31a1(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyad pa yis// bstod de yi ge brgya pa la// badz+ra muHzhes brjod pa yi sa// gshegs pa dang ni mi dmigs lta// de nas slar yang me lha ni// sngar bstan pa de bltas pa dang // khrag gi yon cha ba la
31a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs rnams// sngan gyi rim pas dbul ba dang // mchod pa lnga yis legs mchod de// las kyi gsol ba gdab pa ni// drang srong chen po gdul dka' ba// ma rungs gdug pa 'dul ba po// khyod kyis bdag gi sgrub bya yi// las
31a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di myur du bsgrub tu gsol// ces brjod nas ni gshegs gsol la// badz+ra ag+ne muHzhes pa// brjod de ye shes lha gshegs la// dam tshig lha ni mi dmigs lta// de nas thal ba bsdus pa dang // nam mkha' lding gi gdul
31a4(rgyud 'grel): bya yi// gdon gyis bzung ba'i thod pa ru// blugs te mnan pa bya ba 'am// yang na chu bor dor ba dang // rlung la phyar bas las kun ni// grub pa la ni gdon mi za// rdo rje nag po chen po'i mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg rdzogs so//
31a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje nag po chen po'i mngon spyod kyi las ny-i chi ba/ slob dpon 'phags pa kru sgrub kyi zhal snga nas brgyad pa'i man ngag/ jo bo a b+hA ya k+ShA ras bkod bu/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po sin d+ha ba sangs rgyas grags pas bsgyur
31a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// / kha sbyar dbye ba ni/ de la rang gi snying kha'i hUM las 'phros pa las byung ba'i khro bo'i tshogs spros la/ de rnams kyis de la ye shes lha'i kha sbyar yod na btang bar gsol ba gdab pa ni/ hrIH
31b1(rgyud 'grel): can las ngan sems can 'di// ma nar med rgyud la gnas pa ni// rtse bas bdag gzhan bzlog byed pas// khyod kyis bsrung ba btang du gsol// zhes dngos su rang gi blos de dag gis brjod par bsam// ye
31b2(rgyud 'grel): shes lhas gsan nas de btang ste mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsams la/ snying kha nas 'phros pa'i mchod pa lngas mchod la rang gnas su gshegs/ de nas 'jig rten pa rnams khro bo'i tshogs de
31b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi snying kha nas lcags kyus drangs te/ rgyab nas mtshon cha sna tshogs pas bdebs pas dpag tshad du bskrad par bsam/ gzugs gu gul gyis bdug go// / yum tsaN+Di ka'i sgrub thabs kyi rtsa gzhung
31b4(rgyud 'grel): ma ra/ he ru ka dpal yab yum dang // sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs// nag po che la phyag 'tshal nas// las kyi lha mo'i sgrub thabs bshad// thab khrung tshang ldan mdog
31b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur bya// mthun pa'i dam rdzas tshogs par bsag/ rgya tshogs ling ga mdzub gang ste// rims bzhin ma nor stang du bzhag/ rdor gsum tshal chen me gsum gsum// logs gsum gtor ma mchod pa
31b6(rgyud 'grel): bshamo// rang nyid bde mchog 'khor lo 'am// yang na ye shes mgon por sgom// logs gsum du ni lha mi ste// sku mdog la sogs zhal las shes// de nas bzlas pa tshul bzhin bya// oM ma hA kA
32a1(rgyud 'grel): lI de wi gr-ih+Na bA liM a mu kAM kha kha khA hi khyA hi/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ khaM hri hUM phaT/ gsang sngags de brjod rtags rnams 'byung // des kyang rtags
32a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams ma byung na// drag po'i las la sbyar bya ste// shin tu drag po'i las byed na// mchod rten nag po tshang ldan dang // sgrub bya'i ling ga tshul bzhin bya// rtags kyi ngang ru gnyis kyang gzugs// thun rdzas drag por brtag par
32a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ oM kA li kA li ma hA kA li rak+ta li nr-i rbad shrI b+hak+Sha swa ra bA laM stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya hUM hUM phaT/ de nyid drag tu bzlas pa yis// sgro las me stag 'byung ba ste// de tshe drag po'i las rnams ni// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya/
32a4(rgyud 'grel): des kyang las byed ma 'chun na// dpa' bo'i nga rgyal sngags 'di bzlas// sarba sha~M trAM lam thibs thabs swA hA/ sbyin sreg ngag gi las la gzhug/ mthun pa'i rdzas kyi btang rag btang // mgon po'i gsang ba'i srog
32a5(rgyud 'grel): thig/ dam nyams kyi snying 'byin/ bstan la sdang ba dgral ba'i las// tsaN+Di ka'i tshig sgrub ces bya ba rdzogs so// / rong glings lo tsA ba rdo rje dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o// /
33a1(rgyud 'grel): // nam po chen po'i gang ba'i bsdus ga/ sator ma'i byin brlabs dang bcas pa 'di gyu che rdo rje rmil bums mang bar gcig tu yid ches par dag yang yi ge rti pa yin can go//
33b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal khrag 'thung rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// nag po chen po'i dbang bsdus pa len par 'dod pas/ gnas khang phyag dar bya mchod pa lnga bsham/ der gtor ma gsum bya ba ni/ dang po gtor ma
33b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal can gcig bya/ yi dam dang nag po chen po ye shes pa la bsngo// gnyis pa dpal can gcig nag po chen po bya rog gdong can la sogs pa'i phyogs skyong rnams la bsngo/ dpal med pa'i dkar gtor gcig rigs
33b3(rgyud 'grel): drug dang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams la bsngo/ ka pA la mtshan dang ldan pa gcig tu chang dang bdud rtsi sbyar la mdun du bzhag pa ni rdzas bsham pa'o// // de nas rang lhan skyes su mos pa'i thugs ka'i sa bon las 'od
33b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas/ skad cig gis mdun du dpal nag po chen po yab yum lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba spyan drangs te/ de yang / shar du bya rgod gdong can ma// byang du khyung gi gdong can ma// nub tu khwa'i gdong can ma// lho ru 'ug
33b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdong can ma// shar lhor phag gdong ma/ lho nub tu khyi gdong ma/ nub byang du spyang gdong ma/ byang shar du stag gdong ma'o// lha mo de thams cad sku mdog dmar mo// pang nyi'i steng na zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs par
33b6(rgyud 'grel): sgom/ de dag gi mdun du phyi nang gsang gsum gyis mchod la/ slob ma 'di rnams la dbang bskur du gsol/ tsas pa'i gsol ba lan gsum du gdab bo// de nas rigs drug dang gnyug mar gnas pa la gtor ma 'byung gtor
34a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin byin gyis brlabs la btang / de nas nag po bya rog gdong can la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di rang gi lugs kyi byin brlabs rgyas bsdus gang rung byas pas 'phrin las gzhol zhing gtor ma bya gcan
34a2(rgyud 'grel): gzan gyis za bar btang / yi dam dang ye shes pa'i gtor ma de gtor dbang gi rten du bzhag go/ de nas yi ge brgya pa grub tshad cig bsnyen pa byas pa'i rjes la/ ka pA la'i bdud rtsi l-i dmigs la/ oM hrIHha ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hU~M kA la hUM
34a3(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI shwa ri hUM dzaHces pa sum sbrel du bzlas pa stong phrag gcig bya'o// de nas slob ma des bla ma la phyag dang maN+Dal dang yon phul te gsol ba gdab pa ni/ rje btsun rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso// bdag gi lus ngag yid
34a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi// dri ma ma lus dag bya'i phyir// ma smin smin pa'i dbang rnams gsol// zhes lan gsum gsol ba gdab/ de nas skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dbog pa ni/ slob dpon gyi rjes zlos byed du bcug ste/ sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs
34a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi mchog rnams la// byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi// bdag gis dge ba bgyis pa 'di dag gis// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ ces lan gsum du brjod/ de nas dpon slob gnyis kas mdun gyi na mkha'
34a6(rgyud 'grel): la nag po chen po yab yum la lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba gong ltar bsgoms la/ de rnams kyi phyag nas ye shes kyi bum po'i chus slob ma la dbang bskur bas/ smin mtshams yan chad gang bas bum pa'i dbang thob/ lus kyi dri ma dag
34b1(rgyud 'grel): par gnyis kas mos pa bya/ mgrin pa yan chad gang bas gsang ba'i dbang thob/ ngag gi dri ma dag par mos pa bya/ snying kha yan chad gang bas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob/ sems kyi dri ma dag par mos pa bya/ lte ba nas gsang
34b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas yan chad gang bso dbang bzhi pa thob/ lus ngag yid gsum ka'i dri ma dag par mos pa bya zhing / dngos su slob dpon gyis ka pA la'i bdud rtsi slob ma'i mgon mar blugs te/ khrus byed pa dang 'thung ngu bcug pas/ lus
34b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi chus gang bar bsam zhing gong gi sngags sum sbrel la a b+hi Shiny+tsa yA mi zhes brjod mthar ba mchog gi bkra shis brjod pa tsam gyis dbang bzhi rtogs su thob pa yin/ de nas nag po chen po yab yum
34b4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo brgyad dang bcas pas ka pA la sha khrag gi gtor mas bkang ba bzung nas/ slob ma'i mgo la bzhag ste/ rkang pa brgyad pa dang gtor sngags sgra di ri ri brjod cing / khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srungs shig/ ces zer bar dpon
34b5(rgyud 'grel): slob gnyis kas bsam zhing / dngos su slob dpon gyis/ yi dam dang nag po chen po'i gtor ma gcig tu byas pa de slob ma'i mgo la bzhag ste/ rkang pa brgyad pa dang gtor sngags lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis snang srid kyi lha ma srin
34b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bran du 'khol ba/ srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i nag po chen po gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i spyi bo'i gtsug na lhan skyes bzhugs pa gcig tu dpon slob gnyis kas sgom pa ni gtor ma la brten pa'i 'phrin las
35a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbang ngo // de nas gtor ma bya gcan gyis za sar btang / he ru ka'i yi ge brgya pas kha bskang / dbang bskur mkhan gyi lha rnams rang bzhin gyi gnas su gshegs pa'am/ mi dmigs par sgom/ de nas
35a2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma la bskor ba lan gsum byed du gzhug/ phyag dong maN+Dal phul la/ bka' drin che zhes zer du bcug la ci bder gnas par bya'o// de ltar dbang bzhi 'phrin las gtor ma'i dbang dang lngas nag po chen po'i dbang bsdus pa bskur
35a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// dbang bskur gyi cho ga rin tshon 'phreng 'dra zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rdo rje dril bu pas mdzad pa AM// mgom lags ba mdzad kyi las kyang bzhugs// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ka la hi si te/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i
35a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs/ dpal 'jigs byed phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// dur khrod dang ni dben pa'i sar// drag po las kyi sgrub pa bya// dang po yi dam rdzogs par bsnyen// gter ma'i sbyin pas rigs drug bsdu// rgya chen mchod pa'i srid du
35a5(rgyud 'grel): phuthul// 'dri dang klog dang sku gzugs bzhengs// grangs sogs khrag sngags sgo phug rtags// yar gyi ngo la tsam par bya// me dang lcags ni ngar ba dang // mtshams lon gzhan du mi smra'o// lho ru bltas ti sgrub pa'o// tshogs nyid dag
35a6(rgyud 'grel): pas rgyu nyid sbyangs// mdun du tshogs bsags 'khor lo sgom// 'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa bsdu// zur gsum las sbyor 'dod lngas brgyan// dur khrod ras la khrag gis so// dpral bar rdo rje mthu chen no// thugs dang mgrin par
35b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub snyen lha// dmar smug mdangs kyi de nyid gsol// mngon spyod 'grub pas rab tu gnas// sdom bzung gtor mar bcas te'o// sku dang gtor ma sba bar bya// phur bu phyug mtshan nye bar bzung // mgon po bzhi la sbyin pa gsum//
35b2(rgyud 'grel): rim par phye ste bshad par bya// gang rung gcig gi kun 'grub cing // drag po la ni grol bar bya// chu las skyes pas nyin mtshan sbyar// dgra dang bgegs nyid dgyel bar bya// gri gug nag po hUM gis mtshan// 'bar ba 'od kyis sreg par bya/
35b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid lha ru bya ba yin// dur khrod gnas nas de nyid 'bod// phur pa me 'bar na mkhar 'char// ber nag puso mo g.yas su rjes// dur khrod brgyan zhing thod khrag g.yon// spyi bo'i gnas su mi bskyong brgyan// cung zad zil gyis non par bya//
35b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi rang gi snying po dang // lha'i sngags kyi de yi mthar// spro bsdu zhal nas thugs su bsdus// 'od kyi sprul pas las la bskul// bsnyen pa'i rtags kyi rim pa yis// de nyid bdag la bsdu bar bya// sgrub pa'i yan lag rang nyid do// thugs
35b5(rgyud 'grel): las sprul te mdun du bsam// dmar smug be con 'chang ba can// las byed phyi'i mgon po ste// snyon dang sgrub pa nang dang gsang // drag po sgrub pa phyi yi'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yin// rgyun chags kyis ni 'phrin las sngags// mtshan
35b6(rgyud 'grel): ma gzhung bzhin byung ba dang // rang nyid yi dam gsal bar skyed// mdun du los kyi mgon po bsam// sku gsung thugs su lha nyid dgod// gru gsu mo nang du ling ga bca'// sgra las sprul pa'i 'khor lngas 'gug zer// thod rdza
36a1(rgyud 'grel): brdung zhing bskul bar bya// gdug pas lha lnga dbye bar bya// e las gru gsum dmar nag 'bar// e raMHrdzas lnga 'tsho gas pa'i ling ga la// smra pe sha phaTaHngam nyams dgra po dgug par bya// a pe sha a/ bde gshegs
36a2(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa yang sprul bcas// lha rnams thams cad spang mdzod cig/ nyams pa 'di ni bstan la sdang // mgo ba'i lha rnams nga bzur gcig/ rdzas la zhen na rlag par bya// gru gsum nang du mon pa ni// 'khrid byed nag pos bzung bar bya//
36a3(rgyud 'grel): gnam lcags 'bar ba'i rdo rje 'dis// dmigs pa'i dam nyams ru tra 'di// thar par bya ba'i go med do// sprul pa lnga'i lha lnga dbye// gru gsum khyud na drag po sgrogs// gnas pa'i lha ni gshegs par bya// thugs kyi mgon pos tshe mdangs
36a4(rgyud 'grel): sdud// sku yis nyos bcing gzir bar bya// gsung gis rnam shes dbyings su phang // thugs kyi sha khrag zan du rol// lha mo bzhi'i phung po bzhi// rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas gnas su'o// man ngag 'di dang mi ldan na// dmyal ba'i gnas dang
36a5(rgyud 'grel): nye bar 'gyur// 'di nyid sngags pa ces 'dar bya// lho ru gru gsum nag po la// nang nyid dbang du khrag gis byug/ gdug pa can gyi rdzas dang cig/ dug khrag mtshon nag byug par bya// bzhi la thal chen 'bar ba'i snod // nyer gcig tshad
36a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis sgrub bya la// nyer gcig phur pa'i sum gnyis byug/ mon nag 'bar ba'i lcags kyu can// kha khyer dag la dgod pa yin// cha gsum gtor ma 'phrin las sngags// bdud rtsis bden pa phyogs bcur ba dar// 'bar ba'i lha nyid
36b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pa'i mdog/ dmar nag bsgrang 'phreng tri shul can// kha dog rang nyid gdan du bya// ag tshom drang srong rnam pa'o// slob mas 'bar bar byas pa dang // chas gos nag pos lho ru lta// lcags kyi sgreng bur mi glang sngo// stegs bu'i steng
36b2(rgyud 'grel): du 'dug par bya// yi dam sngags dang nyungs kar gyis// 'bar ba'i snod nyid bskrad cing bsang // shan pa'i khyim nas 'bar ba'o// mchod lnga tshong bar g.yas g.yon no// mon nag skyo gsum rdzas nyid mdun// dgang gzar gnyis ni khyud
36b3(rgyud 'grel): mo la// hUM gis sgra yis phyogs su bskul// 'bar ba'i lha nyid drang srong che// 'jig rten las 'das sku bzhengs shig/ mngon spyod 'phrin las bsgrub slad du// gnas 'di spyan drang byon par 'tshal// spyi bo rdo rje sems dpas brgyan// sngags/
36b4(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag rgya bcing bar bya// g.yas kyi rnam lnga de la 'bul// til sran rdzas ni nyer gcig ste// 'bar ba'i lha khyed mthu bo che// tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyi sras// 'phrin las kun gyi bdag pos te// rig 'dzin kun gyi bsrungs ma che//
36b5(rgyud 'grel): drang srong mgon la bstod par bgyi'o// mngon spyod 'phri9na las sgrub slad du// 'di nyid du ni 'bar bar mdzod// ag ni dza la raMH'bar ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gsal// dgang blugs gsum gyi gso bar bya// gzhung ni las kyi lha nyid bskyed/
36b6(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las bzhin du bzhugs su gsol// mchod pa lnga yi gtor ma dbul// gong bzhin sreg rdzas brgya rtsa gcig/ drug cur dbul bas 'phros pa yis// zhal nas khrag zhag 'khyil bar bsam// bstod pa bya zhing me glang nang // ma ra nag blog
37a1(rgyud 'grel): pas 'bar bar bya// bdud rtsi ba la sres pa dang // dug khrag gis ni ho bya zhing // blo kha la ni khras gis so// dam nyams phung po lnga la // ye shes lnga yis 'bar ba yis// 'phrin las lnga'i dbyings su sbyang // dug lA
37a2(rgyud 'grel): nas bcad par bya// las mgon nag po'i zhal du sbyang // dras mo'i sngags brjod mong lnga brdung // smon lam stobs kyis snang ba sbyang // ling ga'i las ni gong bzhin sbyar// slar yang mchod cing nyer gcig sdeg// bstong bskul rgyas gang ba
37a3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs par bya// 'bar ba'i lha yang de nyid do// me glab steng du dgab par bya// rgya ri laM ShaM ka rten 'og/ rdo rje rgya raM phyung ba bzhin// lha'i pho brang bsam par bya// nga nyid he yi gsung gyur tshe// rdo rje lag tu gtad pa na// de tshe khyod nyid btang par bya// /
37a4(rgyud 'grel): nga yi dka' byung bar du ni// skal pa'i bar du mnan par bya// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya// 'di yis the tshom med par 'grub// zlu ma dang glu bzhi zla kham mo// dkar ser dam ba'i lha dang gnas// tsan dan dkar po shug9// 'o sa
37a5(rgyud 'grel): yi ni byug par bya// 'bras chan dngul phye me tog dkar// 'o mos bsdus pa'i gtor ma'o// mar 'ad til dkar 'bras dkar ni// zhi ba liM ni rab tu sbyar// thams cad khru gang zabs su phyung // kha khyer sor bzhi rab tu sbyar// 'khor ya na ra pu pad+ma/
37a6(rgyud 'grel): dang // rdo rje gdongs pas rim bzhin brgya ma// u dum wa ra 'o ma can// me tog ser po gser phye dang // zho dang ldong ros bro chen no// zas kyi bye brag rgyas pa ste// yam shing dmar po chang la sogs// bu ram zangs phyi shing thog dmar// rab hriM/
37b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rag ta sa sgra// pad+ma rag tas byug pa bya// dbang gi rdzas te kha phyo yis// rgyas pa la ni byug pa'o// dug shing tsher ma can la ni// tshol bu yis ni phyug par bya// dug khrag lcags phye rdo phye'o// mi ngang ba glang khyi dang ra// sran ma'i chan ni
37b2(rgyud 'grel): gsong byed do// khrig gis sbags pa'i gtor ma'o// bdud rtsi nor bu 'bar ba dang // lcags kru tri shul mtshon pa ni// phan phyir rab tu bsam pa'o// brgya dang brgya rtse nyer lnga dang // drug cu yi ni dbul bar bya// zhag bdun nyer gcig zla ba
37b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum// zla ba gcig nas nges par 'grub// mkhas pas dkrugs te gnas pa 'di// phyes te nyams su blang bar gyis// gzhan du smra ba mi bya'o// bud med bu chung chu la ni// sbal sbrul bong bu'i khrag du sbyar// zhag bdun sngags
37b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis thod par blugs// b+h+yoHsteng 'og phyogs la mtshams brgyad na// dus gsum bde gshegs sprul par bcas// bka' bsrung chos skyong mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// dam can thams cad spang mdzod cig/ mon pa nag po zer lam phye// lha
37b5(rgyud 'grel): mo bzhi yis zor sgo phye// zor lam dgra bo'i snying la grongs// sde brgyad bka' yi dmag dpung skyed// phyogs na bzhugs pa sku zur cig/ bdag ni rnal 'byor dam la gnas// nyams pa 'di yis snyad rmugs na// mthu stobs bden pas
37b6(rgyud 'grel): dam du bdar// btsal ba'i las 'di grub par mdzod// chang phung phyogs bcur gtor bar bya// mu stegs 'bar ba'i thod pa la// rdzas ngan drug gis mtsho dkyil te// drag sngags mtshon gyi me dpal 'phro// dmigs pa'i rlung gis btsun pa bya//
38a1(rgyud 'grel): dam nyams dgra bgegs 'khor bcas kyi// sa yi lte phur bshig par bya// gnam gyi 'khru thag bcad par bya// 'khor bcas rdul du brlas par gyis// drag sngags bzlas shing gos nag gang ba// ral pa/
38a2(rgyud 'grel): sprug cing zod rnga brdung // thal chen thun dang phur la sgril// tha ma'am zla ba gcig gis 'grub// skul bas mgon po 'khor bcas kyis// rdul du rlag nas 'od du bsdus// yi ge gsum du bdag nyid ni// yi dam bsal ba'i gnas
38a3(rgyud 'grel): su bsdu// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya// mi zlog nad kyi gangadam pa 'di// dpe la bzhag par mi bya'o// phyag gnyis nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor te// sprul pa'i khro po phyogs mtshams sgo// lan gsum du ni gdab par bya/ hrI/
38a4(rgyud 'grel): ru mi lci nang du lta// dbyings las sprul pa'i mgon po yi// be con las sprul pa'o// rnal 'byor pa'i srog yin no// sku gsung thugs kyi mgon po che// nag po 'am yang na las kyi sbyar// rtags nyid la thob las byung ba// g.yang
38a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mig med bzhin// rang lus ma smin gzhan la sems// sgyu ma skyes pa'i byi'u bzhin// dam tshig med pa'i sngags pa 'aM/ shing tshig thal ba'i mtshon bzhin mo// slob dpon gsod pa'i sngags pa de// ma med kun gyi khyi'u bzhin
38a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang ma thob pa'i sngags pa de// sgra bu 'bar ba'i 'od bzhin no// man ngag med pa'i sngags pa de// tshad med chu bo rgal 'dod bzhin// rdzas ma sogs pa'i sngags pa de// rgyud nyid med pa'i gzhung bzhin no// gtor tshogs med na
38b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yel bar 'gyur// bskul dang bsrung ba'i ngag med na// ma srid dam can g.yel bar 'gyur// dam tshig rdo rje snying la bzhag/ yi ge gsum gyi mnar chu sbyin// sngon dang da lta'i dam tshig 'di// lha khyod mda' par ma byed ce/ 'das
38b2(rgyud 'grel): na dam tshig rdo rje 'dis// snying gi dkyil nas rlag par byed// de bas rnal 'byor dam tshig bsrungs// rnal 'byor sdang yang lha 'di bsam// za ba shos rtag tu dbul bar bya// lha nyid gzhan ni rten mi bya// slob dpon gsan la phyag ma //
38b3(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa rnams dang sre ba min// rtags dang nyams tshong 'odas pa na// sngags pas 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// sbyor ba dam tshig gi le'u ste dang po'o// // sngags pas las 'di brtson par du// 'byung ba bzhi yis
38b4(rgyud 'grel): bon la// nag po'i tshon gyis gso bar bya// zhing bcu bsgral ba'i rag ta 'dis// maM sa bdal ba'i sa gzhi 'dis// drag po'i sgras chag chag btab// rin chen sna lnga rag ta dang // kham pa nag pos bsdu bar bya// bong rim bzhi la dur khrod
38b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan// lcags mkhar gnam sgo gcig pa la// gru gsum nag pos brgyan par bya// zor la shan pa'i rgyun la ni// bud med gtsang mas srang bu bya// zur brgyad srang bu'i gur phub la// na mkha' nag pos brgyan par bya// bya rog nag po
38b6(rgyud 'grel): phod rtsugs te// rgyang bu nag po lnga dang ni// bzhi dang brgyad brgyad brgyad nyid do// bcu gsum rim par bya nag go// mda' nag ltong dmar mdung nag dang // bdud rtsi ra ga ta bshos nag ni// lha yi sku gsung thugs kyi rten// rim pa bzhin du
39a1(rgyud 'grel): gong bzhin sbyar// zur bzhi thod 'khor rgyang bu bzung // zur bzhi gsal shing 'bar ba la// zhing gi rgyal mtshan re re gzugs// stag gzig dom spyang khyi nag dang // mi nag mchod pa tha ma la// gling bzhi nyi
39a2(rgyud 'grel): zla rtsi ta dang // gtor ma bdud rtsi rag ta dang // lha dmag phyogs bzhir re re'o// go mtshon nyungs ka ra la sogs dang // rin chen lnga dang 'bru sna lnga// dar tshon lnga dang mchod lnga dang // zas kyi bye brag dpag med kyi// mtha' bzhi
39a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan cing rta lug dang // ra dang g.yag sogs tshang mar bsham// sku 'am phyag mtshan dgod pa ni// dbus su gtso bo 'khor lnga dang // dur khrod sring mo ma mos skor// dbang po tshangs pa khyab 'jug dang // 'dod pa'i dbang po bdag
39a4(rgyud 'grel): po dang // 'bring gi ri ti kA ti ka/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa// dkar ser mo thing kha spug po dang // dmar po ljang khu ser dang dkar// zla ba pad+ma 'kho lho 'dzam/ be con phub dang phyi wang dang // shol mda' nyi ma snum pa'o// g.yon
39a5(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad phur pa 'dzin// bang rim dang por dgod par bya// lha klu gnod sbyin lto 'phye dang // mi 'am ci yin lha ma yin// bdud dang ba tsan dang dri za'i tshogs// sku mdog sna tshogs mtshon cha rnams// bung rim gnyis par gnas pa'o//
39a6(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas 'jog po stobs kyi rgyu// dung skyong rigs ldan nor rgyas dang // pad+ma chu lho sbrul bzhugs 'khyil// rin chen ut+pal sprin dpung dung // rin chen gser 'phreng pad+ma dmar// pang dkar 'dzin cing ro stong mi// g.yon pa
39b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sbrul zhags so// sku mdog ser dmar sngo zhing ljang // dkar ser dmar dang dkar po'o// drag po'i dus su rim pa bzhin// dkar dmar nag po 'phros pa'i mdog/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa khe ra dang bcas// phur pa
39b2(rgyud 'grel): ral gri sgral ba ni// rim pa bzhin ni 'dzin pa yis// dmigs pa'i lus ngag yid gsum 'joms// dam can rgya mtsho ma lus pa// bzhi pa la ni dgod par bya// nam mkha' rlung bzhu rgya mtsho dang // ma so'i keng rus me 'bar ba// dkar
39b3(rgyud 'grel): ser dmar ljang kha dog go// dur khrod lcags mkhar gru gsum nang // zhing chen nags tshal g.yang gzhi'i gur// rim pa bzhin du rdzogs par bya// 'phrin las gzhung srang gnas su smra// rgyun du sman rag gtor ma dbul// zor
39b4(rgyud 'grel): du byed na ye shes bsdu// dang po gnas dang mchod rdzas te// tha ma dmag dang mtshon cha'o// gong bzhin zor gyi las rnams so// drag po la ni 'khor lnga nyid// srin po'i gzugs nyid rang gi mgo// gro gug thod khrag shin tu khros//
39b5(rgyud 'grel): mgon po stag la zhon pa skyed// ma hA ka la 'khor bcas kyis// thugs dam snyan po skang ba ni// nam mkha'i' mthing nag g.yang gzhi'i gur// bye rog nag po'i phong rtsugs te// zhing gi rgyang bu bcu gsum gyis// sku yi thugs
39b6(rgyud 'grel): ngam skong gyur cig/ ma hA ka la 'khor bcas kyis// thugs dam snyan po skong ba ni// mnga' nag ldog dmar bcu gsum gyis// mdung nag dpol dmar bcu gsum gyis// gsung gi thugs dam skong gyur cig/ ma hA ka la 'khor
40a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas kyis// thugs ngam snyan po skad ba ni// bdud rtsi rag ta'i rgya mtsho dang // bshos pu nag po bcu gsum gyis// thugs kyi dam tshig skong gyur cig/ ma hA kA la 'khor dang bcas// phyi yi mdos kyi skang ba ni
40a2(rgyud 'grel): na mkha' mthing nag phod kyi brgyan// rtsibs brgyad nag po'i gur gyis phub// rgyang bu nag po so gnyis kyis// sku yi dam tshig snyan po skang // ma hA ka la 'khor dang bcas// nang yi mdzes kyi skud pa ni// chos nyid mi 'gyur na mkha' la// rnam
40a3(rgyud 'grel): thar brgyad kyi gur phub te// mtshan nyid so gnyis rgyang bus brgyan// gsung gi dam tshig snyan po skang // ma hA ka la 'khor dang bcas// gsang ba'i mdos kyi skad ba ni// nyi zla skar gsum na mkha' la// zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i gur chen
40a4(rgyud 'grel): phub// zhing chen nags tshal rgyang bu yis// thugs kyi dam tshig snyan po skang // mchod dang skad bshags rgyas par bya// bstod pa dam tshig gzhung bzhin no// yi ge lnga yi spro bas+t+ra dang // a la~M ka li'i 'phreng ba yis// rgyun gyi bshags
40a5(rgyud 'grel): pa mchog tu sngags// sbyor ba thabs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / gru bzhi zlum po pad 'dab brgyad// las kyi lha dang klu chen dgod// klu sman dkar gsum gtor ma dbul// ting 'dzin 'phro 'dus 'phrin las bcol//
40a6(rgyud 'grel): zhag gsum le ni nges por 'grub// ma grub klu nyid gnas pa'i sar// klu yi bzung ba'i dbang dang ni// sgra nag gcod pa'i dbang la sogs// dbang rigs drag po sbyar byas te// klu las skyes pa'i nang du blugs// kha nyid bsdams la
40b1(rgyud 'grel): sba bar bya// gzugs nyid la ni thun gyis brab// 'di la 'grub 'gyur the tshom med// gong gi rdzas nyid ling gar bca'// nga mod zlas gnas der sbas byas ma// klu yis 'dzin par the tshom med// rgyu lam g.yas su dmigs pa yi//
40b2(rgyud 'grel): khang pa'i rtsa bar sbas byas na// 'gas par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// bdag dang mgon po'i 'phro bdu yis// khyab 'jug sde brgyad las la sngags// zhag bdun bar du bsgrub pa bya// rgyu ba'i dus su gter ma dbul// gong gi rdzas la
40b3(rgyud 'grel): dmod pa zlas// rgyu ba'i dus su dmigs pa yis// yul nyid klu gnyen gnyan pa'i sar// yul lha la sogs gozu spang bad re// rdzas nyid de yi phyogs su'o// zhag bdun bar du nges par 'grub// bedag dang lha yi sprul pa yis// dmigs
40b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i yul nyid gar bsam// me dang rlung gi 'khor lo bskor// bden pa bdar zhing sngags nyid ni// lan bdun bzlas na chu 'khyags 'joms// lha 'od gzhan la bsdu ba dang // gzhan nyid 'di la bsdu bar bya// gcig tu mkhas pas sra ba'o//
40b5(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu 'dun spyi gtsugs te// gzugs kyi bshang ba'i lam du'o// smra ba phyi yi gtsug tu'o// gnyis kyi snying kha me dang chu// rnam nyid spro bsdu'i nus pa dbye// rengs bkug las ni phur pa'i gzugs// hU~M gnyis mthun pa'i rdzas kyis rgyur//
40b6(rgyud 'grel): chags pa'i mdog mtshungs spro bsdus tshogs// rta dang g.yag yang mthun por 'gyur// g.yas kyi 'og nas blangs byas te// sngags nyid dmod pa bdun du bzlas// g.yon gyi phyogs su gtor bar bya// lus nyid lcags kyi rdo rje ste// cis kyang
41a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs par mi 'gyur ro// mtshon nag la naM lnga nyid dang // gsum la gsum dang bzhi la bzhi// 'dud pa'i phyogs su sngags nyid btab// gtor ma dbul zhing na ma btags// yar gyi ngo la mchod pa bya// mar gyi ngo
41a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pa bya// phur bu sor bzhi mgon por skyed// mgul du btags na nges par 'grub// mtshon nag la ni sngags bzlas shing // de yi phyogs su gtor bar bya// 'gro gyis mtshan la sngags bzlas te// khug ma nag po ro bsdu bar bya//
41a3(rgyud 'grel): mdud pa nag pos bcing bar bya// lcags kyi khang par chud par bsam// 'di yi 'ching bar the tshom med// ji srid ma grol bar du'o// so phag la ni snyen pa'i gzugs// khru 'am sor brgyad phyogasu bstan// dmigs par bya ba zhabs kyi ste//
41a4(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod sa yi snod du bas mo// rgyun du dmigs pa'i gter mar dbul// sbyor ba ngan pa bzlog par 'gyur// dbyings las sprul pa'i mgon po yis// nyen nyid ral gris bcang bar bya// rdzas la bcug na sel bzlog 'gyur// dug khrag gis
41a5(rgyud 'grel): ni byug par bya// gang la seng ldeng phur bu de// smug cing 'khums par 'gyur ba yin// mtshan mo rgyu ba'i gzugs rnams dang // nogs la gnas pa mi dang ni// sa la gnas pa 'bul ba yi// skyes dang khrag la gong gi gzugs// gi khrag gis
41a6(rgyud 'grel): byug phyogs su rba// zla ba phyed nas cho 'phrul bong // gru gsum khrag gis gang ba yis// skong po'i zer bzhi phyogs bzhir bya// sde brgyad byams pas srid du bcad// yi dam lha yi rtsi ta ru// las kyi lha nyid dmar po te// kha dog dmar po ber
41b1(rgyud 'grel): gyon zhing // bzed lhung dmar po zla bas brgyan// a nyid dkar dmar sngags kyis bskor// dbyangs yig gi ni dang po gnas// mthar gnas bzhi yi dang po la// dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan par bya// gsal byed sde tshan gnyis pa yis// bzhi
41b2(rgyud 'grel): pa gnas zhing sde tshan bzhi'i// lnga pa bzhag pa'i yi ge ste// sid+d+hi b+h+rUM gyis mtha' nyid rten// sngags kyi sham bur gdags par bya// phyag rgya bzhi yi bcing bar bya// rigs dang mthun pas rgyas btab cing // bsrung bya dmigs dang snyen po sbyar// yi ge ba'i
41b3(rgyud 'grel): yi nus pa yis// da lta nyid du che zad yang // lan gsum gyis ni bzlog par 'gyur// dar dmar brgyan pa'i mnga' dar g.yab// thugs las sprul pa'i lha nyid spro// shar gyi phyogs nas bskul ba ni// shar phyogs lha mau ka tsatsaM ka/ 'jigs pa'i bud med dkar
41b4(rgyud 'grel): mo ni// sku yi sprul pa 'bum dang bcas// lcags kyu zhags pas tshe khug la// sa yi phyogasu tshe bsdus shig/ lha mo gsum la rigs 'dre'o// me chu rlung ces 'don pa sgyur// sku las sprul pa'i 'khor lnga yang // sku yi sprul pa 'bum dang bcas// lcags
41b5(rgyud 'grel): kyu zhags pas tshe khug la// mkha' yi phyogs che bsdus shig/ gsung las skyes pa'i lha srin yang // sku yi sprul pa 'bum dang bcas// lcags kyu zhags pas tshe khug la// rnam shes brgyad la dpal skyed cig/ gong gi sngags kyis dgug par bya//
41b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi dmar po 'od zer 'phro// lus nyid gang ba'i mgon po yis// bu ga kun tu gang 'jigs sam// sbrul pa yang ni bsdu bar bya// mi dmigs pa ni dam pa'o// gtor ma dbang nyid las kyi lha// snying khar gong bzhin spyi bor bzhag/ gong gi las
42a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi gzhan la'ang bskur// gtor ma dkar po zhi ba'i rdzas// nad gdon bgegs rnams zhi ba'i rten// zhi ba'i gtor ma'i dbang bskur bas// zhi ba'i rig 'dzin thob par shog/ gzhan gsum la rigs 'dre// be con nor bu sman rag
42a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // thun zlar yang na gtor mas so// mgon po 'chi med gdams pa 'di// bla ma'i zhal las blang bar bya// ngar mi rgya rtsas nang sel zhing // mtheb k+Sha yis ni gdon grol 'gyur// chang bu yis ni bgegs zhi ste// zur gsum gtor mas bar chad sel//
42a3(rgyud 'grel): gzungs chu yi ni grib sel 'gyur// dpral ba mgrin pa snying kha ru// sku gsung thugs kyi mgon po bas mo// 'od 'phros lus ngag yid gsum gyi// grib sogs mdun du nag po byung // rdzas nyid la ni rim bzhin stim// khru gang ba yi ngar mi la// gtor ma la
42a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs sbyin par bya// sngags nyid rdzas kyi brgya rtsa bya ba// khrus nyid rol mo'ang de bzhin no// nad pa'i gos kyi g.yogs byas te// lho 'am rgya raM lam du skyal// 'byung po sngags kyis 'chi bdag tshim// me dang chu yis spyad par bya// 'dir ni gong gi tshe mchog
42a5(rgyud 'grel): bya// mgon po 'chi spu grib sel 'dir// bla ma'i zhal la blang bar bya// zhal mthong rtsa ba'i man ngag yin// sbyor ba gnad kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// gtor ma chen po las la sbyar// mgon po'i 'phrin las gzhung srang ste// mdun gyi na mkhar
42a6(rgyud 'grel): mgon po bsam// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la// gru gsum nag pos brgyan par bya// 'bru yi phye dang sna lnga dang // srid pa'i ma mo khru gang bya// mdog nag ral pa nag po la// gri yi khrag gi thugs par bya// ngar mi mtheb kyu chang pu dang // gtor ma la
42b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs nag po la// gri khrug gis byugs sha khrag gam// brgya cwa brgyad du sngags kyis dbul// mgon po gtor ma gso zhing dbul// sngags pas mgon po'i sngags nyid zla/ slob ma gnyis kyi btab par bya// rol mo rgyun du bya ba yin// bar du bdud bzlog
42b2(rgyud 'grel): lan bdun sbyar// dgra yi phyogasu gtor ma 'phang // bzung chus phyogasu gtor ba re bya// ma mos las kun sgrub par 'gyur// mgon po'i stong bskul drag po bya// dbang dang gtor ma'i las rnams kum las bzhin ma ni rab tu sbyar// las dang mthun pa'i mdo yang sbags//
42b3(rgyud 'grel): yis las kun 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan byed las kyi mgon po ste// sprul pa re'i phyogasu'o// dar dmar brgyan pa 'di nyid // tri nyid hUM gis dgug par bya// gang nyid bka' dang dran bzhin bsam// lha 'dre mi gsum 'du bar 'gyur// gong gis mkhas spyod rnam nyid bstam// khams
42b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum kun 'dus lte ba ro// las dag 'grub par the tshom med// las kyi lha las mgon po spro// 'bar ba yi ni khams kun sreg/ sa la rlung dang tshul sa// me la chu dang rlung la ni/ rdo rje rgyararaM gnan par bsam/ ting 'dzin sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis/ mi 'grub pa ni gang yang med/ 'phrin
42b5(rgyud 'grel): las kyis ni las la sbyar// gtor ma yis ni las kun 'grub 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// nyan pas smod byed bden pa brdar/ rje nyid bsdus na the tshom med// smra ba rigs pa ling ga'i gnad // bzlas pas gzhan la smra mi bya/ gcig las spel bar mi bya'o// bla ma'i man ngag sngon du phyu 'di la
42b6(rgyud 'grel): lhag par mi bya zhing // lbu ba yang ni mi bya'o// gal te 'das na lha 'di yis// klad pa'i rgyu srab stu 'goms par 'gyur// de bsdu tshul bzhin dam tshig srungs/ lha 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sbyor ba yan+na lAg+na gi le'u bzhi pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po'i sgrub thabs gsang ba mdzod/
42b7(rgyud 'grel): kyai las byang rdzogs so// bla mo bram ze bde bas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so// tshul khrimasashes rab kyi myan+ya ngag lA rI skur ro// te tsa'i dpe'o//
43a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal mgon po'i gsang mdzod bzhugs so//
43b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrin ma u pa d+he sha/ ma hA ka la sa ma ya/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i gsang ba'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal mthu chen thob pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// de'i sgrub pa 'am sgrub rdzogs/ bstan
43b2(rgyud 'grel): pa srung byed las byed pa// de yi sngon byung 'di ltar ro// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / bdag nyid ro langs bde ba yis// stan la dbab phyir sgrub pa []/ gtsugs// nga yi don nyid kya kho bos ma
43b3(rgyud 'grel): mthong / []srog bdag/ r+tha nag po de sngon byung // srog gi snying po de phul nas// stan dang sgra tha 'atsapa pa sgrub pa yi// stong gi/ cugadu ga rgyal gyi gnas bstan mtshang sa pa'ang kho bos srung // de yis yid gzhungs
43b4(rgyud 'grel): zhag bdun bsgrubs// da nyid ston du the tshom med mas byed bdu a sa // las dang las laSh+Takyi r-i ma rnam babyo tsha khye kyi brgya ba #ma yi pa bgyis// srog snying phul ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / pha nyid dga' rab dbang phyug/
43b5(rgyud 'grel): ma nyid dur khrod pe ta []laM// mdog nag gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ grub pa'i la []98/ sde brgyad ma mo bran du 'khol// brjod pa tsam gyis skrag par byed// skul bas the tshom tsi byar yod// skye rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
43b6(rgyud 'grel): mgon po sngon byung gi le'u rdzogs so// @@/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal matsar lo// nyams []dga'u myu ru chang med du/ dang // dur khrod gnas sogs shin tu shis// shU lnga ra shwa khrag la sogs
44a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bru yi snying po bdud rtsi shis// maN+Dal zlum po gru gsum nag/ bse phor gri thod thod rngu shis// rten dang be con mchog phur dang // seng ldeng phur pa g.yab dAr shis// gnas dang sgrub pa'i yo byad bstan pa'i le'u ste
44a2(rgyud 'grel): dang po'o// // sngon du gong gis yan lag ma po nga snrubs// mdun du skyedod la ma btsun par bya// rgyun du mchod dang gtor ma bya// dom dang khyi nag bya nag go// a tsa ra dang ston pa dang // ban d+he nag po 'o
44a3(rgyud 'grel): papar 'gyur// mdo yi dam kyi bsnyen pa tshang sa/ ga nag ral gri thod pa 'dzin/ mganas chag zhin// sgrub pa'i dus su bdag nyid sgrub thos 9// ma tshogs ma ra mthu chen thob pa'o// brten pa'i \u0f7fyi ge lnga yi nus pa grub pa'i bsdu// snying po gnyis pas btsun
44a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// nag po phur pa thod pa 'dzin// snying po dang pos btsun par bya// snyen pa'i yan lag can du bshad// sngags kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya// rtags dang snyen 5\u0f7fsgrub kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // sku yi 'khor
44a5(rgyud 'grel): lnga sngo brgyad dang // thugs las sprul pa'i9Talha mo bzhi// gzhan yang bka' 'og ma 'dus mang // nag po du ma phyogs bcur 'phro// 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// dmar / mdun du mgon po nag chag
44a6(rgyud 'grel): be tsen gsung gi/ thogs// ber nag phong kha 'chang ba can// lhas kyi rim pa de la bcol// skul rbad bsad pa'i tshe gau bya// sreg mnan zor gyi las rnams kyi// bstan pa srung bar 'di dgos so// nag po mdos bya nyams pa skang //
44b1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa yis ni rgyan bshags bya// gcig las spel bar mi bya'o// sngon du dang po shin tu ces// mon nag spungs pa dmar po 'byung // las mtha'i rim pa tshul bzhin bya// las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// dang pa
44b2(rgyud 'grel): yaM ngam gzhung srang la// las kyi mgon po 'khor bcas bskyed// cho ga rim pa tshul bzhin bya// khrus byas maN+Dal phul nas ni// slob ma de nyid gtsug par bya// sngon 'gro dag las rgyud sbyangs la// gus pa bstan pos
44b3(rgyud 'grel): mdun na 'dug/ sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes dbab// sngags nyid byin pas grol bar 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi bstod pa bya// phyag na rdo rje de la bstod// gtor ma'ang bya 'acu sems la skyeng ba shags pa/ spyi bor bzhag par bya// mos pa yon phul
44b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang bar gdams par bya// nga la gnag pa'i phyogs su naM// ming tsam smra bar mi bya'o// rjes su snang ba'o le'u ste lta pa'o// gang gi las kyi lha de nyid// rin chen rgyun can po con no// b+ha su d+hi ba'i 'khor gyis bskur/
44b5(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma rgyun du btang bar bya// gang 'dod rdzas de rtag la dbul// gang 'dod gsol btab sngags nyid gdags// rten gyi rgyal mtshan rgyun du rten// lus dang grib ma ltar du glag/ rgyan du gnas su brten par bya// nor sgrub pa dang / rgyun
44b6(rgyud 'grel): du rten pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / bstan pa bsrung ba'i dam du bzhag/ mig gi 'bras ltar gces par tshangs// gar oM A dam hUM 6\u0f7f/ sku gsung thugs kyi'o// oM badz+ra yekra d+hi ba ma hA ka la kha tro ta hU~M/ nye ba'i snying po'o//
45a1(rgyud 'grel): oM d+he ba a su ra pra ti dza/ g+hu hI dza ho b+ha d+h+yA ta ra tsa hi na da/ kur b+hi dzi dzats+tsha/ drag rag sha sa ma ya daM daM dza dza tsU n+su/ sgrub pa'i snying po'o// oM d+hi ba a su ra a ro ka la yai kr-i du na ma ka ru shaM Shau tr-i tr-i ma r-i ma ra tshin+ta tshin+tu b+hu
45a2(rgyud 'grel): ta b+hud ta hUM phaT/ las sngags btsun pa'o// sa ma ye dza dza/ spyan drang ba'i 'o// dza hUM baM ho/ snyim pa'o// oM d+he ba a su ra hUM/ skyed pa'i sngags so// thun ka la rag sha rni dza rbad/ []/ [] ed / da cig
45a3(rgyud 'grel): dgra bo'i snying la thun b+h+yo/ thun gyi sngags so// oM d+hi ba a su r-i hUM pra ti dza g+hA hi dza/ d+h+yA ta ra tsa g+h+ri na hUM phaT/ bong pa'i sngags so// a~M d+he ba a su ra ni rI mar snying snying / dgra bgegs snying la lAM/ ma ra ya thums/ snying khrag thang la phyung / nyos
45a4(rgyud 'grel): khyer yeng khyer/ snying khrag kha ru lcug/ gsang ba'i sngags so// oM dzo ha naM/ mo ha ni/ taM pa ni/ b+ha lin ta kha'i/ gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags so// oM da ma chang gi ni i a/ 'ad+mo pra ba rno bo 'bras pa ti sa che ta sngo b+hi ba sa d+hi'o hUM thA tha/ glu blang
45a5(rgyud 'grel): zhing dgyes par btab pa'o// dra ya ba kha dza dza/ ma hA u pa kha nI pA thA na hUM hUM phaT/ zor gyi sngags so// oM ag naM dz+wa la raM/ me lha'i sngags so// s+phu ra ya u gu tsag sha rni tra snying la tsakra dza la raM yaM baM rbad/ ling ga sreg pa'i 'o// aM d+hi ba a
45a6(rgyud 'grel): su ra hUM ki la ya hUM/ phur pa'i sngags so// trag rag sha ru ra ti ba ra ni tri thun rbad phaT/ phur pa gdab pa'i sngags so// trag rag sha rang ne sid+d+hi ma gu sha hUM/ srung ba'i sngags so// drag rag sha kur b+hi taM taM tri ma ra ya rbang / khams thams rbang/
45b1(rgyud 'grel): drag rag sha sa ma ya phrom shar phob/ trag rag sha/ a b+hi ni rag sha a hril zil phrom shar phob/ dgra bgegs bskrad pa'i sngags so// oM d+hi ba a su ra hUM/ b+ha su pus ting ku ru ye swA hA/ nor sgrub pa'i sngags so// nI tri staM pa ya
45b2(rgyud 'grel): nan/ gnan pa'i sngags so// las kyi sngags rnams shaM bur gdagus/ sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// / bdun du sbubs na so cig nas// dgra dnges par 'chi bar 'gyur// sring mo bzhi yi sgrub pa bya// mchi ba can
45b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum smra ba canA/ sha dang khrag gi gtor ma byA// thun bzhir sgrub cing rbad par bya// oM a ka la tse'u d+has a d+ha ri NAM/ oM aM sa maM ts+tsha/ s+ya ka ma ma ri tAM/ oM a b+ha ma tA/ then kra ba la d+ha re na nAM/ oM a b+hai tA ru ru d+hi ra bI wa hUM/
45b4(rgyud 'grel): snying po'o// bong pri badz+ra sa ta pa la ti/ ma sa kha'i/ rag ta kha'i/ sarba kha'i/ hUM ga la hUM/ gang ga la/ las kyi sngags so// sreg gnan gtor ma zor du 'phang // thong rnga brdung zhing skul cing rbang // chas gos nag po bgo bar bya// sring mo
45b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// shin tu gces pas srog ltar bcang // 'di nyid gang la yod pa des// bskul na dgra de'i srog la rgol// khros na dgra bo'i rta phyugs dang // 'khor rnams rlag cing cho 'phrul ston// des na 'di nyid
45b6(rgyud 'grel): lus la bcang // yod pa tsam gyis dgra kun thub// smra na gshegs las rgyal bar 'gyur// ces pas bsngags pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // dpal nag po chen po'i gsang ba'i man ngag/ slob dpon ro langs bde bas gdams pa rdzogs
46a1(rgyud 'grel): so// // bram ze chen po la rim par brgyud nas/ tshul shes sgyur ba'i man ngag gi rgyud do// mgon po 'di man ngag gi dbang du byas pa yin pas/ sgrub thag nye'o rdzogs so// bla ma rin chen 'od pa'i phyag
46a2(rgyud 'grel): dpe la/ bla ma sang 'ong pa'i zhal zhus so// de'i dpe la dag par byas te/ rim par ban chung gis kyang zhal zhus so// / dam tshang 'dus pa'i dbang bzhulas so// rgya gar skad du/ sa ma yA/ a b+hi she ka ta/ ke duH/ bod skad du/ dam
46a3(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'dus pa'i dbang // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul gyi grangs kyi mgon po bkug/ sha khrag rgyan pa'i gtor sogs dbul// bstod sogs dam tshig rdo rje gtang // snang ba zhus pas snang bar bsam// two hA
46a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa'i dpal mgon po dang lha mo rnams snyan gsan cing thugs btang du gsol/ khyed rnams kyi spyan sngar/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung / dkon mchog gi dbu phangs bstod/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul
46a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jim dge 'dun gyi sde skyong / dam tshig cig la gnas par khwas bslangs pa bzhin du/ bdag dang slob ma sangs rgyas ma rgyas kyi bar du/ srung skyob po dngos grub stsal du gsol/ rten cig la 'du ba dang / snying po cig la 'du ba dang / chos nyid cig la
46a6(rgyud 'grel): 'du ba dang / mchod pa dang gtor ma cig la 'du ba dang / dam tshig cig la 'du ste/ phan tshun 'khum ldog/ zhe ma sdang / phrag ma dog/ 'khon dang sel med par mdzad du gsol/ de las 'das na/ khyed rnams rang sha rang gis za ba dang / rang khrag rang
46b1(rgyud 'grel): gis 'thung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang blus te/ gnar med par gyur ta re/ de bas na bdag dang slob ma la 'go ba dang 'dres pa dang gnas par mdzad du gsol/ mgon po rnams kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa legaso legaso de bzhin du
46b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// thabs yin no gsung / legaso brjod/ da ni dbang bskur te/ 'di ni mgon po kun la byin pa'i gtor ma ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bden stobs kyis/ bstan pa bsrung ba'i mgon po ma lus kun// dam tshig cig la 'du
46b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dbang thob shog/ 'di ni mgon po kun gyis myangs pa'i bdud rtsis te// 'di ni mgon po kun gyis spyi bor khur ba'i dam chos te// 'odadi ni mgon po kun gyis bltas pa'i mar me ste// 'di ni mgon po kun gyi snying la gnas pa'i srog yin te/
46b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni mgon po kun gyi lag tu gtang ba'i rdo rje ste// lhag ma sbyar te brjod par bya// gang bzhin gsol gdab byin par bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig sgrub pa'i rigs yin te// dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis//
46b5(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa bsrung ba'i mgon po ma lus kun// rig 'dzin 'di la 'gro zhing 'dres gyur cig/ oM ma hA ka la sarbAHsau ma yAHsid+hi hUMHaHhris brgyan dar dmar dbu thong dbul// 'gro ba 'du ba'i rten 'brel thob// mgon po 'dus pa yi ge bcu ces byas rdzogs/
46b6(rgyud 'grel): bla maM bram zes mdzad pa rdzogs so// tshul shes rgyur ro// gtor ma dbus g.yas su bdud rtsi/ mdo rgyud po ti/ gyi gcig pa'i rdzogs yi du thams g.yon du mar me/ yi ge bcu pa/ mdun du rdo rje dang mchod pa'o lag len no//
47a1(rgyud 'grel): // bskang gso ma 'angan ma bzhugs ka/
47b1(rgyud 'grel): dpal mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal nag po chen po bya rog ma la bskang so bya bar 'dod pas/ dang por mgon g.yag dang lug dang bya dag gi rgyal mtshan dang / tshogs dang gtor ma dang mchod pa thams
47b2(rgyud 'grel): cad tshogs par byas la/ 'di skad du gye ro bar bya'o// hUM mi mngon na mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// bcom ldan dpal chen bde mchog 'khor lo la// sku gsung thugs kyi mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la// phyi
47b3(rgyud 'grel): nang gsang bar bcas pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs 'bul// sku gsung thugs dang 'gal ba ci mchis bzod par gsol// bskang ngo bskal par thugs ngam bskang // hUM glu gsum mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// 5
47b4(rgyud 'grel): shes mgon po bya rog ming chen nag po che// zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gar dang bcas// sku la dur khrod brgyan dang bcas pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// do nub spyan 'dren 'dir gshegs mchod pa bzhes// bskad de bskal
47b5(rgyud 'grel): par thugs dmo bskang // de yi sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i yum// dkar mo glog phreng sku yi yum// dmar mo rtsa 'jib gsung gi yum// na ka mo tsan ti thugs kyi yum// bskang ngo // hUM da mar nag gtum drag 'bar ba'i dur
47b6(rgyud 'grel): khrod nas// sprul ba'i mgon po bya rog gdong can bzhi// shar nas srog gcod ltas ngan gtong pa'i bya rog gdong // tshangs ris mgon po 'bum dang bcas// bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang // lho nas za byed skyo 'bor/
48a1(rgyud 'grel): gtong ba'i bya rog gdong // za byed gshin rje nag po 'bum dang bcas// bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang // nub nas khrag nad dal yams 'gyed pa'i bya rog gdong // 'apud byed sbas pa ma mo 'bum dang
48a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas// bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang // byang nas bdun rgyud rtsad nas gcod pa'i bya rog gdong // snang sring lha srin sha za 'bum dang btsas// bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang // hUM keng rus me dpung 'bar ba'i dkyil
48a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor nas// mkha' 'gro drug dang lha mo brgyad// mkha' 'gro ma dang zho byed ma// bsrung byed ma dang chos sku ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// tsher gsang nag mo bya rog mgo/ 'gugs byed sngon mo stag gi mgo/ gsod byed nag mo seng ge'i mgo
48a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten las grung mkha' 'gro ma// bskang ngo bskal par thugs ngam bskang // 'jog rten 'dzin pa'i dbang mo che// las kyis sprul pa'i lha mo brgyad// dbang mo za byed 'gugs byed ma// myos byed gsod byed rgas mkhan mo// brlag
48a5(rgyud 'grel): byed ma dang mgyogs ma'i tshogs// bya rgod la sogs mgo brnyan tshogs su sprul// bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang // hUM sprul pa'i mgo brnyan bcu drug ni// stag dang gzig dang ngom dang dred// seng ge spyang ki chu srin mgo/ 'phar ba
48a6(rgyud 'grel): khyung dang 'ug pa'i mgo/ khra dang bya rgod kaM ka'i mgo// sbrul dang sha wa dag gi mgo/ phag gi mgo can la sogs pa'i// bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang // gzhan yang mgon po'i 'khor tshogs kyi// seng ge gdong can la sogs
48b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// pho bdud nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // mkha' 'gro sgrol byed la sogs pa'i// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // gang po mdzes pa la sogs pa'i// dregs pa sum cu'i thugs dam bskang // legs ldan nag po la sogs pa'i//
48b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal mgron bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi// bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang // hUM sha khrag mtsho ltar gang ba'i dur khrod nas// ro langs mang po bsnol ba'i khri stengs na// drag po smon pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs// nag po gcer
48b3(rgyud 'grel): bu sbrul gyis brgyan// khyi la zhon nas dgra bgegs 'dul// rgyal po sha la za ba'i ro langs bcu// bram ze dmar po khrag la 'thung ba bcu// rje rigs gser mdog tshil la 'jab pa bcu// gdol pa nag po rkang gcog rus pa
48b4(rgyud 'grel): mur baM bcu// dmangs ris sngo skra pags pa za ba bcu// dge slong gtsang ma dbang po za ba bcu// sngags pa nag po don snying nang khrol za ba bcu// khyi'u gzhon nu dri chu skom du 'thung ba bcu// bud med sngon mo ro ras gos su gyon pa
48b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu// keng rus 'jigs pa sha med pags med bcu// de ltar ro langs nag po brgya yi thugs dam bskang // bskang ngo bskal par thugs ngam bskang // hUM nag po stong gi thugs dam bskang du ni// mgyogs byed nag po bya
48b6(rgyud 'grel): nag zhon pa brgya// mon pa nag po phag nag zhon pa brgya// sir sgra nag po sbrul nag zhon pa brgya// bdung po nag po rta nag zhon pa brgya// ro zan nag po 'bring nag zhon pa brgya// khyab pa nag po lug nag non po brgya// bon
49a1(rgyud 'grel): bo nag po dre'u na gzhon pa brgya// sgo ba nag po rlung nag zhon pa brgya// shan pa nag po khyi nag zhon pa brgya// lings pa nag po sha nag zhon pa brgya// de ltar nag po stong gi thugs dam bskang // bskang
49a2(rgyud 'grel): ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang // hUM gnod sbyin khri yi thugs dam bskong ba ni// dgra bo'i bla srog mtha' nas 'gugs pa'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong // dgra la mi kha brlang gzhi gtong ba'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong // dgra bo'i
49a3(rgyud 'grel): lo thog 'bru bcung 'jib pa'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong // dgra la mi nang phyugs nang gtong ba'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong // skye 'gro rtsis la 'debs pa'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong // dgra bo'i dbugs len srog lo 'jab pa'i 'byung
49a4(rgyud 'grel): po gnod sbyin stong // dgra bo'i sha za rkos la 'debs pa'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong // dgra bo'i bdun rgyud mtho' nas sdud pa'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong // dgra bo'i rjes gzhi dur nas slong ba'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong // dgra bo'i
49a5(rgyud 'grel): gnam sa skor gyis 'debs pa'i 'byung po gnod sbyin stong // de ltar 'byung po gnod sbyin khri yi thugs dam bskang // bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang // hUM ma mo bye ba'i thugs dam bskang ba ni// dgra lo gar 'phog bla
49a6(rgyud 'grel): bring byed pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum// dgra bo'i mdangs 'phrog bcud la 'jib pa'i ma mo nog mo 'bum// dgra bo sho'u khram la 'debs pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum// dgra bo'i srog la 'jab pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum// dgra la nad rgyal
49b1(rgyud 'grel): tshen drub 'phen pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum// gling bzhi stong gsum nyul ba'i ma mo nag mo 'bum// dbugs 'phrog srog la pa rgyug pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum// sha za rkos la 'debs pa'i ma me nag mo 'bum// khrag 'thung rkang la
49b2(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum// stong gsum brlag par byed pa'i ma mo nag mo 'bum// de ltar ma mo nag mo bye ba'i thugs dam bskang // bskang ngo bskal par thugs dam bskang // hUM sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang ba ni// bar snang
49b3(rgyud 'grel): ro la lding ba'i bya rgod khaM// sha za khrag la 'thung ba'i lce spyang khyi// pags glang rgyu ma 'khyer ba'i wa khyi khri// ro la khyur ming byed pa'i stag gzig khri// ro za ro gos gyon pa'i srin po khri// keng rus rjes la snom pa'i gzhang ki ra khri// skang/
49b4(rgyud 'grel): dang dri le brgyug pa'i dri za khri// khrag bathung sha rus 'byed pa'i 'phar pa khri// nang khrol don snying za ba'i sbrul gdug khri// mdun bsu phyi la 'brang ba'i yi dgas gzugs can khri// de ltar sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang // bskrang ngo
49b5(rgyud 'grel): bskal par thugs dam bskang // hUM thugs dam bskong ba'i dam rdzas ni// thams cad sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi dang // rAk+ta nga mar gyi arga dang // sha khrag dkyil ba'i gtor ma dang // snang gsal 'od kyi zhun mar dang // sha chen spos kyi dung
49b6(rgyud 'grel): sprin dang // tshogs kyi zhal zas mang po dang // mgon lug nag po spyi dkar dang // bya mo nog mo gser mig dang // phyi nang gsang ba'i dam rdzas kyis// chos skyong nag po 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang // bskang po bskal bar thugs
50a1(rgyud 'grel): dam bskang // b+h+rUM sku yi dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// bya rgod mda' yis thugs dam bskang // rak+ta rnam gsum gsung gi rten// gsung gi rten gyis/ tsit+ta rnam gsum thugs kyi rten// thugs kyi rten gyis thugs
50a2(rgyud 'grel): dam bstang // g.yag lug nag po phyi yi rten// phyi yi rten gyis thugs dom bskang // bya nag rgyal mtshan nang gi rtan// nang gi rten gyis thugs dam bskang // gri rgod snying chen gsang ba'i rten// gsang ba'i rten gyis thugs dam bskang
50a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bod pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// g.yab dor nag pos thugs dam bskang // dam tshig gnyen po bsre ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi sman gyis thugs dam bskang // rak+ta zhal du gsol ba'i phyir// dmar chen argas thugs dam bskang
50a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub pa'i phyir// su ra chang gis thugs dam bskang // rtag tu mi 'bral 'grogs pa'i phyir// rtag gtor chen pos thugs dam bskang // rgyun du 'phrin las bcol ba'i phyir// rgyun gyi gtor mas thugs dam
50a5(rgyud 'grel): bskang // rbad pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// khyi nag snying gis thugs dam bskang // gsang ba'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// gri rgod snying gis thugs dam bskang // bsgral ba'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// lug nag snying gis thugs
50a6(rgyud 'grel): dam bskung // bskang ba'i dam rdzas yin po'i phyir// lug nag spyi dkar thugs dam bskang // dgyes pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// mkha' lding nag pos thugs dam bskang // nal bu'i sha khrag gtor chen 'dis// yum chen
50b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis thugs dam bskang // bsad pa'i sha khrag snying sna 'dis// bya rog gdong can bzhi yi thugs dam bskang // tshogs phung sha sna 'bru chen 'dis// mkha' 'gro drug dang lha mo brgyad kyi thugs dam bskang // bshos bu dmar nag
50b2(rgyud 'grel): snying gis brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'dis// legs ldan seng ge gdong can la sogs pa'i// pho bdud nyi shu rtsa gcig thugs dam bskang // khrag sna sman sna sbyar ba'i gtor ma 'dis// mkha' 'gro sgrol byed la sogs pa'i// dbang phyug nyi/
50b3(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa brgyad thugs dam bskang // dkar gsum sman gyis sbran pa'i gtor ma 'dis// gang po mdzes pa la sogs pa'i// dregs pa sum cu'i thugs dmo bskang // 'bru bcud bdud rtsis bkang ba'i gtor ma 'dis// legs ldan smyon pa
50b4(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i// dpal mgon bdun cu rtsa gnyis thugs dam bskang // 'bru gsum dkar dmar brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'dis// ro langs las byed rnams kyi thugs dam bskang // nag po bdun gyi sha khrag spungs pa'i gtor ma 'dis//
50b5(rgyud 'grel): nag pa stong gi thugs dam bskang // sha khrag sna tshogs sbyar ba'i gtor ma 'dis// gnod sbyin 'byung po khri yi thugs dam bskang // rak+ta bdud rtsi smin gyis sbran pa'i gtor ma 'dis// ma mo nag mo bye ba'o thugs dam bskang // lhag
50b6(rgyud 'grel): gtor kha chus sbran pa'i gtor ma 'dis// sprul pa sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang // hUM de ltar mgon po'i lha tshogs rnams// 'du ba'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// mi rkang gling bus thugs dam bskang // maM sa zas su za ba'i phyir/
51a1(rgyud 'grel): shwa chen bdud rtsis thugs dam bskang // spyan gyi dbang po tshim mdzad pa'i// tshil chen mar mes thugs dam bskang // shangs kyi dbang po tshim mdzad pa'i// bsur chen drung bas thugs ngam bskang // ljags kyi
51a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang po tshim mdzad pa'i// bshos bu snying gi gtor mas thugs ngam bskang // snyan gyi dbang po tshim mdzad pa'i// rnga dang dril bu cang te'us thugs dam bskyang // mthun pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// gos nag zha nag dag gis
51a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs dam bskang // mchod pa'i dam rdzas yin pa'i phyir// nya sha la phug sgrog tsong la sogs thugs dam bskang // dgyes shing dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// tshogs dang gtor mas thugs dam bskong // g.yag lug nag po mar gyis
51a4(rgyud 'grel): byugs// dar na ga ru mtshon rA la brgyan// phrag par dgro bgegs ling ga bskyen// gser skyems bdud rtsis bran pa 'dis// nag po chen po'i thugs dam bskang // zhes brjod la bshags pa bya ba ni/ dpal ye shes kyi mgon po bya/
51a5(rgyud 'grel): rog gi ming can la/ sku gsung thugs kyi yum gsum dang // 'phrin las kyi mgon po bya rog gdong can bzhis bskor ba/ mkha' 'gro ma drug dang / lha mo brgyad dang / mgo brnyan bcu drug dang / phyag brnyan legs ldan seng ge gdong can
51a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa pho bdud nyi shu rtsa gcig/ DA ki sgrol byed la sogs pa dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ klu'i rgyal po gang po mdzes ma la sogs pa dregs pa can sum cu/ legs ldan nag po la sogs pa dpal mgon bdun cu rtsa
51b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ drag po smyon pa la sogs pa ro langs chen po brgya/ mgyogs byed nag po la sogs pa nag po stong / dgra bo'i bla srog 'gugs par byed pa la sogs pa 'byung po gnod sbyin khri/ gar byed nag mo la sogs pa ma
51b2(rgyud 'grel): mo bye ba/ khyung dang bya rgod sbrul la sogs pa shA za 'bum gyis bskor ba rnams kyi spyan sngar/ bdag gis bka' ltar ma gyur te/ gzhung bzhin rngo ma thogs pas/ bsnyen sgrub tshad du ma phyin pa ro las la sbyar ba dang / tshogs
51b3(rgyud 'grel): dang phung gtor dus su ma grub pa dang / mchod pa'i 'byor tshogs chungs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma gsal bar bzlas pa gri chag pa dang / phyi nang gsang ba'i rten rdzas ma tshogs par gsang ba bsgrags pa dang / sku gsung thugs dang
51b4(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang gsang ba'i dam tshig nyams pa thams cad mthol lo bshags so// dpal nag po chen po ye shes kyi spyan dang ldan pa/ khrag 'thung gi rgyal po/ bstan pa'i bka' bsrungs/ dam nyams kyi srog gcod/ rig 'dzin gyi srog
51b5(rgyud 'grel): shing / rnal 'byor gyi dgra lha/ dug gsum gyi sman pa/ gtsug lag khang gi bsrungs ma/ bdag gi rnal 'byor bsrungs shig/ tshe dang dbang phyug spel cig/ dpal dang grags pa bsgrubs shig/ 'khor dang gang zag skyongs shig/ snang
51b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dgra dang bar chad kyi rkyen rnams thul cig/ bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu bzlog cig/ nang rigs bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi zhi bar mdzod cig/ ltas ngan brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bsgyur cig/ ye 'brog sum brgya drug cu bzlog cig/ lo'i
52a1(rgyud 'grel): keg dang zla ba'i keg dang zhag gi kyeg dang tha ma'i keg dang bkra mi shis pa thams cad bzlog cig/ ces brjod par bya'o// yi ge brgya pa ci nus bzlas par bya'o// rnal 'byor pa rnams tshogs la longs
52a2(rgyud 'grel): spyod par bya'o// de nas smad las kyi drag po'i las sbyor yang bya'o// dpal mgon po bya rog ma'i bskangs kyi cho ga'i rim pa/ bla ma a b+ha ya kA ras dpal nA lin+d+ra'i gtsug lago khang du/ rdo sgo rang byung gi rtsar mdzad pa'o//
52a3(rgyud 'grel): phyis bla ma chen po dpal rga los rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o//
53a1(rgyud 'grel): xxx
53b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ka la sid d+hi k+Shar+ya gi ra dza d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po pi dngos grub bsrung ba dang bzlog pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang
53b2(rgyud 'grel): dang man ngag thob pa dang // bsnyen bsgrub sngon du song ba yis// rang nyid nag po chen po dang // he ru ka dpal dbye mid bsgom// sum gril rgyan can bsnyen pa bya// mdun du thugs mgon 'khor bcas bskyod// bsnyen pa tshad
53b3(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa dang // gzhan gyi rig sngags bzlog par bya// rtsi dug gi shing la rnga mong bdun bya/ zan bshos dmar nag lnga/ khrag gi gtor ma lnga/ zan changs lnga/ ngar mi chen po lnga/ nam mkha' lnga/ gdugs lnga lo dar nag rnams btags
53b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ rtsug bal sna lngas 'phan gdugs bya/ 'phar ba/ spyad khu/ khyi phag/ seng ge/ stag/ dom/ bya/ lug/ rnams lnga chan re re bya/ khyad par du bshos bu khru gang ba zur gsum pa dmar nag khrag gis brgyan pa cig bya/ bzlog pa'i
53b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bzhi bri/ bsad pa'i 'khor lo brgyad bri/ gnan pa'i ling ga gsum bri/ de nas gtor ma zangs zhong la sogs par bshams la/ rang kha nub tu blta/ lhor ho ljang / byang bu'i 'phreng bas bskor/ yi dam chos skyong gi thang sku
53b6(rgyud 'grel): dgram/ dmar gtor/ dkar gtor gnyis bshams/ bzlog pa'i 'khor lo ngar mi'i gnas gsum du sba/ gnan pa'i 'khor lo sha khyi'i thod par gzhug/ bsang pa'i 'khor lo ha~M la bsreg go/ de ltar rdzas rnams la me rlung gi
54a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba bya'o// bdag mgon por bskyed/ thugs kar he ru ka bsgom/ ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya/ mchod pa dang gtor ma 'bul/ rin po che sna tshogs dang / 'bru sna tshogs dang / sman sna chan dang bcas pa 'bul
54a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas bgegs la gtor ma sbyin/ mtshams gcad/ de nas bstod pa'i rim pa thams cad bya/ thugs dam bskang / rkang pa brgyad pas bstod/ de nas gtor mdos de thugs mgon la las mgon bzhis bskor bar bskyed/ 'khar
54a3(rgyud 'grel): nag po stong / sha za 'bum/ ma mo bye ba/ mkha' 'gro ma 'bum/ gnod sbyin khri/ 'khor lha srin sde brgyang dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ mchod pa 'bul ba la sogs pa bya'o// de nas ha sgrogs ma'i chung sdung ngal kha g.yas su sgyur
54a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa yan chad dang / rin chen dbungs pa 'don/ de nas sngags ni/ oM maM hA ka la bzlog hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA ka lo ya bzlog hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM ma hA ka la gu na hr-i ta bzlog hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM ma hA kaM la ga na ba ta bzlog hUM hUM
54a5(rgyud 'grel): phaT phaT/ oM ma hA ka la si ti yaM du dza bzlog hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ha ha hUM hUM/ ki li ki li che ge mo bzlog b+h+yo/ pha po phaT che ge mo bzlog b+h+yo/ kr-i kr-i kr-i che ge mo/ traM k+ShaM shu che ge mo/ ka ha ka ha tsha ga mo/ hraM hreM kr-i gnod byed bzlog b+h+yo/ pa tsa pa tsa tshe gau ma
54a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT phaT che ge mo/ ha ha ha ha che ga mo/ ra ra d+hi tshi ge mo/ k+Sha k+Sha k+ShuM tshi ga mo/ khaM kha khaM che ge mo/ d+haM d+haM d+hi che ge mo/ k+Shi k+ShaM k+ShaM che ge mo/ ka kau ka che ge mo bzlog b+h+yo/ tsi tsa tsa che ge mo/ ya ya yaM che ge mo/ saM sa saM che ge mo/ po pheM pheM che ge mo/ b+hA b+haM b+h+ra che
54b1(rgyud 'grel): ba mo/ b+hu b+hU b+hU che ge mo/ k+Sha k+Sha k+Sha che ga mo/ kr-i kli kl-i che ge/ ba pa ba che ge/ dza dzadza bzlog bzlog zlo b+h+yo rbang rbang che ge mo bzlog b+h+yo/ thun re la sngags lnga lnga bskul zhing bzlog par bya'o// byung bul ming spel dang bcas pa bris la rtags par bya'o//
54b2(rgyud 'grel): byung bu ni mtshon cha'i rnam par 'bri ba 'am/ gzugs su byas te/ mda' dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / dbyug tho dang / rtse gsum dang / tho bA dang / rdo rje rgya gram dang / gri gug du bya'o// de bzhin du zhag gsum mam/ lnga 'am/ bdun nam/
54b3(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bya'o// yang zhag gcig la yang nyan no// thod zor bca'o// de dmag dang bcas pas dgra phyogs su btang ngo // de nas ha~M bsreg go// ngar mi 'khor lo dang bcas pa lam rgya gram du gnan/ gcig kho'i mgul du
54b4(rgyud 'grel): gnan/ sbyin sreg thol ba zor du 'phang / yang na gnan pa bya'o// / yang gtor ma bsdus pa byed na/ zangs zhong la sogs pa'i nang du ri rab bang rim gsum pa bya/ de'i steng du gtor ma zur gsum pa gcig bzhag/ de la
