55a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas/ dgra phyogs su 'phang ngo // de ni zla ba gcig la lan bzhi bya'o// bsad par byed na gtor chen byas te/ bcas par ma de bya/ sha sa na'i sngags la dgra bo kha kha khA hI/ brgya rtsa brgyad khrag
55a2(rgyud 'grel): gis bris/ yang las mgon gyi sngags gsum po la ming thems bcug la brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ gtor ma re re'i nang du sngags re gzhug/ ngar mi dang 'theb kyu dang / sha khrag dang / 'bru sna'i chan la/ yungs kar long
55a3(rgyud 'grel): thun rdzas btab la brgya rtsa brgyad re byas na/ dgra bgegs dgug gzhug byas la/ rdzas sha khrag tu byin gyis brlabs la/ mdun bskyed thugs mgon la sogs pa thams cad kyis gsol bar bsam/ khyad par du
55a4(rgyud 'grel): kho'i lha srungs rnams gsol bar byas la/ kho rang gi sha khrag rnams 'bul lo// de nas bzlog pa btang / rdzas dang khyad par sbyor ba rnams shes par bya'o// mgon po'i gtor mdos/ gtor bzlog/ brgya gtor/ bsad
55a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las/ slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa/ dpal rga los/ phag mo grub pa la gsungs pa 'di ni shin tu gnyan pas dam tshig med pa la mi bstan/ ga rung rung du mi bya'o// // dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshalo//
55a6(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i 'phrin las ni/ stong khog rgyas par byas la/ bzlog rkang gnyis btang ba ni/ de nas gos nag po gon/ rnga dang dung dang / rol mo'i sgra bsgrag/ dar 'phyar/ gsur cher gyi dud pa btang la 'di skad // hUM bdag ni rig
55b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin bsgrub pa po// bdag ni rnal 'byor dam tshig can// bdag ni dpal chen he ru ka/ khyod ni nag po chen po ste// chos kyi srungs ma thugs dam can// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ba dang // rnal 'byor dam can bskyang ba'i phyir/
55b2(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// rnal 'byor bdag la dag byung na// ye shes spyan ldan dus la bab// de nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// dpal ldan nag po chen po khyod// chos kyi dbyings nas sku
55b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs la// bstan srungs legs ldan nag po ni// dur khrod gnas nas sku bzhengs la// de nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// mgon po srog bdag nag po ni// bdud kyi gnas nas sku bzhengs la// ngo nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon//
55b4(rgyud 'grel): mgon po 'chi bdag nag po ni// gshin rje'i gnas nas sku bzhengs la// ngo nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// mgon po che bdag nag po ni// klu yi gnas nas sku bzhengs la// do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// mgon po sgrol ging
55b5(rgyud 'grel): nag po ni// srin po'i gnas nas sku bzhengs la// ngo nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// mgon po srog zan dmar po ni// btsan gyi gnas nas sku bzhengs la// de nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// mgon po sha zan nag po ni// gza'
55b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas sku bzhengs la// do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// mgon po sgrol ging nag po ni// dpe kar gnas nas sku bzhengs la// do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la bon// mgon po sha zan nag po ni// sma yi gnas nas sku bzhengs la//
56a1(rgyud 'grel): do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// mgon po dug blangs nag po ni// klu yi gnas nas sku bzhengs la// ngo nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// mgon po cho 'phrul nag po ni// the'u rang gnas nas sku bzhengs la// de
56a2(rgyud 'grel): nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// mgon po nad kyi bdag po ni// ma mo'i gnas nas sku bzhengs la// do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// / hUM nag po stong gi tshogs dang bcas// dur khrod gnas nas sku bskyod cig/
56a3(rgyud 'grel): dpung gi tshogs rnams sku bskyod cig/ go mtshon 'chas pa sku bskyod cig/ do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// sha za 'bum gyi tshogs bcas rnams// dur khrod brgyad nas sku bskyod cig/ dpung gi tshogs dang sku bskyod cig/
56a4(rgyud 'grel): go mtshon 'chas pa sku bskyed cig/ do nub ma mo bye ba'i tshogs dang bcas// rgya mtsho'i gling nas sku bskyod cig/ dpung gi tshogs dang sku bskyod cig/ go mtshon 'chas pa sku bskyod cig/ do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byin/
56a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan dpal chen spyan snga ru// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i// bstan srungs ma lus sku bzhengs la// do nub bzlog pa'i dpung la byon// 'di ni bsgrub pa'i gzhal yas khang // rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyi
56a6(rgyud 'grel): grogs// dam rdzas sha khrag sna tshogs dang // 'bru yi chan dang khur pa dang // la du la phug shing thog dang // khrag sna dug sna a mri ta// dgra bgegs ling gar byas pa 'di// mchod par 'bul lo bzhes su gsol//
56b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa dang // 'dza gang dpa' bo'i mchod pa dang // khrag gi yon chab dug gi me tog dang // sha chen spros dang zhun chen mar me dang // dug gi mthor 'thung khrag gi byug pa dang // lha bshos dmar po zur gsum
56b2(rgyud 'grel): dang // rkang chen dung dang ban d+ha'i sgra// phyi nang mchod pa rgya chen 'bul// ye shes mgon po 'khor dang bcas// gnas 'dir sprin ltar stobs mdzod la// thugs dam bskang ngo bzhes su gsol// thugs dam gnyan po bskangs nas
56b3(rgyud 'grel): kyang // 'phrin las gnyen po bcol ba ni// drongs cig nyams pa'i snying nas drongs// bzlog cig byad kha dgra la bzlog/ mgon po'i dmag sna dgra la drongs// mgon po'i ru dar dgra la byor// mgon po'i mdun drangs dgra la chos//
56b4(rgyud 'grel): mgon po'i khram kha dgra la spos// mgon po'i khram sna dgra la sgyur// mgon po'i bshugs pa dgro la long // b+h+yo ma ye ma d+ha nag po che// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// bdag cag rgyu sbyor 'khor bcas la// dgra dang byang kha phur kha
56b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba 'di// dam can khyed kyis ma tshor ram// ye shes spyan dang mi ldan nam// sngon gyi dam bcas ma bsnyelo lam// rig 'dzin rnal 'byor mi skyong ngam// sangs rgyas bstan pa mi bsrung ngam// dam nyams log 'dren mi 'dul lam
56b6(rgyud 'grel): khyekhyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// bar chad bzlog pa'i dus la bab// hUM dpal chen khrag 'thung rngam pa'i sku// dur khrod chas kyis sku la brgyan// sprul bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// dus 'dir bzlog pa'i las mdzod cig/ hUM me ri
57a1(rgyud 'grel): dmar nag 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas// shin tu 'jigs pa'i dur khrod chen po nas// thod chen kau rlon po chen gsar rnying dang // keng rus sngo skya gdug pa sbrul gyis brgyan// steng na sprin nag 'khrig cing 'brug sgra
57a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrogs// khyud dang dur bya la sogs mkha' la lding // gcan gzan ci spyang tshogs rnams phyi la rol// dur khrod chen po'i gnas mchog de nyid na// gru gsum mthong nag 'bar ba'i dbus// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan// bam chen ru
57a3(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs pa'i steng // dus gsum sangs rgyas kun dang dbyer med pa'i// khrag 'thung rdo rje nog po chen po ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis dor thabs can// dgra bgegs bdud bgegs thams cad bzlog du gsol// dang
57a4(rgyud 'grel): skra kham nag gyen du 'bar ba yi// ye shes lha yi gnod pa bzlog du gsol// zod kaM lnga yis dbu la brgyan pa ni// nyon mongs dug lnga'i tshogs rnams bzlog du gsol// rgyal rigs sbrul gyis dbu sku bcings pa yis// 'jig rten mkha'
57a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro'i gnod pa bzlog du gsol// rin chen dbu brgyan ngar gyi cod pan gyis// lha rnams yongs kyi gnod pa bzlog du gsol// spyan gsum dmar zlum phyogs bcur gzigs pa yis// dug gsum mi dge bcu rnams bzlog du gsol//
57a6(rgyud 'grel): shangs nas rlung byung khro gnyer bsdus pa ni// khro bo pho nya'i gnod pa bzlog du gsol// smin ma glog stong 'khyugs nas gzigs pa yis// gcan gzan la sogs gnod pa bzlog du gsol// zhal gdangs ljags 'dril mche ba gtsigs
57b1(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// za byed brgyad kyi gnod pa bzlog du gsol// zhal nas hUM phaT b+h+yo dang bso sgra yis// ngan sngags gnod pa'i thun sngags thams cad bzlog/ ag tshems dmar po me ltar 'bar ba yis// nyon mongs shes bya'i bag chags//
57b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bzlog/ phyag g.yas gri gug rab tu 'bar ba yis// gzhan gyi mtshon cha'i ngan sbyor byed pa bzlog/ g.yas kyi 'og ma ral gri 'bar ba yis// khams gsum rbad pa'i lha 'dre thams cad bzlog/ g.yon na thong khrag dmar//
57b3(rgyud 'grel): po 'tsho ba yis// ma mo'i khrag rims ngal kha thams cad bzlog/ g.yon gyi 'og ma kha T+wAM lha dmago bskang ba yis// ye shes 'jig rten pho nya'i dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog/ khrims kyi cha lugs gsum dang ldan pa yis// theg
57b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum gyi rbod stong thams cad bzlog/ sku stong glang chen ko rlon gsol nas 'gying pa yis// gti mug rmongs pa'i bag chags thams cad bzlog/ zhing chen g.yang gzhi sku la gsol ba yis// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i bag chags
57b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bzlog/ stag gi lpags pa'i basbrul chen po yis// nga rgyal dregs pa'i bag chags thams cad bzlog/ gdug pa sbrul gyis dbu la brgyan pa yis// ngam nyams zhe sdang gdug pa'i sbyor ba thams cad bzlog/ raka
57b6(rgyud 'grel): ta'i thig les rab tu brgyan pa yis// ma mo mkha' 'gro'i rgyu gzer thams cad bzlog/ zhag gi zo ris rab tu brgyan pa yis// gang dang bdud kyi sbyor ba ngan pa thams cad bzlog/ thal chen chom bus rab tu brgyan pa yis//
58a1(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod bdag po'i pho nya thams cad bzlog/ zhabs gnyis dpa' bo'i stas kyis bzhugs pa yis// dregs pa lha chen rnams kyi chang ba thams cad bzlog/ pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yis// log
58a2(rgyud 'grel): par blta ba'i dgra bgegs thams cad bzlog/ sku la ye shes me dpung rab tu 'bar ba yis// las ngan 'khor ba'i bud shing thams cad bzlog/ dpral ba'i dbyings nas bya khyud lding ba yis// sa bdag klu yi byang stems/
58a3(rgyud 'grel): sems cad bzlog/ sprul pa'i pho nya sku wA 'phro ba yis// snang srid lha 'dre'i rbod stong thams cad bzlog/ sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma dang // sha chen spos kyi dud sprin dang // dmar chen ra ka ta arga dang // rtsi ta snying chen rgyal mtshan
58a4(rgyud 'grel): dgyes pa'i dam rdzas sna tshogs kyis// nag po chen po'i thugs dam bskang // thugs dam bskang do byang kha bzlog// hUM/ steng gi phyogs kyi pho nya ni// lcags kyi bya khyung nag po la// spyan ni khrag mdog bse yi spyan//
58a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje la laM rA// gnam lcags thog gi bu yug tshub// thog dang ser ba'i bdag po byed// dam nyams yul du thog ser phob// bshog pa mo yi bu yug 'tshub// khro bo grangs med me yi tho ba 'dzin// sprul pa'i khro bos
58a6(rgyud 'grel): rbod stong thams cad bzlog/ bshog pa g.yon pa rlung gi bu yug gis// sprul pa grangs med 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu can// sprul pa'i pho nya rnams kyis zong stong bzlog/ gnam lcags zhun ma'i mchu sder la// mi yi tsha tsha 'phro ba
58b1(rgyud 'grel): yis// bshog pa sngabs pa'i rlung gis rab ded nas// 'jig rten khams kyi rmod ngan sbyor ba rnams// bzlog cig bsgyur cig rang la b+h+yo cig/ skye rgyud rtsad nas chod cig/ bshog pa ral gri 'bar ba yis// rlab pas ngan sngags chod
58b2(rgyud 'grel): cing bzlog/ the'u yu 'khor lo 'bar ba drag 'khor bas// rgong stong ma lus thams cad g.yul du chod cing bzlog/ gzhug sgro gnam lcag 'bar ba yis// dam nyams lus ngag yid gsum bzlog cing sbubs// kr-i kr-i hraM gyi sgra
58b3(rgyud 'grel): chen ra pa sgrogs pas// sprul pa drag pos dgra bo dbang sdud pho nyar bzlog/ sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma dam rdzas dang // sha tshan dung sprin bdud rtsi a mri ta// dmar chen rak+ta rtsi ta snying chen gyis// sprul pa byung chen thugs dam
58b4(rgyud 'grel): bskongs gyur cig/ thugs dam bskongs la byang kha thams cad bzlog/ oM ma hA ka la/ mang sa la khA hi/ raka ta la khA hi/ go ro tsa na la khA hai/ ba su ta la khA hi/ srog adz+ha la khA hi// hUM/ ma hA ka la bya rog gdong /
58b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs dam gnas nas bskul ba ni// bstan po bsrung phyir 'phrin las mdzod// dpal chen khrag 'thung spyan snga ru// khyod kyis khas blangs dam bcas pa// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar byas// dam chos legs par skyong
58b6(rgyud 'grel): bar byas// dge 'dun bar chad bzlog par byas// sgrub mochog rnal 'byor skyong bar byas// dus la bab po byang kha bzlog/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // dgra bgegs sgral ba'i sha khrag dang // dza gang sman dang bdud rtsi 'di//
59a1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha rog dang gi zhal du bzhes// rnal 'byor bdag la dgra b+hU na// mgon po nag po sa ra d+ha lags// byang kha bzlog cig bya rog gdong // phra ba byas cag bya rog gdong // dgra za sbrul cig bya rag gangang /
59a2(rgyud 'grel): s+m+R+YuMmA d+hu kA la mthu bo tsho// sku mdog mthing nag 'dzegs pa'o// zhal gdangs ljags 'dri ba klog ltar 'khrug/ gtum rnga mo rab tu 'jigs po la// ha ha hU dang phaT sgra sgrogaso// ngam nyams byung khe rang la bzlog/ dus la
59a3(rgyud 'grel): bab bo bya rog gdong // shin tu gtum zhing rab tu drag/ khrag 'dzag mgo bo'i nga shel can// stag lpags rlon pa'i sham thabs can// dug sbrul gdug pa'i ske rags can// phyag na gri gug thong khrag thogs// dam nyams
59a4(rgyud 'grel): byAskyes la byung kha bad+mo// dus la bab po b+h+ya ga ga da // bskrun pa byA shig pa'i dgu ba 'di// dbang du bsdus la byung kha bzlag/ r-i su bar khrig la byed kha bar+d+ha// zlu ma thAka la bya rog gdong // bris pa'i gang
59a5(rgyud 'grel): zlogs pa yos// snaske hU~M skad na ngas/ ni ni brags spyong bsdu/ ga du skyen cing las la 9// nug pa sang dung 'o ma// mam bye ban+d+ha 'khar baHsa rnam so// rang meng par las smra
59a6(rgyud 'grel): de byangs nyams dgra ba sbrel// 'jig rten mo dang mi min gyi// rig sngags byed kha zang stong brlag// dris la bab po byar ge gdang // mgon pa'i ngam las ma 'da' cig/ mgan za'i dam las 'das gyur na// ngam cho
59b1(rgyud 'grel): nyan po'i chad pa 'ong // khyod kyi dam tshig nyan po 'dis// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba yin// ngam nyams sdug can dgra po 'ang // bstan pa bshig cing dbu 'phang smad// rdo rje slob dpon spu la brngos// rgyal khams phung zhing
59b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can 'tshe// 'di la phyugs rjes maM gnas kyis// da lta nyid la sgrol yis thong // phyogs pani mtshams brgyad steng 'og bcu'i// rigs sngags byang kha zong stong bzlog/ rig 'dzin rgyu sgyur 'khor bcas kyi// bar du gcod pa
59b3(rgyud 'grel): dgra bgegs bzlog/ bzlog cig sdang ba'i dgra la bsgyur// ye shes lha yi rmod pa bzlog/ lha srin sde brgyang rmod pa bzlog/ lo skag zla skag zhag skag bzlog/ ban bon ngan sngags byang kha bzlog/ mu stegs rbong stong thams cad
59b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlog/ sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma dang // sha chen du sprin a mri ta// dmar chen ra ka ta snying chen gyis// ma hA ka la'i thugs dam bskang // thugs dam bskongs la rkyen ngan bzlog/ bya rog gdong can dus la bab// skye bo'i ya gar
59b5(rgyud 'grel): ma btang cig/ maM nag gi 'char kar ma btang cig/ mdos dang gtar ma 'di long le// byang khaM phur kha thams cad bzlog/ b+h+rUM steng gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// bya khyung 'dzum ni ldong zhing 'phye// gzhang dang ngur bya grangs
59b6(rgyud 'grel): las 'das// b+hU b+h+rUM sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog par chang rtson ngan bzlog/ shar gyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// nag po stong gis ru der 'byor// b+h+yo b+ha sdang ba'i dgral b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog par chod rkyen ngan bzlog/ lha
60a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// sha za 'bum gyi dmag dbus 'chas// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog par chang rkyen rnams bzlog/ nub kyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// ma me bye ba ra ka ta rlob// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang
60a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog bar chad rkyen ngan bzlog/ byang gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyis// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog par chad rkyen rnams bzlog/ ma hA mang sa la
60a3(rgyud 'grel): khA hi/ ma hA rtsi ta la khA hi/ ma hA go ro rtsa na la khA hi/ ma hA ba su to la khA hi/ a mri ta srog adz+ha la khA hi/ hUM/ shar phyogs mthing nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// bam chen ro dang nyi stengs su// srog bdag nag po
60a4(rgyud 'grel): bya rog gdong // sku mdog mthing nag char sprin mdog/ mi bzang gdug pa'i 'od zer 'phro// phyag g.yas 'bar ba'i gri gug 'phyar// phya ga g.yon ban d+ha dmar gyis bkang // gdug pa'i snying khrag zhal du gsol// shar phyogs
60a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rigs kyi rbong stong thams cad bzlog/ dgra bo'i mgo phreng ngo shal can// yan lag rigs cing lto ba 'phyang // dug sbrul gdug pa'i ske rags bcings// zhe sdang rigs kyi pho nya thams cad bzlog/ gang chen bco brgyad
60a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyis bskor// dam nyams srog la mnga' mdzad pa// shar phyogs dregs pa'i dmag dang bcas// dam nyams dgra yi sha khrag dang // sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma bzhes// shar phyogs byang kha thams cad bzlog/
60b1(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ steng gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// bya nag mang po mchu sder bdar// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog byang kha phur kha bzlog/ shar gyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// mon pa nag po 'o dong 'bod// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang
60b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ngagra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog byang kha dgra la bzlog/ lho yi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// gshin rje khram kha thogs la rngam// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog byung kha phur kha bzlog/ nub kyi phyogs nas bzlog
60b3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// mon pa g.yab ngor longs se lings// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog byang kha dgra la bzlog/ byang gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bcas// seng stag rgyud 'gral rngam
60b4(rgyud 'grel): par byed// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog byed kha phur kha bzlog/ dam nyams dgra bgegs sha khrag dang // sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma dang // sha chen dung sprin a mri ta// rak+ta rnams dang dud sprin gyis// srog
60b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'khor bcas thugs dam bskang // thugs dam skongs la byang kha bzlog/ ban pon ngan sngags byang kha bzlog/ lha srin sde brgyang chad pa bzlog/ ma hA mang sa la khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta la khA hi/ ma hA tsi ta la khA hi/
60b6(rgyud 'grel): ma hA go ro tsa na la khA hi/ ma hA ba su ta la khA hi/ ma hA zhing chen lo khA hi/ a mri ta srog adz+ha le khA hi// hU~M byang phyogs ljang nag gru gsum gzhal yas nas// ljang nag me dpung klong dkyil nas// gnod
61a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin nag po bya rog gdong // sku mdog ljang nag dug chen 'khyil ba 'dra// kha rlangs sngo dmar nad kyi na bun 'khrigs// mi bzad gdug pa'i cha tsha bu yug 'tshub// khrag gi ral pa dmar po gyen du 'khyil//
61a2(rgyud 'grel): ral pa'i bseb nas thog dang ser ba 'bebs// g.yas kyi gri gug dam nyams srog rtsa gcong // g.yon gyi thong khrag dgra bo'i snying khrag 'thung // sku smad dpa' bo stag gi sham thabs can// dgra bgegs ma lus dbang
61a3(rgyud 'grel): du sdud// ljang nag sbrul gyi ske rags bcings// gnod sbyin nag po'i tshogs kyis bskor// dam rdzas dmar gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la// las kyi rigs kyi rbod stong thams cad bzlog/ sdig can dam nyams dgra po la// nang
61a4(rgyud 'grel): dang me tshon gyi char po phob// byang kha phur kha bzlog cig bya rog gdong // dus la bab po bya rog gdong // / hUM/ steng gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// khra dang bya klag bshog ldang 'khrigs// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+r-i/
61a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlog bzlog byang kha phur kha bzlog/ shar gyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// khro bo mthing nag byo rog gdong // sha log cod byed sdang mig blta// b+h+yo b+h+rUM sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog gnod pa'i bgogs la bzlog/ lho yi
61a6(rgyud 'grel): phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// seng stag dom drang tse spyong gzig/ gcan gzan mang pos sa gzhi gang // b+h+yo b+hU sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+rUM// bzlog bzlog gnod pa'i bgegs la bzlog/ nub kyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// khyi nag mang po dra
61b1(rgyud 'grel): zugs byed// g.yag rog mang pos ngar zhing bsrung // b+h+yo skyo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog byang kha phur kha thams cad bzlog/ byang gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// srin po sha zan cho ngas 'debs// skye 'gro yongs kyi srog
61b2(rgyud 'grel): gcod po// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+ho// bzlog bzlog bya kha pur kha bzlog// dam nyams sdig can dgra bo yi// mgo lus phrol tsag khrog ral can// sha rus dum pur nga phye cig/ dam nyams dgra yi shA khrag dang // sha khrag dmar
61b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi gtor ma dang // tshil chen dung sprin a mr-i ti// dmar chen sha khrag rtsi ta yis// gnod sbyin bya rog gdong gi thugs dam bskang // thugs dam bskongs la bar chod bzlog/ ma hA mang sa la khA hi/ ma hA rtsi ta la khA hi/ rak+ta la khA hi/
61b4(rgyud 'grel): go ro tsa na la khA hi/ ba su ta la khA hi/ srog rtsa la khA hi// // hUM nub phyogs dmar nag gru gsum dkyil 'khor nas// tshe bdag bya rog gdong can ni// zhing chen ro yi gdan la bzhugs// dur khrod rol pa'i brgyan dang
61b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan// mthing nag sku la rngam pa'i zha la// lcags kyi mche ba dgra la gtsigs// dug gi 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro// phyag na gri gug thong khrag thogs// las mkhan nag po dgra srog gcong // sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la//
61b6(rgyud 'grel): nub phyogs pad+ma rigs kyi rbod stong thams cad bzlog/ ye shes lha yi rbong stong thams cad bzlog/ 'jig rten dregs pa'i rbod stong thams cad bzlog/ bdud dmag bya ba'i 'khor gyis bskor// lha srin sde brgyad cod stong thams
62a1(rgyud 'grel): cad bzlog/ hUM/ steng gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// khyud dang khwa bshang shang dang // bzhang dang du ra bya bshog pa steb// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog byad kha spang ba'i ngag la bzlog/
62a2(rgyud 'grel): shar gyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// dung gi mon pa 'bum ni rol gri 'phyar// b+hu b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog ltas ngan dgra la po zlog/ lho yi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// lcags spyang 'bum ni du zugs byed// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra
62a3(rgyud 'grel): la b+h+yo// bzlo ga bzlog ltas ngan dag la bzlog/ nub kyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// bal mo 'bum ni g.yab mo sde pa// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog ltas ngan dgra la bzlog/ byang gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// stag gzig 'bum
62a4(rgyud 'grel): ni rgyug 'dral byed// b+h+yo b+hU sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+rU~M// bzlog bzlog ltas ngan dgra la bzlog/ dam nyams dgra bo'i sha khrag dang // dmar gyi gtor ma a mri ta// sha chen spos dang zhun chen dung sprin dang // dmar gyi rak+ta rtsi ta snying chen gyis//
62a5(rgyud 'grel): bya rog gdong gau thugs dam bskang // thugs dam nyan po skongs nas kyang // 'jig rten lha 'dre mi gsum gyi// rgod stong bsam sbyor ngan pa rnams// bzlag cig sgyur cig dgra bgegs stongs su b+h+yo// ma hA mang sa la khA hi/ rtsi ta la khA haM/
62a6(rgyud 'grel): xxx
62b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil nas// bdud mo rtswa 'jig khrag 'thung rkang ldag ma// sku mdog dmar nAg khrag gi mdog/ sngo dmar nad kyi tsha tsha 'phro// khrag nad rgyu gzer na bun 'thibs// dmyigs pa'i dgra la dmag 'dren ma// sku la khrag zhag thig
62b2(rgyud 'grel): les brgyan// gsad pa'i mtshon cha lag na thogs// rtsa chen bzhi nas rak+ta 'jib// nag mo grul bum pho nyar 'gyed// srid pa'i ma mos dmag sna 'dren// dgra bo'i sha khrag stob cing 'chang // dmar gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes
62b3(rgyud 'grel): la// rin chen rigs kyi rgong stong bzlog/ las kyi rlung dmar chibs su cibs// dam la gnas pa'i grogs mdzad ma// bdud mo bye ba'i 'khor gyis bskor// dmar gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la// lho phyogs rbod stong bsam
62b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ngan pa bzlog/ nang rims dal kha thams cad bzlog/ dus 'dir bzlog pa'i dus la bab// dus la bab po khrag 'thung ma// / steng gi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// ye shes ma mos nam mkha' gang // b+h+yo b+h+yo s+dzang
62b5(rgyud 'grel): bo'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog byang kha phur kha bzlog/ mdun gyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// ma mo 'bum gyis g.yab mo sdeb// b+h+yo b+hU sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog lhas ngan dag la bzlog/ g.yas kyi phyogs nas bzlog
62b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ni// ming po las kyi gshin rje 'bum// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog byang kha phur kha bzlog/ rgyab kyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// dug sbrul gdug pa shigs shigs// b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog bsam
63a1(rgyud 'grel): ngan dgra la bzlog/ g.yon gyi phyogs nas bzlog pa ni// mon mo bal mos steng khams gang // b+h+yo b+h+yo sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// bzlog bzlog byang kha phur kha bzlog/ dus la bab po rtsa 'jib ma// dam nyams dag po'i sha khrag
63a2(rgyud 'grel): dang // sha khrag dmar gyi gtor ma dang // sha chen spos kyi dung sprin dang // rak+ta snying chen rgyal mtshan rnams// rtsa 'jib ma tshogs thugs dam bskang // thugs dam bskongs la byang kha bzlog/ ye shes lha yi rbod stong bzlog/ 'jig rten
63a3(rgyud 'grel): lha 'dre'i rbod stong bzlog/ ban bon bsam sbyor ngan pa bzlog/ tshe dang srog gi bar chod bzlog/ khar rje za lha'i bar chod bzlog/ ma nyes ngan sgrib thams cad bzlog/ bsam sbyor ngan pa thams cad bzlog/ ma hA mang sa la khA hi/ rak+Sha
63a4(rgyud 'grel): la khA hi/ rtsi ta la khA hi/ go ra tsa nA la khA hi/ ba su ta la khA hi/ zhing chen la khA hi/ srog adz+ha la kha raM khA hi/ ces pas phung dang rak+ta sbreng / stab pa bya'o// / de nas mgon po'i gtor ma snying po can brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
63a5(rgyud 'grel): par byas la/ sngags pa rnams kyis sha za na'i sngags kyi mthar bzlog ces pa re dang / gtor ma re sbags la man ngag ltar 'bul la// drag po'i 'phrin las 'di btang ngo // // hUM ma g.yel ma g.yel chos skyong rnams//
63a6(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyi thugs dam dus la bab// nag po stong gi thugs dam dus la bab// sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam dus la bab// ma mo bye ba'i thugs ngam dus la bab// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi thugs dam dus la bab// gtor ma sha chang
63b1(rgyud 'grel): la phug dang // 'bras chen ling gar bcas pa 'di// re re la yang brgya rtsa brgyad// mchod gtor 'bul lo mnyes par mdzod// dgra bo'i sha la kha raM khA hi// bzlog cig byang kha phur kha bzlog/ bdud dang gshin rje'i rbod stong
63b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlog/ gnod sbyin ma mo'i rbod stong bzlog/ klu dang sa bdag khram kha bzlog/ gza' dang rgyu skar byang stems bzlog/ btsan dang rgyal po'i chad pa bzlog/ smra dang 'gong po'i gnod pa bzlog// hUM/ dpal ldan mgon po nag po
63b3(rgyud 'grel): ni// steng gi phyogs su byon pa'i tshe// sprin phung 'khrugs pa'i dur khrod du// tshangs pa'i tshogs rnams dbang du sbyang // lha bdud 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed// de bzhin rigs kyi mgon po ste// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// steng gi phyogs
63b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi byad kha bzlog// hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni// shar gyi phyogs su byon pa'i tshe// rdo rje rigs kyi mgon po ste// gtum drag can gyi dur khrod du// dri za ma lus dbang du sdud // srog sdud 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed//
63b5(rgyud 'grel): khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// shar gyi phyogs kyi byang kha bzlog// hUMng bal ldan mgon po nag po ni// byang gi phyogs su byin pa'i tshe// las kyi rigs kyi mgon pa ste// cheng tshing 'khrigs pa'i dur khrod du// gnod sbyin ma
63b6(rgyud 'grel): lus dbang du sdung // ging shan ma lus pho nyar 'gyod// sha khrag gtor ma 'od bzhes la// byang gi phyogs kyi byang kho bzlog/ hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni// nub kyi phyogs su byon pa'i tshe// pad+ma rigs kyi mgon po
64a1(rgyud 'grel): ste// bur 'u 'bar ba'i dur khrod du// klu bdud ma lus dbang du sdud// tshe bdag nag po pho nyar 'gyed// sha khrag gtor mdos 'di bzhes la// nub kyi phyogs kyi byang kha bzlog// hUM dpal ldan mgon
64a2(rgyud 'grel): bo nag po ni// lho yi phyogs su byon pa'i tshe// rin chen rigs kyi mgon po ste// dur khrod dpal gyi nags tshal du// gshin rje ma lus dbang du sdud // shan pa 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyeng// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes le// lho yi
64a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi byad kha bzlog// hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni// shar lho'i mtshams su byon pa'i tshe// bstan pa bsrung ba'i mgon po ste// ha ha rgod pa'i dur khrod du// me lha ma lus dbang du sdud// bdud rigs 'bum ni
64a4(rgyud 'grel): pho nyar 'gyed// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// shar lho mtshams kyi dgra bgegs bzlog// hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni// lho nub mtshams su byon pa'i tshe// rnal 'byor skyong ba'i mgon po ste// mun pa mi
64a5(rgyud 'grel): zad dur khrod du// srin po ma lus dbang du sdud// sha za 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhis la// lho nub mtshams kyi dgra bgegs bzlog/ hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni// nub byang mtshams su
64a6(rgyud 'grel): byin pa'i tshe// dam nyams sgrol ba'i mgon po ste// ki li ki la'i dur khrod du// rlung lha ma lus dbang du sdud // phra men dgu khri pho nyar 'gyed// shi khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// nub byang mtshams kyi dgra bgegs bzlog/
64b1(rgyud 'grel): hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni// byang shar mtshams su byon pa'i tshe// tshang tshing 'khrigs pa'i dur khrod du// tshe dpal longs spyod rgyas par byed// 'jigs su rung ba'i drur khrod du// dbang ldan ma lus dbang du sdang //
64b2(rgyud 'grel): bgegs chen 'bum na po nyar 'gyed // sha khrag gtor ma 'od bzhes la// byang shar mtshams kyi dgra bgags thams cad bzlo/ hUM dpal ldan mgon po nag po ni// 'og gi phyogs su byon pa'i tshe// rgyang srungs mdzad
64b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mgon po ste// bsil ba 'tshal gyi dur khrod du// sa bdag ma lus dbang du sdud // klu bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyeng // sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhis la// 'og gi phyogs kyi dgra bo gegs bzlog/ hUM nag po stong gi
64b4(rgyud 'grel): dus la bab po mchod par bzhes// byung kha phur kha thams cad snang ba'i dgra la b+h+rU~M/ sha za 'bum gyi dus la bab po mchod par bzhes// ltas ngan thams cad sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// ma mo bye ba'i dus la bab po mtshang bar
64b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhes// rgod stong thams cad sdang ba'i dgra la bzlog/ mkha' 'gro 'bum gyi dus lo bab po mchod par bzhes// bsam sbyor ngan pa sdang ba'i dgra la bzlog/ gnod sbyin khri yi dus lo bab po mchod par bzhes// bar chod thams
64b6(rgyud 'grel): cad sdang ba'i dgra la bzlog/ lha srin sde brgyad dus la bab po mchod par bzhes// byol kha thams cad sdang ba'i dgra la bzlog/ b+h+yo b+h+yo dgra dang bgegs la b+h+yo// bdag cig 'khor dang bcas pa la// dam nyams las ngan dgra bo yis//
65a1(rgyud 'grel): bsngags cing rbad pa'i lha 'dre rnams// 'dir byon blung dang gtor ma bzhes// dkon mchog bden pa'i bka' dang ni// chos skyong mgon po'i bden pa yis// bdag la gnod pa ma byed par// byang ma rang
65a2(rgyud 'grel): gi thog du song // rang nus rang la smin par gyis// rang mtshon rang la bzlog par gyis// rang srog rang gis gcod par gyis// rang sha rang gis za bar gyis// rten pa'i lha rnams bdud du phob// grogs byed rnams kyang dgra ru
65a3(rgyud 'grel): slong // 'dis ni bstan pa bshig cing dbu 'phangs smad// dam can khyed la ngo rdos pas// 'di yi sdong grogs ma mdzad par// mthu dang nus pa rtsal thon la// rtsad nas tshong la drung nas phyung // snang sring lha 'dri'i chad pa rnams// dam
65a4(rgyud 'grel): nyams dgra yaM thog du bzlog/ snang srid dregs pa'i drod stong rnams// dam nyams dgra yi steng du b+h+yo// ces thams cad kyis byos btab// gzhan yang bzlog pa'i 'phrin las rnams btang ngo // zor bskul gzhan rnams kyang btang
65a5(rgyud 'grel): ngo// de nas mdos kyi lam bstan pa ni/ bdag ye shes par gsal bar bsgom// / hUM rnal 'byor dbang phyug zor 'phen no// bla ma dkon mchog gzu dang spang // dus gsum sangs rgyas gzu dang spang // yi dam lnga
65a6(rgyud 'grel): tshegs gzu dang spang // chos skyong srungs ma gzu dang spang // ma mo mkha' 'gro gzu dang spang // 'jig rten lho klu gzu dang spang // nga yis ma nyes kho yis nyes// nga yis ma lan kho yis lan// nyes byed 'di la chad pas chod// dgra
65b1(rgyud 'grel): bgegs dran pa nyams su chug/ b+h+yo drag po las kyi zor mangs 'di// steng gi lha la mi 'phen no// 'og gi klu la mi 'phen no// drag po'i zor khar ma byon cig pas bdag klu la mi 'pheran no// drag po'i zor kha ra ma byon cig/
65b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal chen bzhi la mi 'phen no// drag po'i zor khar ma byon cig/ phyogs skyong bcu la mi 'phen no// drag po'i zor khar ma byon cig/ lha srin yongs la maM 'phen mo dag po'i zor bar ma byon cig/ drag po'i btsan la mo 'phen no//
65b3(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i zor khar ma byon cig/ lha srin sde brgyad sku zur cig/ drag po'i zor khar ma byon cig/ 'jig rten lha tshogs thams cad kyis// nyams pa'i mgon skyabs ma mdzad cig/ lha srin sde brgyad ma rdogs shig/ mchod sbyin
65b4(rgyud 'grel): gser skyems 'di bzhis la// mangs lam phye la zor sna drongs// nyams pa'i mgon skyabs ma mdzad cig/ gal te mgon skyabs mdzad gyur na// gzer nod khrag skyugs nyam thag cheng // mtho ba rnams kyang zhabs yar
65b5(rgyud 'grel): skums// dma' ba rnams kyang dbu mar tshums// bar na gnas pa sku zur cig/ pho brang rnams kyang sgo chod cig/ na bza' ltob lhub mtha' bsdus shig/ sku zung de ni spyan byol cig/ zor dang mdos kyi lam phye cig/ sgo ba rnams
65b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis sgo phye cig/ 'brang ba rnams kyis 'phreng sol cig/ da ni zor 'phen gang du 'phen// rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor bcas la// sdang bar byed pa'i dgra la 'phen// byang khi pu ra kha stong la 'phen// gnod pa byed pa'i bgegs la
66a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phen// sgo na gong kha phye la 'phen/ phugs na khyim chags che la 'phen// nad 'dre cong sri byed la 'phen// mo ngan chags kha byed la 'phen// rmi lam ngan pa la sogs pa'i// gang la dmigs
66a2(rgyud 'grel): pade la 'phen// dgra dgegs thal ba'i rdul du bzlog// skung ni mangs chen bskyod re ran// nag po chen po sku bskyod cig/ lha yi las mkhan sku bskyod cig/ lha srin dmag sna sku bskyod cig/ chibs kha dgra
66a3(rgyud 'grel): yul du bsgyur// dgra bo'i yul khams dmig gis khang // snang byung dag la sku zur sbyim// bka' yi chang ba drug la rlung // thun par snang ba'i dgra la chos// rlig byeng 'khor bcas dgrol cha so// dgra bo'i myi nor cham
66a4(rgyud 'grel): lab// dgra bo'i yul khams rlag par mdzod/ oM ma hA ka la thun b+h+yo/ oM ku ru rbad b+h+r-i/ pra mo ha b+h+yo/ ma hA ka li thun b+h+yo/ kaM ka la thun b+h+yo/ ka la ra tri thun b+h+yo/ zhes gtong ba'i dus su zor sngags las so//
66a5(rgyud 'grel): mgon po bya rog gdong gi gtor mdos/ slob dpon 'phags pa klu grub nag pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
67a1(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin mas pa chen po'i sgrub thabs bzugs
67b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ka la yak+Sha ma hA sa d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa yi// thugs
67b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi sras cig gtum po la// gus pas btung ngo de yi sras// gnod sbyin nag po'i sgrub thabs bri// nyon mongs gdug pa'i cho gos rnams la// ma lus pa las sgrub pa rnams// skad cig tsam las grol 'gyur ba// rdo rje 'dzin
67b3(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam par 'gyur// de las dang por sgrub pa pos dbang dang ngam tshig thob cing / dad pa phun sum tshogs pas/ bla ma la gdams pa yang dag par blangs cing / the tshom rnam par spangs pas sgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o//
67b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas ni dur khyod dang / brag nag po dang / ri rtse dang nags kyi phug dang / mi ma yin 'du ba'i sa lha brten can du bya'o// // der dang po bkra mi shis pa'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya ste/ lte ba gru gsum pa me ri dang btsos pa/
67b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyis mtshon pa'i sgo dang ldan par bri/ mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams te gnas brgyan par bya'o// de nas dur khrod kyi ras la lha bzo mkhas pas gnod sbyin gyi sku bzhengs la/ de'i snying khar dam tshig bskul ba'i sngags
67b6(rgyud 'grel): bris te/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha ka la tsane d+ha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra song te hU~M ces bri'o// de nas phyag gnyis dang zhabs gnyis la dam tshig bskul ba'i sngags ni/ yak+Sha pa ta lo ces br-i/ kA ma b+ha ra ces bri'o// de'i rgyab du/ tang thatang ya thA/
68a1(rgyud 'grel): AM b+hA b+hA ban yAk+Sha/ A te pa ta ye/ aM dan+ta ni la b+ha ra d+ha ra sha ri ra/ badz+ra ba ni tr-i ta yan/ sa sa ma tikrA mA te/ u sa d+hA na/ b+hA bAM shud d+he/ tang yA thA/ AM b+hu d+ha b+hU d+hA/ bi b+hu d+ha bi d+hud d+ha/ ma hI pra ba ta/ ha ra ha ra yar+tha/
68a2(rgyud 'grel): nAn/ pra ha ra pra ha ra yak+Sha nan/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha yak+Sha hri ta ya ni/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha yak+Sha d+ha ma ni/ bi si mA ti/ yak+Sha sha ri ra ni/ bi pho ta ya/ yak+Sha na ya ni/ tang ya thA/ A~M AHhUM phaT/ yak+Sha bi da ra na ya hUM phaT/ yak+Sha kro ta sA tA na ya hUM phaT/
68a3(rgyud 'grel): laM b+ha ra sa na ya hUM phaT/ a pra ti ha ta pa la ya hUM phaT/ ba ra kra ma ya phaT/ kri tan twA ya phaT/ kri tan tA ru pa ya phaT/ ro sha na ya phaT/ tra sa na ya phaT/ ku sman na d+ho da sa d+ha na ye phaT/ pre ta bi shartsa/ bi na sha ka ra ya phaT/ yak+Sha
68a4(rgyud 'grel): a pa sma ra bi na sha ka ra ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma ra ya ma ra ya/ na sha ya na shA ya/ sarba b+hi ga nAn bi na sha ka ra ya phaT/ sarba sha truM saM g+ha bi na ka ra ya phaT/ ni laM b+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ra pa nI rata dz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA/ ces rdo rje'i lte
68a5(rgyud 'grel): ba la bri'o// // dam tshig 'chags pa sku'i rten no// gsung mi 'gyur ba dam tshig gi rten no// gro ga'am ras la 'khor lo bris nas 'chang ba'o// thugs gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rten no// khyi nag po'i snying du bla rten
68a6(rgyud 'grel): du sku bzhugs pa'o// de nas gtor ma la btsugs te/ ngar nag pos gur phub la bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems bskyed la// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// der rjes dkyil 'khor khang pa ru// suM las rin
68b1(rgyud 'grel): chen ri rab steng // hUM dam k+Sha 'am yaM las ni// 'phros 'dus gyur pas rdo rjer bsam// de dang rten gsum rgyu rkyen las// gnod sbyin nag po zhal gsum pa// phyag drug 'jigs pa'i zhabs gsum pa// g.yas pa 'jigs byed stag gi
68b2(rgyud 'grel): gdong // g.yon pa stobs chen seng ge'i gdong // rtsa zhal khro bos thams cad bsgrol// spyan gsum mche bo rnam par gtsigs// dmar ser khrag gi ral po brdzes// phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'dzin// gnyis pa rtse gsum thams phur//
68b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa dril bu lcags kyu 'dzin// thod chen khrag ldan zhal du rngub// g.yas bskum bdud mo 'ching byed gnan// g.yon pa brkyang pas nyi gdong brdzis// phur zhabs mau 'bar tsha ba yis// bsgrub bya gang yin mgor btab nas// tshangs
68b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bu gar phug par bya// thong rlon ro yi lpags pa gon// dur khrod rus pas lus la brgyan// sha khrog la dgyes ha ha ra bzhad// mthing nag mi bsrun 'jigs pa yi// sprul pa gnod sbyin bye bsau bskor// bka' nyan las la thogs
68b5(rgyud 'grel): ba med// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la// shar nas nyi ma'i gdong pa dang // skar mnga' gdong dang lnga tsen dang // ku pre ra rnams g.yas kyis bskor// dbang ldan gtum 'byin yang ngag rgyal// yang dag shes dnga'abar gdon bris// g.yas
68b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rdo rje g.yon pa ni// rtse gsum pa ngan 'phyar ba bsam// oM AHhUM gis gnas gsum brlab// yi ge bzhi yis ye shes bstim// thugs kas rdo rje dbang bskur byaso// 'bru nag la sogs gtor ma yis// gnod sbyin mchod pa gto
69a1(rgyud 'grel): mar brjod// slar mnyes bya phyir sngags 'di brjod// oM badz+ra yak+Sha ka la tsan d+ha ni laM b+ha ra d+hA ra sha ra ra hUM phaT/ rtsa sngags 'bum las mi nyung bar// rtags dang sbyar la bsnyen pa bya// nag po'i tshogs dang snyan
69a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgras// bya dang ba dan sngon po mthong // gnod sbyin gnas dang gos gter dang // gzhon pa'i mchog tu sku gzugs gton// da byung las la sbyar bar bya// rjes dang tsha ba'i 'bru dngango tsha// 'gal ba'i rjes la ling ga bya// gnod
69a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin skud pas 'khor lo gdags// dmigs pa bkug bstim 'brub khung gzhug/ nyungs kar la sogs thun rdzas kyis// dus drug sngags kyis steng nas bra ba// oM badz+ra yak+Sha ka la tsan d+ha ni laM b+ha ra d+ha ra sarba sho hUM bi da ra
69a4(rgyud 'grel): ya phaT/ ha ra ha ra phaT/ pra ha ra pra ha ra phaT/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha phaT/ b+han d+ha b+hin d+ha phaT/ bi s+pho ta ya bi s+pho ta ya phaT/ sarba sha truM ka ya bag tsa ta bi na sha ka ra ya phaT/ sems can bsang dang shi bcang dang // dmag 'dren dbang
69a5(rgyud 'grel): gdon za ba dang // bya khras sems can bsad pa dang // rtags byung gnan pa yang na bsreg/ drag po'i sngags gtub par bya// des ni nges par bsgrub bya rnams// longs spyod dang bcas brlag par 'gyur// gal te las
69a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams gul ba na// rten gsum sa ga gtam bcug la// steng nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// rdo rje'i thog chen 'bebs par bsam// seng ldeng me la bsro bar bya// 'phrin las sngags kyis gzir bar bya// de yi mjug la sngags
69b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum bzlas// gnod sbyin srog gi 'khor lo yang // rdo rje thogs la brdung bar bya// nges par las rnams thogs pa med// gal te las kyi tshogs bsgrub par 'dod na// rgyal rigs kyi thod pa la/ hor ram bye khra'i khrag gis
69b2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi gzugs 'phrin las dang sbyar la bris te/ rtsa ba'i sngags la gang 'dod pa'i ming spel byas la/ rgyas pa la g+hi haM/ dbang la khri/ zhi ba la mon sran dkar po'i khu ba/ drag po la dur khrod sol ba/ bsad pa la
69b3(rgyud 'grel): bya khwa lcogs kyi khrag/ rengs pa yung ba/ bkrags pa lug gi khrig gis bris la/ ke tshe'i mar dang / chang dang / spo so 'cha' dang / bri yang ku'i thang chus bris te/ de thang kar byas la rdo rje 'dzin par bsam/ gcer bu skra
69b4(rgyud 'grel): bshig la/ rgyas pa la me tog ser po/ dbang la dmar po/ zhi ba la dkar po/ drag po la nag po/ bsad pa la dung ka/ rengs pa ser skya/ lkugs pa dmar nag/ sngags la gong 'dod pa'i ming dang spel la/ nyi ma re la thun
69b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad du brdeg na/ zhag bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// // bsrung ba'i 'khor lo byed par 'dod pas/ da ra ram ras la lte bar rdo rje gtum po'i sngags la che ge mo la rag k+Sha rag k+Sha swA hA/ zhes
69b6(rgyud 'grel): rtags te bri'o// de'i phyir rtsibs brgyang la gnod sbyin rtsa sngags br-i/ mu khyud la bsang pa'i sngags bri/ de'i phyi rol re dmig bcu drug la/ gtso bo'i gsung gi sngags dang / rag kA re re la sku dang spel la br-i/ de nas mu
70a1(rgyud 'grel): khyud la 'phrin las bri/ de'i phyir spyan drang ba'i sngags bri/ de'i mthar ka lI/ de'i mthar a li bri/ de'i mthar chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags bri/ de gur gum gyis bris la/ lA cha'i sbubs su bcug la
70a2(rgyud 'grel): btags na/ phan yon brjod kyis mi lang ngo // bsad par 'dod na skar ma mgo la bab pa dang / shing lo la sha khog par chud par bris la/ de nas khyi nag po'i glo ba'i shas gtums te/ gnod sbyin gyis bsad sngags la u
70a3(rgyud 'grel): tsa ta ya/ btags te ri lu brgya rtsa brgyad la rtsa brgyad bzlas nas byin nas/ bya rog mthong ba'i bar du yang bzlas te/ ri lu brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs nas gsod par 'gyur ro// de nas rams dang me tog sngon po'i khu ba la rtsa ba'i
70a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas khwa skad mi 'don pa la/ dpral bar thig la byas na kun gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'bras chang dang g+hi haM dang / lta gor sha sna rnams la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas rang
70a5(rgyud 'grel): gi snying kha ra k+Sha bris nas gnod sbyin rnams kyis stobs dang longs spyod sbyin par byed do// mthing ril gyi sgro nga dang / khwa ta'i gung sgro dang / khyi nag po'i chu dang / mtsho bya'i mthu rnams la sngags btab la/ mi khyi'i sgra mi grag pa'i
70a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas su dpral bar byugs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bcud len na mkhar 'phur// gnod sbyin gter dang longs spyod dang // 'phrin las bya ba sna tshogs pa// rdo rje gtum po mnyes pa dang // gnod sbyin rig pa rdzogs
70b1(rgyud 'grel): pas na// rgyud dang bla ma'i gdam ngag las// rim pa rgyas par rtogs par bya// gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud dang ni// bla mas gdams pa'i gdams pa yis// gnod sbyin bsgrub pa'i rim pa 'di// rang dga' ma yin nyes pa
70b2(rgyud 'grel): med// gal te 'khrul par gyur pas nA// bla ma dam pa mkhas rnams dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa las grub nas// rmi lam sgyu ma lta bu'i blos// bdag gis nyes tshogs bzod par mdzad// bdag gis sgrub thabs brtsams pa yis//
70b3(rgyud 'grel): dge ba dri ma med pa rnams// 'khor ba'i bag chags gzhom slad du// byang chub chen por longs spyod shog/ gnod sbyin nag po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po las kyi rdo rjes kong kha na'i 'od ma'i tshol du/ rang gi slob ma rje btsun
70b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po thang lo pas gsol ba btab nas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi paN Di ta wo la tsan tra dang / bod kyi lo tsha ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis gus par bsgyur ba'o// / dpal mas ze chen po'i sgrub #
70b5(rgyud 'grel): btsugs pa// rgya gar skad du/ shri ma hA ka la sa d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// khro bo gtum po gdug pa 'dul// thugs kyi sprul pa nag po la// gus
70b6(rgyud 'grel): pas phyag byas dgra bo rnams// bsad par 'dod pas sgrub thabs bri// dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i gnas// 'byung po gnas par dkyil 'khor brtsigs// gru gsum khru phyed mthur bkos la// sgrub bya'i rjes rnams tshogs
71a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang // rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin bsams la// mdun du e nang ro stengs su// hUM las nag po chen po bskyed// zhal gcig phyag gnyis brkyang bskum bzhugs// g.yas pa gri gug na mkhar gdengs// g.yon
71a2(rgyud 'grel): pa thod pa dmar gyis bkang // gsol ba'i tshul du thugs khar bzung // mgo bo'i 'phreng bas do shal byas// kha nas hU~M brjod dgra bo gsod// shwa lnga bdud rtsi rnam lnga yi// gtor mas mchod la bstod bya ste// de rjes 'phrin las
71a3(rgyud 'grel): bcol bar bya// oM ma hA ka la b+ha ling ta pu tsa b+ho d+hi kha kha khA hi khA hi/ gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags su gsungs// oM badz+ra kr-i ta ma hA ka la yaM/ sha tru tsi ta kro ting dun dza/ drag pos bsad pa'i gsang sngags so// AM ma hA ka la g+hu na hri/
71a4(rgyud 'grel): ta hUM phaT/ yi ge'i grangs kyi bsnyen pa bya// rtags byung las la sbyar bya ste// tsha ba gsum la long ga bya// sgrub bya'i ming rus snying khar bcug/ 'brub gnas bcug la shi skras btags// phur bu dag le bstod bya la// nyin mtshan cha
71a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thun gyis brab// rtags byung nas ni bsreg pa'am// gnan po byas par gyur na ni// gang yin nges par brlag par 'gyur// skabs su 'phrin las 'di yis bskul// hUM dpal ldan nag po chen po ni// bskal ba'i me dpung nang nas
71a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs// mi ro'i steng nas sku byung ba// mdog nag thung la bsus pa che// yon tan rdzogs pa'i lha khyod kyis// ngag bgegs gdug pa myur du bsgrol// g.yas kyi phyag gi gri gug gis// bstan la gnod pa'i snying rtsa chong // g.yon/
71b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'i phyag gi thod pa yis// dam nyams rnams kyi snying khrag gsol// mche ba zla tshes rab gtsigs pas// 'jig rten ma lus za tshul stom// spyan gsum me yi tsha cha 'phro// gdug pa can rnams sreg par byed// rnal 'byor yongs
71b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dgra lha yin// bdud 'dul rnams kyi dmag dpon yin// dam nyams rnams kyi gshed ma mdzad// mna' zan rnams kyi srog dbugs le no// dam pa chos kyi bsrungs ma yin// nag po gtum po las lo gshegs// bla ma la
71b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khu sems can 'tsho// ma lus skad cig tsam gyis kyang // 'di nyid du ni rings par khug/ sha khrag nang khrol ma lus la// dpa' bo chen pos myur du gsol// sha khrag til tsam ma lus par// khyod kyi zhal du gsol bar
71b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzod// gal te de ltar ma byas na// khyod kyi dam tshig nyams 'gyur te// rdo rje 'chang gi bka' 'das te// khyod kyi snying khrag thang la 'thig/ de bas dam tshig ma 'da' bar// gdug pa'i dgra 'di myur du bsgrol// zhes pas
71b5(rgyud 'grel): drag tu bskul pa yis// gang la dmigs pa myur du bsgrol// thod pa mtshan dang mi ldan par// ming rus bris te sngags bzlas pa'i// nyungs kAr dug dang bcas blugs te// dgra yi sgo khar sbas gyur na// zla ba drug na rlag par 'gyur/
71b6(rgyud 'grel): kaMkwa'i thod par ming rus bcug/ sngags bzlas zhing laM spras pa ni// dza mi me thog nyams par 'gyur// rabs chang zang bar 'tsha tshom bri// sngags kyis bta'i sta ngur du sbas// rigs brgyud ma lus 'chang bar 'gyur/
72a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa las kyi rim// yon tan sngags kyis byed 'gyur bas// rtag tu sngags la 'bad par bya// gal te las rnams ma grub na// lha yi snying khar rdo rje bsam// de las me byung bsreg bya zhing // sngags rnams
72a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlog la bzlas pa ni// las de thogs pa med par 'gyu re// grub nas bdud rtsi lnga yis mchod// de la sogs pa'i las kyi rim// bla ma mnyes las blang bar bya// nag po chen po'i yon tan gyi// bsgrub pa'i rim pa bris pa 'di//
72a3(rgyud 'grel): rma ma'i zhal las gsungs pa 'di// de yi dge bas 'phrin las rnams// 'bad pa med par 'grub par shog// dpal nag po chen po yon tan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho//
72a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsan tra dang / lo tshwa ba skan chung dar mu tshul khrims kyis legs par bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ yag k+Sha ka la ma hA s+yAd te rang na nA ma/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin nag po chen po la rin po ches
72a5(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'chang la gus btud nas// thugs kyi sras cig gnod sbyin rgyal// nag po g.yung drung chen po la// gus pas bstod pa bri bar bya// hUM dpa' bo chen po gnod
72a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin nag po ni// ri rab chen po'i lcog bzhi nas// khros pa'i sems kyis sku bzhengs la// dgra bgegs bsgrol la phyag 'tshal li// stobs chen mthing nag 'bar ba'i sku// gsod byed g.yas pa stag gi mgo/ 'joms byed
72b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa seng ge'i gdong // gdug pa tshar gcod phyag 'tshal lo// 'bar ba'i phyag drug g.yas pa na// ye shes rdo rjes 'byung po 'dul// rtse gsum nyon mongs dug las rgyal// gsod pa'i phur bu phyag 'tshal lo// g.yon pas
72b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dril bu 'khrol// 'gugs par byed pa'i lcags kyu 'dzin// gdug khrog kha ru 'dren mdzad pa// g.yon pa'i 'phrin las phyag 'tshal lo// zhabs gsum g.yas pas shes rab bdud// 'ching byed 'dod chags rtsang
72b3(rgyud 'grel): nas gcong // g.yon gyis nyi gdong thabs kyi bdud// zhe sdang rtsad gcod phyag 'tshal lo// phur bus dag bgegs dmigs pa'i mgor// gnyis med bde chen rol pa'i zhabs// ma rig rtsad nas gcod mdzod pa// rtog med ye
72b4(rgyud 'grel): shes phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs pa'i rgyan ldan ha ha ra bzhad// log par blta ba rtsad nas 'byin// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' nyan la// 'jigs byed khro bo phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig bla ma la smod dang // sangs rgyas bstan la smyung
72b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byin po// las dran sems can sdig can 'chi// bsgrub pa po la gdung ba rnams// skad cig tsam gyis gnod sbyin gyis// 'dir bsdus ling go 'di la bstims// nus pa med par srog dang phrol// snying la sogs pa'i nang khrol
72b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams// rang gi snyim pa bkang nas kyang // gtso bo nyid la bstims pa dang // ma lus khrag gi rgyun yang 'thung // rus pa rkang mar glang pa zhag/ ma lus par ni gsol bar mdzod// bdag la gnod pa'i bgegs tshan rnams//
73a1(rgyud 'grel): bsad cing bcing ba ma byas na// gnod sbyin dam tshig nyams 'gyur te// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' ma bcag/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam ma bsgral// khyed kyis dam bcas dam bsgral na//
73a2(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas te// snying yang dum bu stong du 'gyur// lus la bskal pa'i me 'bar te// sdug bsngal 'gyur bar nges pas na// nga yi 'phrin las myur du gyis// bskal du bsnyer ba'i 'phrin las 'di//
73a3(rgyud 'grel): nga lta nyid du thogs med kyis// k+Sha ma na ti dgra bo ma lus pa bi da ra ya bi da ra ya phaT/ hUM gnod sbyin chen po las le ya// nag po chen po las la ya// mkha' 'gro chen po las la ya// 'jigs byed gtum po las
73a4(rgyud 'grel): la yaM// thugs kyi sras cig las la ya// yak+Sha rno dpal las la ya// hUM k+ShA yak+Sha sa ma ya phaT// bdag gis bstod pa 'di byas pas// nag po'i 'phrin las grub nas kyang // skal dang mi ldan sems can rnams//
73a5(rgyud 'grel): chos dang 'gal ba tshar gcod shog/ gnod sbyin nag po la bstod pa rin po che zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ka na ri pas bstong po rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma wa la tsan tra
73a6(rgyud 'grel): dang bod kyi lo tsha ba slan chung ngar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o//
74a1(rgyud 'grel): xxx
74b1(rgyud 'grel): oM na mo ma hA kA lA ya/ rgya gar skad du/ swas+thA na ma hA kA la sA d+hA naM/ bod skad du/ rang gnas pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun la phyag 'tshal lo// gdul dka' 'dul ba sdang mthar
74b2(rgyud 'grel): byed// de yi sgrub pa rab bshad de// lha dang 'byung po 'jigs byed cing // dgra dang bgegs rnams rnam par nyams// ma zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i dra ba dang sngags cano// ha zhes bya ba ni hUM yig dang srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'phrog
74b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// a zhes bya ba'i yi ge ni aM yig dang skye ba med pa'o// kA yig ni rgyu las grol ba bde ba dang snying rje chen po'o// la zhes bya ba'i yi ge ni/ des skye ba med pa la rnam par rol pa'o// de la dur khrod la sogs pa nag po chen po bsgrub
74b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// sgron ma lnga dang myos byed la sogs pa dam tshig lhag par gnas pas shrI he ru ko&haM zhes nga rgyal bya'o// yi ge hUM las yang dag par byung ba sna tshogs rdo rje dang rdo rje'i gur dang / phyogs thams cad du rdo rje'i me'i 'khor yug bsam
74b5(rgyud 'grel): oM rok+ShA rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ srung ba'i sngag so// oM Tak+ki hUM dzaH'dod pa'i rgyal pos bgegs rnams dgug cing bcing bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje bdud rtsi phyung la/ oM g+ha g+hu g+hA tA ya b+hU ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAM phaTakI lA ya kI la ya sarba pa baM phaT hUM hUM
74b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM badz+ra kI la badz+ra d+ha ra a dz+nyA pa ya ti sarba big+h+nAn kA ya wak+Shi ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ phur bus btab pa'i sngagaso// oM badz+ra mung+ga ra badz+ra kI la a ko Ta ya hU~M hUM hUM phaT/ brdung ba'o sngagaso// de nas ji skad bshad pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bdun dang / tshangs pa
75a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o// oM shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ka&haM/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma mang ba dang / smon pa med pa las slar yang / 'jig rten mgan pa'o sa ban hrI/ zhes na mkhar bzhag go// na mkha'
75a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun skyes bsam// rdo rje sprin ni 'phro skyes pa// de ru yi ge b+h+rUM bsam mo// phyi rol du ni dur khrod chen po'o// ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan// sgo bzhi par ni rnam par brtag/ de yi dbus
75a3(rgyud 'grel): su 'khor lo ni// rab tu zlum po bri bar bya// nyi ma dang hriMHyig 'ongs pa hUM du gyur pa las rdo rje gri gug go/ de la nag po chen po/ mun pa'i zhal can spyan gsum pa/ gri gug dang 'phrang ba dang cang te'u ni g.yas pa'i phyag
75a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis 'dzin pa/ de bzhin du thod pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa ni g.yon pa'i'o// mnyam pa'i stabs kyi gaM yig las byung ba'i log 'dren mnan pa sbrul ni mi rus dang / dril bu'i 'phreng ba dang // mgo
75a5(rgyud 'grel): bo'i do shal can/ stag gi lpags pa grol ba/ cher 'khrugs pa/ 'bar ba chen po'i sku/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa pha rol 'joms pa'o// dpral bAr sin d+hu ra'i thig le'o// nag mo chen mo hriHlas byung ba/ kha T+wAM ga dang / thod pa
75a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pas phrag pa nas 'khyud pa/ des byin pa gnyis kyis mkhyud pa'o// g.yas su ni gshin rje chos be con dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa g.yon du ni dus mtshan ma'o// mdun du ni tri shul dang ka pA la 'dzin pa dz+wa li nA'o// cang
75b1(rgyud 'grel): dang thod pa bsnams pa/ zhing skyong ma ni rgyab tu'o// khu ba dang / khrag dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / sgron ma lnga ni mtshams su'o// sgo rnams su ni lcags kyu mo dang / zhags pa mo dang / lu gu brgyad mo dang / 'bebs mar/
75b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams rnams su ni/ gshin rje sreg ma dang / pho nya mo dang / mche ba mo dang / be tsan ma'o// ma mo dgu nAM/ gcer mo gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// oM AHhUM/ sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so//
75b3(rgyud 'grel): k+ShaM dzaM khaM gaM skaM/ po yig la sogs pa'i sngags so// ye shes sems dpa' dgug par bya'o// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// mchod chen ji ltar rtsal ba ltar// bdag kyang rab tu sbal ba'i phyir// na mkha'i rdo rje dang bdag stsol
75b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi// gsang gsum rdo rje las byung ba// khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pa// rdo rje dbang bskur chen po sbyin// gsol ba bya ba dang dbang bskur ba rdo rje'o tshig go// mi bskyed dam tshig dbu
75b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan la// sgom na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// oM badz+ra sa mA dzaMHsbyang ba'i sngags so// dzaHhUM baM hoHbyin gyis brlabs pa ste phyag rgya'o// de la sngags 'ang
75b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag ni las thams cad sgrub pa'o// oM badz+ra ma hA ga la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nAn bi nA ya ku hUM phaT/ ha sngags 'di la rgya dpe gsar ba na 'dra min du 'dug kyang sngar gyi bo na yod pa nyid dbang bcan par byas so// rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM shrI ma hA ka la sha sa no pa ha ri Ne
76a1(rgyud 'grel): s+yai Sho ba shrI mUk+Sha lo ya ma nga rat+na trA ya a ba kA ra Na ya da pra tA d+hA skA rA sa t+yA d+ha/ ya da drAn+tu/ g+ha gar+dz+dza \u0f7f khA sa m+b+ha ra mA ra/ grAr+N+Na grAg+na/ bAn+tha b+han+ta/ d+hA na han/ da ha dA hA/ ba tsa pan+d+ha/ dAn ma kA na mA ra s+yA d+d+ha phaT/ brAng /
76a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra nA ra kr-i kr-i hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ mkha' 'gro mas dbang du byed pa'o// oM s+t+rai shrI ya/ da~M bo kA lI kA lAM ma hA kA li nAM b+h+yo/ nag mo chen mo 'i 'o// oM AHma hA kA lA~M de bi kA la bikrAn+d+ha kA rA tri tsat+tA rU bi t+taM hU~M phaT/ dus
76a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'o// oM hrIHkA la rU pa hUM sngags 'di yang snga 'gyur bang dpe dbang ba can par byas so// khaM/ nyi ma'i bu'o// oM AHkro d+haM ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dzi hUM phaT/ gshin rje gshed kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so// thal mo sbyar ba ri
76a4(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni nag mo'i phyag rgya'o// b+ha ga ltar byas pa ni dus mtshan ma'i'o// 'dzub mo brkyang ba ni chos kyi rgyal po'i'o// phyag rgya 'di dag gis spyan drangs shing / mdun du dam tshig sbyin pa
76a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ oM badz+ra ha na ha na badz+ra sa ma ya mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ zhes pa ni sngags so// lte ba ra b+ha ga la gnas pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bsam par byas na/ bde ba chen por 'gyur te/ 'jigs byed chen po dang / dus mtshan mo mnan
76a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gri gug dang thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'chang ma/ steng du lta zhing dmar mo 'bar ba'i lus can ma'o// 'di la ni bzlas pa med de/ gzhan du 'odi nyid sngags so// gshin rje gshed ni nag po nag dkar dmar ba'i zhal/ 'khor
76b1(rgyud 'grel): longang ral gri dang be con dang / mang dang / stA re dang / thong pa bsnams bya'o// dur khrod kyi rgyan dang ldan pa ma he la non pa'o// gal te dam tshig nyams pa la/ sgrub dpon rdo rje sems dpas bdag nyid la sogs pa
76b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig dran pa bzlas pas gsol ba bya'o// cod pan gyis/ bdag la sogs pa la dbang bskur ba bsgom na/ las dang dngos grub rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sgrub pa bshad
76b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dbugs dbyung ba dang / dgang ba dang / rengs pa dang / bum pa can gyi las kyis lus dag par bya'o// de nas gdol pa mo 'am/ gzhan pa'i rigs kyi'o// pad+ma can nam/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i maM mo/ b+ha ga bzang ba/
76b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang ldan pa/ lo bcu gnyis ma la sogs pa blangs nas dag par byas te rim pa ni 'di yin to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/ spyan la sogs par bsgom par bya// yi ge hUM dang oM ngag dang // AH
76b5(rgyud 'grel): dang phaT ni rab brtag bya// 'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yi// pad+ma rdo rje rab bsgom bya// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // tsum pa na dang rtag par mkhyud// ye shes pad+ma kha bye ba// rdo rje sor mo nges pa bzhag/ 'dod chags rdo rje 'i tshul
76b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas te// rdo rje'i phur bu nges par gang ba// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bso// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas dpa' bos me tog chu// 'thungs nas sngags ni rjes dran bya// dbugs 'byin brgyal dang
77a1(rgyud 'grel): rgod pa dang // sgeg pa'i gar ni ngo mtshar bas// phyag rgya lhan cig sgrub pa pos// myur du bde ba thob par 'gyur// bu mo yang gsungs pa/ lce sbom mag ni dmar ser la// rlu ba cang spyan dmar ser yan
77a2(rgyud 'grel): nges kyang grub par 'gyur ba ste// rog ma chen mo spyan la sogs// rtog tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa bstan na 'grub// ces gsungs so// las kyi phyag rgya'o// ba lang
77a3(rgyud 'grel): dang rta sha dang // khyi shwa ngag dang sna tshogs pas// dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni// gtum mo rang gi lus las byung bas dbyer med pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o// chos kyi phyag rgya'o// dngos po mdo la sgom pa med//
77a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min// de ltar dngos po dngos med pas// sbom po dmigs su med pa'o// chos rnams dngos po med pa la// chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa// e ma ngo mtshar las byung ba// nam mkha' la ni na mkha'
77a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// phyag rgya chen po'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la// rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu bsgom// lus dang ngag sems la spros pas// rdo rje 'jam pa 'dra bar 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyen tsam du// rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od dag gis//
77a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis// dag pa'i bdag nyid snang bar 'gyur// 'di nye bar mtshon pa ni kun brtags te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de dag ni bsnyen pa'o// de ltar rtag tu goms pa na rig pa'i brtul zhugs
77b1(rgyud 'grel): spyad pas bdag nyid nag po chen por 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rje btsun gyi sku gzugs zla mtshan gyi ras sam/ g.yul gyi ro ras la gsang bas bris te byin gyis brlabs nas/ nag po chen po gang yin pa de rdo rje slob dpon du
77b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam pas/ ri mo'i mdun du mchod pa dang / dug dang sha chen po dang gu gul gyi bdug pa phul nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la kr-I k+She tra big+h+nAn bi na ya ka A gats+tsha A gats+tsha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ nag po
77b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po nyid 'ongs nas ci 'dod ces smra'o// des kyang nag po chen por mdzod cig ces byas na/ bdag nyid nag po chen por 'gyur ro// ril bu dang / mig sman dang / ro dang / ral gri la sogs dang / las thams cad ster ro/
77b4(rgyud 'grel): cho ga 'di kho nas nag mo chen mo la sogs pa 'grub par bya'o// yang lang tsho dang ldan pa'i bu mo'i mgul nas 'khyud nas nag mo 'am/ dus kyi mtshan ma'i gsang sngags dang bcas/ dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya zhes brjod na 'bar bar
77b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro// de bzung ste spyod pa spyad pas bdag nyid nag po chen po dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du phyag mtshan rnams dang / lha dang 'byung po thams cad nag po chen po'i bkas mngag gzhug tu bya'o// oM badz+ra ma hA
77b6(rgyud 'grel): kA la~M k+She k+Sha tra ban+dan mi nA~M ma~M ka ba~M rjes mug swa d+ha ya sA d+ha ya hA hA Te swA hU~M/ mtshan ma sgrib pa'i sdeg sa mi// oM badz+ram kI kA la m+bi k+Sha tra bag+h+nAn ba~M na ya ka A dz+nyA ma i mu ka/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya i mu ga d+ha sa sa d+ha ya /
78a1(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad sgrub pa'o// yang na rdul chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang sgrub ste/ mtshan ma mthong zhing 'jigs pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ci ste ma
78a2(rgyud 'grel): grub na drag shul sbyor ba bya'o// de dag ni sgrub pa chen po'o// gzhan yang las kyi sbyor ba phra mo dag kyang sgrub ste/ rtse gcig tu ma gyur pas kyang ngo // gshin rje'i 'khor lo dur khrod kyi ras la drug dang khrag dang ke tshe dang / lanA tshwa dang /
78a3(rgyud 'grel): d+ha du ras bri'o// lte ba dang khang pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la yi ge bcu bdun dang / nag po chen po dang gshin rje gshed kyi sngags kyi bskul ba dang bcas pa bri'o// yak+She ma me daM dza sa do ru yats+tsha ni rA Na yo ni ra/ de nyid nya phyis gnyis kyi
78a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus su bzhag nas bskul bar byas na nyi ma bdun gyis gsod par byed do// de bzhin du de dang de'i cho ga las thams cad sgrub pa ste/ 'khor lo 'di ni chen po'o// gzhan yang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ lte bar rtse ba'i sngags
78a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / phaT a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT tsos bris/ kha kha khA hi khA hi a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT/ ces bya ba la sogs pa yang rab tu bris/ phreng ba'i sngags kyis phyi rol nas bskor ba'i 'khor lo 'dis kyang drag shul thams cad sgrib
78a6(rgyud 'grel): par byed cing / sngags dang 'khrul 'khor 'ching ba dang gcod pa dang / byis pa'i gdon rnams kyi gnod pa thams cad dang / nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang / mi mthun pa thams cad bsrung bar bya'o// nag po'i bkas mo mo
78b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / gshin rje rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / lha min rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / grong khyer skyong ba rnams bskul nas kyang las sgrub bo// nag po chen po la gtor ma sbyin te las
78b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams bsgrub par bya/ sreg blugs dag kyang dbul lo// mi rus las byung phur bu 'am// yang na seng ldeng rtse las skyes// lcags las byas pa'i phur bu dag/ snying ga nas ni rkang pa'i bar// phur bu btab nA myur du 'chi// dgra
78b3(rgyud 'grel): bo'i bshang gci las gzugs brnyan byas te/ A kaR+Sha ya dzaHsa bkug nas/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+Shi k+She tra big+h+nAn bi nA ya ka badz+ra ki li kI la ya sarba sha tru nA ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ 'dis gdab po// da ni drag shul gyi sbyor ba thams
78b4(rgyud 'grel): cad pa bshad pa na mkha' rdo rje'i srin po ni/ drag cing khro bo rab gtum dang // wa dang bya rog sna tshogs dang // bya rgod khyi yis gang bar bsgom// me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dgra bo rnams ni sgrog par bsgom//
78b5(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams// sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la// dgra byi bsad par bsam nas su// de nas las rnams brtsams par bya// de la dkyil 'khor ba de rnams kyis de'i lus btang zhing
78b6(rgyud 'grel): de'i bsrung ba'i lha rnams kyang bkug nas rang nyid la thim par bya'o// phur bus btab cing mtshon chas bcad par bya'o// bsod nams gang gis tshe 'dir srung ba rnams kyang sngags pas blang bar byas la/ 'byung po gang dag srung ba byed
79a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la gtor ma sbyin pa dang / phur bus gdab bo// a mu ka k+Sha sam+b+ha TA di rak+Sha man+ta de ba nAM/ kI la ya kI la ya hUM phaT/ phur bu bskul ba'i sngags dang / phreng ba'i sngags dang bcas pa ni gdab pa'i sngag so// mkha' 'gro
79a2(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams kyis de'i lte ba bcad cing / snying ga'i thig le dbye bar bas mo// rgyu ma rkang dang khrag la sogs// thams cad drangs par rnam bsgoms te// mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pas mnan// bsgoms na dgra rnams 'chi bar 'gyur// bla ma'i zhal gyi
79a3(rgyud 'grel): man ngag gis mtshon cha drug po dag gis sprin gyis char dbab pa'o// gzhan yang mnan pa dang / sdang ba dang / srin pos 'dzin pa dang / rims dang / bskrad pa dang / rmugs pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / bu mo 'gugs pa dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa la sogs
79a4(rgyud 'grel): pade de'i cho gas bya ste skad cig gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba la 'di sbyin bye// gzhan du khro bo gtum pos gsod// dngos grub kun gyi sbyor sgrub pa// slob dpon bka' las don yod yin// zhes pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ma
79a5(rgyud 'grel): hA kA la'i sgrub thabs rang gnas pa zhes bya ba de bA a ka ras mdzad pa'o// 'di'i 'gyur rnying grub chen tshul mgon nyid kyis mdzad pa las/ sngags rnams phal cher zhal ba zhes kyi dbang du mdzad pa 'dra bas dkyus na med/ mdzad byang bram ze rat+na pha las
79a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ces 'byung ba la bar skabasu mtshon bu dkyus su shor ba sogs lhag chad nor skyon shin tu mang po snang ga/ rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta pud+d+ha badz+ra pa'i zhabs kyi rgya dpe dang bstun nas/ rgyal khams pa tA ra nA thas 'gyur chad mang du bsags
79b1(rgyud 'grel): shing / g.yar khral du zhus thug byas pa'o//
80a1(rgyud 'grel): // rje btsun mag po chen po phyag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs mar ngag mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i slob dpon chen po zhi ba sdam pas mdzad pa'o//
80b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ b+han+d+ha ra kA shrI ma hA kA la sa dz+nyA na pa de sha sad+d+hi p+ta/ bod skad du/ rje btsun dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs man ngag mdor bsdus pa/ dpal he ru kA la phyag 'tshal lo// bskul
80b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i me yi 'phreng bas rab bskor sdang dang lha min gsod byed gtum po ste// char sprin mtshungs sku glog dmar rjes 'gro ro 'dzin ral gro bskyong pas phyugs rnams gsol// mi bzang mtshon chos bdud tshogs bcom
80b3(rgyud 'grel): nas thod par khrag 'thung mchog tu brgyan mdzad pa// grub pa kun gyi mchog stsol 'jigs byed nag po chen pos 'gro 'di skyong bar mdzod// sgrub pa po dpa' bo'i gnas su gnas te/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la gnas
80b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zlum po bya'o// der zur drug pa b+ha ga'i rnam pa dgod par byas nas/ mchod pa dang gtor ma bsham mo// der yang nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs te/ khrag gi yon chab dang me tog la sogs pa
80b5(rgyud 'grel): dbul ba dang / bdun rnam par dag pa dang / gtor ma dang bstod pa byas la/ oM muHzhes gshegs su gsol/ de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms la gnas par byas la/ slar yang
80b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag med pa'i don la gnas pas stong par bsam mo// oM shu n+yA ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&haM/ de nas mdun du gsang ba'i bris sku dgram pa dang / bsgom zhing bzlas pa bya'o// de'i rim po ni thog mar ngur
81a1(rgyud 'grel): khrod kyi gzhir mos pa bya'o// phyi nas chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i maM ro'i gdan no// der zla ba dang / nyi ma la hUM dang gri gug las skyes pa'i nag po chen po rab tu 'bar ba can/ sprin nag dang
81a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs pa/ bya rog dang khyi dang ce spyang gi tsho gas spyo ba/ spyan gsum pa/ sma ra dang smin ma 'bar ba/ skra ser po brdzes pa/ srin po'i lus can phyag g.yas ngag gis gri gug dang / ral gri'o// g.yon dag gis tri shu la
81a3(rgyud 'grel): sbrul dang bcas pa dang / thod pa khrag can no// stag gi lpags pas smad da kris pa/ sbrul dang / ni rang+kus brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang thod pas cod pa ni bcings pa/ mgo bo'i ngo shal can/ drag po'i gang rgyangs sgrog pa/ sems
81a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i skyil krungs saM yang na mnyam pa'i stabs su'o// de la yi ge gsum dgod pa dang / go cha bcing bar bya'o// de nas ye shes pa bkug cing dbang bskur te/ mi bskyod pas rigs kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// yang mchod
81a5(rgyud 'grel): cing bstod nas sngags bzla ste/ so sor bzhi 'bum du bzla'o// thun mtshams su yang bris sku la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o// de dag ni bsnyen pa chung ngu'o// de'i rjes su nag po chen po'i 'khor bkod de/ dam tshig dbang
81a6(rgyud 'grel): mos mgul nas ma khyung ba/ de ni cang te'u dang thong pa can gcer mo mchog tu sgeg pa mgo bo skam po'i thong pa dang 'phreng po can/ seng ge dang / na chung dang / gdol pa dang / 'dab chags spa ba nag mo chen ma'o// mdun du tsa mudz+dzi
81b1(rgyud 'grel): bung ba'i mdog can/ tri shu la dang / dung chen po thogs pa/ g.yas su dka' bzlog ma 'od dmar 'khrug pa mo// gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// g.yon du phag mo sngo s+yA kha T+wAM ga dang mi'i mgo bo bsnams pa'o// nag me chen
81b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i mdun du gshin rje nag po ral gri dang zhags pa thogs pa'o// g.yas su srin po dmar nAg lag na gri gug dang thod pa'o// g.yon du 'byung po'i dbang po thal mdog cing te'u dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o// de dag ni hrIH
81b3(rgyud 'grel): tsa haHhe yaM ra b+haM zhes pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o// da ni sngags rnams bshad par bya ste/ oM ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ dang po'o// oM ma hA kA la ya na mo hUM phaT/ gnyis pa'o// oM AHmo haM raM hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po ste gsum
81b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// na maHsma sha na bA si ni/ mahA kA la a ru tsa rA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsa le pra tsa la yal lA ya/ de ba ling+ga swA hA/ snying po ste bzhi pa'o// oM ma hA b+haM rab sarba sid d+hi dA ya ka DaM hU d+h+r-i Ta/ dngos grub dang rdzu 'phrul bskul ba ste lnga pa'o//
81b5(rgyud 'grel): oM shI mahA kA la sa/ shas no pa ha raM NaM/ e Shonapash+tsi ma ka lai Ta yaM i ngaM/ rat+na tra yA ba ka re NAM/ ya ti pra ti/ sma ra si ti dAM/ i drASh+TaM/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ mA ra mAr+yA/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+nA/ ban+na ban+ta/ hA na ha naM/ dA ha dah+ma/ ban+d+ha pA tsa/ dAM nam
81b6(rgyud 'grel): ke na mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ nag po chen po thams cad kyi 'phreng ba'i sngags te las thams cad byed pa'o// oM sa~M rat+na sa ma ye shA r-I hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ nag mo chen mo spangs shing bo da pa'i sngags so// oM kr-i/ b+h+r-i/ dzaM phaT swA hA/
82a1(rgyud 'grel): nag mo chen mo'i s+t+raing thA la// oM tsa mrat+te/ d+hu makaM shrI bid+hAt+ne h+ne/ hAnad+han+ta/ dAtangaH/ patsa patsa/ de bdam+b+ha An ya sAt+ma/ tsam+ma tAM'i'o// oMg+ne had+h+waM b+h+rUM phaT s+yAt+tha/ a myA'i'o// gr-i ha ha ma tha mthA ha swAh+na/ phag mo na'o/
82a2(rgyud 'grel): oM dz+dzaHkA lA rU ba h+mA ShAM/ ga shrIn rje'i'o// oM badz+ra rak+Sha sa kA rang hA ba tsan+manr-i s+thA tAM/ srin po'a'o// oM ru tra sam+b+ha he shwa rA ya mA ma hA to hU~M phaT/ drag po'i'o// oM AHs+m+R+YuM b+hin gyis rlob pa'i'o// oh+na/ nA maHhaM/ swAh+mA hUM/ bauSha&ha~M/ d+hAn+na ho/
82a3(rgyud 'grel): me 'i// maM/ d+hIr+the/ d+hAn+d+ra Shar+thabaT+Ti/ ces pa go cha'o// ai la shwA a b+h+raMn sana?/ snun s+yo hran+yatAM madz+nyAMSh+Ta trAMHhU~M/ ltu bang bsgyur ba'i sngags so// nAM nAM dr-I/ zhes pa ni rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlab pa'o/
82a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bsnyen pa'o// 'dir nag po chen po shes rab ma dang bcas pa bsgom pa ni/ bsnyen pa chen po'o// de bzhin du 'khor lo bsgom pa ni/ nye ba'i bsnyen pa chen po'o// de dag tu sngags gcig ni bye ba'o// gzhan
82a5(rgyud 'grel): dag ni 'bum phrag bzhi la sogs pa'o// nag mo chen mo la sogs pa'i ni 'bum du'o// de nas ni sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ dur khrod la sogs par dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi par dbus su zur drug pa'i dkyil 'khor
82a6(rgyud 'grel): raM// de dag tu dbus dang nang gi zur gsum la yi dwags kyi gdan no// gzhan ngos kyi grwa la/ ma he dang / khyi dang / stag go gdan mo// de dag tu mtshan ma bkod la/ tho ba dang / dbyug pa dang / pad+ma dang / ral gri ni sgo bzhir ro// thong
82b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni grA bzhir ro// bum pa dang ka pA la dang sin+d+hu ra'i dkyil 'khor dang / gtor ma yang dgod par bya'o// 'dir ni mung+ga ra b+hai ra ba la sogs pa dang / kul+le dang / ku ru kulpe dang / ki lI yaM dang / ha ri yaM rnams/ lcags kyu dang / mda' dang /
82b2(rgyud 'grel): bur bu dang / shak+ti'i lag can no// zhes pa min ngag go// bdag nyid de'i dbus su 'dug la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na/ nag po chen po'i drung du/ bdag nyid kyang der bsam te/ zla ba drug tu bzlas pas ni/ sgrub pa'o// de dang bdag
82b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid gcig tu bya bas/ zhag bdun du rgyun mi 'chad par bskul ba ni/ sgrub pa chen po'o// de'i rjes su dngos grub blangs la dkyil 'khor gshegs nas ci bder 'dug par bya'o// gang zhig sgrub pa la gnas pas gtor ma
82b4(rgyud 'grel): dang mchod pa dang / sbyin sgeg rgyun me 'tshong par bya ste/ de la gtor ma sbyin pa'i sngags ni 'di'o// gang byin gyis brlab pa dang / bsrung ba dang sbyin pa'i tshe/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i 'phreng ba'i sngags bzlas la/ na maHsa man+ta
82b5(rgyud 'grel): kA ya wA k+tsit+tA badz+ra NaM/ oM AHhUM oM ma maM haM haM kaM kau raM raM ra ra ma hA ma hA kA l-ing had ha pe tsa pa tsa gardza gar+Na kaM sho warta ma ne/ i maM bA lid+b+ha hA gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na pA ya oM AHhUM sarba big+h+nAn+ni nA ya ka/ oM A kA ro mu kho sarba d+harmA NaM a d+ya nut+pan+na tA ta
82b6(rgyud 'grel): oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'byung po'i tshogs pa rnams la ni/ oM sarbe k+She tra pA la sa ha ga Na dU tI bA ling gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na kha kha hUM phaT swA hA/ gang gtor ma sbyin pa dang bzlas pa dang / ma chod pa la 'jug pa na dam tshig bskul por bya'o// oM badz+ra
83a1(rgyud 'grel): ma hA kA la/ dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM ba ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya hoHthal mo mnyam par bcing ba dang / rdo rje thal mo ni nag po chen po bud med dang bcas pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de nas las kyi rim pa ste las kyi don du mchod
83a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyin mo bdun no// de nas dug dang khrag dang ldan tshwa dang nim+ba dang / ske tshe btags pas/ ro ras la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyud pa gnyis bri'o// lte bar snying po bskul tshig dong bcas pa bri'o// 'og ma la g.yon bskor du// kha kha de
83a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dat+ta mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ces pa la sogs pa'o// rtsibs chan dag la/ dI na me ke nA de ba dat+ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces pa'o// de'i phyi rol du mu khyud la yang de dang 'dra ba slar yang mu khyud gnyis pa la/ phaT de ba dat+ta mA ra ya phaT ces pa'i
83a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha nang du ltos pas kyang ra ba'o// de'i bar du gzugs brnyan sngags kyis bskor ba'o// bdag dang bris sku lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas 'khor lo byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nyid thod par bcug la sgrub bya dgug
83a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / snying baM dang 'brang ba'i sngags drag tu bzla'o// dug khrag dang / yungs kAr dang / ske tshe dang / lcags dang / drur khrod kyi thal ba dang / ro bsregs pa'i rdo dang / gtum po'i thal ba dang / bra bo dag la bzlos pas
83a6(rgyud 'grel): kyang gtor ro// gal te bsrung ba dang bcas par gyur na/ kha sbyor dbye'o// de nyid bshad par bya ste/ ji ltar lha sbyin dang mchod sbyin sdang bar byed pa de ltar te/ khwa dang 'ug pa la gnas pa bri/ 'khor lo rta dang ma he dang /
83b1(rgyud 'grel): khwa dang 'ug pa 'i khrag gis bri'o// lha dang sgrub bya'i rdzas kyis kyang byug go// kla klo rnams kyi dur gyi khang pa'i rdzas dang / rus pa dang / ma Shita kyi khrag dang bcas pa nyid lha min gyi rdzas so// de nyid gu gul dang / rang byung
83b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / bshang ba dang / khyi dang / phag gi rus pa dang / ka ping dza'i rwa sregs pas bdug go// de yang / dong bur sgrub na bzang po zhes pa man ngag go// yang logs shig tu/ gzugs brnyan dang 'khor lo bri'o// de bzhin gshegs
83b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa la snyan gsan phab ste mchod nas sngags kyis bskul lo// srung ba rnam dag ni/ de ba dat+sa k+Sha sam+me Ti rak+Sha man+da de ba tany+tsa A kaR+Sha ya dzaHzhes bkug la 'khor lo dang sngags phur bus gdab bo// de'i dge ba de dag/

84a5(rgyud 'grel): pas rig sngags mnan dang bcas pa tshig par bsams na de yi las rnams thal bar 'gyur// bgregs dang sdig pa yang yang sbyangs shing bdud rtsi'i bum pas sku gzugs rab bkrus sman mchog gis// dbang bskur mchod

84b1(rgyud 'grel): phaT ho/ oM pad+ma ka pA la sarba d+hA na pUSh+TiM ku rban+tu au/ oM badz+ra nA ma ru ke Na surba DAkI nI ba hA ya ba hA ya hriHdzaH'di dag ni mtshon tshwa ste sprin 'thug po spro bas las thams cad 'grub pa'o// oM pra wA ra ha/ dgug pa'i sngags so// oM ba sug
84b2(rgyud 'grel): ya lo hUM/ spyod par byed pa'o// oM khe Ta pa tsi tra hraHgsod par byed pa'o// oM ru a sA bi drA pa/ rmugs par byed pa'o// oM ma roha/ 'byung po 'dul ba'o// oM dzir/ me rings par byed pa'o// a dza dzi dze chu rengs pa'o// a ha dza ya swA hA/
84b3(rgyud 'grel): ral gri rengs pa'o// oM he tiSh+Tha he wa hUM/ mkha' 'gro ma 'dul ba'i sngags so// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa rang rang gi sngags bskul ba dang bcas pa dang / lte bar snying po gsum bskul ba dang bcas pa'o// cho ga thams cad
84b4(rgyud 'grel): ni sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes pas brtag go/ chu dang me rengs pa ni khyim dang lus sam gnas la gdags so// ral gri rengs pa ni lus la gdags so// mkha' 'gro ma dang 'byung po gzir ba ni rtag tu bskul zhing mnan pa
84b5(rgyud 'grel): 'am bsregs lugs bya'o// sngags kyi 'khor lo klu rigs brgyad kyi snying gar bri/ rab tu bkug la/ nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyi 'og tu bcug/ ri dwags lte ba dang rma bya'i khrag dang / phag gi mche ba btags pa'i chus
84b6(rgyud 'grel): thal ba dang yungs ka ra la bran ti/ oM ma hA naM ta hUM ha/ sarba ban+d+ha ban+d+ha adz+nyA pa ya tI swA hA/ ces 'bum bzlas so// 'khor lo bcangs shing yungs ka ra dang thal ba gang la bsnun pa'i sbrul 'bros pa 'am 'ching bar 'gyur ro//
85a1(rgyud 'grel): oM mu khaM staM b+hA ya a mu k+Sha baM hUM phaT/ 'khor lo'i dbus su lce bcings pa spu ta li'i snying gar bcug ste lce la phur bus btab ste/ sngags 'dis bskul ba na lkugs pa las gzhan ma yin no// oM hriM ma tsa mut+tA ha
85a2(rgyud 'grel): shrI hUM phaT/ 'bum du bzlas nas bskul tshigs dang bcas khri bzlas la/ sngon dang 'dra ba'i 'khor lo bcing ba dang / gnam lcags kyi rdo rje la lan stong du bzlas te bcangs na mtshon cha bcings par 'gyur ro// snying po'i
85a3(rgyud 'grel): mthar/ oM dza la ya wa hUM/ ces bzlas shing / mchod rten gyi drung du gtsang sbrar bcas pas shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro// snying khar rdo rje rnon po sgoms la/ snying po'i mthar/ oM ba ra ba ra pra ba ra pra ba ra hUM/ zhes bzlas pas blo gros mi
85a4(rgyud 'grel): zad par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi bya ba ni gzhan du bstan pa'o// gtor ma nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa khrag dang chang dang sha dang 'bras bu dang dzas+thU lis brgyan pa brgya dang / bkra shis kyi grangs dang / drug cu dang / nyer lnga sbyin pa/

85a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ ces pas bsnyen nas/ phur bu rnams la so sor bzlas pa stong dang / thams cad du khri bzlas pa'am 'bum du bzla'o// phyis mu stegs byed la sogs pa'i lha'i gzugaso brnyan byas la zhag bdun du dgug par bya'o//

85b3(rgyud 'grel): dang thod pa thogs pa bsgoms shing yang dgug ste/ oM kradra ka r-i phaT da sha khI pa oM kaR+Sha ya dzaHzhes bzlas lha/ bshang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang sha dang khrag dang myos byed/ thong rus kyi bdug pa 'bul lo// oM badz+ra ka ra la

88a1(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma ni phra mo dang thig le bsgom par bya'o// 'ga' 'ga' dag ni/ 'di ni las tsam gyi don te/ de'i phyir gsang ba chen po'i rim pa mi 'dod do// zhes smra ba ni yang dag pa ma yin no// ci phyir zhe na nag po
88a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i rgyud la mi 'jug go// slob dpon dag gis kyang dngos grub dag gi sgrub pa'i thabs byas shing / 'grub par mthong pos 'di ni phra mo kho na ma yin no// 'dir smras pa/ lte bar rdo rje dbang mo rnam par gnas pa me ma
88a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / gnyid ma dag gnon pa b+ha ga ra ni nag po chen po'o// spyi bo la yang he ru ka gdan rnam par yAnon pa'o// zhal nas zhal dang / rdo rje dang pad+mar 'bar ba dang 'dzag pa'o// ma rlung gis lus ni dri med byed// hA/
