88a6(rgyud 'grel): ma log par mtshon po'o// gzhan yang zhing skyong gi sa bon dag kyang gsang ba'o// ces pa ni rje btsun nag pa nyid kyi nges pa'o// bzhi pa lnga pa de'i rjes su// yan lag drug ldan slob dpon 'dod// bla ma'i zhal
88b1(rgyud 'grel): sna'i rim pa las// byung gang bde chen rdo rjes smras// ma bzud srin po gdon dang baglags kyi mthar byung nyid// 'dzags byed nag pa gzhan gyis ma thub sgrub thabs gtso// bshud ba des gang sgru
88b2(rgyud 'grel): pi rnams la grub rtsol zhing // myur du gtir dang rdzu 'phrul grol ba'i 'bras thob sh+log/ ces pa rje bo tsun+da nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs man ngag mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba grub pa'i sgrib dpon shAn ta'i
88b3(rgyud 'grel): gup+ta'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / shar phyogs gau ra'i pati ta ni rbA NA shrI dang / slob dpo ni pUr+N+Na badz+ra'i zhabs dang / rmongs pa kun dga' snying pos bsgyur nas
88b4(rgyud 'grel): slar yang rgya dpe dang gtugs te 'bru zhus yang yang byas pa'o// // mang+ga laM/
89a1(rgyud 'grel): thob dpon sgragacan 'dzin bzang pos mdzad pa bzhugs/
89b1(rgyud 'grel): na mo badz+ra DA kA ya/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs byed dag rnams nyams byed pa/
89b2(rgyud 'grel): lha mon mthar byed nag mo'i bu// de la btud nas sgrub pa'i thabs// mdor bsdus bdag gis bshang par bya// de la dam tshig dang ldan pas// dur khrod dang ma mo'i khyim dang // ling ga gcig pa 'am/ yang na khyim dra
89b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub bo// thog mor dkyil 'khor du myos byed dang sha dang gtor ma dang / me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas/ bdur rnam par dag pa bya'o// de nas oM muHzhes gshegs su gsel bar bya'o// oM
89b4(rgyud 'grel): shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ zhes brjod de thams cad dmigs su med pa'o// de nas byams pa la sogs pas yang dag par bskul te/ chu skyes dang nyin mor byed pa la gnas pa'i// mchog gi dbang phyug
89b5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor la'o// de las bdag nyid nag po chen po/ sprin dang mtshungs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra ser po/ lag pa g.yas ngag gis gri gug dang ral gri'o// g.yon ngag na tri shul dang thod pa khrag can no//
89b6(rgyud 'grel): stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs dkris pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang mi'i thod pas thong byas pa/ mgo bo bcang pa'i phreng ba can/ rab tu 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'o// mgo bo dang lce'i rtsa ba dang / nu ma'i
90a1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su/ rigs byed kyi dang po dang / rnam par bcad pas mtshan pa dang / mchog gi dbang phyug rnams bsam mo// de la sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ba dang nag po chen po dgug par bya'o//
90a2(rgyud 'grel): yang mchod nas bzlas pa bya ste/ oM ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ lus bskul ba'o// 'bum bzlas pas bsnyen pa'o// de bzhin du oM ma hA kA la ya nA mo hUM phaT/ phyag 'tshal ba'o// oM AHma ha raM hUM phaT swA hA/ tshig bskul ba'o//
90a3(rgyud 'grel): na ma/ shwA sa na bA si ni/ ma hA kA laM a nu tsa rA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsa le pra tsa le la la la la yang ba ling+ga swA hA/ thugs bskul ba'o// oM ma hA b+hi ra ba sarba sid+d+hi dA yaM ka DaM ts+tsha kr-i d+ha TaHdngos grub stsol ba'i sngags so// oM tsa mu t+te d+hA maka shI
90a4(rgyud 'grel): bid+d+ha trUM hiM ha na ha na da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa dbadat+te A na la swA hA/ tsa mu N+Da'i'o// oM hriHha hUM shrI phaT swA hA/ dka zlog ma'i'o// hriHha ha mtha ma tha swA hA/ phag mo la sogs pa ma mo'i sngags so// sha dang til dang zan dang chang dang sran ma
90a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / dzam+bu li khrag dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bya'o// de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsa man+ta kA yaHrbA k+tsit+ta badz+rA NaM/ oM AHhUM oM maM maM haM haM kaM kaM raM raM ra ra ma hA ma hA kA la da ha ha pa tsa pa tsag rdza gardza ke sha wa rda ma ne yi mo bA ling
90a6(rgyud 'grel): gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya oM AHhUM/ sarba big+h+nA na? bi nA ya ka oM akA ro mu khaM/ sarba d+harma dzA ad+ya nut+pan+na tI dra/ oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'di la rdo rje bdud rtsi'i sngags kyis bsrung ba dang bcas pas sbyin no// de nas rab tu bskul
90b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ste/ rje btsun nag po chen po'i phreng ba'i sngags bzla'o// rkyen gyi gnas rig bla ma ni// byed po de yi lung bsdus pa// sgra gcan 'dzin bzang gus pas te// 'bad pas 'di ni gsang bar byos// man ngag shin tu rlung dka'
90b2(rgyud 'grel): ba// nam yang brjod pa ma yin te// hi ra'i rigs la rgyud bzhin du// bstan na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// ces pa nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs dpal ldan klu'i zhal gyi rim pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhas pa nirbAN
90b3(rgyud 'grel): shrI'i zhal snga nas dang / rmongs pa kun dga' snying pos g.yar khral du bsgyur ba'o// // mang+ga laM// rgya gar skad du/ b+hai ra ba ma hA ka la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'jigs byed nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun
90b4(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo bdud bzhi las rgyal ba// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba po// ma mo'i tshogs kyi kun nas bskor// 'byung po ro langs tshogs btud nas// de nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad par
90b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// dpa' bo'i g.yul gyi sa'am/ duraru khrod kyi gnas su/ ro'i stan la nye bar 'dug nas/ snying kha'i pad+ma la gnas pa'i sa bon gyi 'od kyi nag po chen po bkug nas mchod par byas te/ phyis rang nyid la bsdu'o//
90b6(rgyud 'grel): de nas ni stong pa nyid sgom par bya'o// phyis ni rdo rje'i gur gyi dbus su/ bdag nyid nyi ma la hUM mig sman ltar gnag pa bsam par bya'o// de las nag po chen po dbyar gyi char sprin dong mun pa ltar gnag pa/ skra ser po
91a1(rgyud 'grel): sen du brdzas pa/ m-i byung ba'i ltal gAng smra mche ba gtsugs pa/ nas khrug 'dag pa/ gtus nang rabaN+DA 'khrus pa/ b+h+yas pa wAs pan/ zlum thang sas pa byung ba/ ma'aM TA / b+hag+sa
91a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / mi sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ dang po'i phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje gri gug dang / mgo bo'i thod pa khrag dang bcas pa bsnams pa/ lhag ma g.yas pa'i phyag gi ni/ ral gri dang mdung rtse gsum pa bsnams pa/ g.yas
91a3(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba'i stabs kyi rab bong gi gang na la 'dug pa/ khrag 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal can/ stag gi lpags pa'i smad g.yogs can/ bskal pa'i mtha'i me dang mnyam pa'i 'od/ 'byung po'i tshogs kyi mchog
91a4(rgyud 'grel): tu brjed par byed pa/ de nyid kyi dpral bar ni thig le'o// mgrin par ni rnam par bcad pa'o// snying kha ra ni hUM yig go/ dur khrod kyi gnas thams cad nas 'jigs byed chen po 'khor dang bcas pa bkug ste bdag
91a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid la snyim par bya ste/ g.yon dang g.yas kyi dpung pa gnyis dang lag pa gnyis dang / brla gnyis dang / rkang pa gnyis rnams la ni rim pas nag po'i yan lag bsgrogs byed/ gtum po khros pa/ yid myos/ thod pa
91a6(rgyud 'grel): can/ 'jigs rung / spro byed ste/ 'jigs byed brgyad po ni rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas pa nus ma rnams la yang dag par mkhyud pa gri gug dang thod pa'i phyag can no// lte ba dang / snying kha dang / mgrin po dang / spyi sa
91b1(rgyud 'grel): dad+ya/ sbyin mtshams dang / gsad pa rnams sna/ kA la dang / k+Sha yAn+ti dang / kak+sha dang / kAN \u0f89\u0fa4m+bu d+hA / dz+nyAnr-i dang / T+Ta g+sa/ rnams sgyum nam nan nyid gas pa/ gas b+h+ya nAnA pa rnams pa
91b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// kha dang / bshang lam dang / lte ba dang / spyi bo rnams su/ phyag na dbyug pa dang / phyag na ral g+haM dang / zhing skyo nga dang / tshogs kyi bdag po rnams/ ral gri dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// de ltar sems brtan par
91b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur gyi bar du sgom par bya'o// gal tAM yid skyo bar gyur na/ sngagaso bzla bar bya ste/ hUM ma hA kA l+yA ya na mo hUM phaTaH/ 'bum phrag gcig gis 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed do// bye ba bzlas pas ni nag po chen po nyid
91b4(rgyud 'grel): mngon du 'ong ngo // der ni 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo // ro langase dang srin po 'bum snyed kyis bskor te ha ha zhes sgrog par byed do// der 'jigs par mi bya ste/ khrag chen po dang myos byed kyi arga dbul bar bya'o// 'jigs
91b5(rgyud 'grel): byed nyid kyi mngon du/ sgrub pa po ci 'dod ces bri bar byed do// sgrub pa pos smras pa/ bdag nag po chen por mdzod cig ces brjod na de nyid dang mnyam por 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i don thams cad byed do// oM a oMdad+ha
91b6(rgyud 'grel): lan maHb+hi'aHb+he rab lan maHseM har byer ba yan maHtshir b+her sa nam/ ha b+hair ba na ma gro khyer na ma un mang byer ba lan ma 'dra khri b+her ba yan mang shA len mas kra bA lwa rkyen ma/ ku lwa be na ma/ ba chabu l+le be namaHba ro d+ha rkyen ma/ bi pra tsi t+ta len mi cing DaN+Da na maHni b+hon ma kha rba bA ni byen ma thems
92a1(rgyud 'grel): gnan maman+da sArbA shAM ma dA kA la b+he ra ba taR+Ya la mi na maHthAM ma hAkA la b+he ra baM pra dza yA min maHsA yu drA ya/ sa ba han la/ sa pa ri bA rA ya/ shIng k+Shi NakA laM kA sa tsi tA ma shAM ma hA kA la ya na maHlan gsum// / 'di ra nyin zhag so sor mchod pa byA ba rA 'dong na/ glu
92a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dra ba ra ba rta babs mdzes// zur bzhir mdung thung brgyad ldan pa// dbus su rdo rje'i 'phreng ba can// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// zur gsum rnam pa'i dkyil 'khor ni//
92a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam gnyis rtse mo rno bar ldan// sha rus la sogs rab ldan pa// dkyil 'khor shin tu 'jigs pa yi// dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// mchog gi dbang phyug rab tu bkod// de nas sa bon gyi 'od zer lcags kyu lta bus
92a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad bkug nas rang rang gi stan la gnas par bya'o// lha thams cad kyi ming la/ mgo bor oM dang / tha mar ni na ma zhes sbyar ro// de nas dang por ni mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// de nas
92a5(rgyud 'grel): me tog la sogs pa ci bde bar phul zhing bstod nas/ gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// 'dir myos byed kyi btung ba dang / khrag chen po'i mchod yon dang / sha sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma/ tshil chen po dang gu gul bdug pa rgyun
92a6(rgyud 'grel): mi 'chad par mchod par byed na de la ma hA kA lA dgyes so// de nas ni sngags bzla bar bya zhing phyis nas mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// gal te slob ma kha cig la byin gyis brlab par 'dod na/ lha'i
92a7(rgyud 'grel): so blangs na shASh+Ta p+ta smA ra mA h+ma kA la mos to/ sto pa'o//
92b1(rgyud 'grel): drangs nyid kyi thod par khrag chen po dang myos byed bsres pa'i chu rang gi sngags kyis mngon par bsngags pa bzhag par bya'o// gsol ba btab par gyur pa'i slob ma nang du 'ongs pa la bdud rtsi lnga'i chus dkyus te gnas
92b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams su thig le bya'o// de nas lha thams cad kyis sngags kyi chus dbang bskur bar bya'o// slob ma nag po chen po lus kyi lha'i tshogs dang bcas par 'dug pa la sngags kyi bsngags pa'i cod pan dang / mtshon cha
92b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / rgyan dang / stan rnams sbyin nas/ phyis gsang sngags kyang sbyin nas bzlas par bya'o// de la slar yang chus dbang bskur nas/ gtor ma la sogs pa thams cad kyi mchod par byas nas 'dis ni bya ba thams cad
92b4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa yin no// de nas slob mos kyang yon dbul bar bya zhing / slob dpon gyis kyang bya ba thams cad bya'o// ces pa ni byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o// ma yig gis ni sgyu 'phrul tshe// hA yig 'di la gzhom med pa
92b5(rgyud 'grel): kA yig rgyu dang bral ba ste// la yig rnam par 'phyang ba nyid// ces pa ni/ 'jigs byed nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs dpa' bo rgyal po'i zhal snga'i rim pas grub pa'i slob dpon pa ga la'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
92b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi pan+ti ta pur+t+ta nan+da dang / dge slong tA ra nA thas g.yar khral du 'tshal ba'o//
93a1(rgyud 'grel): // rnam sras kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga bzhugs sa/
93b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ b+haM shra pa a nu dz+nyA pa b+hi ti b+ha li na ma/ bod skad du/ rnam thos sras rjes su 'brang ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po gos sngon po can la phyag 'tshal
93b2(rgyud 'grel): lo// sa gsum mgon po 'gro bu kun gyi skyabs// gdug pa 'dul mdzad bcom ldan gos sngon can// na mkha' mdzod kyi gter 'chang gnod sbyin kun gyi rje// gang gis mtshan thos skyob mdzad lnga yi rgyal po phyag 'tshal
93b3(rgyud 'grel): nas// de mnyes bya phyir gtor ma'i rjes bzung nas// rjes su 'brangs pa'i cho ga bshad par bya// khro rgyal gos sngon rnal 'byor pas// yi ge bco lnga'i snying po la// bye ba lnga 'bum sngon song nas// sngon du 'gro dang byin rlabs sogs
93b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i cho ga sngar bstan bzhin// sgrub pa pos ni 'dir shes bya// de nas mdun du bruM los ni// gzhal yas khang gi nang nyid dbus// paM las pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsam// lte bar bcom ldan gos sngon dang // bka' sdod
93b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po rnam thos sras// sa bon gnyis las yang ngag skyed// de yi phyi rol 'dab brgyad dang // nyi shu rtsa brgyad sum cu gnyis// sa bon gnas las de rnams dbyung // 'dab brgyad gnod sbyin gong ras klu// phyi rol nyi shu rtsa brgyad la//
93b6(rgyud 'grel): sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad bskyed// de yi phyi rol 'dab ma lo// stobs tshon sum cu so gnyis skyed// gzhan yod klu dang gnod sbyin rnams// bye ba 'bum phrag 'khor bcas bsam// de nas rang gi snying kha yo// sa bon hUM gi 'od zer
94a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis// bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon dang // rgyal chen 'khor bcas spyan drang bya// hUM ri rgyal lhun po'i byang phyogs nas// lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas nas// pad+ma mdzes pa'i gdan
94a2(rgyud 'grel): stengs nas// klu brgyad lus snol nyi zla'i gdan// khro bo'i rgyal po sku bzhengs cig/ sku la ye shes 'od 'phro bas// bskal pa'i me dpung chen po 'bar// bcom ldan gsang ba dag gos sngon can// rnal 'byor sprul pa'i gzhal yas
94a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dir// gdug pa snol ba'i gdan stengs su// 'phrin las mdzad phyir gshegs su gsol// oM ni lam b+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ra pa ni/ sa ma ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ dgug gzhug bcing dang dges par bya// de rjes dbong bskur byin gyis rlabs// de
94a4(rgyud 'grel): nas rgyal po spyan drang ste// hUM ri rgyal lhun po'i byang phyogs nas// lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas// rin chen spungs pa'i gzhal yas nas// khro rgyal gsang bdag spyan snga nas// dpal ldan rgyal chen rnam thos sras// btsun mo sras dang
94a5(rgyud 'grel): blon por bcaso// bye ba 'bum phrag 'khor bcas rnams// sngon gyi thugs dam rjes dgongs la// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang // sems can kun la sman slang du// byang phyogs gnas na bzhugs pa rnams// yid bzhin sprul pa'i
94a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas 'dir// 'phrin las mdzad phyir gshegs su gsol// oM b+haM sha rA ma na yes pa ri ba rA/ badz+ra sa ma ya dzaM dza/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ brda' rgyud phyag rgya bcas nas ni// b+haM yig sum cu rtsa bdun sring // stong snying 'dod dang mgo
94b1(rgyud 'grel): nga dang // rang rang sngags kyis mchod pa dbul// dgug gzhug dbang bskur byin rlabs bzla s+yA// A ni lam b+ha ra d+hA r+yA bad+d+ha ba na d+hu d+b+ha phaT swA hA/ AM d+hi shra ma na ye swAd+d+ha/ A dza ba pa d+hA d+ha yA swA hA/ A~M b+hA na b+hU kra ya swAH/
94b2(rgyud 'grel): AM ma naM b+ha tra ye swA hA/ oM ku be ra ye swA hA/ AM sa ma pra dza na yai swA hA/ AM gu hastaM na yaM swA hA/ AM pan dzi ta ye swA hA/ AM bi tsa~M kun d+ha lau yai swA hA/ sarba yag k+Sha/ na ga/ arge/ du pa/ pus paM/ di paM/ gan d+haM/ ni pe ti/ shab+da
94b3(rgyud 'grel): oM a hUM/ i di b+ha li g+h+r-i ha na du/ sa ma ya rak+Sha du/ ma ma sid+d+hi/ me pra yang tsa/ sarba karma/ swa ta a mo ka swA hA/ rin chen bdun dang bkra shis brgyad // bza' btung longs spyod ji snyed kun// tshogs mchod rgyal chen
94b4(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya// rta dang glang po khang bzangs dang // gser dngul la sogs nor gyi dbyig/ phyi nang gsang gsum rten rnams kyang // mgon po 'khor dang bcas la dbul// ne ro b+han dza na sreg pa rlab// ling ga bcas pa dgug
94b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhug bya// phur pas gdab cing mtshon gyis bcad// de nas bka' sgo 'phrin las bcolo// rU bzhengs cig bzhengs cig sgyu bzhengs cig/ ri rgyal lhun po'i byang phyogs nas// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i
94b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang // dregs pa snol ba'i gdan stengs nas// bcom ldan khro rgyal gos sngon can// mi bzang drag po sku bzhengs cig/ khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs byed kyis// do ma nyams dgra bgegs 'byung po'i tshogs//
95a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang sdud rdul du brlag pa'i phyir// khyed kyi 'phrin las dus la bag/ phyogs bcu kun tu khyab byed pa'i// sprul pa drag po 'byung mdzad pa// khams gsum pa byad rngam par d+hu s+thA can/ shin tu ma bzang
95a2(rgyud 'grel): khro chen 'jigs pa'i sku la ye shes 'od 'bar bas// bskal pa'i me 'bar lam se lam so// gdug pa'i dgra bgogs ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i// zhabs brgyad brkyang bskum khro ba'i tshul du bzhugs// dregs pa stobs
95a3(rgyud 'grel): tshan ma lus gdan du mdzad// rigs drug sems can phyogs skyong bcu// lha chen brgyad dang klu chen brgyad // khro bcu 'bar ba'i gdan stengs na// klu chen brgyad kyi lus bsnol nas// pad+ma nyi zla 'a bar pa'i dbus// bcom ldan
95a4(rgyud 'grel): sku yi chu lugs bstan pa ni// shin tu mi bzang khro bo 'jigs pa'i sku// dgra bgegs 'dul mdzad phyag mtshan sna tshogs bsnams// g.yas kyi phyag brgyad 'bar ba na// gsod cing sgrol ba'i phyag ca ni// rdo rje dbyug tho glang
95a5(rgyud 'grel): chen mche// nyi ma'i 'khor lo lcags kyu dang // sdom zhing 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste// zhags pa gsal shing gril chen dang // bya khyud 'phan dang rgyal mtshon bsnams// zhal bzhi shin tu khros pa ni// 'o phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs
95a6(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad// rnam thar sgo gsum mtshon pa'i phyir// zhal gsum khro rgyal rngam pa'i zhal// chos nyid mi 'gyur steng zhal go nag/ ral pa dmar ser gyen du 'bar// mi bskyod rigs kyi bdag por bzhugs// gdug pa 'bar
95b1(rgyud 'grel): ba thong du bcings// sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir// rtse gsum 'bar bas dbu la brgyan// smin ma dmar ser gyen du 'bar// stobs chen ma lus kun 'dul bas// sma ra ag chom dmar ser rtsub// gdug
95b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i phyir// zhe sdang chen po 'khrugs pa'i rtags// spyan rtsa me ltar 'bar ba yis// 'gro drug thugs rjes gzigs pa'i rtags// spyan gsum sdang dmigs bgrad pa yis// srid gsum
95b3(rgyud 'grel): zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus pa ni// dregs pa chen pos 'dul ba'i rtags// shangs nas rdo rje'i rlung nag 'tshubs pa ni// stong gsumo log 'dren thams cad 'thor ba'i rtags// ljags ni
95b4(rgyud 'grel): glog dmar 'khyug pa yis// zhal nas sngags rgod drag po 'don pa'i rtags// dbugs 'gyu me ltar 'bar ba ni// 'khor ba'i bag chags sreg pa'i rtags// 'jigs pa'i ya sos ma mchu mnan pa ni// khams
95b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum dregs pa dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// a la la yi rgad rgyangs sgrogs pa ni// log 'dren bdud sogs rlangs par mdzad pa'i rtags// mthing nag zhal du sbrul nag gsol ba ni// log 'dren gdon gsum
95b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal du gsol ba'i rtags// shin tu 'jigs pa'i khro mchog sku nyid la// klu rigs sbrul brgyad sku la brgyan pa ni// rigs bzhi'i klu rnams dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// rab 'jigs stag gis sku smad dkris pa ni//
96a1(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang srin po dbang du sdud pa'i rtags// dar kha sngon pos stong g.yogs byas pa ni// rdo rje rigs kyi khro bor bzhugs pa'i rtags// shin tu mi sdug gshin rje'i cha byad can// bskal pa'i me
96a2(rgyud 'grel): dpung nang na dregs shing 'gying // dbang po nyi ma phrag par khur ba ni// yon tan thams cad sku la rdzogs pa'i rtags// zhabs brgyad rdo rje'i gzhi la gtams pa yis// sprul pa'i pho nya phyogs bcur 'gyed pa'i
96a3(rgyud 'grel): rtags// bcom ldan sku yi cha stong nas// khyung dang khra 'ug 'ol ba dang // shang shang ngur bya kang ka'i tshogs// nam mkha' lding gi tshogs chen 'phro// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i mchu sder gyis// gdug pa'i dgra bgegs
96a4(rgyud 'grel): snying nas 'dzin// khro rgya la thugs dang skyed pa las// rdo rje dbyug tho gtun shing thogs// 'khor lo rtse gsum bsnams mdzad pa'i// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs su 'phro// dam las 'dra' byed dgra bgegs la// lta phung yan
96a5(rgyud 'grel): lag rdul du rlog/ khro rgyal sku yi cha smong nas// stag dang ngom dreng glang chen sbrul// seng ge chu sprin 'jigs pa'i tshogs// gcan gzan gdug pa'i tshogs su 'phro// bstan pa gshegs pa'i dgra bgegs kyi// sha khrag
96a6(rgyud 'grel): rus pa'i lta ba chom// de ltar sprul pa 'gyed mdzad pa'i// bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can// dri med skyon bral phyag 'tshal stong // / hUM sngon tshe bskal pa dang po la// 'dzam gling 'gro ba'i mi rnams kyi// tshe lo brgya
96b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus kyi tshe// shAkya seng ge'i spyan snga ru// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mang // thugs dam zhal ba zhes dgongs mdzad pas// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba dang // 'gro ba kun la phan tags phyir// ri rgyal
96b2(rgyud 'grel): lhun po'i byang phyogs nas// i l-i ni 'dre'i zhid khams su// lcang lo can gyi pho brang der// yab cig rnam mang thos pa dang // lha mo dpal tshul bzang mo yi// sras su skye bar smon lam btab// smon lom la sa dang
96b3(rgyud 'grel): mthu stobs kyis// byang phyogs skyong ba yongs kyi rje// lha rgyal sras kyi mthu bor 'khrungs// lcang lo can gyi pho brang nger// gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje yis// mthu stobs rtsal bar dbang yang bskur// bstan pa bsrung bar
96b4(rgyud 'grel): dam yang bcas// sngon gyi thugs dam rjes dgongs la// mgon po nor 'chang stobs po che// pho brang lcang lo ldan pa'i bdag/ dbus mo'i pho brang sum rtsag gi/ rtse mo rin chen nor bus brgyan// zur bzhi rim gsum khang
96b5(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs dgu// rnam pa bco lnga'i mchog gis spras// rin chen khang brtsegs sgo bzhi ste// kA ba stong phrag bcu gnyis brgyan// pho brang phyi rol phyogs mtshams na// bum pa bzang po dpag bsam shing // rin chen rdzing bu
96b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod 'jo' ba// spos kyi glang chen thal skya dang // g+haM ba ban glang ma he'i tshogs// rta dang shing rta skad snyan dang // de na lha rdzas rol mo 'byor// phyi rol dpag tshad nyi shu na// rin chen 'bar ba'i ra bas bskor// dbus ma'i
97a1(rgyud 'grel): rin tshan pho brang na// gter skyong rgyal po gzi brjid can// sku la rin chen rgyan gyis spras// btse ma gser mdog 'od zer 'bar// chibs su seng ge dkar mo chibs// na bza' chu dar sngon po gsol//
97a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas rin chen dbyug to bsnams// gnod sbyin 'byung po rdul du rlog/ phyag g.yon gser gyi ni le bsnams// sgrub pa po yi re ba bskong // zhal nas rin chen char pa 'bebs// thugs rjes phongs pa sgrol bar mdzad// phrag
97a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon nyi zlas brgyan// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi mdangs can// dbu ska ral pa'i thor tshugs la// sna tshogs rin chen brgyan gyis spras// sku la gser khrab ser po gsol// zhabs g.yas sems dpa'i skyil krung
97a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs// seng ge kha dngas yal le yal// lce ni bar snang glog pas 'khyug/ g.yu ral sngon po me stag 'phro// lcags kyi sder chen shing de shad// seng ge'i 'khyug tshul zhungs se zhungs// seng ge'i nga ro cher sgrogs
97a5(rgyud 'grel): shing // dar zab stan cha phu ru ru// ha dar lcang sngon lhabs saM lhabs// rgyal chen sku yi g.yas phyogs nas// lha mo tshul bsrung zla 'od bzang // rgyal chen sku yi g.yon rol nas// lha mo mdangs ldan me tog bzang // btsun mo
97a6(rgyud 'grel): yang g.yog me tog bcas// bu mo stong phrag drug cu ste// la la brgyan dang rol mos 'byor// la la lhab lhub na bza'i tshogs// rgyal chen steng na lding ba ni// tshangs pa'i bya rgyal ka ru na// gser gyi khyung chen 'dab gshog
97b1(rgyud 'grel): babyung // gnam lcags ra dang mchu sbyar can// mkha' ljang rgyal po gsar gyi b+hUn// sngar mo gnam lcags rdo dz+nyA s+yAs// klu rgyal 'dab bzangs zhal du gsol// 'khar ni tshangs pa'i bya rgyal 'bum// lus dran rgyal
97b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i sras chen po// kun tu rgyal ba mi la zhon// sku mdoge dmar nag 'bar ba lo// na bza' mtha' bor 'khor lo ris// phyag na zangs zhags mdung thung bsnams// srin po zangs kyi ral po can// 'khor mang gnod sbyin
97b3(rgyud 'grel): bye ba 'bum// btsun mo sras dang blon por bcas// nang mi dmag dpung gzhon par bcas// pho nya yang g.yog bran mo rnams// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// dbang phyug chen po lha chen po// chibs su seng
97b4(rgyud 'grel): ge sngon po chibs// sku mdog dmar ser mthing gi ral pa can// drang srong stobs chen phyag bzhi pa// seng ge dkar po'i stod g.yogs la// phyag na rtse gsum 'khor lo bsnams// u ma dang yang lhan cig bzhugs/
97b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang lha dmag bya ba 'bum// khyod ni dmag dpung chen po ste// dmag dpung skyed lo ru dur byor// glang chen rab tu brtan pa la// legs ldan nag po'i dmag dpung zho ni// lha dang gnod sbyin dmag sdud cing //
97b6(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer sum rtseg 'jig par byed// lha men g.yul las rgyal mdzad pa// phyag na gser gyi be tson bsnams// 'khor ni lha dmag bye ba 'bum// khyod ni dmag dpon dpung chen ste// dmag dpung bskyed la ru dir phyor//
98a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM rgyal chen las la bskyod tsam na// chibs su sngon po phud kar chibs// bse sga smug po wangs se wangs// gse mthur smug po khyags se khrugs// mi mgo rta mgo phru lu lu// gser gyi blo nan khyags
98a2(rgyud 'grel): se khyugs// mu men yob chen khra la la// na bza'o mtha' ber dmar ljang la// sbrul nag sha chings brengs si brangs// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser sgra la// rin chen mang po'i rgyan cha can// stag ral g.yas la gzig zhu bas g.yom/
98a3(rgyud 'grel): sku la bse khrab smug po gsol// stag gi g.yang gzhi phru lu lu// phyag na bese mdung smug po rnams// bse mdung gnam lcags rdo rje rtse// rgyal po chen po'i phyag g.yon na// rim chen shel gyi mchod rten bsnams// mi yi rgyu zhags
98a4(rgyud 'grel): shwa ra ra// rgyal po'i phrag gong g.yas g.yon na// nyi ma zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro// sku mdog mthing nag gzi byin can// dbu skra mthang ral thor tshugs la// rin chen ba se yi rmog zhu can// zab chen 'phran da ri ltabs sde ldabs// rgyal
98a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i snyan cha g.yas g.yon nas// sbrul nag chun 'phyang phru lu lA// khros pa'i spyan gsum sdang mig gis// ltas pa tsam gyis srid gsum 'jig/ khro gnyer smin ma dpral bar bsdus// zlos pa'i shangs ni dub zhin 'bung // skra
98a6(rgyud 'grel): ra ag tshem me ltar 'bar// zhal nas drag sngags ku tshe 'byin// rgyal po'i bka' lung theng cig gis// klu rigs 'bum sde'i dmag dpung sdud // rgyal po'i bka' lung thang gnyis kyis// lha dmag bye ba 'khor du sdud//
98b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi bka' lung thad gsum gyis// gnod sbyin 'bum phrag dbang du spung // rgyal chen bzhugs pa'i sku mkhar ni// rin chen bse yi sku mkhar la// mi mgo'i kha pad yengs s+ye yengs// sku mkhar de yi rtse mo na// bse mdu
98b2(rgyud 'grel): dmar po ldems se ldems// bse yi mdung bzang rtse mo la// mi snying rgyal mtshan ye re re// bse ye mdung bzangs skyed pa la// dar nag ba dan lhubs se lhubs// dar nug ru mtshon phyar tsamA na// lha min 'bum sde g.yul
98b3(rgyud 'grel): ngo bzlog/ sku mkhar de yi zur bzhin// mi snying rta snying hr-i li laM// sku mkhar de yi logs bzhin// mi khrag rta khrag sha la la// sgyu mkhar de yi 'gram bzhi la// mi ro rta ro brums su brtsigs// sku mkhar de yi nang shed
98b4(rgyud 'grel): nA// rta btags skad 'don ce re re// mi btags 'bod dang lhang nge lhang // srog gcod du skad stongs sa stongs// brag cha skad ngan tse re ri// sku mkhar de yi g.yas rol na// gnod sbyin zangs kyi ral pa can// 'khal ma snying
98b5(rgyud 'grel): gi nang khrol gyis// snyim pa dag ni yongs su bkang // lag na zangs kyi bcu ste thogs// yid la gnag pa'i dgra bo la// bcu stas rdeg cing zhags pas zung // sku mkhar de yi g.yon logs na// gnod sbyin nag po skad
98b6(rgyud 'grel): rdangs can// ral pa spyi bcings lcags kyis so// mi lpags g.yang gni gos su gon// lag na lcags kyi dgra sta bsnams// yid la rnam pa'i dgra bo la// dgra stas mgo dang yan lag chong // sku mkhar de yi rgyab
99a1(rgyud 'grel): logs na// phung byed sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi// kun kyang srin mo khrag mig ma// khrag gi ral pas la 'drung // kha nas khrag lang gron mo skyug/ lag na zangs kyi spu gri bsnams// yid la rnag pa'i dag po la// spu
99a2(rgyud 'grel): gris mgo dang snying rnams gshogs// sku mkhar lcags kyi sgo mo la// zangs kyi tha ram si li li// sku mkhar de yi sgo srungs la// srin po zangs kyi mche ba can// byu ru'i ral cig gnam du 'greng // sbrul nag pags pa'i stong
99a3(rgyud 'grel): gsog sa 'aM// l-ig+sa na lcags na rigs// ya lkug pa nga // bas hU~Mng dang yan ma Nam// mya b+hi mi gas sa legs ma// lcags seM ga n+dan man pa 'di// ma b+hAr s+t+wa~M ma rags na ngas+yAm+b+ha
99a4(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyi dom nag ngu zhing zugs// sku mkhar ya khang rtse mo la// lcags kyi khyung chen sngon po cig/ mchu sder dgra bo'i snying la 'dzums// sku mkhar ba gam logs bzhin// bya nag mang po 'phur zhing ldeng // sku mkhar de yi
99a5(rgyud 'grel): yang stengs nas// rgyal pos g.yab mas btab tsa na// gnod sbyin gdug pa'i blon po brgyad// rgyal po'i mdun ni rgyug pa ni// gnod sbyin chu dbang bum pa'i lto// sku ni gser mdog 'bar ba la// mtha' bir ljang sngon shing la
99a6(rgyud 'grel): ris// gser gyi skra chen khrugs se khyugs// phyag na ban d+ha spu gr-i bsnams// tshabs su dmar nag zhur po tshabs// klu rigs 'bum sde'i dmag dpon mdzad// khyod ni dmag dpon chen po ste// dmag dpung skyed la ru dar
99b1(rgyud 'grel): byor// rgyal po'i g.yas nas rgyug pa ni// gnod sbyin sde dpo gang ba bzang // sku mdog ser na ka 'jigs tshul can// mtha' bar smug nag glang chen ris// byi ru'i ska bzangs khro la la// mu men tshun 'phyang sha ra ra// phyag na
99b2(rgyud 'grel): bum pa bzang po bsnams// dmar ser 'dongs po chibs su tsha bas// 'khor dang gnod sbyin 'bum gyis bskor// khyod ni dmag dpung tshon po ste// dmag dpung poskyed la ru dar phyor// rgyal po'i rting nas rgyugo pa ni// sde dpon chen
99b3(rgyud 'grel): po nor bu bzang // sku mdog dmar zhing gdangs pa la// mtha' ber sngon po seng ge ris// zangs kyi skra bzangs khyug so se khyugs// phag na shel dkar sku gdung bsnoms// chibs su sngo nag zhur po chibs// 'dod khams lha bran
99b4(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo ste// 'khor du lha bran 'bum gyis bskor// khyod ni dmag dpung chen po ste// dmag dpung skyed la ru dar phyir// rgyal po'i g.yon nas rgyug pa ni// rta bdag chen po ku be ra// sku mdoge sngo nag 'gying ba la// mtha' bar dkar skya
99b5(rgyud 'grel): gzha' tshon ris// dngul gyi skra bzangs khro la la// phyag na bste phub ral gri bsnams// dbu la dar smug 'gying zhu gsol// chibs su mtshal dmar 'dongs po chi bas// 'khor du gshin rje 'bum gyis bskor// khyod ni dmag dpung tshon
99b6(rgyud 'grel): bo ste// dmag dpung skyed la ru ngar phyir// sde dpo na rgyal ba'i khyu mchog no// mdog ngomar skya'o'ajigs tshul tsam// seng ge dag po'i stong g.yogs la// stag cher dam pa'itshogam thabs sam// sbrul na ka skra tshangs khyalas sa khrugs
100a1(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyi rnga mo chibs su chibs// gnam lcags 'khor lo phyug na bsnams// g.yon pa zhags 'debs sha ra ra// 'khor dang gnod sbyin drug 'bum ste// khyod ni dmag dpon chen po ste// dmag dpung
100a2(rgyud 'grel): skyed la ru dar phyor// sde dpon chen po lngas chen ni// sku mdog ser skya rab 'jigs byed// mtha' ber kar ljang skar mnga' ris// dar nag skra bzangs bdun yug 'phyar// phyag na rin chen khang bzangs bsnams// dbu la dung rmog
100a3(rgyud 'grel): stsol mangs gsol// laM brgan cod pan ltabs se lhabs// chibs su rag pa phud ngo mar chibs// 'khor ni dri za bdun 'bum ste// khyod ni dmag dpon chen po yino// dmog dpung bskyed la ru dar byor// gnod sbyin dbang po yang
100a4(rgyud 'grel): dag shes// sku mdog ser zhing dngas pa la// na bza' mtha' ber lcags thag can// le brgan dar gyi sku rags can// dbu la rin chen rmog zhu gsol// phyag na gnam lcags dgra sta bsnams// dkar po rdog dmaro chibs su chi bas
100a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni ma mo 'bum gyis bskor// khyod ni dmag dpung chen po ste// dmag dpung skyed la ru dar byor// 'brog gnas rgyal po ser skya ni// sngo zhur 'khyog pa chibs su chi bas// sku la dar nAg ber chen gsol// rin chen gser
100a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi sku bzangs can// phyag na bas mdung smug po bsnams// tha' tshon ba dan lhabs se lhabs// ngor sngon cod pan pu ru ru// mi zhon rta zhon srin po'i dmag/ drug 'bum brgyad khri dag gis bskor// khyod ni dmag dpon chen
100b1(rgyud 'grel): pa ste// dmag pad+hA spyad lanu dAr byor// dmag dpo pi tsa~M kun d+hA l-I// sgyu mdog dkar gsal ga brjod ldan// na dpa' 'dUr ba 'ang rnyis// bas rmag rlan rgyun da n+tu sam/ byAg na gtsang ba'i ral zla bsnams// tshabs sa
100b2(rgyud 'grel): nga pa phung dmar chi bos// 'khor no drang srong 'bum gyis bskor// khyod ni dmag dpon chen po ste// dmag dpung skyed la ru dAr phyor// gnod sbyin gdug pa'i blon po brgyad// bye ba 'bum phrag 'khor bcas bsnams// sngon che bde
100b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs spyan snga ru// bstan pa bsrung bar dam du bcas// 'dod pa sgrub par zhal gyis bzhes// thugs dam skul lo rgyal po nyid// gdus pa'i klu dang gnod sbyin tshegs// las la skos so sha ra ra// rgyal po rta dmig gshegs tsam na//
100b4(rgyud 'grel): khu sgra tho le ljongs se lhangs// dga' ba'i gtam sgregs cha ra ra// mi rkun spyugs pa tshe re re// gsod gcod gtam ngan di ri ri// brda' sgra drag po tshams se tshams// rta rgyug rmig sgra hrabs se hra bas// srin po mi zan rngam pa'i gzugs//
100b5(rgyud 'grel): sprin po mi bzad cho nges 'debs// mtshon thogs mang po gnam la 'phyar// la la lcags kyu zhags pa thogs// gzhu bdungs mang po khyi li l-i// sprul pa'i brda' sgra 'u ru ru// gnom lcags skar mda' spobs se hribs// srin po gnod
100b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bya gag gzugs// gcan gzan gzugs kyi sprul pa rnams// mi sdug bzhin ston tshe srog gcong // bye ba 'bum gyi dmag dpon rnams// las su sangs rgyas bstan pa srung // mas su sha dang khrag la rol// snying brtse med par
101a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol la brtson// longs spyod dbugs dang mdangs la rol// thugs dam brgyud nas rnal 'byor bdag bskul lo// bcol ba'i 'phrin las myur du grub par mdzod// sdang ba'i dgra po las ngan 'dis//
101a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bstan pa 'di yis bshig/ dkon mo tshig dbu 'phang 'di yis smang // sdang ba'i dgra bo las ngan 'di// ri rab zom dang rgya mtsho'i gting // gang dang gang du gnas pa der// mi dang lha ru khyed kyis phyis// lus dang
101a3(rgyud 'grel): sems su khyed kyis phrol// gnam gyi 'ju thag khyed kyis tshong // sa yi rten phur khyed kyis phyung // dug mnga' 'phongs cig dus la bab// rgyal po las la bskyod pa na// rnga chen rdung zhing dril bu bkrol// dung 'bud zangs dung cha
101a4(rgyud 'grel): gdab// dar phyar spyugs pas gdab par bya// rgyal po las la bskyod pa'i tshe// rta ngul ngar shing chag pa dang // ngar phyar spyugs pas gdab par bya// blon po yul gyi rgan rabs rnams// 'khro spug 'debs shing ngu ba dang //
101a5(rgyud 'grel): ltas kyi rim pa byung ba ni// spogs pa'i cho ga brtsam par bya// rang nyid khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis// rgyal po'i rten rnams 'og tu gzhug/ hUM b+haM sha ra ma na ye/ A nu ra tsa ku ru hUM/ gsang ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad// sems dpa' dam
101a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang // dmag dpon las kyi phyag rgya dang // gnod sbyin gzir ba'i phyag rgya yis// khro bo gzir ba'i gzungs sngags kyis// 'khu na sngon 'gro'i cho ga bya// rgyal po gzi brjid che ba dang // ltas kyi rim pa bzang ba ni//
101b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i don rnams 'grub pa'o// 'phrin las drag du bcol ba dang // gang 'dod don la gsol ba gdab// rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyis rjes su 'brang ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'gro bzang snying pos
101b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho/
102a1(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin nor bsgrub glang chen bcas cho ga bzhugs s+ho/
102b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ hAsti rad na d+ha na ye ti/ u ba d+he sha na ma/ bod skad du/ glang po rin po che la nor blang ba'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dgos 'dod ma lus 'byung ba'i rin po che// rin chen bdun las khyad par
102b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags// gter mdzod khyod la rmang pa8 grang man nga ces bya phyag 'tshal lo// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sel 'dod cing // gong zhig nor rdzas sgrub 'dod pas// gter mdzod 'di la 'bad par bya// glang po
102b3(rgyud 'grel): gter mdzod ces bya ba'i// nor sgrub gang zhig byed 'dod pas// bsreg thubo rdzas bzang po la// rang na sna lnga bdar byas te// rgya gar glang po che yi gzugs// nyam bag tsho zhing lta na mdzes// yan lag thung shing gsus pa
102b4(rgyud 'grel): che// mgo la yid bzhin nor bus brgyan// mkhas pas nang dang ldan par bya// de nyid ma yi smin bya ste// de yi nang du gzhug pa ni// sngags dang rdzas su shes par bya// dang po sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni// grub na gser gyi bri
102b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// ma grub rgya shog dkar po la// rgya smug ngag gis bri bar bya// dri bzang lnga yi tsa nan bya// de yi sngags ni 'di lta ste// oM ma hA ha ste rang na sarba saM d+hi pha la hUM/ rad na pu ne sid+haM sid+d+hi hUM/ rin po che gter gyi dngos grub chen
102b6(rgyud 'grel): po thob par gyur cig/ d+ha na me d+hi hi sid+d+hi nAM/ nor zas dang longs spyod kyi dngos grub chen po thob par gyur cig/ na na kheng d+hi sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hUM/ kha zas kyi mchog chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par gyur cig/ d+ha la
103a1(rgyud 'grel): sa s+pho sid+hi sid+d+hi hUM dza dza/ 'khor dang longs spyod kyi dngos grub chen po thob par gyur cig/ bak+ku shis par gyur cig/ sad+ya thA dan/ bi dza ye bi dzA ye ug ge ug ge swastI tra pa tI a khu me/ prA sa ra d+ha/ sA d+hi
103a2(rgyud 'grel): pra ha khe/ mu ne mu ne gu ra ne gu rA ne/ a khe mu khe mu ra gre mu ra gau/ swaste gur na yA/ sarba pa sti bruM b+hu bruM/ swi sti swi sti/ mu le mu l-i/ ke she ke she/ tsu ra na/ tsu ra na/ b+hi mA le swA hA/ oM kaM ka ra/ kAM ka ra/ nir gad tsa ta ni/ nir gad tsa ta swasti/
103a3(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo zhes bgyi ba'i khyim 'di ru/ pho brang rin po che'i gtar gyi gang bar gyur cig/ 'bru dang longs spyod kyi char 'bab par gyur cig/ 'khor dang longs spyod sprin ltar 'du bar gyur cig/ bu tsha dang rigs rgyud thams cad dar
103a4(rgyud 'grel): shing rgyas par gyur cig/ snyan pa dang grags pa na mkha' dang mnyam par gyur cig/ rkyen dang bar chad nye bar zhi bar gyur cig/ tshe ring nad med bde skyid phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ tshe srog brag pas sra bar gyur cig/

103b2(rgyud 'grel): oM ma hA rad na pha la s+yA ti hUM/ oM b+hI hi rang na pha la sAMt+ti hUM/ oM ma hA rang nA pha la si ti hUM/ oM ha tau rad na/ pha la saM ti hUM/ oM d+ha nI ra ga ma sha rod na saM ti pa la ts+tsha/ oM g+he ti rAng na pha[] mal saM ti pha la hUM/ gzhan

110b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ karma ma Ni tsakra saM b+ha sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ sna tshogs nor bu bde mchog 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje mkha' 'gro la btud de// sna

110b3(rgyud 'grel): phyed pa ral pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu mchog la// thong ba'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sku la mgo bo'i do shal can// phyag rgya dugagis rnam par brgyan// stag gi lpags pa gos su
110b4(rgyud 'grel): pabasnams// phag mo yis ni sku la brgyan// zhal gcig pa la bzhengs pa ste// g.yas pa ser la dud pa'i mdog/ g.yo na pa dam ra la ljang khu'o// steng gi zhal ni stag ga dong ste// dkar zhing sprin mdog drag tsang 'jigs// rdo rje dril
110b5(rgyud 'grel): bu mnyam par ldan// lha mo'i mchu ni 'char ba ste// rgyal ba'i lpags pa gos su gon// DA ki ma yi rigs 'dzin zhing // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams//
110b6(rgyud 'grel): cang ti'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin// gri gug zhags pa de bzhin te// phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu bshad// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang // zhabs gcig tu ni rnam par bsgom// glang po be'u'i
111a1(rgyud 'grel): gdong dang ni// seng ge'i gdo du yang de bzhin te// dang po khyi yi gdong yin te// gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang yin// gsum pa phag gi gdong yin te// bzhi pa khA ta'i gdong can ni// gnas
111a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyibs kyi chos bdag nyid// sna tshogs gzugs ni chen po 'dzin// mtha' yas rnam rgyal grags pa ste// thams cad mkhyen zhing thams cad la// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'chang // de bzhin bsgom zhing rnam bsgom
111a3(rgyud 'grel): te// sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin// bdag nyid chen po rnam par rol// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru ka huM hUM phaT/ DA kaM ni dz+wa la saM pa ra swA hA/ zhes pa 'phrin las thams cad ni// bsgrub par 'dod pas bzlas par bya'o//
111a4(rgyud 'grel): tshegs dang gtor ma las rnams ni// gzhan nas gsung bzhin brtsam par bya// sna tshogs nor bu'i sgrub thabs 'di// 'khor lo sdom pa nyid thob shog/ sna tshogs nor bu bde mchog 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya
111a5(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon nag po byas mdzad pa rtogs so// paN+Di ta gA ya d+hA ra dang / lo tsa ba dzo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'i// // rgya gar skad du/ hU~M badz+ra nA kaM ni sA d+ha na mo/
111a6(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bsgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ he ru ka dpal phyag 'tshal nas// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sgrub thabs bshad// 'di nyid cho gas bsgrubs gyur na// ma mo rnams kyang bsgrub pa'i
111b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ de dbus khro bo chen po ni// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// khro bcas zhal ni bzhad pa dang // sku mdog sngo nag 'jigs chen po// thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o// ro dang
111b2(rgyud 'grel): nyi steng g.yon brkyang zhing // g.yas bskum stag lpags kyis brgyan pa// gar ldan sum cu gsum 'jigs mdzad// spyan gsum cher bskrad bgegs kun gnon// rdo rje thong khrag thugs khar 'jim// 'og mas mnga'
111b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhu rgyab nas 'gengs// tshogs bdag stong pa'i ngang nyid na las// a las pad+ma ri nyid las// nyi stengs hUM las rdo rje laso// rang nyid khro rgyal gsal ba'i mdun// gaHlas gyur pa'i bgegs bdag bskyed// dgug sngags
111b4(rgyud 'grel): brgya yis spyan drangs te// phyag mchod bstod pas dngos grub blangs// gal te 'gor na rang nyid lus// hUM mdzad skyed rim brtan byas nas// gsang sngags 'bum bzlas zhabs 'og bcug/ phyag g.yas mthe bong mthe chung
111b5(rgyud 'grel): mnan// mdzub gsum rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis// gzir te thugs ka'i pad steng gi/ raM las me 'bar tshig pa yis// skrag ste thal sbyor gus btung nas// bka' nyan dngos grub ster bar bsam// lha chen gzir ba'i man ngag
111b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan// mo bri sdig che nal los shos// grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor pa nag pa spyod pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs sa/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / bong kyi lo tsA ba/ 'brog maM shAkya ye shes
112a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// / bgegs rgyal gyi sru sa// rgya gar skad du/ bi na ya ka rA dza sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ bgegs kyi rgyal po bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo
112a2(rgyud 'grel): rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// bgegs kyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs bshad// lha mo skal ba chen mo nyom// ma mo'i khyim dang nyams ngaga'i gnas// blo ldan mchod pa sngon 'gro bas// sgom pa bzong po bya ba nyid// 'bad pas
112a3(rgyud 'grel): bris sku dmyigs nas ni// sku mdog dmar po cher 'bar ba// skyil krung 'gying ba'i gar gyis bzhugs// zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// ral pa'i thor tshugs ngag gis brgyam/ dmar po 'bar 'khyil 'jigs pa'i gzugs/
112a4(rgyud 'grel): mche ba gtsigs pa yang dag bri// dgra sta gtun shing nyid dang yang // de bzhin du ni mda' dang gzhu// kha T+wAM ga dang lcags kyu dong // thang khrag dmar po 'khyil ba dang // de bzhin rdo rje ral gri dang // sha tshon thod pa 'dzin pa dang //
112a5(rgyud 'grel): phub chung ba ngan rtse gsum dang // 'phang mdung ngag dang bcu gnyis so// oM gaHgaHsid+d+hi sid+d+hi sarba Ar+tha sa d+ha me pra sa d+ha ye hUM hUM dzaHdzaHswA hA/ zhes spyan drangs pa'i sngags so// oM a gaHhUM swA hA/ bzlas pa rtsa ba'i sngags so// /
112a6(rgyud 'grel): stong phrag brgya yis 'grub 'gyur bas// de nas las rnams yang dag brtsam// lan cig yongs bzlas thig le bya// sngags pa skal bzang mthong ngo gar 'gyur// rgyal po'i sgo drung ches mchod cing // dgra rnams 'jigs
112b1(rgyud 'grel): pas 'dun par 'gyur// bgegs rnams skrag cing zhi bar 'gyur// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras ster ba ra// 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med// oM gaHgaHsid+d+hi sid+d+hi sarba ar+tha sa d+ha me pra sa d+ha ye hUM hUM dzaHdzaHswA hA/ 'gugs sngags
112b2(rgyud 'grel): nyer gnyis pa lcags kyu'i phyag rgya byas la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la lha yul nas dgug go/ oM pad+ma ka ma la ye s+t+waM/ zhes yi ge bdun pa gsum gyis gdon dbul lo// oM a gaHhUM swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru drug pa 'bum
112b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas so// oM badz+ra a gu sha/ badz+ra mo hA gu h+ya sid+d+hi a kAR+Sha ya hUM dzaHzhes pa dngos grub blang ba'i sngags yi ge bco brgyad pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM a mu ka dza~M wi ma la ya/ mo g+ha dzaM b+ha la a b+ha b+ha ya/ a mu kau ma ra ya hUM
112b4(rgyud 'grel): phaT swA hA/ zhes pa nor spel ba'i sngags yi ge ny+tsir gcig pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM mu le b+h+rUM zhes pa btsun pa'i sngags yi ge bzhi pa brgya rtsa re bzlas so// bgegs bdag chen po su mdog dmar po zhabs g.yas
112b5(rgyud 'grel): brkyang ba/ zhal gcig spyan gsum pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ sbom la thung ba/ gsus khyim che ba/ thor tshugs 'khyil ba/ 'jigs shing rngam pa/ glang po'i gdong can/ dar dang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bcu
112b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi g.yas dang po dgra ste/ gnyis pa gtun shing / gsum pa mda' gzhu/ bzhi pa kha T+wAM ga/ lnga pa lcags kyu/ drug pa thod pa khrag gis gang ba/ g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje/ gnyis pa ral gri/ gsum pa thod po sha chen
113a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis gang ba// bzhi pa phub chung / lbu pas ba dan rtse gsum pa/ drug pas 'phang mdung bsnams pa'o// pad+ma dmar po dang nyi ma'i dbus na zhabs g.yon brkyang ba'i gar stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o//
113a2(rgyud 'grel): bgegs kyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs/ grub pa brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po nag po pas/ rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje mkha' 'gro nas phyung ba rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis
113a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// / tshigs bdag gi bstod pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya gaHna pa ti stu ti/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po la bstod pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
113a4(rgyud 'grel): lo ka mgon mdzad gnang bar mdzad// dpal mdzad de bzhin phan par mdzad// mnyam pa med cing dpe med pa// tshogs bdag de la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags dbang phyug rig sngags rgyal// longs spyod 'byung gnas
113a5(rgyud 'grel): gter gyi mchog/ 'bras bu mngon par ston pa po// tshogs bdag de la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal// stobaso chen nyon mongs g.yul 'joms shing // bgegs 'joms duHkha 'joms mdzad
113a6(rgyud 'grel): pa// glang chen snar ldan gtso la 'dud// rin chen chen po rin chen sku// rin chen chen po rin chen 'byung // rin chen bstan pa bsrung mdzad pa// glang chen snar ldan gtso la 'dud// tshogs kyi bdag po rdzu 'phrul che// lha dmag
113b1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'i dbugs 'byin cing // lha min nag po'i g.yul bzlog pa// glang chen sna ldan gats+tsha la 'dud // sku ni yon tan rin chen te// gsung ni yon tan ngo bo nyid// thugs ni yon tan bdag nyid can// glang tshar snar ldan
113b2(rgyud 'grel): gtso la 'dud// 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po la bstod pa/ slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / b.legs rgyal gyi bris bu'i man ngag/ rgya gar skad du/ ma hA bi na ya ka rU pa u pa de sha rang na nA ma/
113b3(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ bgegs bdag chen po'i sku bri ba'i man ngag yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor lo sdom pa la btud de// bgegs bdag chen po'i bris spu bri// ro la g.yog
113b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ras sam ni// mtshon gyis bsnun pa'i ras dang yang // bu btsas shrI ba'i ras dang ni// ba glang lpags sogs khyud por las// nag po'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi la// 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// ri mo mkhan
113b5(rgyud 'grel): yang dam tshig ldan// sgrub po dag gis bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgro bzhi pa// sgo bsrung dag ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub kun gyi yon tan gnas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas gang ba// mchod pa lnga yos brgyan pa yis//
113b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bri bar bya// dbus su dkyil 'khor kun du ni// re kas bskor zhing shin tu mdzes// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// me tog dmar pos legs par mchod// dri dang bdug pa'i khyad par deng
114a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi lngas ni gang ba dang // nya dang sha dang chang rnams kyis// nye bar mchod pa'i gtor mas gang // de dbus khro bo chen po ni// zhal gcig pa la phyug bzhi pa// cung zad zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs// khro
114a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas zhal ni bzhad pa dang // sku mdog sngon po 'jigs chen po// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// yi dwags zhon zhing nyi mar gnas// gar ldan sum cu gsum 'jigs mdzad// stag gi lpags pa'i gos 'dzin zhing //
114a3(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum bzang po'i gzugs can te// be dan gsum pa 'bar rdo rje// thod pa dang ni mtshan ma 'dzin// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag dag la// mda' dang gzhu nyid de bzhin no// oM badz+ra kro ta Da kI hUM phaT/ ces bzlas so// de yaM
114a4(rgyud 'grel): mdun du bgegs bdag che// gzi brjid chen po 'od 'bar ba// bcu gnyis phyag ldan 'jigs chen bri// 'dab ma brgyad la gnod sbyin brgyad// bgegs bdag chen po ji bzhin bri// dang po ras cho ga tshul bzhin bya// de nas lha
114a5(rgyud 'grel): bzo mtshan nyid ldan// mnyes par byas te yid 'ong bri// rab gnas mkhan po byin rlabs ldan// mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor gyis// rab gnas cho ga tshul bzhin bya// byams pa snying rje byang chub sems// rgya chen 'dun pa drag po
114a6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// mchod dang bsngo ba rgyas par bya// 'di ni yid bzhin nor bu ste// rtag tu mchod na dgos 'dod 'byung // 'di ni bris sku'i gdams ngag go/ 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub bya ba// de nas bzlas pa 'bum byas na//
114b1(rgyud 'grel): mdun du mngon sum nyid du 'gyur// rten dgram mchod pa byas nas ni// dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung bar gsungs// bgegs bdag chen po'i sku bri ba'i man ngag/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon
114b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po nag po pas mdzad pa rtogs so// / paN+Di to chen po ga ya d+hA ra dang / lo tsab gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// shr-i b+hAM/ gta #// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ga no pa ti Sha li bi d+hi/
114b3(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i gtor ma'i cho ga/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de la 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po yang dag par mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ gtor ma 'bul bar
114b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas/ dang po rin po che'i snod phun sum tshogs par 'bras chan dang / khur ba dang / dkar gsum dang / dang ra gsum dang / la du dang / la phug dang / glang sha dang / rgun 'bru mo la sogs pa bza' ba dang / btung
114b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / kha dog dri ro phun sum tshogs pas legs par bkang ste mdun du bzhag ste/ stan bde ba la 'dug nas/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rjes su dran pa dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub mchog tu
114b6(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed par bya'o// de nas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms te/ b+h+rUM las rin po che'i snod yangs shing rgya che ba'i nang du/ khaM las zhal zas ro brgya ldan pas byur bur gang bar bsam/ de nyid
115a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum dang / oM a ka ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA nAM/ ad+ya nut+pan na tAd oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la/ de nAs rang gi snying khA ra sa bon gyi yi ge bltas la/ de'i 'od kyis
115a2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po spyan drangs la/ mdun du dmigs nas/ phyag rgya bstan te/ oM na mo tu te/ na moHgaHna sa ta ye/ i daM ba l-i kha kha khA hi khA hi swA hA/ zhes bya bas dbul zhing / des kyang
115a3(rgyud 'grel): tshim par longs spyad nas dges par bsam mo// de nas 'di skad ces/ 'bras bu sman dang rin chen pos// la du la phug glang sha dang // rgun 'brum rgun chang dkar gsum dang // dang ra gsum 'bras chan khur ba
115a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs// phyogs bcu lha mi'i yid 'ong sogs// yongs su bzung ba med pa 'bul// mgon khyod bdag la rab tu brtse ba yis// 'di dag bzhes te dges par gsol nas kyang // bdag gi las rnams 'bras bu mchis
115a5(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod// bar chad rab tu zhi bar mdzod// de nas bstod pa'i tshig gis yang dag par bstod de/ rtsa sngags sam gzungs kyi phreng ba ci nus su bzlas te/ 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas ye shes
115a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gshegs su gsol la/ bsags pa'i dge rtsa yongs su bsngo zhing / yi ge brgya pa bzlas so// 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i gtor ma'i tshi ga/ slob dpon chen po mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa/ nag po zhabs
115b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsab gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgyan thag nam/ rgya gar skad du/ ho ma g+ni bi di nA ma/ bod skad du/ bgegs bdag gi sbyin sreg
115b2(rgyud 'grel): gi cho ga rab tu bshad pa/ dang por sngon du 'gro ba brtsam// rgyas par ser po'i sa las ni// rin chen rnam pa'i thab khung ngam// yang na gru bzhi mnyam par bya// rgya ru khru de dpangs su gang // de yi nang du sor mo brgyad// dor
115b3(rgyud 'grel): der ni kha khyer gnas// kun nas sor mo bzhi pa ni// rin chen phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thab khung dbus ni ser po ru// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad lte ba la// rdo rje rin chen ser po drug/ ser po'i sa dang dri yis mi// thab khung kun
115b4(rgyud 'grel): tu byug par bya// bud shing thab khung bas thung tshang // dgon pa yi ni gci ba nyid// 'bu srin yongs su spangs pa'o// ye shing 'bru dang bsreg pa'o// shing ni bshis pa'i cho ga'o// yam shing zhi ba bzhin du bzung // mdzes pa dbus
115b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi cha las skyos// khu tshur bcangs pa'i khru tshang tsam// zho dang 'o ma mar la brtag/ zas kyi mchog dang zho yi zas// mar la sogs pa'i ro mchog dang // mar dang ldan pa'i sbrang rtsi dang // sa le chu blugs pad+ma dang // grI ha ya na ge
115b6(rgyud 'grel): sar dang // bil ba'i 'bras bu dur ba rnams// 'bras bur bcas pa'i shing sngon bzhin// rgyas pa'i las la sbyin sreg bya// tsam pa ka dang a sho ka/ na ga ge sar ze 'bru can// ji ltar me tog la sogs pa// dri med rab dngas
116a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bur bcas// ljon shing dri ma med pa yis// shing gi me tog rab ldan pa// sor mo lnga pa rab tu ldan// ser po'i rgyan bcas snga dro ste// nor gyis phongs nas rgyas par bya// bzang po'i 'dug
116a2(rgyud 'grel): stangs kyis 'dug ste// yang na rgyal po rol pas so// 'bum phrag gcig tu sbyin sreg bya// gling kun dbang bsgyur rgyal po yis// dpal chen po la spyod par 'gyur// brtul zhugs can sems mgu sems dang // byang du kha
116a3(rgyud 'grel): bltas dga' ldan pas// rin chen 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis// rgyas pa yi ni cho ga bzhin// oM gyi mtha' can sngags bzlas so// thab tu me lha ser po bskyed// bsang sbyangs mchod pas mnyes par bya// de rjes bgegs bdag
116a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par bskyed// dgang rigs padas blugs rgyas par 'bul gzhan du bshad pa'i bar bya// dngos grub kun dang las rnams ni// sngags pas sbyin sreg med mi 'grub// de phyir sngags dang sbyin sreg bya// 'bad de brtsam par bya ba/
116a5(rgyud 'grel): yin// rgyas pa'i las so// dbang gi las ni/ dab la dmar ba'i sa dag la// zla gam dang nI mtsho skyes 'dra// rgyal khru do dpangs su gang // byug pa dmar po kha khyer ni// lcags kyu 'bar bas rab tu brgyan// dbus su
116a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma mtsho skyes dmar// dbang la bshis pa'i shing brtsig go// 'o ma can dang dmar po'i shing // ljon shing dri ma med pa ni// shing gi me tog Shad/ dmar po can// dbang la bshis pa'i shing gis brtsig/ mchod rdzas
116b1(rgyud 'grel): me tog dmar po sogs// zhal zas la sogs ci 'byor bsham// sreg rdzas ming gzugs me tog dmar// ba glang sha dang gi haM sogs// sngags pa'i cha lugs dmar zhing mdzes// dus ni nyi ma nub kha ste// chags
116b2(rgyud 'grel): shing gos ni dmar po gyon// sems dpa'i skyil krung dag gis gnas// chags pa rdo rje sbyor ldan pas// nub tu kha bltas thun dang por// sngags pa bgegs bdag nga rgyal gyis// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor las// btsun
116b3(rgyud 'grel): mo'i pad+ma 'jam gnas pa'i// bsgrub bya rjes su chags pas dmigs// 'od zer bskul ba'i sbyor ba dang // sngags pas hoHyig mtha' can bzlas// rnam g.yeng mig zur gyis bltas pas// bud med skye bo rmongs par
116b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// bsang sbyangs mi lha nga mar mchod de// rjes la bgegs bdag dmar po bskyed// sreg rdzas dgang blugs legs par dbul// las rnams thams cad 'grub pa ste// las kun gyi ni de kho na// bsam pa'i khyad
116b5(rgyud 'grel): par gyis ni bya// sau la las dang rjes mthun pa'i// thab khung las rnams thams cad la// sngags pas ji lta bzhin du bya// gzhan gyi dpung gzhom sbyin sreg ni// bsgrub po rgyal po'i rgyu ru ni// gsang sngags stong phrag bcu
116b6(rgyud 'grel): ru bzlas// pheM nya'i steng du rab gnas te// sbyin sreg stong phrag lnga ru bya// shatshan dang ni 'o mer rtags// de yi dgang blugos rim bzhin bya// dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgya nyid du// dmag mis gang ba be rnyed par 'gyur//
117a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal chen grub pa rgyal dbang phyug/ de bzhin gzhan gyi rngo mi nus// mi dad pa glang ba yi sha/ de bzhin sreg blugs gzhan dag la// chad dang 'o mar mnyam btags pa// 'bum phrag gcig tu spyan
117a2(rgyud 'grel): sreg bya// gling bzhi dbang bsgyur rgyal po yi// dpal chen po la spyod par 'gyur// de nas dgug pa'i cho ga bshad// li khri'i mdog dang 'dra bar bsgom// rlung du steng bltas phyogs gos can// bsgrub bya g.yo ba bsam par bya//
117a3(rgyud 'grel): rol mo'i mtshams rngam gdan la gnas// zhags pa lcags kyu'i sbyor bar ldan// dza yi mtha' can sngags bzlas te// bsgrub zlaHbya'i snying kha chu skyes dbug/ na 'jig rten gsum shes rin po nges par dgug
117a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas gzhan gyi cho ga bshad// dgug sogs ji ltar gsungs pa yi// thod pa dum bu gcig pa'ang rung // mnyam par mdzes shing bzang po la// bsgrub pa bya ba'i lus bri zhing // de bzhin 'dab ma brlan can brgya'i// sngags
117a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ming ni lhan cig tu// gser gyis shing gi skyug gu yis// ba glang gi haM khrag gis bri// khrag gis sbags pa yi ni gos// bsgrub bya yi ni steng du g.yogs// snying zer mang gang ma ma dzum pa'i thangs dus thu gcig pa la 'di thags dang ma nga shri
117a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i sngags ni go bzlog la// bzlas pa sbyin sreg bya ba ste// sngags dang 'gying bar bca' lugs kyis// 'dab ma ra re rab blang so shing // yid la 'dod pa myur du dgug/ de nas gzhan yang tsan dan shing // dmar
117b1(rgyud 'grel): po'i rang bzhin gzugs brnyan g+ha// rang gi khrag dang gtogs// bris te skyong khar gzug par g+ha/ chab gsum gyi lus la byug/ zangs ma'i khab kyis bsgrub byA so+o// skyod khwa lta ba gsang ba yi// gnas gsum pa nA
117b2(rgyud 'grel): phug byas te// gang 'dod mtshan mo phyed na ni// de ni myur du dgug par 'gyur// gser gyi tsag gau b+ha ga ni// bris te de stengs lag g.yon gyis// mnan te gong gau mang smos te// brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas na// de ni
117b3(rgyud 'grel): skad tsog de la 'ong // steng du 'khor lo'i 'dab blangs te// byA rog sgro yi smug gu yis// mig gi chu yi ming dang ni// spel ba'i 'khor lo bri bar bya// 'bad de steng gi rlung spur na// de ni skrong pa'i cho ga nyid// spre'u'i ra
117b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin la// phur bu sor chad drug bya ste// lan bdun du ni mngon bsngags pas// gang gi sgo ru brkos sbas na// de yi rigs ni gcod par 'gyur// ba glang glang po rta bong dang // rnga mang ma he'i gnas rnams su// brkos
117b5(rgyud 'grel): te sbas na brlag par 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhon nas ni// mgrin rings steng du rab gnas pa// bsgrub bya phyogs kyi gos can lta// skra grol til gyi mar khus byug/ lho ru phyogs shing skya bas med pa// myos dang
117b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas shing ngu bzhin pa// zhags pa yis ni lag bcings te// rgyab nas bsnun bzhon pa ni bsam// mkhas pas de tshe ma kha lta// khams gsum mnan pa'i bsam pa dang // gal te 'dod pa bsgrub 'dod na// dza yi
118a1(rgyud 'grel): mtha' can sngag sa bzlas 'grub// rta dang ma he rab zhon pas// gnyis po dag ni rtag par bsam// bsgrub bya mtshon chas rab spras la// phan tshun du ni rtsod par ldan// bsgrub po 'khrul 'khor
118a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan phyogs// kun tu brtsi ba med sems par// ma he rta la zhon pa yis// char bcas 'khor gyi khyad par gyis// ming gi yi ge de rnams dang // raM dang ra gyis kun nas spel// de bzhin spyi bo'i steng du raM// yan
118a3(rgyud 'grel): lag las ni shos par bya// r-i yi rtse mor gnas gyur pa// rdo rje skyil krung nges bstan par// des ni bsgrub bya yang dag mnan// lus dang ngag dang sems ni gzir// des ni ma sngon du gsungs pa bzhin// ming gi mtha'
118a4(rgyud 'grel): mar spel bar bya// 'di ni mnan pa'i cho ga'o// las mtha' bsreg mnan 'phang gsum sbyar// bgegs kyi bdag po'i sbyin sreg/ dpal nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// / paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo
118a5(rgyud 'grel): ba 'brog mi shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / shu b+haM/ shin tu myur ba'i lha chen po gegs kyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs// rgya gar skad du/ pu Na de wa ma hA bi g+ha rA dzA sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ shin tu myur ba'i lha chen po bgegs
118a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogasu/ yid du 'ong ba'i khang par/ 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i bya ba brtsam pa mi dang por thang ka dgram zhing / mchod
118b1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang gtor ma bshams la/ rang stan bde ba la rol pa'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug par bya'o// rang yi dam gang yin pa'i nga rgyal bya// de nas rang gi mdun du lha 'di bsgom/ de'i sku mdog ni/ me 'bar ba ltar
118b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dmar ba/ gdong bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor gtsug sgril nas dkris shing bcings pa/ 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba/ shin tu 'jigs pa/ mche ba rab tu gtsigs pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ g.yas pa
118b3(rgyud 'grel): dang po nas rim pa bzhin du dag sto/ mda'/ lcags kyu/ rdo rje/ ral gr-i/ 'phang mdung rnams so// g.yon dang po gtun shing / gzhu/ kha T+wAM ga/ thod pa khrag gis gang ba/ sha tshan gyis gang ba'i thod pa/ phub chung dang / @
118b4(rgyud 'grel): dan bsnams pa'o// rdo rje dang thod pa thugs kar 'dzin zhing / gzhan kun 'char thabs su'o// oM gaHgaHsid+d+ha sid+d+hi/ sarba ar+tha sa d+ha me/ pra sa d+ha ya hUM dzaHdzaHswA hA/ dgug pa'i sngags so// bsnyen pa'i sngags ni/ oM
118b5(rgyud 'grel): a gaHhUM swA hA/ bsnyen pa'i grangs/ sngags brgya 'am stong bzlas nas/ las sbyor brgya brjod par bya'o// til na ga pos las gang 'dod pa bya'o// de ltar bsgrubs pa'i sngags pa de thams cad kyis mthong na dga'
118b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal pos mchod pa chen pos mchod cing 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad 'ching ste/ lan tshwa chur btab pa ltar 'gyur ro// bgegs thams cad 'byer zhing drung du 'ong mi nus
119a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro// las thams cad 'grub cing nor rnams brnyed par 'gyur ro// ji skad smras pa'i tshig la gzhan yid ches par 'gyur ro// bgegs sel ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon dI paM ka
119a2(rgyud 'grel): ras mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// // bgegs kyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs pa 'ang ma'i rang 'gyur// rgya gar skad du/ su bud d+hi ma hA bi g+ha bi ga nan rA dza sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ shin tu myu ra ba'i lha bgegs chen po/ bgegs kyi rgyal
119a3(rgyud 'grel): po bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo// nyams dga' ba'i sa phyogs su/ yid du 'ong ba'i khang par 'dod pa brtsam pa ni/ dang por tsan ngan gyi thang ka dgram/ gzhan
119a4(rgyud 'grel): yang mchod pa bshams/ 'dun pa drag po bskyed/ rang stan bde ba la rol pa'i 'dugu stangs su 'jug par byas lo/ de'i sku mdog ni/ me chen po ltar dmar ba/ gdong gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs
119a5(rgyud 'grel): sgril sgrigs shing bcings pa/ 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ gcig chago pa/ phyag g.yas na dgra sta dang / gtunaM shring dang / mda' gzhu dang / kha T+wAM gau dang / lcags kyu dang / thod pa
119a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar chen gyis bkang ba'o// g.yon na rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / sha chen pos bkang ba'i thod pa dang / mun shun ti dong / ba dan rtse gsum dang / shag ti dang bcu gnyis so// oM gaHgaHsid d+ha sarba ar+tha me pra sa d+ha ya
119b1(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM dzaHswA hA/ bsnyen pa'i sngags ni/ oM a gaHhUM swA hA/ bsnyen pa'i sngags brgya'am stong bzlas nas/ phyis nas las byed pa na gang 'dod pa bya'o// til nag po la sngags la las gang 'dod pa bya'o//
119b2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bsgrub pa'i sngags pa de ni thams cad kyis mthang na dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal pos rgyal por mchod cing 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bgegs thams cad byer zhing drung du 'ong mi nus
119b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro// las rnams 'grub cing don rnams brnyed par 'gyur ro// ji skad smras pa'i tshig la mi gzhan dag yid ches par 'gyur ro// bgegs sel ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// /
119b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar ko sa la'i rnal 'byor pa/ brtul zhugs spyod pa bai ro tsa nas rang 'gyur byas pa'o// / 'khor mo'i gsal byed Di b+hi te ru gas mdzad pa// rgya gar skad du/ shri ga Na pa ti tsakra sur+ya/ bod skad du/ dpal
119b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi bdag po'i 'khor lo'i gsal byed/ rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bla ma'i zhabs kyi chu skyes la// btud de de yi man ngag ni// bri gzhi rab gnas bsgrub pa dang // bgegs dbang 'khor lo'i gsal byed
119b6(rgyud 'grel): bri// sngags pa bskal bzang yo byad tshang // rgyu skar rgyal la las rnams brtsam// thog mar bri ba'i cho ga ni// sa dang na mkha' bar dag gi/ 'khor lo gsum gyi dbye ba yis// bsgrub pa'i srog gi 'khor lo 'bar//
120a1(rgyud 'grel): khor yug rim pa dgu yi dbus// zhi rgyas zla ba nor bu dang // dbang drug nyid phyed gru gsum nyid// thog ma'i sde tshan tha ma'i mthar// oM yig gis ni rab brgyan pa'i// yi ge drug pa nor bu'i gzugs//
120a2(rgyud 'grel): oM a gaHhUM swA hA/ rim+bus ldan thog ma mtshe skyes brgyad// dang po'i gsum po re re'i mthar// gang 'dod sbrel bas bskor ba'o// mig me rig byed mnga' rim bzhin// oM gaHgaHsid d+hi sid d+ha/ sarba ar+tha sa d+ha ma~M pra sa
120a3(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ye swA hA/ oM ba ra ta kaM ye swA hA/ oM ba ko tre d+haSh+To ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ga na po taM ye swA hA/ nye snying / snying po ming gi snying po/ ro ri klu rnams go rim bzhin// dbyangs dang gsal byed spel tshig bcas// a A la sogs
120a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dbyangs yig/ kA kha ga nga sogs gsal byed// e d+harmA sogs rten 'brel snying // bu gar las bzhi rim pa ni// zla ba yid bzhin zhir la mtshon// bgegs bdag rol pa'i lto bor bri// 'phrin las bzhi yi rim pa'o// nam
120a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha'i bzlog pa'i rim pa yi// rgya mtsho yang ni de bzhin no// de nyid bar nang tsakra'o// na mkha' rgya mtsho'i tsakra yang / khor yug rim pa lnga dang ldan// lte bar ga la spel tshig bskor// dang po 'dab brgyad mtsho skyes te// brgya byin
120a6(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gnod sbyin chur// yi ge bdun pa spel tshig bcas// me rlung bden bral bgegs kyi sar// nye snying snying po yang snying ngo // rtsa ba'i sngags rnams rim las bri// mig me mtsho mthar oM dbyangs gsal// rten 'brel spel tshog
120b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa bri// de lta'i bar mchog 'khor lo yang // las bzhi'i dbye bas so sor 'gyur// ras kyi nor bu'i mdog bzhin no// yar ngo'i ches la skal pa rang gis// n+ya gro sogs dkar po la// 'das la sogs pa'i snag tsha las//
120b2(rgyud 'grel): skug sogs 'dzin pas bri// shar du phyogs te bris pas ni// zhi ba'i cho gas rab tu gnas// dngul la sogs pa'i ga'ur gzhug/ mar dang lo spyang dag gis dgang // mat+pal steng bzhag ron chen snod// 'bru bcas dbus
120b3(rgyud 'grel): su gzhug par bya// rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar dmigs te// tsakra tshogs bdag rab dkar gzugs// thugs kar 'khor los brgyan pa bsam// bdag gi bzlas pas de nyid bskul// bdag l-i nang gdon lce 'bas
120b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs// mi mthun phyogs rnams zhi byed cing // 'dod pa bsgrub par bsgom pa nyid// bzlas pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas// zhag bdun bar du bsgrub par bya// de nas ga'u ru dar dkar dril// mchan khung g.yon bcang
120b5(rgyud 'grel): snga dro'i dus// ga'u mdun bzhag sngar bzhin bsgom// de yis nang gdon 'jigs pa dang // rgyal po chom rkun lce 'bab sogs// bsam sbyor ngan rnams zhi bar byed// zhi bar byed pa'i cho ga'o// n+ya gro ta sogs
120b6(rgyud 'grel): ser po la// lho phyogs 'jam pa'i skug gu yis// 'bras bu tshe dang bsod nams ster// rgyas par byed pa'i mtha' rten can// cho ga bzhin du bris nas ni// rgyas pa'i cho gso rab tu gnas// gser la sogs
121a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ga'ur gzhug/ mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsis bkang // maN+Da la rat+na'i snod mdzes su// bzhag la gser ldan tshogs bdag ni// bskul bas don kun 'grub par 'gyur// slar yang gser mdog
121a2(rgyud 'grel): can gyis dril// bcangs zhing spyang la mdun bzhag ste// sngags kyis tshogs bdag bskul ba yis// 'dod dgu 'byung zhing rgyas par bsam// bsod nams che dang 'byor pa sogs// grags dang dpal ni rgyas
121a3(rgyud 'grel): par byed// rgyas par byed pa'i cho ga'o// gro ga gur kum gi ho chus// zangs sogs skrag gus nub byang bri// dbang dang dgug pa'i spel tshig bcas// de nyid cho gas rab tu gnas// zangs sogs ga'ur pra tshi la
121a4(rgyud 'grel): bsdams// mar sbrang blugs te bsdam par bya// snod bzang maN+Dal steng bzhag la// tshogs bdag pad ma ra ga'i mdog/ bdag gi bzlas pas bskul ba dang // 'jig rten gsum sogs 'byor pa bkug/ dbang
121a5(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa'i don grub bsam// gang zhig dbang dang dgug 'dod pas// cho ga 'di yis 'grub par byed// dur khrod ras sogs nag po la// mi rus sgo rkang stug gus bri// bsad dang rengs dang dbye ba dang /
121a6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung dang bzlog par ro ras nyid// sdug mas lho phyogs spel tshig bcas// drag po'i cho gas rab tu gnas// tshogs bdag nag po'i lus la'o// maN+Dal steng bzhag bskul ba yis// bdag la gnod pa'i
121b1(rgyud 'grel): skye bo rnams// bsad rengs rmugs dang bzlog pa dang // mi mthun bsrung zhing don grub bsam// slar yang lcags kyi ga'ur gzhug/ srod la mdun bzhag sngar bzhin bya// de lta'i bsrung 'khor cho ga yis//
121b2(rgyud 'grel): lho yang rung ste brlag par byed// nang gdon 'jigs pa ma lus bsrung // byang stems rig sngags ngan rnams bzlog/ gsang sngags mgo bo nang du bstan// bsrung dang zhi rgyas phyi ru ste// de lta'i cho ga bzang
121b3(rgyud 'grel): bo nyid// brtsams pa tsam gyis thun mong mchog/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// skal bzang rnams kyi don ldan no// dpal ldan gnyis med rol pa'i zhabs// bung pa bdud rtsis tshim byas pa'i// 'khor
121b4(rgyud 'grel): lo'i cho ga'i dge ba des// 'gro kun phun tshogs nyid gyur cig/ dpal tshogs kyi bdag po'i 'khor lo'i gsal byed/ slob dpon chen po DoM b+hi he ru kas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// shu b+ha/
122a1(rgyud 'grel): // sngags kyi rgyal po'i dam tshig dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs bzhugs so//
122b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ man+t+ra rA dzA sa ma ya sid+d+ha sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ sngags kyi rgyal po'i dam tshig dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa la phyag 'tshal
122b2(rgyud 'grel): lo// b+h+ra ma dang ni lhag pa'i lnga// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs li phyag btsal nas// thun mang sgrub pa'i rim pa bri// 'phrin las sgrub par 'dod pa yis// gnas ni nags tshal dur khrod dam// rtswa mtho brag dmar me tog+ho ljongs//
122b3(rgyud 'grel): dben zhing nyams dga' sgrub pa'i gnas// de ru 'dug la spros pa bcad// shog bu gro ga dur khrod ras// dung dang gur ku son+na ra// dur khrod sol bas snag tsha'o// mu khyud gsum pa chu dkyil 'khor// dbus kyi ri mo'i mtshan
122b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid ni// sa dang chu dang me dbye yis// rdo rje bum pa lcags kyu yi// bsnol dang brtsegs pa go bar bya// gru bzhi rdo rjes mtshan pa laM// dang po'i rgya gsum nang du bri// de nas re kha rnam bzhi la// mu khyud gsum dang ldan pa la// yi ge
122b5(rgyud 'grel): sum brgya rtsa gnyis kyi// h+ya kyi rim pa bri bar bya// h+ya rnams thams cad g.yon bskor bri// nang du ming yig bri bar bya// yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi la// nga nyan ma bzhi spangs nas// gzhan rnams 'khor lor dgod par bya// ka kha ga
122b6(rgyud 'grel): g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nyA nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ ka kA d+ha ya gnyis/ kha khA hi khA hi/ ga gAr+N+Na ya gAr+t+ta ya/ g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ tsa tsA la ya gnyis/ tsha nA ta ya gnyis/ dza dzAm+b+ha ya/ dz+nya dz+nyA ta
123a1(rgyud 'grel): yA gnyis/ Ta TA la ya gnyis/ dzatA ka ya gnyis/ DA DA b+ha ya gnyis/ D+ha D+hA ka ya gnyis/ NA tA sha ya gnyis/ t+yA tA b+hA ya gnyis/ tha b+ha b+hA ya gnyis/ da dA ra ya gnyis/ d+ha d+ha ra ya gnyis/ na nA sha ya
123a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ ba pA ta ya gnyis/ pa pA tA ya gnyis/ ba bAn+d+ha ya gnyis/ b+ha b+he da ya gnyis/ ma mA ri ya gnyis/ ya yo ha ya gnyis/ ra ro hi ya gnyis/ la lo ba ya gnyis/ wa wA hA ya gnyis/ sha sho Sha ya gnyis/ She Sh+waSh+Ti
123a3(rgyud 'grel): ya gnyis/ sa sA d+ha ya gnyis/ ha hA na ya gnyis/ k+Sha k+Sho b+ha ya gnyis/ che ge mo wa sh+ya kr-it+ta wa sh+yaM ku ru hoHshAn+ting+ku ru/ puSh+Ting+gu ru/ k+Sha maM ku ru/ k+Sho baM ku ru/ ma raM ku ru swA hA/ oM sid+d+hi sid+d+hi ma hA sid+d+hi pU dza ag+ni ta b+ha na ta mI
123a4(rgyud 'grel): ra Ni ka ri Ni b+h+yAM/ aM ku su ma mA li b+hi hU dzaHoM badz+ra ku pa dzaM kaM b+haM ThaHThaH4\u0f7foM gro ga ma kr-it+te sarba sha tru na nA ma/ rtsa ba'i t+ye dang sham bu'i h+ya// bsgyur dang 'don dang 'jug pa gces// dang po bsnyen te sgrub pa bya// las la sbyar
123a5(rgyud 'grel): te ma grub na// 'khor lo ting 'dzin h+ya kyis spogs// DA ki ma yaM rdzas sgrub 'di// spog mi dgos te gdams pa'i mchog/ dung dang ra gan zangs dang lcags// snod kyi bye brag bstan pa'o// lha dang 'od zer 'khor lo las//
123a6(rgyud 'grel): sgom pa'i rim pa de yis shes// thun mong lha dang khyad par lha// mchog tu shis pa'i lha zhes bya// brgyad dang nyer lnga'i dus su ni// rab tu gnas dang sgrub pa dang // spog pa'i dbye ba shes par bya// snga dro gung dang nyi ma'i
123b1(rgyud 'grel): zer// de bzhin dus kyang shes par bya// chu sa me yi dbye ba yis// bgrang phreng gos dang rang mdog shes// mar dang sbrang rtsi bu ram dang // zho dang 'bru dang rin chen lnga// dug yungs khrag sogs dbye ba shes// ma rlangs ni
123b2(rgyud 'grel): dang longs spyod rgyas// dmigs bya dbang sdud tshar gtsod pa// nang re dus kyi dang po la// gsang sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// zla ba gcig dang gnyis dang ni// gsum dang bzhin 'grub par 'gyur ro// gtor ma mchod pa
123b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg gis// thun mong khyad par mchog gi lha// mnyes par byas la dngos grub blang // bar chad bsrung ba'i cho ga la// rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// lus ngag yid kyis sba bar bya// hor ba mi ro rgyal po bzhin// shin
123b4(rgyud 'grel): tu gsang ste spyad na 'grub// bla ma dam tshig ldan pa la// lung sgrub pas ni 'dod pa 'grub// de yis man ngag shes par bya// rab 'bring tha ma'i dbye ba yiso// rang dang bsgrub bya'i bsod nams brtag/ bsgrub bya'i mtshan nyid
123b5(rgyud 'grel): de yis shes// grub nas gzhan la lung mi dbog/ sgrub pos rab tu gnas pa dang // 'khor lo'i rab gnas gso bar bya// chos dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis// chos kyi don dang sems can don// bstan pa'i don du spyad
123b6(rgyud 'grel): pa na/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de las gzhan pas mi 'grub ste// lus ngag nyon mongs kho nar zad// rgyal khams gcig dang grong khyer gcig/ pho mo'i dbye ba shes par bya// chos mkhas dang ni gnas lnga mkhas
124a1(rgyud 'grel): sa yi bdag po khyim gcig gi/ dbye ba rim pas shes par bya// mchog tu 'phags pa'i sgrub thabs 'di// rang don bral bas gzhan don du// bkod pa'i dge bas sems can gyi// 'dod pa 'grub pas
124a2(rgyud 'grel): tshim gyur cig/ sngags kyi rgyal po dmo tshig gi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i thab so zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ ka li tsakra sUr+ya wa shaM nA ma/ bod skad du/ gsal
124a3(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i 'khor los dbang du bya ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrub pa pos snod bcud dbang du bya bar 'dod pas/ rang nyid khro po 'dod pa'i rgyal po lcags kyu dang zhags pa
124a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ sku mdog li khri'i phung po ltar dmar ba/ yum bde ba rgyas byed ma dang gnyis su med par bltas te/ h+ya 'di bya khA ta'i skad maM grag pa'i dus la pad+ma'i phreng ba 'dzin pas bzla bar bya/ oM shIn+tiM ka ri Ni b+h+rUM/ oM
124a5(rgyud 'grel): ku su ma mA li b+hi hU dzaHoM badz+ra ku pi dza kam+b+haM ThaH3\u0f7fThaHgro ge ma kr-it+taM sarba sha tru na nAn/ ka kA d+ha ya/ nas/ mA ra Ni ya nra sngags rgyal dam tshig gi sngags dang 'dra'o// 'di'i cho ga ni/ shing shu na ya dang po'i sngags
124a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum nang du praM/ gru bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan pa phyi rol du bri/ de nas mu khyud bzhi pa'i yi gsum cu rtsa gnyis kyi h+ye rim pas bri/ thams cad g.yon bskor du'o// mA ra ya btags nas gtor ma dmar po
124b1(rgyud 'grel): byin na drag por 'gyur ro// nga nya gnyis dang bral ba'i nam gang rung spangs pa'i tsakra zangs sam/ kham sa'i ga'u sor drug par sbrang rtsi dang mar du sbyar ba bcug la/ rkang pas mnan te bzlas na rlung bcud kyis bsdus pa la
124b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang byed par the tshom med do// gal te grub par ma gyur na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'khor los gnang du 'bebs par byed do// sbyin sreg dang 'khor lo kha sbyar gyi man ngag bzhin du spogs pas de mi thag tu 'grub par 'gyur
124b3(rgyud 'grel): ro// 'khor lo'i sbyor ba rigs gsum gyi sbyor bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// mar ngo'i tshes bcu la rab tu gnas par bya'o// man ngag bzhin/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo sngags kyis bsrung bar bya ste/ chu la yongs su
124b4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas nas btung bar bya'o// 'di ni lhag pa'i lha yis kyang bsgrubs na 'grub ste snga ma bzhin no// khyad par du sa sna gsum gyi mdag pa la bde ba rgyas byed ma'i sku legs par bya ste/ 'khor lo dang ril bu la man
124b5(rgyud 'grel): dgra bzhin du bsgrubs nas bsgrub bya gang la byin pa dbang du 'gyur ba la the tshom med do// gsal byed nyi ma'i 'khor los snod bcud dbang du bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje gdan pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
124b6(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta s+tha baM ra'i zhal snga nas dang / shAkya'i dge slong ba ri lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o// / shu b+haM/
125a1(rgyud 'grel): // tshogs bdag dkar po'i sgrub thabs man ngag cha lag dang bcas pa bzhugs/
125b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shri ga na pa ti shan ta na sa d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal tshogs kyi bdag po zhi ba'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// dang por gnas dben
125b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing yid du 'ong bar/ maN+Dal gru bzhi pa ba yi rnam lngas byug go// sman dang dri zhim po'i chus chag chag gdab/ tsan dan dkar po'i dri'i thig le gcig bya/ me tog dkar po'i chom bu gcig dgod/ mar me dpatri
125b3(rgyud 'grel): dang spos dang lha bshos dgram/ gtor ma tshan nam bag bye la sbrus pa'i zan dkar gsum mngar gsum/ la phug re re/ la du'i ri lu re re gzhug/ lugs sku 'am bris sku yod na bzhugs su gsol/ de ltar
125b4(rgyud 'grel): bsham de nas dang po dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa phul la/ bdag nyid yi dam lhar bskyed/ de nas mdun du a las zla ba'i steng du yi ge hUM dkar po gcig bsam/ de las dpal tshogs kyi bdag po sku
125b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar po glang po che'i mgro can phyag g.yas gnyis na/ la phu gla dang dgra sta bsnams pa/ g.yon gnyis na thod pa nor bus bkang ba dang / kha tra ga bsnams pa/ rin po che dang lha'i me tog gis brgyan pa/ byi ba
125b6(rgyud 'grel): sngon po'i khri la bzhugs pa gcig gsol bar sgom/ de nas bdag nyid kyi thugs kha nas/ 'od zer 'phros pas/ rang bzhin gyi gnas nas dpal tshogs bdag spyan drangs la mdun gyi de la snyems la/ dam tshig
126a1(rgyud 'grel): gi phyag rgya bstan/ sku khrus gsol/ mchod pa sngags kyis dbul/ de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni/ oM ba ra ta ka swA hA/ oM ba ga ba twe e ka daMSh+Ta bin d+ha sid+d+hi hUM/ oM bruM ga na pa ti ye swA hA/ zhi ba'i yi ge 'bru bdun
126a2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang gter/ bsams pa yang 'grub/ longs spyod che/ yi zhes byad kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyas pa khams gsum gyi nor dang thams cad 'ong ste/
126a3(rgyud 'grel): phyug por 'gyur ro// nye ba'i snying po zla ba drug mchod pa dang bzlas pa byas na mi tha mal pa yang stong 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bsod nams mnyam par 'gyur ro// ming gi snying po zla ba drug tu bzlas pa dang
126a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa byas na/ rgyal po thug pa dang blon po dang / skyes pa dang / bu da med la sogs pa thams cad bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ro// bzlas pa thon nas/ dkar gtor la sngags ldan pa/ btab ste dbul bar bya'o//
126a5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ni chos la gnas par bya dgos so// gtor ma ni kham las kha zas ro brgya pa/ na mkha' khengs par sgom mo// de la gsol bar bsam mo// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag dgyes// phyag 'tshal
126a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan zhi ba che// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan khro bo che// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub ni// ci 'dod pa ni bstsol bar mdzod// lha yi rgyal po'i mnga' thang ni// bsgrub pa po la bstsol bar mdzod// shin tu thugs rje'i
126b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid las// tshogs bdag chen po thugs rje che// thugs rje chen pos dbul ba skyob// nor lha chen po khyod nyid la// bdag nyid dang bas phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal ldan tshegs bdag chen po ni// sku mdog dkar po
126b2(rgyud 'grel): glang chen dbu// g.yas kyi phyag na la phug bsnams// g.yon na yid bzhin nor bu bsnams// 'og ma dgra sta kha tAM ga/ gsus tshan rgyan rnams kun gyi brgyan// zla ba byi ba'i khri la bzhugs// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshegs
126b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag la'o// la phug gtor mo 'di bzhes la// tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang // nad dang 'byung po zhi bar mdzod// mi dang lha klu gnod sbyin rnams// bdag gi bran du 'gyur bar shog/ lha yi longaso spyod mang po las// 'dod

126b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// 'di jo bos dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud la brten nas mdzad pa'o// des 'brom/ des spyan snga pa la gnang ba'o// na zhes pa'i gdams rig tshigs bdog mi grub sa pag dzab rdzanas rgyud pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ga na ba ti
127a1(rgyud 'grel): tsin+ta rad na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// tshogs kyi bdag po sgrub pa la// zhi ba dang
