279a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sgro dang me la sogs pa'i mtshams dang steng dang 'og tu yang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo bcu'o// de la gshin rje gshong nag po nag po dang dkar po dmar po'i zhal can rdo rje tho ba dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang thugs/
279b1(rgyud 'grel): kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o// shes rab mthar byed dkar po dkar po dung nag po dang dmar po'i zhal can rdo rje dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang ral gri dang thugs
279b2(rgyud 'grel): kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra ste 'dzin pa'o// pad+ma mthar byed dmar po dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po'i zhal can pad+ma dmar po dang ral gri dang gtun shing dang dril bu dang dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin
279b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ bgegs mthar byed sngon po sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang gtun shing dang zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o// mi g.yo ba sngon po sngon po
279b4(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can ral gri dang rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang sdigs mdzub dang dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon po sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can rtsa ba'i phyag gis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi
279b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya mdzad cing gzhan rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// dbyug sngon can nag po nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa sngon po dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang
279b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang pad+ma dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o// stobs po che nag po nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dang ral gri dpar khor lo dang thugs kar sdigs
280a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzub zhags pa dang bcas pa dang pad+ma dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o// gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba nag po nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis gtsug ter gyi phyag rgya spyi bor 'dzin pa lhag ma rnams
280a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis rdo rje dang pad+ma dang sdigs mdzub dang ral gri 'dzin pa ste/ phyag gnyis thal mo gon rgyal du mnyam por brkyang ba'i srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo'i steng du mthe bong gnyis kyi sen mos sanan te mthe chung gnyis brkyang ba'o// de bzhin du gung
280a3(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis kyi sen mo yang dag par rtswa sprang la mdzub mo dbus su gnyis rwa'i rnam pa ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba gtsul tor gyi phyag rgya'o zhes kha cig gi ste 'ga' zhig ni gzhan no// gnod mdzes nag po nag po dang dkar po dang dmar
280a4(rgyud 'grel): bo'i zhal can rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang thugs kar zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang pad+ma dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du go rim ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje rtse lnga pa
280a5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'khor lo dang cha dgu pa'i rin po che ma ra ka ta dang pad+ma dmar po dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dung pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang klu shing gi me tog dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje
280a6(rgyud 'grel): dradang rin po che dang pad+ma dang rdo rje dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang rdo rje dang rdo rje tho ba dang rdo rje chu skyes dmar po dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang ral gri dang rdo rje khu tshur dang dbyug pa sngon po dang de thug pa nag po dang rdo rje dang rdo rje la gnas pa'i dbyug pa dang
280b1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang zla ba la zhugs pa'i zhal gsum phyug drug pa'o// yang gzhan las ni lha rnams kyi rang rang gi mdog lta bu'i rin po che las byas pa'o// de la rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni zla ba la
280b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ste gzhan rnams ni nyi mA la gnas pa'o// mi bskyod pA la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje skyil krung can no// khro bo rnams ni zhabs g.yas brkyang ba g.yon bskum pa zhal so so la dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum dang
280b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa 'bar zhing sgra sgrogs pa shin tu 'jig su rung ba srong ba'i 'khor lor bshad pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'o// 'dir ni 'khor lo'i dbang phyug kho na yum dang bcas pa ste/
280b4(rgyud 'grel): gnod mdzes kyi mthor thug pa'i lha gzhan rnams ni yum med pa'o// srung ba'i 'khor lo la gnas pa'i gshin rje bshed la sogs pa ni rang 'od kyi shes rab dang bcas pa ste de yang go rim bzhin du rdo rje ro langs ma dang gzhan
280b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi thub pa dang khro gnyer can ma dang ral gcig ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje ma dang sna tshogasu rin chen ma dang sna tshogs pad+ma ma dang sna tshogs langs ma dang nu mkha'i rdo rje ma dang sa 'dzin ma rnam so// mi bskyod pa la thugs kar ye shes
280b6(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' phyag gnyis pa dmar po shes rab dang bcas pa de'i thugs kar hU~M nag po'o// rnam par sna mdzad kyi thugs karari oM dang rin chen dbang po la sA dang snang ba mthar yas la AHdang don yod grub pa la hA
281a1(rgyud 'grel): dang An mA la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams la lA mAM pAM tAM dzaH baM so dang reg bya rdo rje ma la kha dang byams pA la sogs pa brgyad blo rnams lA mok+Sha AM oM auM hUM oM sa dang khro bo bcu po rnams la d+hU // mI bskyod pa sogs
281a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyi snying po'i sngags ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa nyid de byams pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ni oM AHme tri ya maM hUM/ oM AHk+Shi tI gan+d+ha hrIM hUM/ oM AHbadz+ra pA Ni oM hUM/ oM AHkha gan+d+ha oM hU~M/ oM AH
281a3(rgyud 'grel): lo kI shwa ra oM hUM/ oM AHmany+dzu g+ho Sha hUM hUM/ oM AHsarba ni ba ra Na biskam b+hi ni oM hUM/ oM AHsa man+ta b+ha dra saM hUM/ oM AHa tsa la hUM hUM/ oM AHTak+ki rA dza~M hU~M hUM/ oM AHnI la dat+na hUM hUM/ oM AHma hA ba la hUM hU~M/ oM AH
281a4(rgyud 'grel): uSh+NI Sha hUM d+hU/ oM AHsum+b+ha rA dza hUM hUM/ gang gi tshe mi bskyod pa dang dbyer med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor lo'i dbang por gyur pa de'i tshe 'di'o// oM AHhUM hUM zhes pa'i sngagaso// rigs kyi bdag po ni mi bskyod pa dang kun
281a5(rgyud 'grel): tu bzang po dag gi gong du brjod pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ste 'on kyang rdo rje dong 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang dril bu dang nor bu dang ral gri 'dzin pa rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas yang dag par 'khyud pa'o// de bzhin gshegs/
281a6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams dang mA ma kI dang phyag na rdo rje dang 'jam pa'i dbyings dang gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba dang gnod mdzes rgyal po rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o// spyan ma dang gzugs rdo rje ma dang byams pa dang sa'i snying po dang gshin rje mthar
281b1(rgyud 'grel): byed dang mi g.yo ba rnams kyi rnam par snang mdzad do// sgra rdo rje ma dang na mkha'i snying po dang shes rab mthar byed dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi rin chen dbang po'o// gos dkar mo dang dri rdo rje ma dang 'jig rten dbang phyug ma dang
281b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma mthar byed dang dbyug ston can rnams kyi snang ba mtha' yas so// sgrol ma dang ro rdo rje ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma dang rnam par sel ba dang bgegs mthar byed dang / stobs po che rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o// rgyas 'debs kyi de bzhin
281b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad ni reng 'od kyi yum dang bcas pa 'khor lo sgyur ba'i gzugs can no// // / dpal kun tu kha sbyor du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du srung ba'i 'khor lo'i lte bar rlung dang
281b4(rgyud 'grel): me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor dang ri rab kyi steng du chos 'byung gi nga busu gzhal yas khang ngo // srung ba'i 'khor lo la gshin rje gshed ni phyag g.yas pa gsum gyis rdo rje lcags kyu dang 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang g.yon pa gsum gyis
281b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs ker sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang dril bu dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o// shes rab mthar byed ni rdo rje zhags pa dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang thugs kar sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang dgra sta'o// pad+ma mthar byed ni lcags sgrog
281b6(rgyud 'grel): dang pad+ma dang ral gri dang dril bu dang dgra sta dang zhags pa'o// bgegs dgra ni rdo rje dril bu dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gtun shing dang dgra sta'o// mi g.yo ba ni ral gri dang 'khor lo
282a1(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub dang dgra sta dang zhags pa'o// 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang rdo rje zhags pa'o// dbyug sden can ni rdo
282a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa ston pa dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang pad+ma dang dgra sta'o// stobs po che ni rtse gsum dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang thubs kar sngags mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa
282a3(rgyud 'grel): dang pad+ma dang dgra sta'o// gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba ni g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyis gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma dang sdigs mdzub dang ral gri'o// gnod mdzes ni rdo rje dang 'khor lho dang rin po che dang thugs/
282a4(rgyud 'grel): kar sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa de da pad+ma dang ral gyi'o// bcu po 'di rnams ni dbu la thong po lngas brgyan pa 'khor lo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa mi mgo'i phreng ba mgul la 'phyed pa go rim ji lta pa bzhitu rnam par/
282a5(rgyud 'grel): snang mdzad dang rin tshan dbang po dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa dang rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang 'od dpag med dang don yod grub bya dang mi bskyod pa dang mi bsgying pas rgyas btabo pa'o// gzhal yas khang gi snying par rje
282a6(rgyud 'grel): rje 'dzum pa dang bcas pa cung zad dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'i sku mdog dkar po ral pa'i thor cog nag po la gnas pa'i nor bu dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang de'i 'og tu g.yon ngosu gnas pa'i zla ba phyed pa dri ma med pa dang sangaH/
282b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lha dang 'khor lo dang rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang lag gdub dang ska rags dang thal chen rnams kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi zhal sngon po dang dmar po zhal re re
282b2(rgyud 'grel): la spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa phyag drug pa rdo rje dang dril bus rnam par mdzes pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rab dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud cing chu skyes la mnyam par sbyor ba'i dga' ba dang ldan pa phyag g.yas pa dag gis ral gri dang lcags
282b3(rgyud 'grel): go dang g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa/ nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can sna tshogs pad+ma dang thod pa dang / zla ba'i gdan la skyil krung phyud pos bzhugs pa gar gyi nyamaso dgu dang ldan pa'o// de'i thugs kar sna tshogs
282b4(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes dang zla ba la ye shes sems dpa' sku mdog dkar dmar sems dpa'i skyil krung can sangs rgyas lngas spras pa'i rin po che'i cod pan dang rin po ches brgyan pa rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes
282b5(rgyud 'grel): rab ma la 'khyud pa ste/ de'i thugs kar ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rang bzhin hUM yi go nag po'o// 'dir sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang gi shar du rnam par snang mdzad dkar po zhi ga phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis 'khor
282b6(rgyud 'grel): lo dang dril bu g.yon pa ngag gis thod pa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// lhor rin tshon dbang po ser po phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis rin po dang lcags kyu/ g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang zhags pa'o// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar
283a1(rgyud 'grel): po phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis mnga' dang pad+ma g.yon pa dag gis gzhu dang zhags pa'o// byang du don yod grub pa ljang ku phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang lcags kyu/ g.yon pa dag gis dril bu dang
283a2(rgyud 'grel): thod pa'o// dbang ldan du spyan ma dkar mo phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang mnga' dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis thod pa dang dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu'o// mer mA ma kI spen mo phyag bcu gnyis
283a3(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas pa rnams kyis mda' dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang lcags kyu dang dril bu dang zhags pa dang thod pa dang khaT+Tang+ga'o// bden bral du gos dkar mo dmer mo phyag brgyad me
283a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa rnams kyis mda' dang pad+ma dang ral gri dang rdo rje g.yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang thod pa dang zhags pa dang dril bu'o// rlung du sgrol ma ljang ku phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis ut+pa la dmar po dang ral gri dang lcags
283a5(rgyud 'grel): dang mnga'/ g.yon pa rnams kyi 'khor lo dang zhags pa dang thod pa dang gzhu'o// rim pa gnyis pa la shar phyogasu rdo rje drag mo dkar mo mda'i dang lcags kyu dang gzhu dang byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i thod pa can no// lhar
283a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs rdo rje ma ser mo rdo rje dang mdung dang zhags pa dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa can no// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje ma dmar mo ral gri dang rdo rje dang dri chus gang ba'i thod pa dang dril bu tsa mo// byang du rdo rje zhi ba ma ljang ku thal
283b1(rgyud 'grel): char dang ba dan gsum pa dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha TAng+ga dang thod pa can no// dbang ldan du rdo rje gnod sbyin mo dkar ser dbyug pa dang ut+pal dang thod pa dang DA ma ru can no// mer rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dkar ser pad+ma dang ma long dang rkang
283b2(rgyud 'grel): mar gyi gang ba'i thod pa dang dgra sta can no// bden bral du sku rdo rje ma sngo dmar shak+ti dang dung dang 'khor lo dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa can no// rlung du sa rdo rje ma dkar ljang pad+ma dang rdo rje dang bdud rtsi dang sgron mas gang ba'i thod
283b3(rgyud 'grel): pa mi lpags kyis g.yogs pa dang dril bu can no// brgyad po 'di rnams ni phyag bzhi ma phyag dang po gnyis ni g.yas pa dag gis te gzhan gnyis ni g.yon pa ngag gis 'dzin pa'o// rim pa gsum pa la shar phyogs gzhang
283b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dmar mo phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pas mngon par bshad pa'i tshul can no// lhor sgeg mo sngon mo phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas bsnyems pa dang bcas par mngon par sgeg pa'i tshul can no// nub tu glu ma
283b5(rgyud 'grel): ser mo cung zong g.yo zhing sgeg pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ting ting shag 'dzin pa'o// byang du grwar ma ljang gu pang skor gyi tshul la sogs pa'i gar gyis g.yo ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o//
283b6(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan du gling bu ma dmar mo'o// mar pi wang ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis sgrog pa'i nyams kyis cung zad g.yo ba'o// bden bral du mu kun nga ma dkar mo'o// rlung du rdza rnga ma ngu ba'i mdog can te bzhi po 'di rnams ni phya
284a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis rang rang gi rol mo sgrogs pa'o// de nas phyi'i snam bu la me mtshams su me tog ma dkar mo g.yon pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gis me tog gi phreng ba dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// bden bral du bdug
284a2(rgyud 'grel): spos ma du ba'i mdog can g.yon pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gis bdug spos kyi snod rin po che 'dzin pa'o// rlung du mar ma ma gser gyi mdog can khon pa dang g.yas pa'i phyag gis mar me'i mchod sdong dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// dbang
284a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan du dri chab ma dmar mo g.yon pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gis dri'i dung dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o// shAr du ma long ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis me long 'dzin pa'o// lhor ro ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis ro'i snod 'dzin pa'o// nub tu
284a4(rgyud 'grel): rerel bya ma ljang ku phrag gnyis kyis sna tshogs pa'i gos 'dzin pa'o// byang du chos ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyis chos 'byung dkar po 'dzin pa'o// 'di rnams dang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha rnams ni zhal gcig pa sbyin
284a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa rale bo'i tsang pan nag po li thod pa lnga dang 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa/ lha'i na bza' gyon pa skyi la krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa'o// sgo rnams la shar du rdo rje lcags kyu ma na mkha' ltar sngo ba sangs zhal g.yas
284a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dadang cig shos nag po dang dkar po phyag drug gis g.yas pa rnams kyis lcags kyu dang ral gri dang 'khor lo g.yon po rnams kyis zhags pa dang sdigs mdzub dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o// lhor rdo rje zhags pa me dkar ser zhal
284b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa dang cig shos nag po dang dmar po phyag gis g.yas pa rnams kyis zhags pa dang rdo rje dang ral gri/ g.yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang dril bu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa'o// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dmar mo zhal
284b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa dang cig shos nag po dang dkar po phyag drug gi g.yas pa rnams kyis lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dang ral gri/ g.yon pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang dril bu dang lcags kyu'o// byang du rdo rje dril bu ma ljang ku zhal g.yas pa dang cig shos nag
284b3(rgyud 'grel): po dang dkar po phyag dug gi g.yas pa rnams kyis dril bu dang rdo rje dang ral gri/ g.yon pa rnams kyi se 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang zhags pa'o// bzhi po 'di rnams ni zhal re re zhing spyan gsum gsum pa dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhi du gyen
284b4(rgyud 'grel): brdzes pa/ thod pa lnga dang 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i gos can zhabs g.yas brkyang zhing g.yon bskum pa'i gar gyis sna tshogs pad+ma dang thod pa dang nyi mA la bzhugs pa'o// rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'ong
284b5(rgyud 'grel): dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang thod pa dang nyi ma la ste lha gzhan thams cad sna tshogs pad+ma dang thod pa dang zla ba la gnas pa'o// thams cad kyang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa nyid po/ 'i drir rdo rje sems
284b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' kho na yum dang bcas pa ste lha gzhan thams cad ni yum med pa'o zhes pa ni phyogs gcig go// rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab dang bcas pa ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bdag po ni rdo sems dpa'i la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
285a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams dang mA mra kI dang sgra rdo rje ma dang glu mya dang reg bya rdo rje mu dang chos dbyings rdo rje ma rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o// spyan ma dang rdo rje drag mo dang sa rdo rje mu dang me tog ma dang bzhad ma dang gling bu ma dang me long
285a2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang rdo rje lcags kyu ma rnams kyi rnam par snang mdzad do// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje gzugs ma dang bdug spos ma dang sgeg ma dang pi wang ma dang rdo rje zhags pa ma rnams kyi rin chen 'byung ldan no// gos dkar mo dang 'dod chags
285a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ma dang / mar me ma dang dri chab ma dang mu kun da ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma rnams kyi snang ba mtha' yas so// sgrol ma dang rdo rje zhi ba ma dang rdo rje gnod sbyin mo dang / gar mkhan ma dang ro ma dang / rdza rnga ma dang rdo rje dril bu mya
285a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni dkyil 'khor la dgod pa'i rim pas/ hUM buM AM hrIHkhaM d+hA hUM d+hIHtrAM/ aM I I AM AM aM aHr-i haM AM r-I laM saM khaM gaM/ bai r-i nai raM au au
285a5(rgyud 'grel): oM oM dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'i sngags ni oM badz+ra a mr-i ta ma hA su kha hUM/ zhes pa'o// rdo rje dril bu mo'i oM AHbadz+ri gat+taM heHhaM swA hA/ zhes paM ste las thams cad pa'i sngag so// rdzogs pa'i
285a6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa'i rnal 'byor la 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi snying po'i sngags nyid kyis lha gzhan rnams kyi snying po'i sngags kyi bsgrub bya yang 'grub pa ste/ de rnams ni ma bris te gzhung mangs pas 'jigs paso// de bzhin du snga ma
285b1(rgyud 'grel): dang phyi ma rnams la rig par bya'o// / ye shes 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nung ngu sna tshogs pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su gdugs dkar po dang bcas pa'i seng
285b2(rgyud 'grel): ge l-i gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sngon mo ste 'di'i cod pan dar gyis bcings pa'i steng du rdo rjes mtshan zhing sangs rgyas lnga 'phro bas brgyan pa rtsa ba'i zhal khro zhing gang rgyangs dang bcas
285b3(rgyud 'grel): ba gAyas dkar zhing bzhang ba dang bcus pa g.yon dmar zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa phyag g.yas pa gsum nu steng du gnas pa'i wang+ga dang dgra sta dang rdo rje g.yon pa gsum na dril bu dang
285b4(rgyud 'grel): khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang ral gri'o// 'di'i shar phyogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo sgeg pa'i nyams can dang / byang du mi bzang mkha' 'gro mi gser gyi mdog can dang / nub tu ro langs ma sngon mo dang / lhoraru gtum
285b5(rgyud 'grel): mo dmar po ste bzhi po 'di rnams kyang seng ge la gnos pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la bzhugs pa/ g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gnyis kyis steng du bsgreng ba'i kha TAng+ga dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin
285b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// dbang ldan du seng ge mo seng ge'i gdong pa can g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i lus phyed phyed dkar po dang ser po glang po che dkar po la gnas pa'o// mer stag mo stag gis gdong pa can g.yon pa dang g.yas
286a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lus phyed phyed sngon po dang dkar po rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po la'o// bden bral du lce spyang mo lce sbrang gi gdong ba can g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i lus byed phyed nag po dang dmar po ma he la'o// nub tu 'ug pa me 'ug
286a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdong can g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i lus byed phyed ser po dang / dmar po klu brgyad kyi mjug ma la'o// bzhi po 'di rnams ni g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pas brgyan
286a3(rgyud 'grel): cing sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// de nas sgo rnams la shar du rgyal ba'i dbang phyug ma dkar mo phyag gnyis kyi thal mo khar bcug pa'o// byang du gsal byed ma ser mo mar me lta bu'i thal mo sbyar ba spyi bor 'dzin pa'o//
286a4(rgyud 'grel): nub tu 'jig byed mo dmar mo khrag gis bkang b.ri snyim pa steng du bkan pa kha'i thang kar gzung nas khrag gi rgyun 'thung bar byed pa'o// lhor kaM po dzI nag mo rdo rje'i snyim pa la mthe bong gi rtse me gnyis phan tshun sbyar te sdigs mdzub
286a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi mdzub mo btung bsgyur nas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhug pas rang gi b+ha ga ston par byed pa'o// ban po 'ang rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i yi dwags kyi snying kar nyi ma la bzhugs pa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la
286a6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bcu gnyis ni zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa'o// lha mo bcu gsum po thams cad kyang lha'i rin po che dang lha'i gos dang dbu la thod pa lnga'i phreng ba can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa sems dpa'i skyil krung can klu'i rgyal
286b1(rgyud 'grel): po brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes pa/ bskal pa'i mtha'i me 'bar ba'i 'od lta bu'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'bar zhing 'jig su rung ba ste go rim ji lta ba bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang rtags pa dang / rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas
286b2(rgyud 'grel): drung don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'ongad dpag med dang rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas pa/ don yod grub pa rnams kyis btab pa'o// hUM nA nA hrI hUM AM IM ra~M
286b3(rgyud 'grel): e oM aH/ zhes pa 'di rnam sa ni thugs ka'i sa bon no// oM hrIHswA hA/ zhes pa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po'o// oM bet+tA lI hUM swA hA/ zhes pa ni ro langs ma'i ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so// // bcoM bdun gyi bdag
286b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kye'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi snying por gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbusu sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte ba la gnas pa'i ro'i snying gar khrag gis gang ba'i thob pa'i steng du nyi ma la gnas pa'i
286b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum ste bzhi pa ni re dang bral ba'o// de la 'jig rten gsum kum tu bskyod pa nag po sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pathod pa lnga dang phyag rgya drug dang mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng bas brgyan
286b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rgyab kyi char stag gi lpags pa'i smad g.yogs can zhabs g.yon pa'i brla la zhabs g.yas pa'i sen mo yang dag par bzhag po'i skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa/ dmar le zlumo pa'i sbyin gsum dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig pa
287a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis pa phyag g.yon gyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i thod pa khrag gis gang ba 'dzin pas 'chang par 'gyur ba'i gzugs can gyi bdag med ma la 'khyud pa phyag g.yas kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa dbyug pa brdeg pa'i
287a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul du 'dzin pa'o// yang phyag bzhi pa ni phyag gnyis pa lta bu ste phyag gzhan pa gnyis kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje phag mo la yang dag par 'khyud pa'o// zhes pa ni khyad par ro// yang phyag drug pa ni nag po dang dkar po dang / dmar
287a3(rgyud 'grel): po'i zhal gsum pa zhal re re zhing spyan gsum gsum dang ldan pa rol pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dril bu dang gzhu dang thod pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang mda' dang rtse gsum 'dzin pa rdo rje
287a4(rgyud 'grel): dril bu dang ldan pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rung dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje lu gu brgyud ma la yang dag par 'khyud pa ste gzhan ni ji ltar rigs par snga ma bzhin no// de ltar he ru ka gsum gyi shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma brgyad la rdo rje drag
287a5(rgyud 'grel): ma la sogs pa brgyad do// 'di dag gi phyi rol du dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams gling bu ma dang pi wang ma dang mu kun dam dang rdza rnga ma'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang rdo rje zhags pa ma
287a6(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje phyags sgrog ma dang rdo rje dril bu ma'o// lha mo bcu drug po 'di dag ni gong gi dang 'dra ba la yab dang bral ba'o// he ru kaM gsum gyi rigs kyi bdal po ni mi bskyong ba ste thugs ka res bi na ni hU~M ngo // snying po'i sngags ni
287b1(rgyud 'grel): oM AHhUM hrIHswA hA zhes pa'o// so so'i sngags ni rim pa ji lta bu bzhin du/ oM trai lokyA Ak+She pa huM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo huM huM huM phaT swA hA/ oM ki Ti ki Ti badz+ra hUM huM huM pha// zhes pa'o// // kye'i rdo rje bzhi pa ni phyag bcu
287b2(rgyud 'grel): drug pa ste mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa bdag med ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o// 'on kyang 'di la gong du bshad pa'i ro'i gnas su bdu de bzhi ste/ de'ang phung po'i bdud kyi ngo bo tshangs pa ser po dang nyon mongs pa'i bdud
287b3(rgyud 'grel): khyab 'jug nag po dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud dbang phyug dkar po dang / lha'i bu'i bdud dbang po dmar ser ro// de rnams la bco ma ldan 'das kyi zhabs bzhi'i gnyis kyis skyil krung byed pa dang gzhan pa dag gis g.yon
287b4(rgyud 'grel): bskum zhing g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ sku mdog nag blo nas sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa dang smad g.yogs kyi bar sngar bshang ba'i khyad bar dang ldan pa/ zhal brgyad pa spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa/ rtsa zhal nag po gang
287b5(rgyud 'grel): mo can g.yas dkar po g.yon dmar po steng ma mche ba gtsigs pa lhag ma rnams nag po'o// phyag g.yas pa rnams na rdo rje dang ral sri dA mda' dang / 'khor lo dang thod bar dbyug pa dang / rtse gsum dang lcags kyu dang / g.yon
287b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams na dril bu dang pad+ma dang gzhu dang kha T+Tang+ga bsgreng ba dang thod pa dang rin po che dang / sdigs mdzub dang zhag/ sa pa'o// shar gyi 'dab ma la gau ri dmar ser phyag g.yas pa gnyis na mnga' phyung ba dang rdo rje gri gug/ g.yon
288a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na san+d+ha dang ro hi tu dang bcas pa'i thong pa khrag gis gang ba'o// lhor chom rgyun ma dmar mo rdo rje dang Da myu ru dang lcags kyu dang phag pa dang bcas pa'i thong pa khrag gis gang ba can no// nub tu ro langs ma
288a2(rgyud 'grel): dkAr ser ral gri dang ru sbrul dang bcas pa'i thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang / chang gis gang ba'i thong pa dang dri chus gang ba'i thod pa can no// drung du d+ha sma rI ljang ku cung zad ser ba rkang mar gyis lang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i sbrul dang ma
288a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i me thab dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dgra sta can no// dbang ldan du puk+ka sI ser mo sha chen gyis gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i seng ge dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang dpag pasam gyi shing gi yal ga
288a4(rgyud 'grel): ngadang rin po che tson no// mer ri khrod ma dkar mo khu bas gang ba'i thod pa la gnas pa'i dge slong dang rdo rje dang kha TAng+tha dang zhags pa'o// bden bral du gtum mo sngon mo g.yas pa na khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa la stag dang / g.yon na pad+ma
288a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang phyag gnyis na rlung ras can no// rlung du g.yung mo nag mo chang gi thod pa dang rtse gsum dang bdud rtsi lnga'i thod pa la gnas pa'i lce sbrang dang thong gshol can no// 'di dag gi phyi rol gyi mtshams rnamasu gling bu ma la sogs
288a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi snga ma bzhin no// sgo rnams la sha ra du rta gdong ma nag mo ste zhal rnams ni nag po dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / steng du rta'i gdong pa ljang ku'o// lhor phag gdong ma ser mo ste zhal rnams ni ser po dang nag
288b1(rgyud 'grel): bo dang dkar po dang steng du phag gi gdong ba dmar po'o// nub tu khyi gdong ma dmar mo ste zhal rnams ni dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po dang steng du khyi'i gdong pa ser po'o// byang du seng ge gdong mA ljang ku ste zhal rnams ni ljang gu dang nag
288b2(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar po steng du seng ge'i gdong pa dmar po'o// 'dir rtsa bo dang g.yas pa dang cig shos dang steng gi rim pas zhal bzhi pa'o// sgo skyong ma rnams phyag bzhi ma rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhin du phyag mtshan 'dzin pa sna tshogs su
288b3(rgyud 'grel): skyes dang khrag gis gang ba'i thong pa dang ro'i steng du g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar zhing brdzes pa'o// lha gzhan rnams ni skyil krung phreng ba can/ thams cad kyang zhal re re zhing spyan gsum
288b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa yab meng pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo // snying po'i sngags ni oM de ba bi tsu badz+ra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa'o// g+hasma ri'i oM oM swA hA/ zhes pa ste las thams cad
288b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags so// // bdag med ma'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi snying por gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs ting+ge'i lte bar bdag med ma sti shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi 'dab mar rdo rje ma
288b6(rgyud 'grel): dang dkar mo dang chu ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams so// rim pa gnyis par sna tshogs pad+ma rnams la shar la sogs pa rnams kyi shar la sogs par gau ri dang chom rkun ma dang ro langs ma dang g+hasma ri rnams te/ dbang ldan
289a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs par puk+ka sI dang ri khrong ma dang gtum mo dang gsung mo rnams so// bangag med ma'i steng du shar mi ngos kyi chu skyes la gnas pa'i mkha' sbyong ma ste steng zhal can no// 'og tu nub kyi ngos kyis badz+ra
289a2(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i sa sbyong ma ste 'og can no// 'di phyi rim la gnas pa'i go ri la sogs pa brgyad ni phyag bcu drag pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du ser po la sogs pa'i mdog can te gzhan bdun ni sngon mo'o// bco lnga po yang skyil
289a3(rgyud 'grel): kruklung phreng bas ro dang zla ba la gnas pa zhal gcigs pa spyan gsum dmar bang bu skra dmar si raM gyen du brdzes pa stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can phyag bzhi ma g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang gri gug/ g.yon pa
289a4(rgyud 'grel): ngag gis thod pa dang steng du bsgreng ba'i kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ dbu la thod ba lnga'i phreng ba can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o// mtshams rnamasu gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi ni snga ma bzhin du'o// sgo rnams la shar du rta gdong ma dkar
289a5(rgyud 'grel): sngo dang lhor phag gdong ma ser sngo dang nub tu khyi gdong ma dmar sngo dang khyad du seng gdong ma ljang sngo ste bzhi po 'di rnams kyang g.yas brkyang zhing g.yon bskum pas nyi ma la gnas pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis
289a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa ming dang rjesu mthun pa'i zhal gcig ma kha dog gnyis gnyis dang ldan pa/ khyad par gzhan rnams ni bdag meng ma dang mtshungs pa/ bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams ni go rom ji lta
289b1(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhin du mi bskyong ba dang rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang mi bskyod pa dang rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas dang mi bskyod pa dang rtag pa dang rin chen dang
289b2(rgyud 'grel): po dang snang ba mtho' yas dang rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa ste/ gli nga bu ma la sogs pa dang rta gdong ma la sogs pa rnams la rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas dang /
289b3(rgyud 'grel): don yod grub pa rnams kyis so// bdag ming ma'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni oM ste i oM swA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po'o// oM oM swA hA/ zhes pa ni g+hasma rI'iri s+t+waM las thams cad pa'i sngags so// ya bdag med ma la
289b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa lha mo bco lnga'i dkyil 'khor te/ nga yang lha mo thams cad sku mdog nag mo g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa mchod phyir thigs pa can kha T+Tang+ga dang bcas
289b5(rgyud 'grel): ste gzhan rnams ni snga me bzhin no// oM AHbadz+ra g+hasma rI oM hUM swA hA/ zhes pa g+hasma rI'i sngags te las thams cad pa'o// // gang gi tshe dkyil 'khor gyi dbang mo ku ru kul+ler gyur pa ni sku mdog dmar
289b6(rgyud 'grel): mo phyag ba'i ma g.yas pa ngag gis mnga' dang lcags kyu/ g.yon pa ngag gis ut+pal dmar po dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa snang ba mtha' yas kyis rigs kyi bdag po byas pa'o/
290a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ma la sogs pa ban+d+ha bzhi'ang sku mdog dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste/ bco lnga po thams cad kyang pad+ma dmar po dang ro'i snyi par zla ba la skyil klu byed pas gnas pa'o// ku ru
290a2(rgyud 'grel): kul+le'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni hrIH'o// oM ku ru kul+le d+hI swAhA/ snying po'o// gzhan ni sgyu ma bzhin du gyur pa de'i tshe ku ru kul+le'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro// / rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i gur gyi nang du myos
290a3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung gi snying por gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte bar zla ba la dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi sems dpa'i skyil krung can me tog pr-i yang ku lta bur sngo bsangs rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi
290a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum me tog pr-i yang lta bur sngo bsangs dang dkar po dang dmar po'o// sna tshogs pa'i lag gdub dang rkang gdub la sogs pa dang gos rnams kyis brgyan pa/ phyag drug pa rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis
290a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis rang 'od kyi shes rab la 'khyud pa g.yas pa dag gis 'khor lo dang ral gri dang g.yon pa dag gis zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa 'ong dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ zhi ba dang sgeg pa'i nyams kyi phung po can no// 'dab
290a6(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams la shar du zhi ba mo dkar mo dkar ba dang nag pa dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo// lhor zhi gdong ma ser mo ser ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo// nub tu zla ldan ma dmar mo dmar ba dang gnag
290b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang dkar ba'i zhal gsum mo// byang du ri bong can ma ljang gu ldang ba drang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo// mer zla dkyil ma sngon mo sngo ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo// bden bral du zla chas ma ma
290b2(rgyud 'grel): tog pr-i yang ku ltar sngo bsangs sngo bsangs dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo// rlung du yid 'ong ma ut+pal sngon po'i mdog can sto ba dang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo// dbang ldan du yid tshim par byed
290b3(rgyud 'grel): ma gser gyi mdog can ser ba drang dkar ba dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo// lha mo 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbang phyug lta bu'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ 'on kyang 'khor lo'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// zla tshes
290b4(rgyud 'grel): ma ni zla ba'i cha gcig 'dzin pa'o// rim pa gnyis par dbang ldan gyi mtsham su ma tog ma dkar mo dkar ba dang gnag pa deng dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo// mar das spos ma du ba'i mdog can du dkar ba'i mdog dang dkar
290b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang dmar ba'i zhal gsum mo// bden bral du mar me ma gser gyi mdog can ser ba dang dkar ba dang gnag pa'i zhal gsum mo// rlung du dri chab ma dmar mo dmar pa dang dkar bu dang gnas pa'i zhal gsum mo// 'di
290b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du g.yas kyi phyag dang phos me tog gi za ma tog dang spos phor dang mar me'i mchod sdong dring dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa ste phyag lhag ma rnams kyis ni gtse ba'i phyag mtshan no// de nas shar ya
291a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i snam bu la gling bu ma dang pi wang ma dang mu kun+d+ra ma dang rdza rnga ma rnams kyi dmar mo dang ser mo dang dkar mo dang du ba'i mdog can zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis ma gling bu la sogs pa'i sgra sgrogs par
291a2(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa'o// go rnams la shAr du khro gnyer rim par ldan na mkha' ltar sngo bsangs na mkha' ltar sngo ba sangs dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal gsum pa'o// lhor 'jigs sdig dkar ba dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i
291a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum pa'o// nub tu rta'i gzugs dmar po dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po'i zhal gsum pa'o// byang du tshogs kyi gtso bo ljang ku ljang ku dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhes gsum pa'o// 'di rnams ni 'gying ba'i khro ba
291a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gying pa'i rkang stabs kyis bzhugs pa 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ khyad par ni phyag g.yas kyi dang pos rim pa ji lta bar lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrol dang dril bu 'dzin pa mche bcung
291a5(rgyud 'grel): zad gtsigs pa'o// 'dir ni 'khor lo'i dbang po'i gzugs sa btsun de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa'i cong pan no// de las gzhan pa'i lha nyi shu po rnams ni rdo rje bdud rtsi dang po tis
291a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'i rin po che'i cod pan zla ba la gnas pa/ gtso bo lta bur rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che la soms pas brgyan pa'o// me tog la sogs pa bcu gnyis po rnams kyi zla ba'i rab tu sna tshogs pad+ma'o//
291b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni haHso// oM haHbadz+ra a mr-i ta swA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po ste las thams cad pa yang 'di nyid do// rdo rje bdud rtsi gzhan gsum 'di ltar rnam par bsgom pa'i rim pa ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud las
291b2(rgyud 'grel): rig bIr+ya bya skye mangs pas 'jigs nas 'dir ma bshad // / pad+ma'i bdag nyid he ru ka bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos kyi 'byung gnas la gzhal yas khang ngo // phyag bcu drug pa la slar yang 'jas
291b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i srung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa yang yo zhes pa ni phyogs gnyis pa'o// gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte ba'i steng du gan rkyal du gnas pa'i tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug
291b4(rgyud 'grel): dang dbang phyug dang dbang po ste bdung bzhi'i rang bzhin can gyi snying kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i zhabs bzhi pa gcer bu gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa zhabs gnyis skyil krung byed pa dang gzhan gnyis g.yon bskum zhing g.yas
291b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyang ba'i gar stabs can sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbu ske dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ dpral ba'i steng du mi mgo skam po lngas brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can skra mdog nal po phyag bcu drage pa gang rgyangs
291b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i zhal brgyad pa zhal re re la dmar zhing zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum yod pa rtsa ba'i zhal nag po g.yas pa rnams dkar po dang nag po dang nag gi g.yon pa rnam sa dmar po dang nag po dang nag po/ steng ma
292a1(rgyud 'grel): du ba'i mdog can rnam par 'gyur ba/ zhal thams cad smin ma 'khyog po dang bcas pa khro gnyer can mche ba'i myu gu gtsigs pa phyag g.yas pa brgyad kyi thod pa rnams na glang po che dang rta dang bong bu dang glang dang rnga
292a2(rgyud 'grel): mo dang mi dang sha ram+b+ha dang byi la rnams dang / g.yon pa brgyad kyi thod pa rnams na sa dang chu dang rlung dang me dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang gshin rje dang nor sbyin rnams 'dzin pa/ 'khor lo dang rna chu dang mgul rgyan dang lag gdub dang ska
292a3(rgyud 'grel): rags dang thal chen rnams dang mi mgo rlon pa khrag 'dzag pa lnga bcu'i do shal can dpung rgyan dang rkang gdubu rnams kyis brgyan pa'o// 'di'i yum ni bdag med ma nag mo gcer bu gri gug dang thod par ldan pa'i phyag g.yas
292a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang g.yon pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par 'khyung ba/ g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang ba'i gar stabs can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig ma mche ba gtsigs ma dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum dang
292a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa/ dpral ba'i mtshams su thod pa lngas brgyan pa/ mgrin par mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba 'phyang ba rkang gdub la sogs pas brgyan pa'o// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi
292a6(rgyud 'grel): 'deb mar gnas pa'i tshangs pa dang dbang po dang nye dbang dang dral po rnams kyi snying ka'i steng du zla ba la gau rI la sogs pa ste dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab mar gnas pa'i gshin rje dang lus ngan dang srin po dang thag bzangs
292b1(rgyud 'grel): ris rnams kyi snying ka'i steng du zla ba la puk+ka sI la sogs pa'o// de la gau rI nag mo g.yas pa na gri gug dang g.yon pa na nya ro hi ta 'dzin pa'o// chom rkun ma dmar mo phyag g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis DA ma ru dang phal pa
292b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// ro langs ma gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis ru sbal dung pad+ma'i stong 'dzin pa'o// g+hasma rI ljang ku phyag g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis sbrul dang rnal 'byor gyi snod 'dzin pa'o// puk+ka sI
292b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon mo phyag g.yas pa dang g.yon pa ngag gis sing ge dang dgra sta 'dzin pa'o// ri khrod ma dkar mo phyag g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis dge slong dang gsil byed 'dzin pa'o// gtum mo na mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag g.yas
292b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang thong gshol 'dzin pa'o// g.yung mo sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag g.yas pa dang g.yon dag gis rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa'o// brgyad po 'di rnams ni skyil krung byed pa'i gar
292b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis bzhugs pa ste/ khyad par gzhan rnams ni sngar brjod pa'i bdag med ma bzhin no// rigs kyi bdag po nr-i he ru ka dang bdag med ma dag gi mi bskyod pa'o// gau rI la sogs pa rnams kyi mi bskyod ba dang rnam par snang mdzad dang
292b6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas te puk+ka sI la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo // / yang phyag gnyis pa dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gyur pa na g.yas pas rdo rje gyen du 'byar zhing g.yon pas rdo rje thod pa 'dzin pas
293a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag med ma la 'khyud pa/ kha T+Tang+ga yang dpung pa g.yon pa la brten pa'o// yang phyag rgya bzhi pa 'khor lo'i dbang phyug tu gyur pa na/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje sngon po dang g.yon pas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa/ phyag
293a2(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma ngag gis rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa'o// // yang phyag drug pa 'khor lo'i dbang por gyur pu na rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'o zhal gsum sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po phyag g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang gri gug dang
293a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa dag gis rtse gsum dang dril bu 'dzin pa/ lhag ma dgo gIs rdo rje lu gu rgyud mU la 'khyud pa ste/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma ni sku mdog dang zhal dang phyag la sogs pa bdag med mu la mtshungs par yan lag med pa'i rdo rje'i zhabs kyis gsung
293a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa 'di rnams sna tshogs chu skyes kyi ze'u 'bru la r-i'i snying ka ra nyi ma la skyil krung phyed pa'i ger stabs mdzad pa/ mi bskyod pas rgyus btab sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/
293a5(rgyud 'grel): mi mgo lngas brgyan pa/ smin ma 'khyol pa dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ phyag bcu drug po bzhin du 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa'o// go rI la sigs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis bskor+yA ba'o// lha mo thams cad ni tha
293a6(rgyud 'grel): dadang bral ba ste rdo rje phag mo dang rdo rje lu gu rgyud la ni mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa'o// kye'i rdo rje rnam pa bzhi'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM // oM de ba pi tsu badz+ra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa ni phyag bcu drug pa'i snying po'o// oM trai lokya Ak+She pa hUM hUM hUM phaT swa
293b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni phyug gnyis pa'i'o// oM dz+wA la dz+wa lU b+h+yo nu hUM hUM phaT ces pa phyag bzhi pa'i 'o// oM ki Ti ki Ti bar+d+ha n+yA hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pa phyag drug pa'i 'o// oM AHbadz+ra g+hasmA rI oM hUM swAn+tu/ zheswA pa ni g+hasmA rI'iSh+Ti ste las thams cad pa'o// / sgra
293b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gyur gyi nang du gnas pa ni chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khong ste/ kha cig ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'acu sa par gzhal yas kha'i ngi zhes so// gzhal yAs khang gi dbus su pad+ma dmar po 'ang ba ma
293b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyud bu'i lte bar nyi sA lA sgyu ma chen po las byung ba'i hUM ru ka nag po nyi ma'i 'od zer can 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa 'gying ba'i khro bo dbu skra ngamar ser 'bar zhing chen du brdzes pa/ thod pa'i cod pan can rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang rgyab
293b4(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon pa lenal ba ni sngo po dang ser po dang dkar po dad ljang ku zhal re re la da mar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum pa phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis thong pa dang mnga'// g.yon pa dag gyis kha Tang+ga dang ga'u 'dzin pa/ phyug ban+de
293b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa/ mi'i lpags de'i nA bza' 'dzin pa/ skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs ba'o// dpal ldan sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog dmar mo dmar po pad+ma ser po dang dkar po dang ljang ku'i zhal can grwatsepo wA
293b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha 'dzin pa/ phyag gnyis kyis de'i mgul nas 'khyud po'o// 'dab ma rnams la shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sngon mo sngon mo dang ser po dang dkar po dang ljang ku'i zhal can dza 'thod pa dang dril bu dang kha TAng+ga 'dzin pa'o// lhor rin chen
294a1(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma ser mo ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po dang ljang ku'i zhal can/ rin po che'i pa Tu dang rtse gsum dang mgrin pa btsir ba'i lce sbrang ngang ba dan 'dzin pa'o// nub tu pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo dkar po dang
294a2(rgyud 'grel): ser po dang sngon po dang ljang ku'i zhal can sna tshogs pad+ma dang mnga' dang thod pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// byang du sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma ljang ku ljang ku dang ser po dang dkar po dang sngon po'i zhal can ral gri dang Da ma ru dang zhags pa dang thong
294a3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dzin pa'o// thams cad phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa zla ba'i gdan ngang 'ong can te/ 'di rnams kyi khyad par rnams ni gtso mo lta bu'o// rigs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mi bskyod pa ste/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa
294a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtag pa dang mi bskyod pa dang rin chen dbang po dang gsung gi dbang phyug dang don yod grub pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo // oM hUM hUM snying po'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sog
294a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi oM oM hUM/ oM hUM hUM/ oM swA hUM/ oM A~MHhUM/ oM hA hUM zhes pa ste sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni la se thams cad pa'i'o// // bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thod pa'i lha dgu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni//
294a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte ba la ro'i snying kar nyi ma la shes rab ma dang bral ba'i bcom ldan 'das te sku mdog la sogs pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i
294b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo gsum la gnas pa'i dpal sangs rgyas thod pa bzhin no// shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i 'dab ma rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sna tshogs sde ma dang 'dod ma dang sa 'og na gan pa ma dang legs bzangs ma rnams ni sku
294b2(rgyud 'grel): mdog sngon mo g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang ba/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can/ phyag g.yas pa ngag gis gri gug dang thob pa/ g.yon pa ngag gis kha TAng+ka dang ba ma ru 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan dang me lha dang bden bral dang rlung gi
294b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma rnams la chung 'i tshong ma dang 'byung mo dang phyag bzhi mA dang na mkha' la gnas ma rnams ni ser mo na bza' ser po gyon pa 'od zer ser po 'phro ba/ zhibs gnyis g.yas brkyang zhing g.yon bskum pa klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa/
294b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas pa dag gis gri gug dang Da mai ru/ g.yon pa dag gis kha T+Tang+ga dang pad+ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o// brgyad po 'di rnams kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gar gyi tshul gyis gnas pa/ dbu skra dmar ser 'bar zhing gyen du brdzes pa/ dbu
294b5(rgyud 'grel): lo thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang ldan pa/ phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa/ mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu mgul du 'phyang ba/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa'o// bcom ldan 'das la mi bskyod pa la
294b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sangs rgyas lngas rgyas btab pa ste/ sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa rnams la mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang snang ba mtha' yas rnams kyis so// chang 'tsheng ma la sogs pa rnams kyi
295a1(rgyud 'grel): yang de rnams nyid do// yang na bcom ldan 'das 'di dang phyogs kyi lha mo rnams kyang dkar po ste mtshams kyi lha mo rnams dmar mo'o// 'di ni yum dang bral ba'am yum dang bcas pa'o// // rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil
295a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung la gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma'i steng du g.yon bskum zhing g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs ngag gis 'jigs byed dus mtshan mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten
295a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba khro bo bskal pa'i dus kyi me ltar 'od zer 'bar zhing 'gro ba ma lus pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad rab tu gsol bar mdzad pa/ sku mdog sngon po rnam par 'gyur zhing gang nges pa'i zhal gsum pa
295a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams sngon po dang sngar po dang ljang ku mche ba gtsigs shing rab tu gtum pa/ ljags 'gril zhing shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhal re re zhing dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum gsum pa smin ma g.yo
295a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang bcas pa'i khyo gnyer can 'bral ba'i steng ni thod pa lha'i phreng ba dang ldan pa/ khragu 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phre ba mgul par 'phyang ba/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa/ klu mtha' yas sngon pos dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba
295a6(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa/ 'jog po dmar pos rna rgyan byas pa/ pad+ma chen po pad+ma'i rtsa ba lte bu dkar pos mgul rgyan byas pa/ stobs kyi rgyu dur ba lta bu ljang kus mtsho de phyir thogs byis pa/ nor rgyas dkar pos ska rags byas pa/ pad+ma dkar
295b1(rgyud 'grel): po kun da'i me tog ltar mdzes pas rkang gdub byas pa/ dung skyong seru bos lag gdub byas pa/ rigs ldan du ba lta bu khra bos dpung rgyan byas pa/ rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa/ rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa'i phyag dag gis 'jig rten
295b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pas rang dang 'odra ba'i shes rab ma la snyoms par 'jug pa/ byig g.yas pa dag gis lcags kyu dang zhags pa/ g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang kha T+Tad+hA 'dzin pa'o// 'di'i shar phyogasu rdo rje
295b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa sngon po rtsu ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams sngon po dang ser po dang ljang ku/ phyag g.yos pa dag gis rdo rje tho ba dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gyen du 'phyar ba/ g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang kha TAng+ga 'dzin
295b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ byung du rdo rje nyi ma ser po dang sngon po dang ljang ku'i zhal can/ phyag dang pos rdo rje dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i lta bu'i ste 'tshod par 'gyur ba gzhan rnams kyang ngo // nu br-i tu rdo rje
295b5(rgyud 'grel): gtsus tir dmar po dmar po dang dkar po dang ljang ku'i zhal can phyog na pad+ma dmar po'o// lhor rdo rje 'khyil pa ljang ku ljang gu dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal can phyag ni sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// mer rdo rje gnod sbyin du bo'i me
295b6(rgyud 'grel): can du ba'i mdog dang ser po dang ljang ku'i zhal can lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// bden bral du rdo rje dus dam mo dmar po dang ser po dang ljang ku'i zhal can phyag na dgra sta'o// rlung du nag po chen po sngon po sngon po dang ser po dang ljang
296a1(rgyud 'grel): ku'i zhal can phyag na rtse gsum mo// dbang ldan du rdo rje 'jigs rung nag po mig yon nag po dang ser po dang ljang ku'i zhal can phyag na ral gri'o// rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs pa brgyad po 'di rnams ni go rim ji lta ba bzhin
296a2(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje mthar byed dang shes rab mthar byed dang pad+ma mthar byed dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang dbyug sngon can dang stobs po che dang mi g.yo ba rnams kyi ming gzhan no// steng du gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba dkar po
296a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang sngon po dang ljang ku'i zhal can phyag na 'khor lo'o// 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og gnod mdzes kyi ming gi rnam grangs can sngon po sngon po dang ser po dang ljang ku'i zhal can phyag nA rol pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje'i gtun shing ste/ 'di'i
296a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yon pa na klu'i zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa dang kha TAng+tha'o// rdo rje dbyug pa la sogs pa'i khro bo 'di rnams phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo dang thod pas mtshan pa'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa/ dbu skra
296a5(rgyud 'grel): domar ser 'bar zhing gyen du 'khyil ba/ rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po'i cod pan mdzes par brgyan pa/ smin ma g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i khro gnyer can zhal mche ba gcigaso ba/ zhal re re la dmar zhing zlum pa'i spyan gsum pA/ ma~M
296a6(rgyud 'grel): mgo'i phreng ba dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa dang klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma rnams la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong brgyad dang / steng du tshangs pa dang 'og tu thag bzangs ris rnam sa mnan pa'i g.yas
296b1(rgyud 'grel): brkyang lIs bcugs pa rang gi rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas btab pA ste 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsi bas bcu pa'i 'khor lo dzaM lta ba bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi thugs ka'i sa 'on ni hU~M ho// oM kha badz+ra d+h+r-i ka badz+ra /
296b2(rgyud 'grel): ces pa ni snying pa'o// oM badz+ra kuN+Da li badz+ra hUM phaT ces pa ni rdo rje 'khyil pa'i sngags ti las thams cad pa'o// yang na shwar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang mtshams dang steng dang 'og tu sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma rnams la g.yas skor gyis
296b3(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje mthar byed la stsogs pa'i khro bo bcu ste 'di thams cad kyi gnas dang sku mdog la sogs pa ni bsdus pa'i rim pa'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin no// yang na bdam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtsibs bcu pa'i
296b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo ji lta bo bzhin no// yang na dpal kun tu kha sbyor gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin no// phyogs 'di gsum ka la yang oM AHpim+ban+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ ces pa ni bgegs mthar byed kyi sngags te las thams cad
296b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// // bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes kyi ze'u 'bru la sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte bar gnas pa'i la/ zhal yas khang gi dbus su bcom ldan 'ongs te g.yas brkyang gi zhabs
296b6(rgyud 'grel): dag gis sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba'i steng du nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa/ sku mdog nag po shar dang byang la sogs pa'i zhal ni nag po dang ljang ku dang dmar po dang ser po'o// zhal re re la spyan gsum
297a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can phyag bcu gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bur bcas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa/ phyag gnyis kyis rgyab tu glang po che dkar po de lpags paphral dang bcas pa rgyangs
297a2(rgyud 'grel): nas 'dzin pa/ de dag las gzhan pa'i phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis Da ma ru dang dgra sta dang gri gul dang rtse gsum po dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha TAd+d+ha dang khrag gis gang ba'i thob pa dang rdo rje khags pa dang tshangs
297a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mgo bo 'dzin pa/ 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul du 'byung ba/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa mi'i rgyus pa'i mchong phyir thogs byas pa dpral ba'i steng du med pa lnga dang ldan pa/ nor bu dang g.yon ngos su gnas pa'i zla ba
297a4(rgyud 'grel): phyed pa dang sna tshogs rdo rje rnams kyis mnan po'i rol pa'i thor cig ni ga po can/ rnam par 'gyur zhing gdangs pa'i zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ gar gyi nyams dgu'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o// rdo rje phag mo ni dmar mo zhal gcig ma sbyan
297a5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa skra'i tshogs grol ba gcer bu thod pa'i dum bus rkeng pa'i rgyan byas pa/ 'khyud pa'i phyag gis gzung ba'i thod pa khrag gis gang ba 'dzag pa'i rgyun gtso bo'i zhal du stobs pa/ sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i rdo rje steng du
297a6(rgyud 'grel): 'phyar bas gdug pa can rnams bsdigs pa/ khrag dang bral ba'i mi mgo skam po'i phreng ba can/ nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ cung zad bzhad pa zla mtshan 'bab pa dang bcas shing ba spu gyen du langs
297b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de nas shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams la ga yon skor gyis dang me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams la g.yas skor gyis dgod par bya'o// de la phyogs kyi 'dab ma rnams su mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang dum
297b2(rgyud 'grel): skyes ma dang gzugs can ma rnams ni nag mo dang ljang ku dang dmar mo dang ser mo'i mdog can zhal gcig ma spyan gsum mA skra grol ba/ phyag bzhi ma g.yon pa ngag gis kha T+Tang+ga dang thed pa dang / g.yas pa drug gis
297b3(rgyud 'grel): Do ma ru dang gri gug 'dzin pa g.yas brkyang gi gnas pa'o// mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la byang chub kyi sems dang wa~M gA dang bdud rtsi dang sgron ma lha rnams grub pa'i dngul chu lta bu'i bdud rtsir gyur pas gang ba'i pad+ma'i snong
297b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams te/ yang na bzhi char yang bdud rtsi ltas gang ba'o// de nas thugs kyi 'khor lo la rtsi bos rnams shar du tho da ba'i dum bu dang rab tu gtum mo// byung du keng rus chen po dang gtum pa'i ming can ma/ nub tu keng rIsna
297b5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'od ldan mA/ lhor+ya mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang sna chen mo// mer chang dgra dang brtan pa'i blo can ma/ bden bral du 'od dpag med dang mi'u thung ma/ rlung du rdo rje'i 'od dang lang ka'i dbang phyug ma/ dbang ldan du rdo rje'i
297b6(rgyud 'grel): sku dang shing grib mo'o// rim pa de bzhin du gsung gi 'khor lo la myu gu can dang se srungs ma dang rdo rje ral pa can dang 'jigs byed chen mo dang dpa' bo chen pa dang rlung gi shugs can ma dang rdo rje hUM mdzad dang chang 'thung
298a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang shin tu bzang mo dang sngo sangs lha mo dang rdo rje bzang po dang shin tu bzang mo dang 'jigs byed chen po dang rta sna ma dang mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma'o// de bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor la stobs po che dang
298a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang rin chen rdo rje dang dum skyes ma dang rta mgrin dang chang 'tshong ma dang namakha'i snying po dngango 'khor lo'i gro cha mi dang / dpal he ru ka dang shin tu dpa' mo dang pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang stobs chen ma dang
298a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad dang 'khor lo sgyur ma dang rdo rje sems dpa' dang brtson 'grus chen mo'o// de la thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams ni zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa rol pa'i thor tshugs can dbral bar gnas
298a4(rgyud 'grel): shing / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dpa' bo'i ngar dpyangs dang ldan pa phyag bzhis 'khyud pa'i phyag gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas kha T+Tang+ga dang g.yas pasau Da ma ru 'dzin pa/ tshangs pa'i srung ba can dpung rgyan dang ldan
298a5(rgyud 'grel): pa mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal can phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa ga las brkyang gis gnas pa'o// rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa drag pa'i gzugs can mu/ skra grol ba gcer bu phyag gnyis
298a6(rgyud 'grel): ma 'khyud pa'i phyag gis thod pa dang g.yas pas gdug pa can bsdigs par byed pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa'o// sgo rnams la khwa gdong ma dang 'ug gdong ma da nga khyi gdong ma dang phag gdang ma la sogs pa rnams ni mkha' 'gro ma
298b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bzhin te 'di rnams kyi zhal nI ming dang rjesu mthun pa'o// mtshams rnams su gAshin rje brtan ma dang gshin rje pho nya mo dang gu shin rje mche ba ma dang gshin rje 'joms ma rnams ni mi'i zhal can te/ g.yas dang grA/
298b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi sku phyed de g.yas dang g.yon gyi lha mo rnams kyi sku dang 'dra ba'o// brgyad po 'di rnams ni ro'i gdun can nyid do// mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad kyang 'dzag pa'i mi mgo'i phreng ba mgul du 'byung ba/ rdo rje'i
298b3(rgyud 'grel): phreng pos dpral ba mtshan pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa ske rags la sgra dang bcas pa'i g.yer kha la sogs pas brgyan pa'o// rigs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mi bskyod pa ste rdo rje phag mo'i rnam por snang mdzad
298b4(rgyud 'grel): dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rin tshun dbang phyug go// thugs dang gsung dang sku'i 'khor lo rnams kyi mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang rtag pa rnams te dam tshig go 'khorI lo la gnas pa rnams kyi ni don yod
298b5(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo // oM shrI badz+ra he haM ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba raM swA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po'o// oM khaN+Da ro hi hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes pa ni dum skyes ma'i sngags te las thams
298b6(rgyud 'grel): cad pa'o// yang na 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa nas gshin rje 'joms pa ma'i mthar thug pa thams cad zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa'o// de la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga thams cad ni 'khyud pa'i g.yas dang g.yon gyi
299a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'o// mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi dang khru gdong ma la sogs pa rnams ni g.yon pas thod pa dang dpung pa la brten pa'i kha Tang+tha dang / g.yas pas Da ma ru 'dzin pa ste gzhan
299a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ni snga ma bzhin no// yang na 'khor lo'i dbang phyug la sogs pa phyag gnyis pa nyid kyi phyogs la ni dpal bde mchog dang rdo rje phal mo gsar gyi mngag can nam yang na sngon pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ni phyag g.yas pa
299a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsor ba mchog tu brtson pa/ g.yon pas thod pa deng khA T+Tang+ga 'dzin pa 'am/ yang na rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud par mdzad pa'o// mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi ni ser mo g.yas pas Da ma ru 'dzin pa'o// thusa?
299a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni nag po rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa ste/ dpa' mo rnams ni dkar mo phyag g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can no// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dmar po pad+ma dang pad+ma'i
299a5(rgyud 'grel): dril bu 'dzin pa ste mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni nag mo g.yas pa pad+ma dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can no// sku'i 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams ni dkar po 'khomo dang 'khor lo'i dril bu 'dzin pa sde lha mo rnams ni dmar mo g.yas
299a6(rgyud 'grel): pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// dpa' bo thams cad yum la 'a khyud par brtson zhing g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa ste/ dpa' mo rnams ni de'i brla gnyis la 'khril ba'i tshul lo// khwa gdong ma la
299b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ni g.yas pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa ste lha mo thams cad phyag g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa'o// gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa ni g.yas pas Da ma ra dang / g.yon pa sdilas mdzub dang bcas pas mi
299b2(rgyud 'grel): mgo 'dzin pa'o// mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams dang khwa gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi g.yon pa na kha T+Tang+ga'o// bcu gnyis po 'di rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa ste gzhan rnams ni snga ma bzhin no zhes pa bde mchog gi
299b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum mo// yang gi tshe 'di rnams la dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa lnga mi bsgom par rdo rje phag mo dkyil 'khor gyi gtse mar gyur po ngo'i tshe rdo rje phag me'i dkyil 'khor gsum mo// rdo rje phab lo'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni baM mo//
299b4(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT ces pa ni snying po'o// bde mchog phyag gnyis pa la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams kyi phyag g.yas su gnas pa'i phyag mtshan ni bri bya'i dkyil 'khor la yang bri bar bya'o// // bcom ldan 'das sangs
299b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thod pa lha nyi shu N+DI lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi snying por gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brkyang ba la gnas pa'i ste tshags chu skyes kyi lci bar ro gan
299b6(rgyud 'grel): kyigyi snying kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka sku mdog nag po skyil krung phyeng ba can gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pas gar mdzad pa zhal gcig pa spyan gsum dam raM la zlum pa byol ba ni pa g.yas padag
300a1(rgyud 'grel): gaus Da mA ru dang gri gug/ g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang kha T+Tang+ga 'dzin pa phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa mi mgo rlon pa lnga bcu'i ngo shal mgrin pa la 'phyang ba/ gnyis 'thung gi lpags pa'i sham thabs rgyab na cung zad
300a2(rgyud 'grel): dpyangs pa sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pas mtshan pa'i ral pa nag pa'i thor cog can dpral ba'i mthar thod pa lngas brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can no// mnga' bdang yo dga' ma ni sna tshogs sde ma ma na bza' med pa mi ma'o'i
300a3(rgyud 'grel): phregrong ba can dbu skra sil bur grol zhing gyen du 'bar ba thod pa lngas dbu la mtshan pa/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig ma spyan gsum pa phyag g.yon pa bdag po'i mgrin par 'khyud pas khrag gi rgyun
300a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzeg pa'i thong pa sab la stobs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na gri gu rdeg pa'i tshul can no// rtsi bas nag po'i steng gi 'di ba ma rnams la shar du legs prad+yA nana? mu dang / khyong du thod pa can ma dang nub tu 'jigs ma dang lhor thub da
300a5(rgyud 'grel): ma'o// dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la g.yas skor gyis khu ba dang rdul dang bdud rtsi dang sgron ma lngas gang ba'i pad+ma'i snod de rim pa dang po 'di ni rdo rje sngon po'i khor yug can no// de nas rim pa gnyis pa'i rtsi bas brgyad
300a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po la gnas pa'i pad+ma brgyad ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dmar pos bskor ba ste de'i rtsibs rnams la shar du dge ba'i ska rags can ma dang / byang du gzugs can ma dang / nub tu rnam par rgyal ma dang / lhor 'dod ma dang / dbang ldan du
300b1(rgyud 'grel): dus can ma dang / mor mtsho chen ma dang / bden bral du phyed ma dang / rlung du gsod na'o// de nas rim pa gsum pa'i rtsibs brgyad dkar po la gnas pa'i pad+ma brgyad ni rdo rje phreng ba dkar po'i khor yug can te/ de'i rtsibs rnams la
300b2(rgyud 'grel): shar du sgrol ma dang byang du 'jigs mthong ma dang / nubau tu legs mthong mA dang / lhor mi thub ma dang / dbang ldan du dge ma dang / mar grib gnon+d+ra ma dang / bden bral du dus mtshan ma dang / rlung du grags chen ma'o// sgo rnams su
300b3(rgyud 'grel): shwar gyi pad+ma la mdzes ma dang / byang gi pad+ma la nor 'dzin ma dang / nub kyi pad+ma la skal bzangs ma dang / lho'i pad+ma la mthong dga' ma'o// 'di rnams thams cad g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin
300b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o so cung zad spro ba zhal gcog ma spyan gsum ma/ rus pa'i rgyun gyis brgyanA ma/ mi mgo'i phreng ba dang bral ba/ dbu skra sil bu dmar ser gyi tshogs gyen du 'bar ba byang sems 'jig pa/ nyi ma la skyil krung phyed pa'i
300b5(rgyud 'grel): gabar gyis gnas pa'o// sgo skyong ma rnams ni g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang ba ste/ thams cad stag gi lkugs pa'i na bza' sku mdog sngon mo'o// yang na legs ma la sogs pa bzhi nag mo dang rim pa gnyis pa lo gnas
300b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams dkar ser dang rim pa gsum pa la gnas pa la rnams ljang ku dang sgo'i lha mo rnams nag mo'o// bcom ldan 'das la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab pa ste/ sna tshogs sde
301a1(rgyud 'grel): ma la rnam par snang mdzad dang legs phreng ma la sogs pa ba'i la rin chen dbang po dang / rim pa gnyis par gnas pa rnams la snang ba mtha' yas dang / rim pa gsum par gnas pa rnams la rnam par snang
301a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad dang // sgro'i lha mo rnams la don yod grub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo // uM bu d+h+yaM kA pA li nI AHhAM haM hUM phaT/ snying po'o// las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di nyid kyis bya'o// // rnal 'byor
301a3(rgyud 'grel): na mkha'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgya mtsho chen po la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i ri rab kyi spyi bor sna tshogs chu skyes dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas
301a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzhal yas khang gi snying por rim pa dbus ma'i lte bar seng ge'i steng du sna tshogs pad+mo dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor na mkha' sku mdog nag po rtsa
301a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal gsum nug po dang dkar po dang dasar po zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dpral bar gnas pa nor bu dang zla ba phyed pa dang
301a6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral pa nag po'i thor cog can/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'phro ba'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thibs rgyab tu cung zad 'phyang ba/ phyag drug pa rdo rje dang dril bu
301b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'i phyag dag gis ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro mA dkar mo'am nag mo la 'khyud pa/ g.yas pa dag gis nu ma dang mnga'/ g.yon pa dag gis pad+ma'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// de nas re mig rnams la shar du
301b2(rgyud 'grel): glang po chu'i rgyal paM la 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo// byang du rma bya la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'i mi bzang mkha' 'gro ma ser mo sbrul gyis brgyan pa'o// nub tu mkha'
301b3(rgyud 'grel): lding la tseg pu'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa'i ro langs ma dmar mo'o// lho mi 'am ci'i gdan la skyil krung phye pas gnas pa'i gtum mo sngon mo dbu skra dmar po grol zhing spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba'o// 'dir ye shes
301b4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa lnga ni g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis kha nAng+ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa ni glang po che la sogs pa pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa glang po che'i lpags pa'i
301b5(rgyud 'grel): smad g.yogs dang mI'i lpags pa'i stong g.yogs can no// dbang ldan du seng ge laM 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i seng ge ma dkar ser phyag gnyis ma g.yas pas stang du 'phyar ba'i kha TAng+ga dang / g.yon pas sdigs
301b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// mar rdo rje phag la zlum po'i tshul gyis gnas pa'i stag mo dkar nag phyag gnyis ma g.yas paM dang g.yon pas lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// bden bral du ma
302a1(rgyud 'grel): he la skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa'i lce spyang mo lce sbyangs kyi gdong pa can dmar nag phyag gnyis kyis dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rlung du lce sbyang la cog pu'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas pa'i 'ug pa
302a2(rgyud 'grel): mo 'ug pa'i gdong can dmar ser phyag gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// 'di rnams ni rang rang gi gzhon pa rnams la pad+ma dang nyi mar gnas pa'o// shar du mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyab tu mkha' 'gro ma dkar
302a3(rgyud 'grel): mo phyag gnyis kyi rtse mo khar bcug pa'o// byang du mi bzang mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyab tu mar me ma ser mo spyi bor mar me lta bu'i thal mo sbyar ba dang / nub tu ro langs ma'i rgyab tu 'jib byed ma dmar mo snyim pa khral gis
302a4(rgyud 'grel): bkang nas gsol ba dang / lhor gtum mo'i rgyab tu kam po 'dzi nag mo phyag dag gis thugs kar gtun shing 'phyar ba ste/ 'di rnams ni pad+ma dang nyi ma dang ro la gnas pa'o// de nas rdo rje'i phreng ba dang 'od zer gyi khor yug
302a5(rgyud 'grel): gi phyi rol du zlum pa'i rim par pad+ma dang zla ba rnams la shar phyogs su puk+ka sI dang dra mi Di dang gtum mo rnams phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsi'i snod 'dzin pa'o// byang du mi bzang ma dang khrag ma dang sha ma rnams ni spyan
302a6(rgyud 'grel): ma lngas gang bo'i pad+ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o// nub tu drag shul mo dang 'bar ma dang mi sdug ma rnams gtor ma'i snod 'dzin pa'o// lhor thod pa ma dang rdo rje ma dang bum pa can ma rnams btung ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o//
302b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan du sgeg mo bsnyems pa'i phyag rgya can dang dri chab ma dri'i snod 'dzin pa'o// mer pi wa dA ma bi wang bsgreng ba dang me tog ma me tog 'thor ba'o// bden bral du glu mu kha'i thad kar mdzub mo g.yo ba dang bdug sdes
302b2(rgyud 'grel): ma spos dang bcas pa'i spos phor 'dzin pa'o// rlung du grwar ma gar gyi tshul gyis steng du thal mo sbyar ba dang mar me ma mar me dang bcas pa'i mar me'i snod 'dzin pa'o// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i lha sum
302b3(rgyud 'grel): cu rtsa gsum po 'di rnams ni phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa skra grol ba dbu la thed pa'i phreng ba can no// mi bzang mkha' 'gro ma ni dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa ste seng ge mo la sogs pa ni gos dmar po gyon
302b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// puk+ka si la sogs pa mo'i mtshams kyi lha mo drag ni dkar mo'o// mi bzang ma la sogs pa dang dbang ldan gyi lha mo dag ni ser mo'o// drag shul ma la sogs pa dang rlung gi mtshams kyi lha mo ngal ni dmar mo'o//
302b5(rgyud 'grel): bod pa ma la sogs pa dang bden bral gyi mtshams kyi lha mo dag ni nal mo'o// de nas rdo rje phreng ba'i khor yug gi phyi rol gyi rim par sgo rnams dang snam bu rnams la chu skyes dang zla ba'i gdan rnams la shwar sgor khyab
302b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jug nag po dang / byang du tshangs pa ser po dang / nub tu dbang phyug dkar po dang / lhor gdong dug dmar po dang / dbang ldan gyi mtshamasu dbang po ser po dang / mer lus ngan po ser po dang / bden bral du gshin rje nag
303a1(rgyud 'grel): po dang / rlung du chu lha dkar po'o// lha'i snam bu la shar du keng rus 'jigs dang kha TAng+ka'i srin po dang tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang dril bu'i rna ba can rnams dkar po'o// byang du gtum mo'i dbang phyug dang 'dun
303a2(rgyud 'grel): sa'i lha dang rims kyi dbang phyug dadA dz+nyi ka ra 'jig su rud+hi ba rnams ser po'o// nub tu drag po'i 'dod pa dang shaN+Di lI'i dbang phyug dang De me ru'i 'dul byed dang sgras 'jigs byed rnams dmar po'o// lhor gtum bu ra'i dbang
303a3(rgyud 'grel): phyug dang / s+phA ra nA do dang mche ba gtsigs pa dang gzhu 'dzin rnams nag po'o// khyab 'jug la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams ni zhal gcig pa spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis kha TAng+ga dang rtse gsum 'dzin
303a4(rgyud 'grel): pagayon pa dag gis lha mo la 'khyud pa dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ ral pa nag po'i thor cog can thod pa lnga'i phreng ba dang phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can no// 'di rnams kyi lha mo rnams kyang phyag g.yas pa
303a5(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon pa dag gis thod pa dang kha swAng+ga 'dzin pa'o// 'dir dpal ldan na mkha'i rnal 'byor la mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas rgyas btab pa ste ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la mi bskyod pa 'am rnam par snang
303a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rtag pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams kyi ste/ seng ge ma la sogs
303b1(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi la mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung ldan dang sdung ba mtha' yas rnams kyis so// tshangs pa la rnam par snang mdzad kyi ste dbang phyug chen po la snang ba mtha' yas kyis so// lha gzhan dkar po rnams
303b2(rgyud 'grel): la rnam par snang mdzad dang ser po rnams la rin chen dbang po dang / dmar po rnams la tshe dpag med dang nag po rnams lA mi bskyod pa nag po'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug gi thugs ka'i sa bon ni hUM ngo // oM huM haHswA
303b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni snying po'o// oM yuM yaHswA hA/ zhes pa ni ro langs ma'i ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so// zhes pa rim pa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gzhi la yas khang lta bu la mkha' 'gro ma la sogs
303b4(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi po rnams ni sgo rnams su'o// zhes pa gzhan dag gi'o// rim pa gnyis pa la yang gzhal yas khang gi gzugs so zhes pa ni gzhan dag gI ste de yang zlum po'i byed pa kha cig go// / gashrIn rje gshed kyi
303b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi lte bar gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma'i steng du gnas pa'i ma he nag po khros pa rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyab tu sna tshogs
303b6(rgyud 'grel): chu skyes dang nyi ma la g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang ba'i rkang stabs kyis gshin rje mnan nas bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gshed nag po smin ma dang sma ra langs shing dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan
304a1(rgyud 'grel): pa sku bong thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba/ yan lag rags pa mi mgo'i phreng ba mgul par 'phyang ba ljags 'gyur ba mche ba 'bar zhing gtsigs pa rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal nag po dang dkar po
304a2(rgyud 'grel): dang dmar po phyag drug gi gri gug dang thod par ldan pa'i g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis rang 'od kyi shes rab mA la 'khyud pa g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang ral gri/ g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang pad+ma
304a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba bzhin du mtha' yas la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyis brgyan pa'o// 'di'i shar du rnam par snang mdzad dkar po rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal gsum
304a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po// phyag g.yas pa dag gis 'khor lo dang ral gri dang / g.yon pa dag gis rin po che dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o// lhor rin chen dbang po gser bco ma'i mdog lta bu ser po dang sngon
304a5(rgyud 'grel): po dang dkar po'i zhal gsum pa phyog g.yas pa drug gis rin po che dang ral gri g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar po dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po'i zhal
304a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag gis pad+ma dang ral gri dang / g.yon pa dag gis nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// byang du phrag dog gshin rje gsheng ljang ku ljang ku dang nag po dang dkar po zhal gsum pa/ phyag
304b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa dag gis ral gri dang 'khor lo// g.yon pa ngag gis nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// bzhi char yang 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi mtshan nyid can gyi khro bo// g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi rtsa ba'i phyag ngal gis gri
304b2(rgyud 'grel): gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas rang dang 'dra ba'i yum la 'khyud pa'o// me'i mtshams su rdo rje tsaTI ka sku dang phyag mtshan rnams gti mug gshin rje gsheng lta bu'o// bden bral du rdo rje phag mo phag zhal can ma zhe sdang
304b3(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed lta bu'o// dbang ldan du gau rI phrag dog gshin rje gshed lta bu'o// 'di rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtsa ba rnams su ste/ mtshams rnams su nI rdo rje tsaR+tsi ka la sogs
304b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rang dang 'dra ba'i thabs dang bcas pa'o// sgo rnamasA la shar du tho ba gshin rdza gshed nag po'o// nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can/ phyag g.yas po dag gis tho ba dang ral gri dang / g.yon pa dag
304b5(rgyud 'grel): gis nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// lhor dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dkar po// dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po'i zhal can byug g.yas pa dag gis/ dbyug pa dang ral gri/ g.yon pa dag gis pad+ma dang 'khor lo
304b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// nub tu pad+ma gshin rje gshed 'dod chags gshin rje gshed lta bu'o// byang du ral gri gshin rje gshed phrag dog gshin rje gshed lta bu las cung zad sngo ba'o// thams cad kyang khro bo kla rnams kyis
305a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ 'jigs pa'i gang rdzangs cas/ dbyu sgra dmar par chen du 'bar ba mche ba gtsigs par zhal tsam rtsa ba'i phyu ga gnyis graM gug dang dong ba 'dzin pas rang 'ong kyi shes rab ma la 'gyung bam/ 'dang /
305a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad dang lha mo rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la ste/ lha gzhan rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhir sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas
305a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thod pa bzhi ni/ khu ba de brdul dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / sgronA ma lngas gang ba'o// rigs kyi bdag po ni gshin rje gshed nag po'i spyi bor rang nyid de/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bzhi'i yang de bzhin no// de rnams ni
305a4(rgyud 'grel): go rims ji lta bar spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dang / tho ba gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni ya'o// // oM hrIHSh+NI ti kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT sAt+ma/ zhes pa ni
305a5(rgyud 'grel): snying po skye las thams cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di'o// // rdo rje sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje kur gyi nang du chos 'byung gi snying por gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshog sa pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar bla
305a6(rgyud 'grel): ba la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sgrol ma gser gyi mdog lta bu sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang rgyab dang g.yon pa'i zhal bzhi gser gyi mdog dang / dkar po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po'o// phyag
305b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad mu g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang mngar dang dud rnams 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams ni ut+pa ya ser po dang gAzhu dang lcags kyu dang sdigs mdzub can no// shar gyi 'dab ma la me tog sgrol ma
305b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo phyag dag gis me tog gi phyung ba 'dzin pa dang / lhor bdug spos sgrol ma nag mo phyag dkri gis bdug spos kyi snod 'dzin pa dang / nub tu mar me sgrol ma ser mo phyag gnyis kyis mar me'i kong bu 'dzin
305b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / byang du dri chub sgrol ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis dri chub kyi dung chos 'dzin pa ste/ lho mo bzhi po 'di rnams kyang zla ba la gnas pa'o// me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
305b4(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo de dog lte bu'i 'khor lo dang rdo rje dong pad+ma dang ral gri'o// rim pa gnyis pa la sgo rnams su shar du rdo rje lcags kyu mra dkar mo phyag g.yas pas lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang / lhor rdo rje zhugs pa mi ser mo phyag g.yas
305b5(rgyud 'grel): pas zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dmar mo phyag g.yas pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang / byang du rdo rje dril bu ma ljang ku phyag g.yas pas rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa'o// me la sogs
305b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshams rnamasu gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma rnams la/ spyan ma la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bum pa dang / ri rab dang me thob dang rgyal mtshan chen po'o// steng du gtsug tor rnam par
306a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ma dkar mo phyag g.yas pas 'khor lo 'dzin pa ste/ 'og tu gnod mdzes ma sngon mo klure zhugs pa 'dzin pa'o// lha mo bcu drug po 'di rnams ni phyag g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa ste sna tshogs
