306a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'o// bcu po 'di rnams kyang zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis ma'o// bcu gcig po rnams kyang rdo rje skyil krung can gser gyi sna che g.yo ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po ches brgyan pa/ pad+ma rA ga'i
306a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'phro ba'o// rigs kyi bdag po ni rdo rje sgrol ma'i rin chen dbang po'o// me tog sgrol ma la sogs pa'i ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa rnams te rdo rje lcags kyu ma la
306a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa rnams kyi yang ngo // gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i rin chen dbang po ste gnod mdzes ma'i mi bskyod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni tAM ngo // oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po ste las thams
306a5(rgyud 'grel): cad pa'i sngags kyang 'di'o// // 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du gnas pa'i chos 'byung gi nang du gzhal yas khang ste/ kha cig ni chos 'byung med par ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang ngo zhes pa'o//
306a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang gi lte bar mchod rten gyi phug gi snying por sna tshogs chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'am nyi ma la g.yas bskum zhing g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma 'od zer can ser mo rin po che sna
306b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi cod pan can/ dbu'i rtser mchod rten gyis rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ zhal gsum ma rtsa ba'i zhal ser po g.yas zhal dkar po/ g.yon zhal nag po phag pa'i gdong can khros pa khro gnyer dang zur
306b2(rgyud 'grel): mig tu ldan pa/ ljags 'gril pa 'jig su rung ba/ phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis mda' dang rdo rje dang khab 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyis gzhu dang skud pa dang mya ngan med pa'i shing gi yal ga me tog dang bcas pa 'dzin
306b3(rgyud 'grel): ga spang g.yogs sngon po gyon pa rnam par bkra ba'i stod g.yogs sngon po can/ ser po'i mdog can gyi phag pa la gnas shing de'i mdog can gyi phag pas yongs su bskor ba mya ngan med pa'i me tog gi phreng bas dbu la brgyan
306b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// shar phyogs su aR+sha ma sI me tog ban+d+ha ka'i mdog can g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa'o// lhor maR+sha ma sI ser mo gser gyi mdog can g.yas pas skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab dang g.yon/
306b5(rgyud 'grel): bas mya ngan med pa'i yal ga 'dzin+d+ra pa'o// nu bi tu aT+TA ra d+ha ma sI ser mo g.yas pas mya ngon med pa'i yal ga dang g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// byang du t+ya~M dzo ma sI dmar mo'i mdog can
306b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis mdor dong gtsu 'dzin pa'o// me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su u da ya ma si dang grol ma ma si dang ba na ma si dang ci bA ra ma saM rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du a rnams la
307a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan no// rim pa phyi ma'i snam bu rnams la shar du mahA tsi pa ra ma si dang pa rA ha mu khi mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigasu rung ba g.yas pas rdo rje lcags kyu dang g.yon pas rdo rje zhags pa
307a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// lhor pa ta kra ma si dang ba ra li ser mo g.yas pas mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang g.yon pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// nub tu ba ra kra ma sI dang ba nga la dmar mo g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o//
307a3(rgyud 'grel): byang du AR+Ya si dang ba ra li ljang ku g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa'o// me'i mtshams su bat+tA li dmar mo'i mdog can g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis khab dang skud pa 'dzin pa'o//
307a4(rgyud 'grel): bden bral du ba dA li ser mo g.yas pas skud ba dang bcas pa'i khab dang g.yon pas yal ga dang bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i me tog gi chun po 'dzin pa'o// rlung du ba rA li dkar mo g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis
307a5(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du ba rA ha mu khi dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnam su A lo dang / tA lo dang / kA lo dang / sang pa lo sam pa
307a6(rgyud 'grel): mUr d+ha Ti rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ dkar mo dang / ser mo dang / dmar mo dang / ljang ku ste phyag gnyis ma rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o// aR+sha ma saM la sogs pa'i lha mo nyi
307b1(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa bzhi po 'di rnams mngon par gsar du byung ba'i lang co can spyi bor mchod rten gyis brgyan pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa rnam par bkra ba'i gos sngon pos stod g.yogs byas pa/ phag zhal gcig
307b2(rgyud 'grel): ma spyan gsum ma phyag gnyis ma gser gyi mdog can gyi phag po la gnas shing gser gyi mdog can gyi phag pas yongs su bskor ba'o// sgo skyong ma rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la g.yas brkyang gi gnas pa ste
307b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nyi shu rtsa bzhi po sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la g.yon brkyang gis gnas pa'o// rigs kyi bdag po ni 'od zer can ma'i rtag pa'o// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs la bskor ba rnams kyi mi bskyod pa dang / rin chen dbang
307b4(rgyud 'grel): bo dang snang ba mtha' yas drang don yod grub pa rnams te me la sogs pa'i mtshams la bskor ba rnams kyi'ang de bzhin no zhes pa ni kha cig go// yang na dkar mo rnams kyi rnam par snang mdzad dang nag mo rnams kyi mi bskyod
307b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / ser mo rnams kyi rin chen 'byung ldan dang / ljang ku rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o// zhes pa ni gzhan no// 'od zer can gyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni maM ngo // oM mA rI ts+tshe swA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po'o// oM mA rI ts+yai hUM sar+b+ba big+h+nA na ung+kA nga
307b6(rgyud 'grel): ya hUM phaT ces pa las thams cad pa'i sdigs so// // bsrung ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du ri rab kyi steng gi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la bcom ldan 'das ma so sor
308a1(rgyud 'grel): 'brang ma chen mo 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ zhal bzhi ma rtsa ba'i zhal ser mo g.yas dkar ba rgyab sngo ba/ g.yon dmar ba phyag bcu gnyis ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rin po che'i gdugs dang 'khor lo
308a2(rgyud 'grel): dang rdo rje dang mdar dang phal gri dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rnams kyi rdo rje dang zhags pa dang rtse gsum dang zhu dang dgra sta dang dung rnams 'dzin pa dbu la mchod rten gyis brgyan pa rdo rje'i skyil krung can ma'o// de'i shar
308a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma rol pa'i kun tu bskyod pas bzhugs pa/ skra mdo dkar mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od can zhal bzhi ma rtsa ba'i zhal dkar mo// g.yos sde brgyab ser ba g.yon
308a4(rgyud 'grel): ldong ku phyag bcu ma g.yas pa rnams kyis pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang mchog sbyin dang lcags kyu dang mda' dang ral gri dang g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang dag
308a5(rgyud 'grel): ste rnams 'dzin pa'o// lhor sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma chen mo rdo rje'i skyil krung can ma nag mo nyi ma'i 'odra can rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po/
308a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag bcu gnyis ma g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ gzhan pa gnyis kyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya mdzad pa g.yas pa'i phyag rnams kyis rdo rje dang mnga' dang mchog sbyin dang mi
308b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya dang g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang rin po che'i gdugs dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa'o// nub tu sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la bsil ba'i tshul
308b2(rgyud 'grel): chen mo skyil kru phyed pas bzhugs pa dmar mo nyi ma'i 'od can rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams dmar po dang dkar po dang nag po phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyis pad+ma dang bcas pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i
308b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dong ma do'u dang rdo rje dang ral gri dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang thugs kar po ti 'dzin pa'o// byang du sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la rma bya chen
308b4(rgyud 'grel): mr-i sems dpa'i skyil krung can ljang ku zla ba'i 'od can rtswa bu dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhalnga rnams ljang ku dang nag po dang dkar po phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyi sku rmA bya'i mdzug sgo dang mda' dang mchog sbyin dang rol
308b5(rgyud 'grel): gri/ galjon pa rnams kyi sa lhung bzed la gnas pa'i dge slong drang gzhu dang pang du gnas pa'i bum pa rin po che 'bar bas 'bab po can ngo nga sna tshogs rdo rjes spras pa'i rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/ rim ba gnyis
308b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la me'i mtshams su dus ma nag mo phyag dag gis rung 'dzin pa dang / bden bral du dus mtshan ma ser mo phyag dag gis rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dang / rlung du dus kyi rna ba mo dmar mo phyag dag
309a1(rgyud 'grel): gis dgu sta 'dzin pa dang / dbang ldan du dkar mo sku mdog dkar mo phyag dag gis rtse gsum 'dzin pa ste bzhi po 'di dag ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma'o// dgu po 'di rnams ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i
309a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang lha'i gos dang rin po che'i cod pan can/ zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum dang ljon pa rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin chen dbang po dang rnam par snang mdzod dang mi bskyod pa dang snang ba mtha' yas dang don yod grub pa dang mi
309a3(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa dang rin chen dbang po dang snang ba mtha' yas dang rnam par snang mdzad rnams kyis rgyas btab pa'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi mo la rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang rdo rje zhags pa ma dang rdo rje lcags
309a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrog ma dang rdo rje 'bebs mu rnams ni snga ma bzhin no// so sor 'brang mi chen po lA sogs kyi rnams kyi sa bon ni p+l-i dang oM ma Ni d+ha ri badz+rI Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes pa ni snying po dang / sa bon ni buM dang / oM AHma hA
309a5(rgyud 'grel): swatwa pra man+da nI d+h+ye nAM ni snying po dang / sa bon ni hUM dang / oM AHma hA man+ta a nu bA ri Ni hUM hUM nI snying po dang / sa bon ni dzI dang / oM AHma hA shI ta ba ti dz+nyi hU duM ni snying po dang / sa bin ni maM dang / oM AHma hA ma yu rI bi d+ha rAdz+nyI tsu hUM phaT phaT
309a6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pa snying po'o// dgos pa'i dbang gis 'di rnams gang yang rung bas 'khor mo'i dbang phyug ma bya ste/ 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ma'i snying po'i sngags ni las thams cad pa'o// // rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil
309b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du gling rnams dang nye ba'i gling rnams rgya mtsho bdun la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang ste/ de'i dbus su sang ga'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i l+yA bu lA bcom ldan 'ad
309b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par snang mdzad dkar po rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i 'od can/ sangs rgyas lngas spras pa'i rin po che'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i ral pa'i thor cig dang ldan pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang /
309b3(rgyud 'grel): gos can zhi ga/ dkar po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang ljang ku'i zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyud pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dgu gis rdo rje drang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gis phyag rgya 'dzin pa/ gzhan pa dag gis bsam gtan gyi
309b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya 'dzin pa/ g.yas pa dag gis bgrang phreng dang mda' 'dzin pa g.yon po dag gis 'khor lo dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// yang ni 'di ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po rdo rje dang bcas pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag
309b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyo 'dzin pa ste/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo bslang ba g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzung ba ni byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o// 'dab ma rnams la mdun du sems ma rdo rje ma ston mo g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po
309b6(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon pas sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su rin chen rdo rje ma ser mo g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rtse mor rin po ches mtshan pa 'dzin zhing / g.yon pas sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o// rgyab tu
310a1(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi rdo rje ma dmar mo g.yas pas rdo rje rtse lngas pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dab brgyad dkar dmar dang g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// g.yon du las kyi rdo rje ma ljang ku g.yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i
310a2(rgyud 'grel): mdog can yi sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa 'dzin zhing g.yon pas sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o// de nas shar phyogs su glang po che'i dbang po'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba la mi bskyod pa sngon po rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs
310a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas pa'i sor mo gung mos rdo rje rtse lnga pa sngon po gzung nas sa gnon gyi tshul mdzad cing / phyag g.yon pa gan rkyal pang du gzhag pa'o// 'deb ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' dkor po phyag g.yas pa'i
310a4(rgyud 'grel): sor mo gung mos rdo rje thugs kar gtod pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i dril bu bkur brten nas 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po ser po phyag g.yas par gnas pa'i rdo rje
310a5(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyus 'gugs pa'i tshul mdzad cing g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// kha cig ni phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pas spyan 'dren pa'i tshul byed pa'o// zhes pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje zhags pa dmar po g.yon pa
310a6(rgyud 'grel): dang cig shes dag gis gzhu dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o// rgyab tu rdo rje legs pa ma ra ka ta'i mdog lta bu rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis thugs kar la gos so sbyin pa'i tshul mdzad pa'o// lhor rta'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i
310b1(rgyud 'grel): lte bar rin chen 'byung ldan ser po rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ g.yas pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rin po che sor mo gung mos gzung nas mchog sbyin gyi tshul mdzad cing / g.yon pas gan rgyal du pang par bzhag pa'o// 'dab ma
310b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams la mdun du rdo rje rin chen seng po ga ba rdo rje dang cas pal khu tshur gyis mtha' gnyisu rdo rje gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnasu 'ching bar mdzad cing g.yon pa rnga dzA dril bu bsnyems pa dang bcas
310b3(rgyud 'grel): pas 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje gzi brjid dmar po phyag gnyis kyis nyi ma thugs kar 'dzin pa'i 'od kyis gsal bar mdzad pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje rgyal mtshan ljang ku phyag gnyis kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin
310b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing g.yon gyi dpung pa'i gnas su 'phyar ba'o// rgyab tu rdo rje bzhad pa dkar po g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis so'i phreng ba rdo rje gnyis dang ldan pa gzung nas zhal gyi thad kar 'jog pa'o// nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna
310b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba la sbyang ba mtha' yos dmar po rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon pa dang g.yas pa gan rkyal bang ba'i thad du gzhag nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya mdzad de g.yas pa'i sor mo gung mos dzaM
310b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes mtshan pa'i pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// 'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje chos dkar dmar g.yon pas bsnyems pa dang bcas pas pad+ma'i yu ba 'dzin zhing g.yas pas kha 'byod pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje rnon po na mkha' ltar so
311a1(rgyud 'grel): bsangs g.yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs blam dang / g.yas pas ral gri 'phyar thabasu 'dzin pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje rgyu gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yon par gnas pa'i 'khor le rtsibs
311a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa phyag g.yas pa'i sor mo gung mos mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor zhing chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa'o// rgyab tu rdo rje smra ba dmar po g.yen pas chos kyi dung dang g.yos pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu'i lce 'dzin
311a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// khyud du na mkha' lding gi steng du sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte ba la don yod grub pa ljang ku rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i sor mo gung mos sna tshogs rdo rjes 'dzin pas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshu le mdzad
311a4(rgyud 'grel): cing / go yon pa gan n+ya lce du pang bar gzhag pa'o// 'dab ma rnams la mdun du rdo rje lus ljang ku g.yas pas bslang ba'i sbyor bas sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa thugs kar gtong pa'i sbyor bas 'dzin zhing / g.yon
311a5(rgyud 'grel): tshetshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu bkur brten pa ste/ yang na phyag gnyis kyi thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje srung ba ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje'i go cha 'dzin pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje gnod
311a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin nag po phyag dag gis mthe'u chung gnyis rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon gyi rtse mo can rang gzhal gyi grwar 'dzin pas gdug pa can rnams bsdigs par byed pa'o// rgyab tu rdo rje khu tshur ser po khu tshur gyi mtshams su rdo rje ste
311b1(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur dag gis 'tshi ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa gzung ba'o// dbus kyi gzhal yas khang gi me'i pad+ma la rdo rje sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje bkur brten pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i phyag dag gis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa'o// bden bral gyi pad+ma la phreng ba ma
311b2(rgyud 'grel): ser mo phyag dag gis rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// rlung gi pad+ma la glu ma dmar mo phyag dag gis pi wang sgrogs pa'o// dbang ldan gyi pad+mo la gar ma ljang ku rdo rje rtse gsum pa gzung ba phyag dag gis gar mdzad pa'o// dbus kyi
311b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yos khang gi phyi rol gyi snam bu'i shar gyi pad+ma rnams la byams pa dang mthong ba don yod dang ngan song kun 'dren dang mya ngan dang sun pa thams cang 'joms pa'i blo gros rnams ni mi bskyod pa lta bu'o// lho'i pad+ma rnams la
311b4(rgyud 'grel): spos kyi glang po dang dbo' bar 'gro ba dang na mkha'i mdzod dang / ye shes tog rnams ni rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o// nub kyi pad+ma rnams la 'od dpag med dang zla ba'i 'ong dang / bzang skyong dang / dra ba can gyi 'od rnams ni snang
311b5(rgyud 'grel): ba mtha' yas lta bu'o// byung gi pad+ma rnams la rdo rje snying po dang blo gros mi zad pa dang spobs pa brtsigs pa dang kun tu bzang po rnams ni don yod grub pa lta bu'o// yang na shar la sogs pa'i snam bu rnams la byams pa la sogs
311b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' stong du bzhi yis ma tshang ba bsgom par bya'o// de dag gi mtshan rnams ni rnam par rgyas pas 'jigs nas ma bshad de/ gal te 'dod na bdag gis byas pa'i mtshan yang dag
312a1(rgyud 'grel): par brjod pa'i 'brel pa rnal 'byor snying po'i phreng ba las rtogs par bya'o// me'i mtshams kyis pad+ma la rdo rje bdug spos ma dkar mo dang / bde bral gyi pad+ma la rdo rje me tog ma ser mo dang / rlung gi pad+ma la rdo rje mar
312a2(rgyud 'grel): me ma dkar dmar dang / dbang ldan gyi pad+ma la rdo rje dri chab ma ljang ku ste/ bdug spros ma la sogs pa 'di rnams sngar dang 'dra ba'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o// shar la sogs pa'i sgo'i pad+ma rnams la/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang / rdo rje zhags/
312a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / rdo rje ljags sgrog dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin du dkar po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang ljang ku ste sngar dang 'dra ba'i phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'o// 'drir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings las gzhan pa'i lha
312a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po chos brgyan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan can no// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ma gtogs pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug lo mngon du phyogs pa ste/ rdo rje
312a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug ni rang rang gi bdag po'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du phyogs pa'o// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bi bas pa'i mthar thug pa'i lha thams
312a6(rgyud 'grel): cad ni ji skad bshad pa'i lte bo dang bdab ma rnams la zla ba la gnas shing nyi ma'i 'od zer can no// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga las gzhan pa'i lha bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o// 'dir
312b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings rnam par snang ba shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid la rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas gdab bo// me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa'i bdag nyid mi bskyod pa la
312b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa de bzhin gshegos pa bzhi'i rigs kyi bdag pa ni rnam par snang mdzad ngo // sems ma rdo rje ma dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi dang / sgeg mo dang bdug spos ma dang / byams pa la sogs pa bzhi dang / rdo
312b3(rgyud 'grel): rje lcags kyu rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o// rin chen rdo rdza ma dang rdo rje rin chen ma la sogs pa bzhi dang / phreng ba ma dang / me tog ma dang spos kyi glang po la sogs pa bzhi dang / rdo rje zhags pa rnams kyi rin chen 'byung ldan no// chos
312b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje chos rab la sogs pa bzhi dang glu ma dang mar me mA dang 'od dpag med la sogs pa bzhi dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog ma rnams kyi snang ba mtha' yas so// las kyi rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje las rab la sogs pa bzhi
312b5(rgyud 'grel): drang gar ma dang dri chab ma dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa bzhi dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa rnams kyi don yod grub pa'o// 'dir nang gi gzhal yas khang gi sgo rnams la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o// zhes pa
312b6(rgyud 'grel): ni phyogs gzhan no// rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni a'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA yo gI shwa ra hUM zhes pa ni snying pa'o// oM badz+ra yak+Sha hUM zhes pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi ste las thams cad pa'i sngags so//
313a1(rgyud 'grel): gang yang rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i rgyud rnams su rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang lha'i rnam pa'i khyad par gsungs pa de dag ni spangs pas 'jigs pas ma bshad do// // bzhi bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid can 'jam pa'i
313a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i gur la sogs pa nus gzhal yas khang gi bar du dang por bshad pa'i 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no// 'on kyang 'dir khro bo rnams ni 'chang bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs can no zhes pa ni phyogs
313a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig ste/ rdo rje gur gyi nang ri rab kyi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes kyi lte ba la gnas pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo zhes pa ni gnyis pa'o// phyogs gnyis ka la yang mchod rten dkar po'i nang du gzhal yas khang ngo // de'i lte bar seng ge'i
313a4(rgyud 'grel): steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni sku mdog gser gtso ma lta bu sdug cing yid 'ong ba/ me tog sna tshogs
313a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis mdzes pa'i zur phud gsum gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon po'i zhal rnams ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po/ phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mchog dang mda'/ g.yon pa
313a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang / ut+pal sngon po dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la snyoms par zhugs pa'o// de'i shar gyi ri mig la glang po che'i steng du sna tshogs chu
313b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes dang nyi ma la mi bskyod pa sngon po 'gying ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa/ rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po/ phyag brgyad pa g.yas pa'i sor mo grang smos rdo rje thugs kar gyen
313b2(rgyud 'grel): du bsgreng ba/ g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje dril bu bkur brten pa/ gzhan grayas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mnga' dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis nu ma dang zhugs pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// lhor rtaDI steng
313b3(rgyud 'grel): du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la rin chen 'byung ldan ser po sems dpa'i skyil kung ca na/ rtsu ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yin pa'i zhal rnams ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po/ phyag bcu drug po rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis
313b4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam gzhag gIs phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas pa dag gis rin po chu dong ral gri/ g.yon pa dag gis 'khor lo dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// nub tu rma bya'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la snang po mtha' yas
313b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams dkar po dang sngon po dang dmyur po/ phyag drug pa g.yon pas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i pa d+ma'i yu nga thugs ker gzung ste blams
313b6(rgyud 'grel): bas kha 'byed pa/ g.yas padag gis bgrang phreng dang rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pa dag gis nu ma dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// byang du na mkha' lding gi steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi mi la don yod grub pa dmar po sems
314a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i skyil krung nAn/ rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams dra myur po dang sngon po dang dkar po// phyag drug pa dang po gnyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya bcings pa/ g.yas pa dag gis ral gri dang rdo rje/ g.yo /
314a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dag gis nu ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du spyan ma ser mo sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ phyag brgyad ma g.yas pa rnams kyi mchog sbyin dang mi 'jigs pa dang 'khor lo dang mnga'/ g.yon pa rnams kyi sdigs
314a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang rin po che'i snye ma dbo bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin po'o// mar ma mA kI sngon mo khro ba dang bcas pas rgod pa sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs
314a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang rdo rje dang mda'/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// bden bral du gos dkar mo 'gying pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa phyag drug ma/ g.yas pa rnams kyis mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang
314a5(rgyud 'grel): mudar/ g.yon pa rnams kyis pad+ma dang baglang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rlung du sgrol ma ma ra ka tA lta bu sems dpa'i skyil krung can phyag drug ma/ g.yas pa rnams kyisna mi 'jigs pa dang rdo rje dang mda'/ g.yon pa rnams
314a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis sdigs mdzub dang ut+pal dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rim pa gnyis pa'i sher la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su/ sems me rdo rje mo dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang chos kyi rdo rje ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi sku mdog dang
314b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan dang mtshon cha rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams dang mtshungs pa'o// 'on kyang nu ma 'dzin pa mang bar sems ma rdo rje ma dang rin chen rdo rje ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi sngags
314b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzub 'dzin pa ste chos kyi rdo rje ma ni zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan du tsun+d+ra mu zla ba'i mdog can phyag nyi shu rtsa drug ma rtsa ba'i phyag dag gis thugs kar rtsa ba'i phyag rgya dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis mi 'jig sel dang
314b3(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang rin po che'i phreng ba dang bi dza pU ri dang mda' dang dgra sta deng dbyug to dang tho ba dang lcags kyu dang rdo rje dang ba dan gsum gyi tshul dang bgrang phreng rnams dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis ying bzhin gya nor ba'i
314b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan dang pad+ma drang spyi blugs dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang shik+She dang 'khor lo dang ral gri dang sdigs mdzub dang bum pa bzang po dang mtshon rtse gcig pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po tI 'dzin pa kAn cu
314b5(rgyud 'grel): ka'i stod g.yogs bcings pi bla gos phrag pa la gzur ba/ gar gyi nyams dgu'i rang bzhin can/ rtse ba'i zhal dkar po/ g.yas pa'i zhal sngon po ljags 'dril zhing mchu ba cung zung gtsigs pa g.yon pa ser po ma
314b6(rgyud 'grel): mchu mnan pa'o// thal mo yang dag par sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i tshigs bar pa la zlum po'i rnam par bzhag cing mthe bong dag mdzub mo'i logs kyi rtsa bar 'dzin pa ni 'di'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o// mer rin
315a1(rgyud 'grel): chen skar mnga' ma ser mo phyag dug ma dang po gnyis kyis thugs kar rin po tsha kha sbyor 'dzin pa g.yas pa dag gis mi 'jigs pa dang mnga' dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o//
315a2(rgyud 'grel): bden bral du khro gnyer can ma dkAr mo phyag bcu drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mnga'/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang spyi blugs gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rlung du rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ljang
315a3(rgyud 'grel): ku phyag drug ma g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang rdo rje lcags sgrog dang mda' dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang zhag pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// spyan ma laM sogs pa lha mo bcu ga nyis po 'di rnams ni rol ba'i
315a4(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bskyod pa dang ldan pas zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can rang rang gi rigs kyi bdag po bzhin du zhal gsum pa'o// rim pa gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu rnams la/
315a5(rgyud 'grel): shar du byams pa gser gyi mdog can phyag dang po gnyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad cing / g.yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang / g.yon pas ma tog dang bcas pa'i klu shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa/ 'jam dbu
315a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'i gzugs can khyad par du shes rab ma dang bral ba dang / spos kyi glang po ljang ku g.yon pas bum par gnos pa'i glang po che'i sna 'dzin zhing g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa dang / ye shes tog ser po g.yon/
315b1(rgyud 'grel): pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin zhing / g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa bya'o// lhor bzang skyong sku mdog dmar po g.yon pas rin po che 'dzin zhing g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po phyag
315b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi sor mo thams cad brkyang bas chu rlabs kyi tshul mdzad pa dang / blo gros mi zad pa gser gyi mdog can g.yon pa'i khu tshur thugs kar gzhag ste g.yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya can dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa
315b3(rgyud 'grel): ljang ku g.yon pa'i khu tshur pad du gzhag cing g.yas pas se gol gtogs pa'o// nub tu mthu chen thob pa dkar po g.yon pas cung zang kha bye ba'i pad+ma dkar po 'dzin zhing / g.yos pas mchog sbyin pa dang / ngan song
315b4(rgyud 'grel): kun 'dren dkar po phyag gnyis kyis sdig pa 'dor ba'i tshul can dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo glos ser po phyog gnyis kyisna kha sbyar ba rdeg pa'i tshul can dang / dra bo can gyi 'od dam
315b5(rgyud 'grel): blo g.yon pas ut+pal la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin zhing g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o// byang du zla 'od dkar po g.yon pas ut+pa lar gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin zhing / g.yas pas mchog
315b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa dang / 'od dpag med dmar po phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang // na mkha'i mdzod ser po g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bkur brten zhing / g.yas pa na mkha' la bskor ba dang / sgrib pa thams cad
316a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par sel ba sngon po 'am dkar po g.yon pa sa la reg cing g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mdzub mo dang mthe bong sbyar te dri ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o// byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
316a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams ni zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can/ sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa rang phyogs kyi bdag po dang 'dra bar zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug gi gnyis kyis mnyam bzhag gau phyag rgya dang / gnyis kyis
316a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang mnga' 'dzin pa'o// byams pa dang 'jam dpal gnyis ni mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya med pa'o// 'jam pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che'i rgyan can/ zhal 'dzum bag dang
316a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas shing sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o// shar sgor ma he'i steng du gshin rje mthar byed nag po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang mda' 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs
316a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzub gyen du bsgreng bsdu bsdigs par byed pa/ gnyis pas 'khyud par byed pa'i lha mo'i nu ma nas 'dzin pa ste/ de yang phyag gnyis ma dkar mo phyag g.yon pas 'dam skyes 'dzin zhing g.yas pas kun nas 'khyud bar
316a6(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa'o// g.yon pa'i gsum pas dngul gyi gzhu 'dzin pa ma ra ka tau ltar ldang ba'i lha mo phyag gnyis ma g.yas pa ut+pal sngon po 'dzin zhing phyag g.yon pa mgul pa la 'khyud pas g.yas phyogs nas rnam par
316b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa zhabs drug pa/ gsus pa 'phyang ba/ zhal drug ni sngon po rtsa ba'i zhal gang rgyangs dang bcas pa/ gnyis pa 'jigs par byed pa gsum pa gdangs pa/ bzhi pa drag po chen po/ lnga pa rdo rje'i mche ba can drug pa/ spyi bor
316b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing ljags sgril ba'o// yang na spyi bor gnas pa sngon pa'i rtsa ba'i zhal la sogs pa rnams g.yas skor gyis sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang ku rnams so// lho sgor gzhan gyis mi thub
316b3(rgyud 'grel): ser po rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams ser po dang nag po dang dkar po dang / phyag drug pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mda' 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas
316b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// nub tu rta mgrin dmar po rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams dmar po dang sngon po dang phyag drug pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dbyug pa dang ka NaM la dang mda'
316b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil po sngon po zhabs kyis bgegs mnan pa/ phyag drug pa g.yos pa rnams kyis ral
316b6(rgyud 'grel): gri dang dgra sta dang mda' 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan gyi mtsham su rin po che'i ri bo'o steng du mi g.yo ba sngon po mi g.yo
317a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang zhugs pa dang mdu' 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa g.yon ngosu 'byang ba'i gos
317a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon po can// khrag gis bAn+da ni zhing ljags 'dril ba'i zhal gdangs pa'o// mer 'dod pa'i rgyal po sngon po phyag drug pa phyag dang po gnyis kyis phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang mda'/ g.yon dag gis nu ma
317a3(rgyud 'grel): dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis phan tshun rgyu ba sbyar nas mthab chung gnyis lu gu rgyud lter byas te sdigs mdzub gnyis rab tu brkyang nas zhags pa ltar byas pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// bden bral
317a4(rgyud 'grel): du dbyug sngon can ste na po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mang2/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rlung du stob po che sngon po

317a6(rgyud 'grel): du gnong mdzes rgyal po sngon po phyag drug pa rtse phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa/ g.yas pa dag gis ral gri dang mda' 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa dag gis nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa ste/ 'dir 'dod
317b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi mdzub mo gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba ni gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgya'o// 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og sngon po phyag drug pa g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang lcags kyu dang mnga' 'dzin zhang / g.yon pa rnams
317b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis nu ma dang zhogs pa dang bcas pa'i rtse gcig pa dang gau zhu 'dzin pa'o// bgegs mthar byed la sogs pa bdun ni rtse bo dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal gsum ston po dang ser po dang dmar po'o// khro bo
317b3(rgyud 'grel): bcu pau rnams kyang khros pa'i lha stangs can spyan gsum dmar la smin ma g.yo ba/ rtsa bo'i zhal cung zang bye bo/ g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pa/ g.yon pa'i zhal tshims kyis ma mchu mnan pa/ mcheng gtsigs
317b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i gos gyon pa/ thong+ge ba'i phreng ba'i cod pan can/ sgra dang smA rA ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ rol pa'i kun tu bskyod pa can/ klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la g.yon
317b5(rgyud 'grel): brkyang gis gnas pa ste/ gshin rje mthar byed ni g.yas brkyang bya 'am rdo rje skyil krung gis so// dkyil 'khor 'dir gnod mdzes rgyal po'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gtsug tor 'khor lo sbyor ba ni dkyil 'khor pa
317b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid du logasu ma bshad dpal sgyu 'phrul dra bo'i rgyud las rnal 'byor rgyas par bstan pa'o// bar ma'i rim par bstan pa la ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i spyi gtsug gi steng du rin po che'i ri la gnas pa'i pad+ma dang nyi ma la rdo rje
318a1(rgyud 'grel): skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i gtsug tror 'khor lo sgyur ba ser po rtsa ba dang g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal rnams ser po dang sngon po dang phyag brgyad pa dang po gnyis kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya mdzad gags
318a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang bgrang phreng dang mnga' 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang nu ma dang gzhu 'dzin pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che'i rgyan dang ral pa'i cong pan can/ spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha me bzhi lngas
318a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhogs gnyi su rnam par brgyan pa'o// zhes gsungs so// de'i rjesu 'brangs nas rnal 'byor rgyas pa la yang gtsug ter 'khor lo sgyur dkyil 'khor bar tha dad du dang / de'i steng du gnod mdzes rgyal po shes par bya'o// zhes pa ni kha
318a4(rgyud 'grel): gri'o// lha bzhi bcu rtsa gsum po rnams kyang zhal ro zhing spyan gsum pa'o// 'dir nu ma 'dzin par bshad pa de yang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi ni rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la snyoms par zhugs pa rnams kyi ste/ khro bo rnam
318a5(rgyud 'grel): ni rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma grwayon log su gnas pa rnams kyi'o// zhes shes par bya'o// gshin rje mthar byed las gzhan rnams la shes rab ma med kyang der nu ma 'dzin para'i tshul gyis rang gi nu ma 'dzin pa'o// zhes ni gzhan
318a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin 'jam pa'i rdo rje shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi bangag nyid la rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab pa ste/ me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs
318b1(rgyud 'grel): de'i rang bzhin me bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs bya bzhi dang / spyan mA dang tsun+da rnams la 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang / mA ma kI dang sems ma rdo rje ma dang byams pa la sogs pa bzhi dang / khro bo bcu la mi bskyod ba dang / rin
318b2(rgyud 'grel): chen rdo rje ma dang / rin chen skar mda' dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa bzhi la rin chen 'byung ldan dang / gos dkar mo dang // chos kyi rdo rje ma dang khro ga nyer tsan mA dang / mthu chen thob la sogs pa bzhi la snang po mtha' yas dang
318b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma dang las kyi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma~M drung zla 'od la sogs pa rnams lnga don yod grub pa'o// 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i thugs ka'i sa bon ni muHso// oM AHzhes pa ni snying po'o// oM A mr-i te kun+d+ha le bi g+hAr+N+Na katrUM/
318b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa las thams cad pa'o// chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor lo rdo rje gur la sogs pa bsgom pa'i rnam par bzhag pa ni bshang ma thag pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no// gzhan 'di gshin
318b5(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed la sogs pa'i khro bo rnams ni 'chang par 'gyur ba'i gzugs n+dan te mchod rte de ses med do// gzhol yas khang gi lte bar sna tshogs chu skyes kyi ze 'bru la glenas pa'i seng ge'i steng du pad+ma dang zla ba la 'jam pa'i
318b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ nyi ma gzhon nu'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od dang ldan pa gser gyi mdog can in+d+ra nI la lta bu'i thur phung ngong ldan pa/ rdo rje dang rin po tsha dang pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i phong pa
319a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi steng du sangs rgyas lnga 'phro ba'i rin po che'i cod pan can/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang na bza' can sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams kyi tshogs dang ldan pa/ rtsa ba dang g.yas dang rgyab dang g.yon gyi zhal
319a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o// phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang rdo rje g.yon pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
319a3(rgyud 'grel): pro ti dang / gzhu dang rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa'o// 'dab ma brgyad la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du pad+ma dang zla bo'i dkyil 'khor rnams la shar la sogs pa'i phyogasu gtsug ter chen po dang gdugasra dkar po dang / gzi brjid phung
319a4(rgyud 'grel): po dang rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams rnamasu 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba dang 'phe gang cher 'phags dang rgyal po rnams te/ gtsug tor brgyang po 'di rnams ni rdo rje'i skyil krung
319a5(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i cod pan can/ sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis kyi g.yas pas 'khor lo gyen du gzung ba g.yon pa rang gi gdan la brten pa'o// de nas shar gyi re mig gi dbus su glang po che'i rgyal po la mi bskyod pa sngon po zhal
319a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal sngon po khro zhing sgeg pa dong bcas pa g.yas pa dkar po gdangs shing drag pa/ rgyab ma ser po dpa' ba/ g.yon pa dmar po mche ba gtsigs shing ma mchu mnan pa/ phyag brgyad kyi g.ya rna @
319b1(rgyud 'grel): dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang dril bu dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang rdo rje rgyal po dang rdo rje chags pa dang rdo rje legs pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor ba'o//
319b2(rgyud 'grel): lho'i re mig gi dbus su rta'i rgyal po'i la rin chen 'byung ldan ser po ser po dang sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i zhal can phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing / g.yen pa

319b4(rgyud 'grel): su rma bya la snang ba mtha' yas dmar po dmar po dang nag po dang dkar po dang ser po'i zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang mnga' dang ral gri dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa rnams kyis pad+ma dang
319b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang zhugs pa dang dril bu 'dzin pa/ rdo rje chos dang rdo rje rnon po dang rdo rje rgyu dang rdo rje gsung ba rnams kyis yongasu bskor ba'o// byang gi re mig gi dbus su na mkha' lding la don yod grub pa ljang ku zhal bzhi'i rtsa ba ljang su
319b6(rgyud 'grel): mche ba gtsigs pa/ g.yas pa ser po zhi ga/ rgyab ma dmar po rnam par sgeg pa/ gson pa dkar po zhi ga/ phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang rdo rje dang ma'ir dang lcags kyu 'dzin zhing // g.yon pa rnams kyis sngags
320a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzub dang dril bu dang gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa/ rdo rje las dang rdo rje bsrung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyis bskor ba'o// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rang rang gi
320a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhon pa'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang gos dang cod pan can no// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bcu drug po rnams ni dbang ldan la sogs
320a3(rgyud 'grel): bu'i mtshamasmai gnas pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i sku mdog la sogs pa can no// 'di dag kyang phyogs su gnas pa'o zhes pa'i phyogs kyang yod do// dbang ldan la
320a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i mtshams su gnas pa'i ste tshogs chu skyes dang d+hU bo rnams la/ sems dpa'i skyil krung gi/ spyan ma dang nA ma kI dang gos dkar mo dang sgrol mo rnams ni rim pa lta ba bzhin du/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / mi
320a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa dang / snang ba mtha' yas dang / don yod grub po lta bu'o// sgo rnams la shar du rdo rje lcags kyu dmar ser rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas brkyang gis gnas pa dang / lter rdo rje zhags pa ser po rdo rje
320a6(rgyud 'grel): nags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon brkyang gis gnas pa dang / nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pas sa ga'i stabs kyis gnas pa dang / byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang gu rdo rje bsdams
320b1(rgyud 'grel): ba byal gas kyis rdo rje brib b+hu 'dzin pa zlas blo'i sgru bas+t+ya hrIs g+hanas bA s+t+wa~M/ dz+nyAn+da b+hU nAmas+yA ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa 'al gcig pa/ sprul g+huSh+TaswA pA spyan gsum pa/ d+hAd+tha U dang skAr sar b+h+yo nA
320b2(rgyud 'grel): du'ajos g+ha klu brgyad kyis rkyen gyi brgyan pa'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di la smra phyi rol piHlU 'khor gnyis b+hU la/ shA phyog sa dbang ldan nas brtsams nas g.yo skye sbyor gyis ra~M ma ba dz+rI wA zla bzhin du/ sa ma bcu gnyis
320b3(rgyud 'grel): ni phyag gnyis mA gas pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa rnams kyis rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ de la mos pas sbyong ba'i snga ma pad+ma dmyur po ltar nachu skyes dmar po 'dzin pa dang / rab dga' ma
320b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo yid bzhin g+hi nor bu 'dzin pa dang / dri med me dkar mo chu skyes dkar blo 'dzin pa dang / 'od byeng ma dam rA mo sna tshogs chu skyes laM gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang / 'ong 'phro ma mA r+ya ka ta'i mngog
320b5(rgyud 'grel): s+yA A la ston po 'dzin bya dang / byung ba' mya ser mo pad byi gnas pa'i b+hag gan N+Dal b+his s+yu ra ka t+yA'i na dzin na dang / mngon gyur ma gser gyi sa ga n+dan pad+hA'i snang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
320b6(rgyud 'grel): tsi te 'dzin pa deg ring du song mnamo par ltar sngo bsangs sna tshogs su skyes la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / mi g.yob zla ba'i mdog can zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa rje la pos mtshan po madz+ra
321a1(rgyud 'grel): khengs pa dang bcas pas 'dzin pa dang / legs pa'i blo gros ma dkar mo ral gris mtshan pa'i ut+pa la 'dzin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin ma ser mo chos kyi sprin gyis yongasu bskor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
321a2(rgyud 'grel): po ti 'dzin pa dang / kun tu 'od ma nyin gung gi nyi ma'i mdog can pad+ma'i steng du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshon par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs 'dzin pa'o// lhor pha rol tu phyin ma bcu gnyis ni phyag gnyis ma
321a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa rnams kyis yid bzhin gyi nair bu 'dzin zhing / g.yon pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ shos re be kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni phyag gnyis kyis lhag pa'o// de la rin po che pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyi na ma dmar mi pad+ma la gnas
321a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma dkar dmar gyi mdog can sna tshogs pa'i so ba'i nyi ma 'dzin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin mra dkar mo yal ga dang bcas pa'i mya ngan med pa'i me tog
321a5(rgyud 'grel): gi chun po 'dzin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ma ser mo chu skyes dkar po 'dzin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin mA ma ra ka ta'i mdog can ut+pal+ya sngon po 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin ma na mkha'
321a6(rgyud 'grel): ltar sngo bsangs pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma gser gyi mdog can pad+ma la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin zhing / phyag gnyis kyis chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad pa dang /
321b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma pri yang ku ltar ljang ku chu skyes ser po la gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / smon lam gyi rol tu phyin ma ut+pa la sngon po'i mdog can/ ut+pal sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang / stobs
321b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin mo dam+bAr mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bo ti 'dzin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i 'bras bus brgyan pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi yal ga 'dzin pa dang /
321b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje las kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sna tshogs mdog can oMt+pal sngon po la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin po dang / nub tu dbang mi bcu gnyis nI/ phyag gnyis ma g.yas pa rnams kyis ut+pal 'dzin zhing / g.yon pas bsnyem
321b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas pas rang rong gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ de la tshe la dbang ma dkar dmir gyi mdog can nor bu pad+ma rA ga la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can gyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs 'dzin pa dang /
321b5(rgyud 'grel): sems la dbang ma dkar mo rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po 'dzin pa dang / yo byad la dbang ma ser mo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dang / los la dbang ma ljang ku sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / skye ba la dbang ma
321b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs mdog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mdog can gyi dzA ti'i 'khri shing 'dzin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ma na mkha' ltar sngo bsangs pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'dzin pa dang / mos po la dbang ma
322a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba pr-i yang ku'i me tog gi snye mA 'dzin pa dang / smon lam la dbang ma ser mo ut+pal sngon po 'dzin pa dang / ye shes la dbang mu ston po ut+pal sngon po la gnas pa'o ral gro 'dzin
322a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / chos la dpung ma dkar mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i bum pa bzang po 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin nyid ma dkar mo phyag g.yas bsra pad+ma dkar po 'dzin zhing / g.yon pas rdo rje rin po che'i snye mi 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
322a3(rgyud 'grel): mgaser zhun ma gser zhun ma lta bu g.yas pas chu skyes ser po gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin zhing / g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi steng du 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// byang du gzungs ma bcu gnyis ni// phyag
322a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ma g.yas pa rnams kyis sna tshogs rdo rje dang / g.yon pas bsnyems pa dang bces pas rang rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ de la nor gyi blo gros ma ser mo 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin ma dang / rin chen skar mda' ma dmar mo
322a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin g+hi nor bu'i rgyalha mtshani 'dzin pa dang / gtsug tor rnam par rgya la mA da/ ra mo nur zla ba chu shel gyi bum pa 'dzin pa dang / 'od zer can ma dkar dmar skud pa dang btsas pa'i khab 'dzin pa dang / ri khyod lo ma nan ma
322a6(rgyud 'grel): ljang ku rma bya'i 'jug sgro 'dzin pa dang / dug sel ma dkar mo dug gi me tog gi chun po 'dzin pa dang / sgo mtha' yas ma me tog pr-i yang ku ltar ljang ku chu skyes dmar po la gnas pa'i mi zad pa'i gter chen po'i bum pa 'dzin
322b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / tsun+da ma dkar mo bgrang phreng 'chang ba'i ril pa spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang / shes rab 'phel ma dkar mo ut+pa la sngon po la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ma ljang ku rdo rje rtse
322b2(rgyud 'grel): gsum pas mtshan pa'i pad+ma dkar dmar 'dzin pa dang / ye shes mi zad pa'i za ma tog dmar mo rin po che'i za me tog 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzod ma ser mo pad+ma la gnas pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi
322b3(rgyud 'grel): dpe sgrom 'dzin pa'o// sgo rnams la shar du chos so so yang dag par rig mA dkar dmar phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / lhor don so so yang dag par rig ma ma rA ka ta'i mdog can g.yas pa dang g.yon
322b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag dag gis rin po che'i zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / nub tu nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig ma dmar mo phyag gnyis kyis mtha' gnyisu pad+mas mtshan pa'i lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dang / byang du spobs pa so so yang
322b5(rgyud 'grel): dag par rig ma ma ra ka ta ltar ljang ku phyag gnyis rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i dril bu 'dzin pa'o// mtshams rnamasu mor sgog mo ser mo// sgeg mo dang bcas pa'i phyag dag gis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa dang / bden bral du
322b6(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba ma dmar ser phyag gnyis kyis rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa dang / rlung du glu ma dmar mo phyag dag gis pi wa nga 'dzin zhing sgra sgrog pa dang / dbang ldan du gar ma ljang ku phyag gnyis gar gyi tshul gyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa
323a1(rgyud 'grel): dang dril bu 'dzin pa'o// mos pas spyod pa'i sa ma la sogs pa'i lha mo 'di rnams thams cad ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i rgyan dang // na bza' dang rin po che'i cod pan can/ cung zad 'dzum zhing sgeg pa'i nyams dang
323a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa ste/ khyad par sgo skyong ma rnams ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// gzhan dag ni de rnams kyang zla ba la gnas pa'o// dkyil 'khor gsum pa la
323a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan nas brdzums nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams te/ de la snom bu rnams kyi shar du kun tu bzang po ser po g.yas pas mchog sbyin dang g.yon pas ut+pal la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang / blo gros mi zad pa ser po/
323a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas ral gri dang g.yon pas mi 'jigs pas pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / sa'i snying po ser po g.yas pas sa gnon mdzad cing g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing 'dzin pa dang / na mkha'i snying po ljang ku g.yas pas
323a5(rgyud 'grel): rin po che thams cad kyi char 'bebs shing // g.yon pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'o// lhor na mkha'i mdzod ser po g.yas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang g.yon pas bum pa bzang po la 'phyang ba'i dpag bsam gyi shing
323a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa dang / phyag na rin chen ljang ku g.yas pas rin po che dang / g.yon pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dkar po g.yas pas dung dang g.yon pas ral gri 'dzin pa dang / rdo
323b1(rgyud 'grel): rje snying po ut+pal sngon po'i mdog can g.yas pas rdo rje dang / g.yon pas sa bcu pa'i glegs bam 'dzin pa'o// nub tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkar po g.yas pas mchog sbyin dang g.yon pas chu skyes 'dzin pa dang / mthu
323b2(rgyud 'grel): chen thob pa ser po g.yas pas ral gri dang g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / zla 'od dkar po g.yas pas 'khor lo dang g.yon pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dkar dmar g.yas
323b3(rgyud 'grel): pas ral gri dang g.yon pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i nyi ma 'dzin pa'o// byang du 'od dpag med dkar po g.yas pas sna tshogs chu skyes dong / g.yon pas chu skyes la gnas pa'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa ser po
323b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa se gol gtog cing g.yon pas pad+ma la gnas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pa dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'a joms pa'i blo gros sku oM g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / g.yon pas shak+ti 'dzin pa dang / sgribs pa
323b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad rnam par sel ba sngon po g.yas pas ral gri dang g.yon pas sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa'i bdan 'dzin pa'o// bcu drug po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sems dpa'i skyil krung can rin po
323b6(rgyud 'grel): tsheche'i cod pan dang sna tshogs pa'i rin po che dang na bzas brgyan pa/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa rnams so// sgo rnams la shar du ma he la gshin rje mthar byed nag po gsus pa 'phyang ba zhal drug pa phyag drug pa g.yas/
324a1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis lcags kyu dang / ral gri dang / mda' dang / g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhugs pa dang grwa'u 'dzin pa ste/ zhal dang zhabs kyi khyud pAr+yA nI snga ma bzhin no// lhor shes rab mthur byed
324a2(rgyud 'grel): ser po ser po zhal bzhi pa rtsa ba'i zhal sgeg pa dang bcas pa/ g.yas pa gdangs pa/ rgyab ma drag po chen po'o// g.yon pa zhi ba/ yang na 'dri rnams rim pa ji lta bar/ ser po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ljang ku'o// 'di'i
324a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis zhags pa dang / rdo rje dang ral gri dang / mnga' dang / g.yon pa rnams kyi dril bu dang shak+ti dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// nub tu pad+ma mthar byed dmar po zhal dmar po bzhi'i rtsa ba dang g.yas dang
324a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyob dang g.yon gyi zhal rnams sgeg pa dang drag pa dang bzhud pa dang zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa/ yang na 'di rnams dmar po dang nag po dang ser po dang dkar po'o// phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis rdo rje'i lcags sgrog dang / g.yas pa
324a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda'/ g.yon pa rnams kyi dril bu dang sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / gzhu 'dzin pa ste/ gsum po 'di dag ni rol pa'i kun tu bskyod pas gnas pa'o// byang du bgegs mthar
324a6(rgyud 'grel): byed sngon po zhal sngon po bzhi pa/ yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang ku/ phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pa'i tshul gyis dril bu dang / g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang mda' dang lcags kyu
324b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub drang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang gzhu dang dril bu 'dzin pa g.yon brkyang gis log 'dren mnan nas bzhugs pa'o// mtshams rnams la dbang ldan du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
324b2(rgyud 'grel): ba skyon po zhal sngon po bzhi'i rtsa ba b+h+yo zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa g.yas drag go/ rgyab dpa' ba/ g.yon mi sdug pa'i nyams can yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o// phyag brgyad kyi gnyis kyis rdo rje
324b3(rgyud 'grel): dang dril bu thugs kar gzung nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ g.yas pa rnams kyis ral gri dang lcags kyu dang mda'// g.yon pa rnams kyis rdo rje dang zhags pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang bas dbang phyug chen
324b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i mgro dang / g.yas bskum pas uta ma'i nu ma mnan pa'i// mer rdo rje nyi ma me lhur 'bar ba nag po// sgeg pa drang dpa' ba dang 'jig su rung ba dang snying rje'i nyams dang ldan pa'i zhal bzhi pa/ yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang dkar
324b5(rgyud 'grel): bo dang ser po dang / dmar po/ 'di'i phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams rdo rje dang ral gri dang mda' dang 'khor lo 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa rnams kyi dril bu dang zhags pa dang gzhu dang kha TAng+ga dang 'brel ba'i ba dan 'dzin pa/ chung ma dang
324b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i khyab 'jug g.yas brkyang gis mnan nas bzhugs pa'o// bden bral du he ru ka sngon po zhal sngon po bzhi'i rtsa ba drag go// g.yas pa rab tu dga' bas bzhad pa/ rgyab ma za bar rngam pa/ g.yon pa sgeg pa dang bcas
325a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ yang na 'di rnams sngon po dang dmar po dang ljang ku dang dkar po dang / phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo rje rtse ba dang mda' dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa/ g.yon pa rnam gru snying kar pad+ma kha bya ba dang gzhu
325a2(rgyud 'grel): dang kha T+Tang+ga dril bu ba dan dang bcas pa 'dzin zhing // gnyis kyis 'jig rten byed chen po'i lpags pa rlung ras lta bu 'dzin pa chung ma dang bcas pa'i tshangs pa g.yon brkyang gis mnan nus bzhugs pa'o// rlung ngu rta mchog ljang ku zhal
325a3(rgyud 'grel): ljang ku bzhi'i rtsa ba khro zhing sgeg pa dang bcas pa// g.yas pa drag po/ g.yon po tshangs pa'i gdong can/ yang na 'di rnams ljang ku dang sngon po dang dkar po ste spyi bor rta mgo ljang ku/ 'di'i phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa sna tshogs rdo rje ba
325a4(rgyud 'grel): dan dang ldan pas bsgreng ba'i tshul dang / gnyis pas ba dan gsum pa'i tshul dang / gsum pa ral gri/ bzhi pas mda'/ g.yon pas phub dang bcas pa'i phyag gis sna tshogs chu skyes dang / gsum pa shak+Shi dang dbyug pa dang
325a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhu 'dzin pa/ gAyas brkyang ba dang g.yon brkyang ba ste zhabs bzhi pa/ g.yas pa cig gis dbang mo dang dpal mo// gnyis pas dga' ma dang rangs ma/ g.yon pa cig gis dbang po dang sbrang rtsir byed pa/ gnyis pas rgyal bar
325a6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa dang dpyid kyi lha mnan nas bzhugs pa'o// 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi sdang ga steng gi namakhar gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba ser po/ zhal ser po bzhi pa/ yang na ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang zhal
325b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad kyi g.yas pa rnams kyis 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang ral gri dang mda'// g.yon pa rnams kyis dril bu dang zhags pa dang bgrang phreng dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ rol pa'i kun tu bskyod pas bzhugs pa'o// 'og
325b2(rgyud 'grel): tu gnod mdzes rgyal po nagra go drag po dang zhi ba dang bzhad po dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'i zhal nag po bzhi pa/ yang na nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po ri zhal bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis rdo
325b3(rgyud 'grel): rje dang lcags kyu dang ral gre dang mda'// g.yon pa rnams kyis dris bu pa dgra pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang gzhu 'dzin pa/ g.yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa'o// khro bo bcu po 'di rnams ni sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi la gnas pa
325b4(rgyud 'grel): zhalnga re re zhing dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum pA/ smin ma 'khyog pa dang bcas// stag gi lpags pa'i gos dang smad g.yog can// thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan dang ldan pa/ debu skra dmar ser 'bar ba gyena? du
325b5(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa sma ru dmar sA rwa can gdengs can gyi dbang po brgyad dang ldan pas 'jig su rung ba'o// dkyil 'khor gsum pa nyid kyi grwa bzhi'i nang du 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i
325b6(rgyud 'grel): khro bo bzhi'i phyi'i re kha'i phyi rol gyi gnasu me la sogs pa'i zer thig bzhi po rnams kyi g.yas log su me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi dang g.yon logs su rdo rje gzugs ma la ste// de la me tog ma ser mo
326a1(rgyud 'grel): phyug na me tog gi snod can dang / bdug spos mA nag mo phyag na spros par can dang / mar me mya dmar mo phyag na rin po che'i sgron ma'i mchod sdong can dang / dri chab ma ljang ku phyag na dri'i dung can dang / rdo rje gzugs ma
326a2(rgyud 'grel): ser mo phyag na mi long can dang / rdo rje sgra ma ljang ku phyag nA bi wa da can dang / rdo rje ro ma dmar mo phyag na dri'i snod can dang / rdo rje reg bya ma sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag na gos sna tshogs can no// brgyad po 'di rnams ni phyag
326a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ma rin po che'i cod pan can rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rin po che dang gos kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba la sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o// bzhi pa rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la// dbang po'i phyogasu sro srungs
326a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po la gnas pa'i dbang po ser po rdo rje dang nu ma 'dzin pa dang / gshin rje'i mA he la gshin rje nag po dbyug pa dang mdung 'dzin pa/ chur chu srin la chu bdag dkar po gdengs ka bdun pa klu'i zhags pa dang dung 'dzin pa
326a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / lus ngan du mi lA gnas pa'i lus ngan po ser po ljags kyu dang dbyus to 'dzin pa dang / dbang ldan du glang la gnas pa'i dbang ldan dkar po rtsa gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ rol pa'i thor cog la thod pa dang zla ba phyed
326a6(rgyud 'grel): pas brgyan zhing sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa mgrin pa sngon po dang / mi ra ra la me lha dmar po blugs gabar dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang / bden bral du rol srin po'i bdag po bden dral ba sngon po ral gri dang
326b1(rgyud 'grel): phub 'dzin pa dang / rlung du ri dgags la rlung lha sngon po rlung ras 'dzin pa ste/ brgyad po 'di rnams ni phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pas phyag mtshan dang po dang / g.yon pas gnyis pa 'dzin zhing rang snang gi btsun mo la 'khyud pa/
326b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas bdud pa'o// dbang ldan dang nye ba'i phyi rol tu dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas rim pas tshangs pa la sogs pa ste/ de yang ngadra pa la tshangs pa ser ba zhal bzhi pa/ phyag
326b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa/ bgrang phreng dang chu skyes 'dzin zhing g.yas pa dang cig shos dag thal mo sbyar bse dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// mkha' lding la khyab 'jug nag po phyag bzhi pa dang po gnyis 'khor lo dang dung 'dzin
326b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis thal mo sbyar bas dbyug to dang sa raM ga'i gzhu 'dzin pa'o// glang lnga dbang phyug dkar po ri bong gis mtshan ma'i ral pa'i thor cog can+da// phyag bzhi pa spyi bor thal mo sbyar ba dang
326b5(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// rma bya lnga gdong drug dmar po zhal drug pa phyag drug pa g.yas pa dag gis shak+ti dang rdo rje dang / g.yon pa dag gis khyim bya dang dril bu 'dzin zhing gnyis kyis thal mo sbyor ba'o//
326b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams kyang snga ma bzhin du rang snang gi btsun mo la 'khyud pa'o// tshangs ma ni tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa'o// drag mo ni drag po dang mtshungs pa'o// khyab 'jug ma ni khyab 'jug dang mtshungs pa'o// gzhon nu
327a1(rgyud 'grel): mA ni gzhon nu dang mtshungs pa'o// dbang mo nI dbang po dang mtshungs pa'o// phag mo nag mo 'ag pa la gnas mu phyag bzhi ma g.yas pa dang cig shos dag giswa ro hi ta dang thod pa 'dzin zhing
327a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis thal sbyar ba'o// yI dgas kyi steng du tsa mur+t+ti dmar mo phyag bzhi ma g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin zhing gzhan pa dag gis thal mo sbyar ba'o// b+h+r-ing+gi ni ma nag mo shin tu skem pa
327a3(rgyud 'grel): bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin zhing gnyis kyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// byi ba la tshogs bdag dkar po glang po tshwa'i gdong ba can sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa/ phyag bzhi pa g.yas dag gis rtse gsum dang la du
327a4(rgyud 'grel): gson pa drag gis dgra sta dang la phug 'dzin pa'o// nag po chen po nag po rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// dga' byed dbang phyug nag po rdzu rnga la zhen zhing rdza rnga brdung bar brtson pa'o// rtswa bdun pa'i
327a5(rgyud 'grel): shing rta la nyi ma dmar po g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis pad+ma la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// ngang pa la zla ba dkar po gas ba dang g.yon pa dag g+h+ri ku mu ta la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o//
327a6(rgyud 'grel): ral bkra shis dmar po g.yas pas chu gri dang g.yon pas mi'i mgo bo zla ba'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa'o// pad+ma la gza' lhag ser po mdar dang gcu 'dzin pa'o// sbal ba 'am thod pa la phur bu dkar po bkrang
327b1(rgyud 'grel): phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// pad+ma lA ba sangs dkar po bsrung phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// ru sbal la spen pa nag po dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o// sgra gcan dmar nag phyag dag gis nyi ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o// mjug rings
327b2(rgyud 'grel): nag po ral gri dung klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// glang po la stobs bzangs dkar po ral gri dang gshol 'dzin pa'o// khu byug gi shing rta la rgyal bar byed ljang ku phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis me tog phreng ba dang
327b3(rgyud 'grel): mda'o// g.yon pa dag gis btung ba'i snod drang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// naM gtse'i shing rta la sbrang rdzir byed pa dkar po phyag bzhi pa g.yas dag gis chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang mda'/ g.yon pa dag gis btung
327b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i snod dang gzhu 'dzin pa'o// spre'u li dpyid kyi lha dkar po phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa dag gis mda' dang ral gri/ g.yon pa dag gis gzhu dang btung ba'i snod 'dzin pa'o// mtha'
327b5(rgyud 'grel): yas dang nor rgyus dang 'jog po dang stobs rgyu dang pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dang dung skyong dang rig ldan rnams ni sbrul gyi gdengs kra bdun dang ldan pa/ thal mo sbyar ba ste/ yang na rang rang gi yab kyi phyag
327b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gtso bo dang ldan pas thal mo sbyar ba'o// thig bzangs ris dang stobs ldan dang tshim byed la sog sa pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams ni nag po g.yul 'gyed par go cha gyon pa ral gri dang
328a1(rgyud 'grel): phub la stsogs b+ha sna tshog su pa'i mtshon chu phyag na 'dzin pa'o// na mkha' lding gi dbang po gshegs pa rab tu brkyang ba smras mo'i bar du dkar ba/ de'i steng nas lte ba'i bar du ser go// lte ba'i steng nas
328a2(rgyud 'grel): mgrin pa'i bar du dmar po// de'i steng nas spyi bo'i bar nag po// phyag dag gis thal mo sbyar ba'o// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po dmar ser po wang gi sgra sgrogs par brtson pa'o// dri za'i rgyal po zung phud lnga pa ser po pi wang gi
328a3(rgyud 'grel): sgyu sgrogs pa'o// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang po don thams cad grub pa dkar po me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// gang ba bzang po sngon po dang / nor bu bzang po ser po dang / nor sbyin dmar po dang / rnam thos sras ser po dang /
328a4(rgyud 'grel): ci pi ku N+Da li dmar po dang / ki li mA lI ljang ku dang sgro'i dbang po ser po dang / spyod pa'i dbang po ser po ste/ gang ba bzang po la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'di rnams ni g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis
328a5(rgyud 'grel): bi dza pU ri ka'i 'bras bu dang ne'u le 'dzin pa'o// 'phrog ma ser mo chang bu gnyis 'dzin pa bu dang bcas pa'o// tha skar dkar po dang / bra nye ljang gu dang / sbyin drug sngo sangs dang / snar ma dmar skya dang / mgau nag po dang
328a6(rgyud 'grel): lag ser po dang / rgyal sngo sangs dang / skag dkar po dang / mchu ser po dang / bre me tog pr-i yang su ltar ljang ser dang / dbo ljang ku dang / mi bzhi dkar po dang / nag pa ljang ku dang / sa ri ser bo dang / sa ga nag po dang /
328b1(rgyud 'grel): lha mtshams ljang ku dang / snron ser po dang / sbubs ser po dang / chu stod nag po dang / chu smang dkar po dang / gro zhin dkar ser dang / mon gre nag po dang / mon gru ser po dang / khrums stong ljang ku dang / khrums smad ser po
328b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / nam gru dkar po dang / byi bzhin sngo sangs te/ tha skar la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams ni g.yo ba dang bcas pa'i stod g.yogs yongasu 'dzin pa thal mo sbyar ba'o// gzhan yang lha rnams ni 'khor los 'dren pa'i khang
328b3(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs la gnas par shes par bya ste/ dbang po la sogs pa'i lha 'di rnams pad+ma la gnas pa/ re re'ang 'khor dpag tu med pas bskor ba/ 'byor ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa skye tshogs pa'i gos dang rin po che brgyan
328b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing bkra shis kyi tshigasu bcad pa'i sgra phyogs thams cang du sgrogasdu pa'o// shor la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs sgro skyong rnam
328b5(rgyud 'grel): ni snying po'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bya bzhin no// 'dir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin 'jam pa'i dbyangs shin du rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la rang dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems
328b6(rgyud 'grel): dpas rgyas btab pa'o// me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang gtsug tor brgyad dang / spyan ma rnams la 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis so// rdo rje
329a1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi dang / mA ma ki dang / rdo rje lcags kyu dang / sa ma bcu gnyis dang chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang sgeg mo dang kun du bzang mo la sogs pa bzhi dang khro bo bcu dang / me tog
329a2(rgyud 'grel): ma dang gzugs ma dang shar phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la mi bskyed pas// rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa bzhi dang rdo rje zhags pa dang pha rol tu phyin ma bcu gnyis dang / don so so yang dag par rig ma dang / phreng
329a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ma dang na mkha' mdzod la sogs pa bzhi dung bdug spros ma dang sgyu ma dang / lho phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la rin chen 'byung ldan gyiso// rdo rje chos la sogs pa bzhi dang gos dkar mo dang rdo rje lcags sgrogs
329a4(rgyud 'grel): dang tshe dang dbang ma bcu gnyis dang nges pa'i tshig so sor yang dag par rig ma dang glu ma dang spyan zas gzigs la sogs pa bzhi dang / mar me ma dang ro ma dang / nub phyogs gnas pa'i lha rnams la 'od dpag med kyiso//
329a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje las rab la sogs pa bzhi drung sgrol ma dang rdo rje 'beb pa dang / gzungs mA bcu gnyis dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig ma dang gyur ma dang 'od dpag med l-I sogs pa bzhi dang dri chub ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma
329a6(rgyud 'grel): dang / byang phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams la don yod grub pas rgyas ba ta'o// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi thugs ka'i sa bon ni muH'o// oM a aHsarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya ha ra ha ra/ oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga wAn dz+nyA na mur+t+ti wA
329b1(rgyud 'grel): gI shwa ra/ ma hA wA tsa/ sar+b+ba d+harmA ga ga nA a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+haR+Ya d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha aHzhes pa snying po'i sngags so// oM a mr-i ta ku N+Da li big+h+nat+ta ka hUM/ zhes pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags tre/ las thams cad pa'o//
329b2(rgyud 'grel): ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje gur gyi nang du rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang ri rab kyi steng gi gzhal yas khang gi dbus su/ nang gau dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ser po// rdo rje phreng ba sngon
329b3(rgyud 'grel): pos yongs su bskor ba ste 'ga' zhig 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa sngon por gsungs la/ gzhan du ni 'di'i 'khor lo'i lte ba sngon po dang / rtsibs rnams kyi shar dkar po dang / lho nag po dang / nub dmar po dang / byang
329b4(rgyud 'grel): ljangs ku'o zhes gsungs so// 'khor lo'i lte bar sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i seng ge'i steng du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya seng ge rnam par mdzad chen po gser gyi mdog can chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad
329b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje gtsug tor dkar po si bon gyi phyag rgya can no// lho'i rtsibs la rin chen gtsug tor sngon po mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya can no// nub kyi rtsibs la pad+ma gtsug tor dalnga po bas mau gtan gyi phyag
329b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya can no// byang gi rtsibs la sna tshogs gtsug tor ljang ku mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa'o// me'i rtsibs la gzi brjid gtsug/ tor dkar dmar 'dres pa'i mdog can phyag g.yas pas nyi ma 'dzin cing
330a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa dkur bsten pa'o// bden bral gyi rtsibs la rgyal mtshan gtsug tor dmar po dang / 'dres pa'i nag po phyag dag gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o// rlung gi rtsibs la rnon po'i gtsug
330a2(rgyud 'grel): tor na mkha' ltar sngo sangs phyag g.yas pa ral gri dang g.yon pas po ti 'dzin pa'o// dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la gdugs can gtsug tor dkar po phyag dag dag gis gdugs 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol me la sogs
330a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshams rnams su sgeg mo dang phreng ba dang glu ma dang gar ma rnams ni/ dkar mo dang / ser mo dang / dmar myo dang / sna tshogs kyi mdog can phyag gnyis ma'o// snam bu rnam la sgo'i g.yon du byang chub sems dpa' gnyis
330a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas gnyis te/ de yang shar gyi snum bu la byams pa ser po g.yas pas klu shing gi me tog dang / g.yon pas spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang / mthong ba don yod ser po phyag g.yas pas spyan dang bcas pa'i pad+ma 'dzin zhing /
330a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang / ngan song kun 'dren dkar po phyag gnyis kyis lcags kyu 'dzin pa dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dkar ser bsres pa'i mdog can phyag g.yas dbyug
330a6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa'o// lho phyogs su spos kyi glang po dka lo ljang gnas pas dril bu ches 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brtan pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba dkar po g.yas pa ral gri
330b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang / na mkha'i mdzad dkar ser g.yas pa pad+ma la gnas pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang / ye shes trog sngon po phyag g.yas pa yid
330b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin zhing g.yon pa'i khu tshur brten pa'o// nub tu bdud rtsi 'od dkar po g.yas pa cod pan gyi steng du bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur rten pa dang / zla ba'i 'od dkar po
330b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs 'dzin zhing // g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa dang / bzang skyong dkar po g.yas pa 'bar ba'i 'od can gyi rin po che 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa'i khu chur dkur brten pa dang / dra
330b4(rgyud 'grel): ba can gyi 'od dkar po g.yas pa rdo rje'i gur 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brtan pa'o// byang du rdo rje snying po sngon skya g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i ut+pa la sngon po 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa
330b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / blo gros mi zad pa dkar po phyag gnyis kyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dmar po g.yas pa chu skyes la gnas pa'i rin po che brtsegs pa 'dzin zhing / g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur
330b6(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa dang / kun tu bzang po gser gyi mdog can phyag g.yas pa rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa'i khu tshur dgur brtan pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su me tog ma dang bdug spos ma dang
331a1(rgyud 'grel): mar me ma dang dri chab ma rnams ni dkar mo dang nag mo dang dmar mo dang ljang ku ste me tog ma la sogs pa 'dzin pa'o// sgo rnams la shar du rdo rje lcags kyu dkar po/ phyag gnyis kyis lcags 'dzin pa
331a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / lhor rdo rje zhags pa sngon po phyag gnyis kyis zhag pa 'dzin pa dang / nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrogs dmar po phyag gnyis rdo rje lcags sgrogs 'dzin pa dang / byang du rdo rje 'bebs pa ljang ku phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu
331a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o// lha sum bcu rtsa bdun po 'di rnams kyang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gis dang / rin po ches brgyan po rin po che'i cod pan can/ spyan gnyis pa phyag gnyis pa sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba rnams la sems dpa'i
331a4(rgyud 'grel): skyil dkrung gis bzhugs pa'o// 'dir rnam par snang mdzad chen po la rang dang 'dra ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa'o// rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa bzhi la rnam par snang mdzad chen pos so// shar phyogs
331a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / me mtshams na gnas pa'i lha rnams la rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so// lho phyogs dang bden bral gyi mtshams na gnas pa rnams la rin chen gtsug tor gyis so// nub phyogs dang rlung gis mtshams na gnas pa rnams
331a6(rgyud 'grel): la pad+ma gtsug tor gyiso// byang phyogs dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams nas gnas pa rnams la sna tshogs gtsug tor gyis so// 'dir phyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i gnas kyi snam bu la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa brgyad po
331b1(rgyud 'grel): blta bar bya'o// zhes sbyong rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir// 'dod yon gyi snam bu la byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dgod pa ni yang dag par rigs so// kha cig ni nang gi dkyil 'khor zhes rgyud las gsungs pas phyi'i gzhal
331b2(rgyud 'grel): yas khang gi nang du gzhal yas khang gnyis pa'o zhes smra'o// 'ga' zhig tu ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgu po gtsug tor dang bcas pa dge slong gi tshe lugs 'dzin pa'o zhes bshad do// de
331b3(rgyud 'grel): ni mi rigs te chags pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs can 'khor lo sgyur ba'i gzugs su mngon par sprul pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro// pad+ma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba dang / khor yug gi nang du dbang ldan gyi
331b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams nas brtsams te g.yas skor gyis mgrin pa sngon po la sogs pa dgod par bya ste/ de nas dbang ldan nas glang la mgrin pa sngon po dkar po sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/ phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang mchog sbyin
331b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyag rgya dang / g.yon pa dag na rtse gsum dang ral gri'o// na mkha' lding la khyab 'jug nug po g.yas pa pa dag na dbyug to dang rdo rje dang / g.yon pa dgra mdung dang 'khor lo'o// rdo rje gser ma khyab 'jug lta bu ste khyad pa
331b6(rgyud 'grel): ni gser gyi mdog can no// rma bya la rdo rje dril bu zhal drug pa dmar po g.yes pa dag na shak+ti dang rdo rje dang / g.yon pa dag ni khyim bya dang rdo rje dril bu'o// rdo rje gzhonu ma ni rdo rje dril bu lta bu'o// ngang pa la mi sgra rdo rje ser po
332a1(rgyud 'grel): zhal bzhi pa/ g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang bgrang phreng dang / g.yon pa drug na dbyug pa dung spyi blugs so// rdo rje zhi ba ma ni tshangs pa lta bu'o// so ldan gyi dbang po dkar po ma che ba drug pa dang / zla ba la rdo rje mtshon/
332a2(rgyud 'grel): cha ser po phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i// g.yon pas rdo rje dkar brtan pa'o// lha mo rdo rje khu tshur ma ni rdo rje mtshon cha lta bu'o// rta bdun gyi shing rta la rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo dmar po phyag g.yas pa na pad+ma dang / g.yon pa na
332a3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma la gnas pA'i nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor ro// rdo rje bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje 'khyil pa lta bu'o// dang po la rdo rje'i 'od khro bo dkar po g.yas pa na rdo rje dang g.yon pa na pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla bo'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje
332a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog ma ninI rdo rje'i 'od lta bu'o// ra lA rdo rje dmyur ser khri bo dmyur po phyag gA yas nAM rdo rje dang g.yon pas mI bzung nas za ba'i chu'o// rdo rje ska rags ma ni rdo rje dmar sir lta bu'o// pad+ma la rdo rje zhi ba khro bo ser po mda' dang
332a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhu can no// rdo rje zhi ba ma ni rdo rje zhi ba lte bu'o// sbal pa la rdo rje bla mo khro bo ser po bgrang dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ rdo rje bla ma ni rdo rje lta bu'o// pad+ma la rdo rje pa sangs khro bo dkar po bgrang phreng dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje
332a6(rgyud 'grel): pa sangs ma ni rdo rje pa sangs lte bu'o// ru sbal la rdo rje dbugs pa khro bo nag po g.yas pa ni rdo rje dang / g.yon pa ni dbyug pa'o// rdo rje dbyug pa ma ni rdo rje dbyug pa lta bu'o// rdo rje sgra gcan khro bo dmar nag g.yas
332b1(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag na zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can no// rdo rje lha min mo ni rdo rje sgra gcan lta bu'o// rdo rje mjug rings khro bo nag po ral gri dang klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje klu mo ni rdo rje mjug rings lta bu'o//
332b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po 'di dag dang rdo rje zhi ba la sogs pa drug ni rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa ltar bris pa'o// glang po che la rdo rje glang sna dkar po g.yas pa na rdo rje dang g.yon pa na thong gshol lo// rdo rje 'dul ba ma ni rdo rje glang
332b3(rgyud 'grel): sna lta bu ste khyad par no g.yon pas kha thAd+ha'o// khu ga gi shing rta la rdo rje phreng ba can ljang ku g.yas pa na rdo rje dang / g.yon pa na me tog gi phreng ba'o// rdo rje gdan ma ni rdo rje phreng ba can lta bu ste khyad par ni phyag g.yon
332b4(rgyud 'grel): ni kha shak+ti'o// ne gtse'i shing rta la rdo rje dbang can ser po g.yas na rdo rje dang / g.yon na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan no// rdo rje dbyang canA ma ni rdo rje dpyang can lta bu s+t+waM khyad par ni sku mdog dmar mo'o// sbal pa'i shing rta la
332b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje dkar po rdo rje dang ral g+hi 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gdan mA ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba lta bu'o// me tog gi shIng rta la rdo rje gshun shing ser po g.yas pa dang g.yon pa dag gis rdo rje gtun
332b6(rgyud 'grel): shing 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje pho nya mo ni rdo rje gtun shing lta bu ste g.yon pas kha T+wAMng+ga 'dzin pa'i khyad par ro// ra la rdo rje me dmar po g.yas pa dag ni rdo rje dang go cha/ g.yon pas dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o//
333a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'bar ba ma ni rdo rje me lta bu'o// ma he la rdo rje dus nug po rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// ro langs la rdo rje dus ma nAg po rdo rje dang kha nung+ga 'dzin pa'o// klu lcug ma rnams la rdo rje
333a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu sngon po phag gi gdong pU can rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// skyes bu la rdo rje gdong ma sngon po phyag pa'i gdong can ma rdo rje dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o// chu srin la rdo rje klu dkaT po gdengs ka brgyad dang ldan/
333a3(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yas na rdo rje dang / g.yon na klu'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// chu srin la rdo rje 'jigs ma chu srin mya dkar mo gdengs ka brgyad dang ldan pa g.yas na rdo rje dang / g.yon na rdo rje mtshan pa'i chu srin cano// ri dwags la rdo rje
333a4(rgyud 'grel): rlung sngon po g.yas na rdo rje dang g.yon na rlung ras can no// rdo rje shugs can ma ni rdo rje rlung lta bu'o// ro langs la rdo rje 'jigs byed sngon po rdo dang dbyugs te 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rnam par gtsigs sa ni rdo rje 'jigs
333a5(rgyud 'grel): byed lte bu'o// g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa ni khyad paro// byi ba la rdo rje legs 'dren dkar po glang po che'i gdong can phyag g.yas pa dag gis rdo rje dang dgra sta 'dzin zhing // g.yon pa dag gis rtse gsum
